name: Loft Gio Rodrigues Studio by Porto City Hosts
summary: Located in the center of Porto, this excellent studio was recently refurbished, offering a modern and cozy atmosphere. Due to its location it is perfect to get to know the city. This will definitely be a great choice. It is located between the station of S. Bento and Praça da Batalha, with Rua de Santa Catarina (largest shopping street in Portugal) 2 minutes walk. It is 10 minutes from the magnificent bridge D. Luís and its view on the Douro River. Tranquility and comfort in downtown Porto!
space: The apartment is located in one of the most central areas of the city, close to the shopping streets and the most sought after restaurants in Porto. 50m from Rua de Santa Catarina, the busiest and most commercial street in Oporto. This studio is located on the 1st floor and does not have an elevator. The apartment has been recently refurbished, having a cozy atmosphere and suitable to know the city of Porto. This has a bedroom with a double bed 160x200, a bathroom and a kitchnette. The kitchnette is fully equipped with all the accessories to make your meals. The windows around the studio give it a unique brightness. The apartment manages to combine tranquility, with proximity to historical destinations quickly and quietly.
description: Located in the center of Porto, this excellent studio was recently refurbished, offering a modern and cozy atmosphere. Due to its location it is perfect to get to know the city. This will definitely be a great choice. It is located between the station of S. Bento and Praça da Batalha, with Rua de Santa Catarina (largest shopping street in Portugal) 2 minutes walk. It is 10 minutes from the magnificent bridge D. Luís and its view on the Douro River. Tranquility and comfort in downtown Porto! The apartment is located in one of the most central areas of the city, close to the shopping streets and the most sought after restaurants in Porto. 50m from Rua de Santa Catarina, the busiest and most commercial street in Oporto. This studio is located on the 1st floor and does not have an elevator. The apartment has been recently refurbished, having a cozy atmosphere and suitable to know the city of Porto. This has a bedroom with a double bed 160x200, a bathroom and a kitchnette. The kitchnette is
neighborhood_overview: Perfect space for holidays and / or a professional stay. Turning off the apartment and going out onto the street, turn to your right you will find Rua de Santa Catarina - the most commercial and typical street of Porto - just 50 meters away. If you turn left, you are 3 minutes away, Avenida dos Aliados, with quick access to all the historical areas of the city of Porto, such as the D. Luís Bridge (7 mn) with its incredible view over the River Douro, Ribeira (11 mn), the Lello bookstore and the Clérigos Tower, 9 minutes away. It is located 10 minutes from Praça dos Poveiros, one of the most typical places and most sought after by the gastronomic offer. The famous Santiago restaurant, with the best francesinhas of Porto, Casa Guedes and the famous pork sandwiches with mountain cheese; Since 1927, Buraquinho has been serving guts, soup, rojões, chispe and sarrabulho popes; In the Plaza Caffé Prego, which has a sunny terrace all day, the specialties are the sirloin with arouquesa with sier
notes: Perfect guests ... - Turn off the air conditioning / heater and lights before leaving the apartment. The environment and we thank you! - Make conscious use of water to avoid waste. The environment and we thank you! - Respect the hours of silence, avoiding noise after 10pm. - Respect the common areas of the building, avoiding noise. - Smoking is not a problem in the street, but tobacco smoke triggers the alarm, as well as adding hard-to-eliminate smells from the apartment. - Put garbage in the public container daily to avoid unpleasant odors in the apartment. - Before you check out, make sure the entrance doors to the building are unlocked. - If you notice any abnormality in the apartment, let us know immediately. - Enjoy tremendously our city, Oporto! Thank you for being a perfect guest!
transit: On the metro, from Francisco Sá Carneiro Airport, take line E and exit at Bolhão station (direction Estádio do Dragão). After leaving, you have to walk 500m to your apartment, located on 31 Janeiro street.
access: All areas of the studio are available for guests with complete privacy.
interaction: The Porto City Hosts team is always available to assist and help you have a lovely stay.
house_rules: We would like to inform our guests that we can provide: - Breakfast in the apartment for an additional cost of  8€ - Transfer from/ to the Airport by 25€ (up to 4 people) or 45€ (up to 8 people) - City Tours  - Douro Valley Tours  Property Rules: -Every guest is required to provide a valid credit card number, expiration date and cvc number at the time the reservation is requested. The credit card will be used to guarantee payment for any incidentals or charges not previewed in the reservation -You can drop your luggage at our downtown office, next to Aliados metro station from 9am to 6pm, subject to prior information. -Towels and sheets are included for your stay. The change of towels and sheets is free for bookings of more than 8 per day. -Extra cleaning is available upon prior request, at the rate of cleaning fee. -Toilet amenities will be provided for the first 3 days of the stay. -Extra towels are available on request for an extra fee of 3€ per set of towels per person. -Please als

host.host_about:
Porto City Hosts is a tourism team. We receive our guests with professional quality and local charm. We make guests feel well accompanied during their stay and we help them to enjoy unforgettable tourist experiences with the confidence of having a team focused on their well being!

We are also passionate about travel and new places! We like to know new cultures, landscapes, palates and smells. We like to introduce our city of Porto, share new sensations with our suggestions, lived in the first person.
There are walks by the sea, boat cruises on the UNESCO World Heritage Douro river, walks through the old streets of Oporto. You can listen to orchestras at the House of Music, smell the books at the Lello bookstore, where the Harry Potter writer was inspired, visit the cellars and drink Port wine, eat Francesinha, tripas à moda do Porto, bacalhau or visit the farms where the grapes are harvested to produce the idyllic Porto.

name: Plateau Apartment - Ideal for Students
summary: Located in the heart of the Plateau Mont-Royal, only 1 block away from St. Laurent Boul. Close to many restaurants, bars, nightclubs, cafés, pharmacy, and grocery stores. Near the Mountain and Park Mount Royal.  Close to bus 55, which takes you right downtown.  Also close to Metro Stations Sherbrooke and Mont-Royal.  The apartment has 4 bedrooms; 1 of them located in the basement, a cosy living room, a fully equipped kitchen, 1 bathroom on the main floor and half bathroom in the basement.
space: The apartment is generally occupied by international students. It has 4 bedrooms; 1 of them located in the basement, a cosy living room, a fully equipped kitchen, 1 bathroom on the main floor and half bathroom in the basement.
description: Located in the heart of the Plateau Mont-Royal, only 1 block away from St. Laurent Boul. Close to many restaurants, bars, nightclubs, cafés, pharmacy, and grocery stores. Near the Mountain and Park Mount Royal.  Close to bus 55, which takes you right downtown.  Also close to Metro Stations Sherbrooke and Mont-Royal.  The apartment has 4 bedrooms; 1 of them located in the basement, a cosy living room, a fully equipped kitchen, 1 bathroom on the main floor and half bathroom in the basement. The apartment is generally occupied by international students. It has 4 bedrooms; 1 of them located in the basement, a cosy living room, a fully equipped kitchen, 1 bathroom on the main floor and half bathroom in the basement. You can have access to the entire apartment: kitchen, washer and dryer, bathroom, and living room. I try to always be available to help you out throughout your stay. If not me, my co-host Karla will be there to assist you. The Plateau is the best window to view the real Montréal
neighborhood_overview: The Plateau is the best window to view the real Montréal. Here you’ll find a predominantly francophone community featuring an eclectic mix of artists, students, yuppies, and young families, spiced with a healthy dose of other cultures and languages to raise the diversity quotient that much higher. Round it off with a wealth of interesting shops, cafés, pubs and bars, not to forget black-box theatres, art galleries and gourmet shops, and you’ve got a free-spirited, creative atmosphere where all walks of life converge. The Plateau by night heats up with as many choices of clubs, bars and cafés as you could think of, ranging from fashionable martini lounges to local microbrewery pubs to high-octane coffee shops. Throw in a thriving arts scene where local artists take to the stage nightly, and you’ve got the makings for a perfect night on the town.
notes: We also rent the apartment outside Airbnb through our Accommodation for International Students Agency.; therefore, you might be sharing the apartment mainly with international students. It is very important to note that we give preference to stays that last an entire school semester; however, we are open to shorter stays depending on the availability. Roommates are generally young people who are in Montreal studying at university or in language schools as well as young professionals. All from different countries and living in a shared apartment because of their interest to interact and learn from other cultures as well as sharing their own.
transit: This apartment is located at the Plateau Mont Royal, one block away from Saint Laurent Boulevard. Located at a 3-minute walk to bus 55 which takes you to Place des Arts metro station (green line); a 10-minute walk to bus 24 which takes you downtown in about 15 - 20 minutes;  a 14-minute walk to Mont Royal metro station (orange line); and 3-minute walk to bus 29 (east and west directions).  Distance to main universities and language schools by public transportation: - Concordia University: 28 minutes; - McGill University: 22 minutes; - UQAM: 22 minutes - ILSC Language School: 30 minutes; - GEOS Language School: 21 minutes; - College Platon: 28 minutes.
access: You can have access to the entire apartment: kitchen, washer and dryer, bathroom, and living room.
interaction: I try to always be available to help you out throughout your stay. If not me, my co-host Karla will be there to assist you.

host.host_about:
Hello, I am from Mexico and I have been living in Canada for 9 years. 
I love traveling, meeting new people, learning new languages, reading, dancing, eating, and having fun!
I own an homestays agency and we find accommodation generally for international students.
I will be happy to host you in any of the available apartments we have in Montreal.

name: Atic with great views
summary: A cozy attic apartment on Montjuic mountain with two terraces and great views over the whole city. The interior space receives lot´s of natural light, its spacious and stylish, in its on Mediterranean way. Very well connected to public transport, bus, metro, train, and close enough to walk downtown. Located in Poble Sec, vibrant and lively neighborhood with plenty of cultural choices, bars, restaurants.
space: This Attic apartment sits on the edge of Montjuic mountain; whilst only being 20 min, by foot, from the city center. It´s sunny, lot´s of natural light and constant breeze from the sea and the mountain. The interior space is well distributed; offering an open-plan kitchen leading on to the dining area and evening terrace with great views over Barcelona. A glass-fronted terrace extends into the main bedroom, allowing for views of Montjuic mountain and the sun to shine in for restful mornings in bed. The large living room gives for a comfortable daily living space and conveniently converts to a second room if needed. A nice and spacious bathroom with great showers whilst observing the city skyline. You will easily feel at home during your stay here.
description: A cozy attic apartment on Montjuic mountain with two terraces and great views over the whole city. The interior space receives lot´s of natural light, its spacious and stylish, in its on Mediterranean way. Very well connected to public transport, bus, metro, train, and close enough to walk downtown. Located in Poble Sec, vibrant and lively neighborhood with plenty of cultural choices, bars, restaurants. The interior space is well distributed; offering an open-plan kitchen leading on to the dining area and evening terrace with great views over Barcelona. A glass-fronted terrace extends into the main bedroom, allowing for views of Montjuic mountain and the sun to shine in for restful mornings in bed. The large living room gives for a comfortable daily living space and conveniently convert
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a quiet place to retreat to after a hard day´s sightseeing or business meetings, but with plenty of choice if you fancy getting out, socialize, buy supplies,etc. You can enjoy nice walks along the multiples parks of Montjuic mountain,the cactus garden and the many museums around, like Miró, National Museum art of Cataluña, Institut del Teatre, Etnologic Museum, etc.
notes: This apartment has a permit , and is registered in Catalan Tourist Register, number HUTB- (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) and appears in the catalan goverment web ((URL HIDDEN) Catalan goverment applies a tourist tax to be paid for the guest, collected for the owner and paid all together every three months.  The ammount for tourist apartments is now 2,25 € (it was 0,65 cents but it changed 3 monts ago) per night and per person.
transit: Fantastic location, next to downtown, just a 20min walk.  Public transport within the neighborhood is another plus. Three stops on line 3 metro and lots of buses run along Paralell Avenue. Aerobus directly to El Prat airport or bus nº46 stops off conveniently at Plaza España; 15min, by foot, or 2 stops of metro from the apartment. Direct access to Ronda litoral and highway; also, very convenient for business congress, the apartment is really close to FIRA Barcelona.
access: Basic necessities are provided for; including bedding, bath towels and laundry products, etc. This is a communal building with local residents; living their daily lives and therefore respect must be given with regard to noise and late hours.
interaction: Durante tu estancia, disfrutarás del apartamento a tu entera disposición.  Nosotros también estamos disponibles para cualquier sugerencia, imprevisto o simplemente información sobre la ciudad. Respetamos tu intimidad  y nos gustaría que nuestros huéspedes respetasen el descanso de nuestros vecinos.
house_rules: Be respectful with the building installation and neighbors rest, they are not on holidays Lock the door every time you leave the apartment. You are responsible for your belongings. Do good use of electricity, remember to turn off heaters, lights,etc Take good care of the place; if a small accident happens, something breaks, we´ll be grateful if you just let us know by leaving a note, or replace it yourself if you feel like.  Don´t leave any cooked food, dishes or other utensils for us to clean, it´s your responsibility to do it.

host.host_about:
Somos Ignacio y Sonia. Somos del norte y del sur, adoramos Barcelona y nuestra casita. Nos dedicamos al sector de la hostelería, desde la vocación y el entusiasmo por la vida, por una buena mesa en una buena compañía , por un buen concierto..
Estamos encantados de estar entre vosotros..
Saludos.

reviews.comments: Where to start :-) Booked the place for its view, style and great location and ended up feeling at home & making new friends ! This is a great BnB, Ignacio and Sonia truly makes everything posible for you to feel comfortable and the place... it feels homy, arty with its own vibe, anything you might need (and more) is most likely in the appartment (in my case, was looking for a measuring tape as I was visiting appartments and that too they had!) and nothing beats morning breakfast and early evening aperitif on one of the two terasse. Highly recommended.

What a wonderful place! So cozy, light and hospitable. In the very central quiet part of Barcelona. We loved every small detail in the apartment,  but especially we fell in love with a magnificent view from terraces. Every day we began here with a cup of cocoa and morning sunshine, and every evening we finished here with a glass of sangria and amazing sunset. Many thanks, Sonia and Ignacio!!!

The apartment is very nice and comfortable. The few from the terasse is amazing. Everything you need is in the apartment and it has his own style. We loved it! If we will visit Barcelona again, we would come to this apartment again!!
Thanks sonia and ignacio!!!

Highly recommended! The apartment is just as great as it looks on the photos. The terraces are very nice, with beautiful views over Barcelona. Ignacio and Sonia are very easy to communicate with before arrival and they answered our questions during the stay very quickly. There is everything you need in the apartment!! Great to cook a nice dinner and enjoy it on the terrace. Thay also have very good recommendations in the area. Thanks! :)

It was the beat place were to stay in Barcelona. The hosts were so lovely people. 
For sure the place where to return. 
Barcelona on top!!!!

Stylish apartment with a great view of Barcelona and an ideal terrace for brunch !
Ignacio & Sonia were very nice and helpful.

Can prove all previous comments right - we also had a perfect stay!
Don't miss a private cooking class with Ignacio and enjoy catalan food on the terrace!

Nous avons rencontré notre hôte à notre arrivée, et puis plus rien...
Les commentaires signalaient leur présence discrète mais active, notamment au niveau de la cuisine catalane, mais nous n'avons revu personne. Notre check-out s'est fait par téléphone et nous avons mis la clé sous le paillasson. Autrement, l'appartement était magnifiquement idéal pour notre court séjour (5 jours), un peu juste au niveau des aménagements culinaires (assiettes, bols, couverts...) pour un appartement pouvant accueillir 4 personnes. Nous avons laissé quelques conseils d'amélioration à Ignacio et Sonia, lesquels ont été favorablement reçus.

Perfect would be no exaggeration. We found an apartment that is charming, clean, quiet, well equipped and very conveniently located. The two terraces are a real treat. The neighborhood turned out to be a great place to escape the tourists, to shop and dine (breakfast at Cafe Federal or at Cometa, dinner at Bella Napoli). Montjuic's treasures are around the corner. Ignacio was out of town but Sonia was very kind, responsive and helpful.
Very highly recommended!
We really loved this apartment, really charming. The decoration is perfect and the terrace is ideal for drinks and sunbathe while enjoying the amazing view of Barcelona. We recommend it!

I had an amazing stay in Ignacio and Sonia's apartment. The views from both terraces are fantastic, the apartment was clean and tidy and the area is convenient. I loved the way the apartment was decorated and they even left me some beers in the fridge! I would recommend this place to anyone. One of the best places I have ever stayed.

D'abord l'accueil par Ignacio est fort sympathique. Par la suite, l'appartement est plus que parfait : bien meublé, bien équipé, bien décoré. Enfin, la vue sur Barcelone : une merveille! Nous avons passé un séjour tellement agréable que nous ne voulions plus partir. Nous allons recommander chaleureusement cet appartement à tous nos amis.

We stayed for 3 nights but wish it was longer. The apartment was amazing and the location is great for an authentic Barcelona experience away from the main tourist strips. Lots of great eating spots and cultural delights nearby. The views over the city are absolutely unbeatable. Highly recommend. You couldn't possibly find a better place if you tried!

We had an incredible time staying in Ignacio and Sonia's apartment. The views are stunning, and the place was very homely and clean. Ignacio was there to meet us when we arrived, and was an excellent host. He had plenty of recommendations for us. The neighbourhood has lots of places to eat and drink, and the nearest Metro station is very close. It is also very convenient to explore the beautiful Montjuic Hill area. We really loved our stay, and highly recommend this apartment to everyone. We will be back!

The apartment is perfect located, shops, bars and restaurants nearby. the Beach is quite a walk but possible. The apartment itself is great as you can tell by the pictures. The house has got everything you need.
It was my first time in Barcelona and really enjoyed myself. 
Ignacio is very friendly helpful, due to delayed flights we arrived much later than expected which wasn't an ideal situation but Ignacio waited for us. 
I stayed with 3 friends and it was very comfortable for 4. I will hopefully come back!

When we arrived at Sonia and Ignacio's place we got a very warm welcome from them. The apartment is superb; it's tastefully decorated and we could see that a lot of thought has been put into it. The place also has great views over the city on one side and Montjuic on the other.
The neighborhood is full of interesting places for a meal or just a snack. Ignacio's map is a wonderful start to discover those little gems.
The hot water can be a bit moody, but it's easily forgotten by looking at the view from the shower.
We would definitely recommend the place and love to come again next time we are in Barcelona.

First of all, this apartment is absolutely dreamlike. If to mention a minor, it is simply it's character of being too lovely (!) putting the amazing city of Barcelona on hold since one most of all wish to stay at that terrace, enjoying the unbeatable view. 

When finally getting outdoors the El Poble Sec area is wonderful, holding lots of small and friendly places to eat some tapas and drink a nice wine, also at a good price. The Poble Sec area is located close to the city center, and it won’t take more than 15 minutes to get to la Gracia for example. One side of the apartment is turned to the mountain Montjuc, a beautiful place for talking a walk which leads to the museum of Miro among other things. 

Apart from the amazing flat and hospitality, we would really like to recommend taking the tapas cooking course with Ignacio. A full day of cooking and enjoying great food, wine, appetizers, main courses and dessert. Really instructive and good fun! The flat is ridiculously well prepared with everything from cooking equipment to chargers for different kind of phones. Not to mention tidy and clean. 

Ignacio and Sonia are the nicest! Muchas gracias!

Nous avons passé une très bonne semaine dans cet appartement. Il est très agréable à vivre avec 2 terrasses qui offrent de très belles vues sur la ville.
L'appartement est bien situé dans le quartier de Montjuic, très agréable et où l'air et un peu plus frais en plein été qu'en pleine ville. A 5 minutes d'une station de métro qui nous amène vite dans le centre de Barcelone et dans quartier pas encore touristique.
Ignacio a été un très bon hôte, il nous a apporté de bons conseils sur la ville et a fait en sorte que nous passions une très bonne semaine.

What a fantastic week in Barcelona.

The panoramic views of Barcelona are spectacular, especially at night when the city lights up.

We stayed here in the peak of summer, (Aug 5-13th) and the height of the apartment with the windows open ensures air flowing and the apartment isn't too warm.

Sonia and Ignacio provide a brilliant written guide to all of Poble Sec's best bars and restaurants, which we found particularly helpful when deciding where to eat.

The balcony is by far the highlight of this apartment and I can say that I would happily stay here again the next time I visit Barcelona.

A quick word on location for those unfamiliar with Barcelona. I found this apartment within easy walking distance of 'La Ramblas', and in general provides a wonderful base from which to explore Barcelona on foot. 
However if walking isn't your thing, the metro station is a two minute walk away and provides a link to the rest of Barcelona. 

To conclude, I would highly recommend this apartment, even during the warm summer months and if I happen to return to Barcelona in the future I can safely I would stay here again.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Ignacio, une personne très chaleureuse! L'appartement était vraiment fidèle aux photos mises sur le site donc nous étiez très satisfaits! Nous avions eu un coup de coeur pour cet appartement qui nous paraissait typiquement barcelonais! Il a très bien été décoré! L'emplacement est idéal, vraiment proche du centre! Les petits conseils d'Ignacio nous ont été très utiles! Nous avons passé un excellent séjour et espérons revenir très vite à Barcelone!!!!

The apartment is absolutely amazing. Beautifully styled, really quirky and everything is covered. The terrace is really something else, we spent most of our evening drinking wine on the terrace and not even going out because it was so nice. Sonia and Ignacio were really friendly and welcoming. The apartment is in a nice area, there are lots of shops nearby by food and supplies and a metro station literally 5 minutes walk away. If we ever come back to Barcelona we will definitely be staying here again! Thank you Sonia and Ignacio for letting us stay in your amazing space!

It's the perfect spot to stay in Barcelona with an amazing view over the whole city and the sea. There is lot's of space for yourself and all your stuff. The apartment is clean & tidy and nice & arty decorated. Sonia is a really welcoming and helpful host. Ignacio made lot's of helpful lists, where to go for food and coffee, you'll find everything in the neighbourhood. You can almost walk to all the hotspots or there's an easy access to bus and metro. And the best thing is, after you had a great day, you'll have a shower with the most amazing vista ... Barcelona by night. It felt like home in Barcelona. We enjoyed ourselves. We definitely recommend the place and like to stay here again for the next trip to Barcelona.

Sonia e Ignacio foram incrivelmente hospitaleiros e nos ajudaram com tudo o que foi necessário. O apartamento é maravilhoso, extremamente confortável, bem ventilado e com vistas da cidade. O fato do apartamento não ser no centro da cidade é uma grande vantagem, pois ainda assim é muito perto de tudo e fica numa área razoavelmente silenciosa e (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza o apartamento fez uma diferença positiva em nossa viagem.

Die Wohnung hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Es ist ein Traum, unter der Dusche zu stehen und über ganz Barcelona gucken zu können. Die Balkone laden dazu ein, auch einmal einen Abend dort zu verweilen und leckeres Essen, dass man vom Markt mitgebracht hat, dort zu genießen. Die Wohnung ist gut ausgestattet. Uns hat es an nichts gefehlt. Ignacio und Sonia sind sehr nett und sehr sympathisch. Das kleine Restaurant, in dem Sonia arbeitet, ist nur zu empfehlen. Es war alles sehr lecker und toll ist, dass dort nur Produkte aus der Region verarbeitet werden.
Wenn ich das nächste Mal nach Barcelona komme, wünsche ich mir, dass diese Wohnung wieder von Airbnb angeboten wird!

Ignacio & Sonia's place was such a lovely place to spend a few days in Barcelona. The nearly-panoramic view is stunning and made for a great place to unwind with a cool drink after a hot day. We loved their neighborhood, which was near a couple subway stops, walkable from lots of attractions, and they had great meal recommendations a few blocks away.

Ignacio was so kind and welcoming. He was helpful and responsive before our arrival and certainly when we arrived. The apartment is beautifully decorated and very comfortable. The terraces on both sides of the apartment offer great views. Ignacio offered many helpful suggestions for local restaurants and grocery stores. Our only issue was the hot water in the shower. We enjoyed our stay.

We didn't actually meet Sonia and Ignacio, so I can't comment on them, but the flat was absolutely lovely!  Really nicely furnished with two lovely terraces, one with beautiful views over the city.  The area was very nice, with lots of restaurants a couple of minutes walk away, and only 10 minutes walk to the metro.  Would stay here again if I go back to Barcelona.
Very nice and cosy apartement with an amazing view through Barcelona! Ignacio is a very kind and helpful host - next time we will definitly stay longer! Thanks a lot, Ignacio!

I can't even describe how amazing this apartment is. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. The location was about a 5-10 min walk to the metro. It was walking distance to the Olympic garden and other attractions. Everything was exactly as beautiful as pictured. the house was clean and the view was fantastic! The bed was comfortable and there was plenty of pillows and blankets. The kitchen was great as well. I wish I never had to leave this apartment, it was so lovely. I highly recommend it to anyone staying in Barcelona.

Ignacio and Sonia were really helpful from the very beginning of my inquiry through to when we arrived ..which was really comforting as we'd never been to Barcelona before.

The apartment was really lovely in an amazing neighbour hood in fact we spent a lot of our evenings in the local restaurants. Ignacio gave us so much organised imformation on where to go which was great.

I highly recommend this apartment fantastic views from both terraces!

Wir haben uns bei der Ankunft sofort heimisch und willkommen gefühlt. Die Wohnung war dank der Wegbeschreibung super zu finden, Ignacio hat uns herzlich empfangen und durch die schöne Wohnung geführt. 
Die Lokation der Wohnung ist ideal für uns gewesen. Die Lage ist sehr ruhig und dennoch zentral. (Man hört morgens einen Hahn krähen - und das mitten in der Stadt ;-) 
Eine U-Bahn Station in der Nähe, so daß alles Interessante schnell erreicht werden kann. Ignacio hat eine Mappe mit Tipps zusammen gestellt, so daß man sich schnell zurecht findet. Das super Brot beim lokalen Bäcker hätten wir z.B. sonst nie gefunden. Auch gibt es in der Parallelstraße tolle Bars, die für "typische" Touristen aber versteckt sind.
Es ist uns schwer gefallen, als wir den Urlaub gezwungenermaßen beenden mussten.
Dies war unser erster Trip mit Airbnb. Alles hat sehr, sehr gut geklappt. Wir sind froh, mit Airbnb gebucht zu haben und sehr froh genau dieses Appartment in Barcelona gewählt zu haben.

My boyfriend and I stayed at Ignacio and Sonia's apartment while in Barcelona for my birthday.  We stayed for 4 nights,  and the apartment was perfect.  Just what we needed and more.  Ignacio and Sonia obviously go to all lengths so that visitors in the beautiful city can have the best possible time.  We both thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely be recommending this apartment to my friends and family.  Thanks again Ignacio and Sonia!!  :-)

We LOVED this apartment and Ignacio was a fabulous host. His recommendations are great, along with all the other information about the area. The attention to detail in the apartment really makes it feel like at home and one that you don't want to leave! It's spacious and extremely clean & tidy. We loved all the quirky little touches. The views are sensational both during the day and at night. The neighborhood is lovely and safe and the locals are very friendly. There are plenty of great restaurants, bars & cafes in the local area. It is easy walking distance to pretty much any where in central Barcelona or a short metro ride away. We can't wait to return for another stay and we highly recommend this apartment... Thanks again to Ignacio & Sonia for allowing us to stay in your beautiful piece of Barcelona...

Ignacio is a wonderful host: prompt and solicitous. He was very charming and welcoming even though we were an hour late. He responded to all inquiries and shared lots of helpful information. 
The apartment is fantastic! It is very well laid out, spotlessly clean, and very comfortable. As others have said, the views (in two directions-- over the city and Montjuic) are amazing. 
What we particularly appreciated was being in Poble Sec. It's a charming and real neighbourhood -- off the tourists' beaten track -- but close to the old city. We walked everywhere. The many trails up Montjuic are just outside the door. Right in the neighborhood are the Miro Foundation, the National museum of Catalunya, the hokey and fun Magic Fountain, the CaixaForum cultural space, etc. The Metro is also close by.
We enjoyed buying our groceries and cooking most of our meals "at home" coupled with having a glass of wine and tapas along the chill Carrer de Blai.
I spent a great deal of time choosing where to stay for our 12-night trip and my research was rewarded. December is a challenge with short days. I really wanted as much sun as possible and we got it! I also valued having an elevator. (Most atico apartments are up many flights of stairs.)
Keep in mind, though, that the only source of heat is a small wood stove. We know our way around these rigs so there was no problem once we had enough wood. But, with the passive solar of the fabulous sunroom and Barcelona's benign climate, one wouldn't need extra heat most of the time.
We unreservedly recommend Ignacio and Sonia's place.

Ignacio & Sonia ' s place is a little gem & made us feel at home during our stay.  It is just a few blocks away from the metro, in a quiet neighborhood , with a breathtaking view of the city.
Although we didn't meet Ignacio,  it was a pleasure meeting Sonia & her vibrant energy !
We very much appreciated their eclectic touch of decor & we're sure you will too!

Tolles Appartement mit phantastischem Blick über die Stadt! Wir haben uns sofort wie zu Hause Gefühl. Ignacio und Sonia sind tolle Gastgeber und haben unseren Aufenthalt mit vielen Details und Informationen verschönert. Wir kommen gerne & ganz sicher wieder!
We felt just at home. The flat is amazing and the only bad thing was leaving. If we go back to Barcelona we will certanly ask Sonia and Ignacio.

The flat is so beautiful and the area was perfect for us - near enough to the centre to be able to walk most places, but away from all the touristy hustle and bustle. Everything in the flat was in excellent condition and we really appreciated all the little touches, they made a big difference and we felt very at home. It was very hard to leave the beautiful views behind!

Thank you Sonia and Ignacio for being wonderful hosts! We enjoyed the apartment though we didn't spend much time there due to our busy schedule while in Barcelona.

Ignacio and Sonia helped us a great deal with all our needs and made special arrangements to be available for us. Sonia even made a special trip to the apartment to help us with the pick up of a package.  I'm really grateful for their help and glad we stayed at their apartment.

De ontvangst door Ignacio was prettig en vriendelijk. Het appartement was precies zoals we gehoopt hadden en we voelden ons er direct thuis. Het uitzicht aan beide kanten van het huis is bijzonder indrukwekkend en de geluiden die vanuit de straten opstijgen zijn warm en prettig optimistisch. 
Het balkon en de serre zijn werkelijk fantastisch!
De buurt vonden we ook enorm leuk, net aan de rand van de stad tegen de Mont Juich aan voelt het alsof de natuur heel dichtbij is. Stad, natuur en cultuur zijn daadwerkelijk binnen handbereik!
Kortom een plek waar je moeilijk kunt weggaan en heel graag nog eens terug komt!

Such an amazing apartment beautiful views of an amazing city, perfect and central to pretty much every thing! A lovely little apartment with every thing we needed loved the shower! 
Thank you again would love to stay again

absolutely perfect apartment--even better than the pictures.  we didn't want to leave!  ignacio was so warm and helpful.  would absolutely recommend for a gorgeous apartment overlooking barcelona in a great neighborhood.

I definitely recommend this appartment for those who want to enjoy Barcelona way of life.
It is well situated, close to Montjuic, plaza de España, close to the metro but also not so far from the old city center (15min by foot).
The appartment itself is very nice, confortable, calm, with everything that you need, and the terrace offers a wonderful view on whole Barcelona.
And last but not least: Ignacio is a very welcoming person and has a lot of recommendations for your stay!

Ignacio's appartment si even lovelier than the pictures could let you imagine. It's brightfull, cosy and warmfull: I really felt like home.
Ignacio is very friendly and flexible, which is very convenient.
I will come back for sure!

Ignacio was there to welcome us with a friendly smile and much information when we arrived. The apartment is on the top floor with wonderful view over the city. A lift is available so you don't have to cart suit cases up stairs. The apartment has a homely feel and we found it spacious with 2 balconies, one on each side. Location is excellent in a quiet residential street, being about a 5 minute walk from cafes and the Metro, and a 20 minute walk to the port and the bottom of Los Ramblas. We greatly enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend this apartment.

Hello Sonia! Thank you for your warm welcome! You are a very dynamic host and you made sure that we had everything we needed. Your apartment was great, well situated and well equipped. The view was amazing! I would recommend this apartment and would return anytime!

Gràcies i Fins després!

Mounir

Tolle Terrasse, super saubere Wohnung, ruhige Lage und trotzdem zentral, haben uns sofort wohl gefühlt. Silvia, eine Freundin der beiden, hat uns aufgemacht, weil die Ignacio und Sonia übers Wochenende nicht in Barcelona waren, alles hat aber trotzdem super gepasst.
Jederzeit gerne wieder!!!!

Such an amazing and beautiful apartment, even better than in the pictures! The two terraces had spectacular views of the city and Montjuic and we spent some lovely evenings outside enjoying them. Silvia our contact was so warm and friendly and dealt with a query we had very quickly. In a vibrant area with lovely restaurants and bars. The only negative thing I can say is that I wasn't able to stay longer!

Ignacio hat uns trotz Flugverspaetung sehr nett empfangen, hat uns alles ausfuehrlich gezeigt und erklärt und viele Infos und Restaurant-Tipps gegeben. Das Appartement war genauso wie beschrieben und liegt in einer ruhigen Gegend...trotzdem ist man schnell überall, da nur wenige Minuten entfernt eine Metro-Station liegt. Ganz wichtig:  Es gibt einen Aufzug! Vom Küchen-Balkon aus hat man einen super Ausblick auf ganz Barcelona...und er lädt zum Frühstück in der Sonne ein. Um die Ecke findet man gleich mehrere Bäcker bei denen man morgens die Frühstücks-Broetchen besorgen kann, abends gibt es ein paar Strassen weiter jede Menge süße Restaurants und Tapas - Bars. Die Nachbarn waren sehr nett, wir wurden aber von Ignacio darauf hingewiesen dass wir die Tür nicht allzu laut schließen sollen da sonst die Nachbarn Ärger machen könnten. Da wir das aber beachtet haben, war das also kein Problem. Alles in allem...wir würden das Appartement jederzeit weiterempfehlen und kommen gerne wieder.

Lovely apartment! The views are spectacular and the interior decoration is very cute and homey. Communication with Ignacio and his friend Sylvia was great. They were both very helpful, making our stay very smooth. The apartment is very close to the metro, making it a quick trip into the city. Would definitely recommend if you're going to be visiting Barcelona!

Sonia was so welcoming and gave us great recommendations on where to go for food and drink in the neighbourhood. This area of Barcelona is lovely, quiet and relaxed, yet really close to great parks, the Miro Foundation and there are many cafes and bars. The apartment is stunning, incredible views, we loved our stay!

Sonia and Ignacio were wonderful hosts and the apartment is really an incredible place to stay.  The terraces were perfect for morning coffee and afternoon wine. The photos don't do justice. 

Everything was very clean and well outlined. There were also many great recommendations in the guide book that we took advantage of.  The neighbourhood itself is a great oasis away from the busy tourist streets,  with lots of bars and excellent restaurants nearby to take advantage of. 

We had a perfect stay in Barcelona thanks to both Sonia and Ignacio.
This place is amazing! The patio had one of the best views of Barcelona. The house was so clean, comfortable, and quiet!

Really happy we stayed at Ignacio & Sonia's. The apartment is really well decorated, the kitchen is very functional, and the overall feel of the place was the best of any air-bnb we stayed at during our Europe trip. We did 5 nights. If you stay here, bring a bottle of wine for the neighbors, they are really sweet and might just cook you Catalan pancakes if you're lucky!

This was a fantastic apartment at the very top of the building (there is a lift!)in a wonderful location (the view is great, you can see the whole city, even from the shower). I have to say this was one of the best views of the city we had and we walked the whole way up Montjuic! Our hosts were extremely welcoming and friendly, providing more amenities than they were obliged. Honestly can't fault them, great experience and we'll be back.

Localização excelente , ainda mais se quiserem conhecer o bairro que é também excele e só de locais 
Apartamento ótimo , muito agradável

The apartment was spotless and very well equipped. It was in a very quiet area, surrounded by very local bars and restaurants. We seemed like the only tourists in same places, which we liked. We were very happy just hanging around and enjoying the wonderful views and staying local in the evenings.  We were surprised at how reasonable the prices were. We got a taxi back to the airport which cost 30 euro.

Where to start? Ignacio and Sonia's place is really amazing. After a warm welcome with tips and tricks for the area, and even a guide to the best tapas bars and restaurants we were stunned by the view from the terraces. A 360 view over one of the nicest cities in Europe. We were a party of four and had everything we could have asked for

Don't hesitate. Just book this place!

We visited Barcelona for the first time in June and thanks to Ignacio and Sonia's beautiful apartment and warm, helpful welcome we had the time of our lives.

The apartment is perfectly situated in Poble Sec, Metro links are easily accessible but in truth if you're up for it (as we were) you can happily walk to so many places. The area is vibrant and there are brilliant bars and restaurants nearby.

The apartment itself is extremely roomy for two and could comfortably fit four. We had every home comfort we could ask for and then some. And the (Website hidden by Airbnb) goodness, the views. You'd be hard pushed to find a better or more comfortable and stylish place to stay in Barcelona.

I cannot recommend Ignacio and Sonia's apartment enough. The handover and directions to the apartment were so simple and smooth, this was a perfect AirBnB experienced. Our 6 nights went so quickly but we'll certainly be back. 

Thank you Ignacio & Sonia!

Ignacio & Sonia's apartment was amazing! Beautiful views of Barcelona from the terrace, including Sagrada Familia and the Mediterranean. The apartment was clean, open and light filled, it had everything we needed. The location is fantastic! My wife and I loved being able to walk a few blocks and have our choice of great restaurants to choose from. We loved the fact that it felt like a real neighborhood, not a tourist trap surrounded by hotels and chain stores. It was a short walk to the metro where we could get to anywhere in the City very easily. If/when we make it back to Barcelona we will definitely look to stay at Ignacio & Sonia's apartment again.
Nice location. Close to the subway. And the fantastic terrace with stunning city view.

We loved staying at Ignacio and Sonia's apartment. The neighborhood was a very conveniently located to the park and the beaches. The tram was a great way to see the city and so close. Also, the neighborhood bars and tavernas were close and provided a great feel for the local neighborhood. The apartment had lots of space and everything we needed to feel at home. Ignacio and Sofia were great hosts and provided recommendations for our stay. We would stay here again.

The welcome we received from Ignacio immediately put us at ease and we enjoyed the apartment and its fantastic view across Barcelona.
Poble Sec area around the apartment has everything a visitor needs, great restaurants,bars,supermarkets and the area felt friendly and welcoming

Ignacio war für uns ein sehr freundlicher und hilfsbereiter Gastgeber. 
Die Wohnung war einfach perfekt für den 4-Tages-Trip in die katalanische Metropole.
Selbst mit unseren beiden Teenager-Kindern war die Wohnung nicht zu klein.
Die beiden hübschen Balkone sind jeder für sich ein eigener Grund hier einzuziehen.
Die Lage ist einfach einmalig.
Sehr gerne würden wir einmal wieder auf Visite kommen.
Vielen Dank an Euch

Die Wohnung ist sehr schön, mit Liebe zum Detail und gleichzeitig funktional eingerichtet. Die Photos und Beschreibung der Wohnung im Inserat vermitteln einen zutreffenden Eindruck. Insbesondere der Blick auf das Zentrum von der großen, aber auch jener auf den Montjuïc von der kleinen Terasse auf der anderen Seite der Wohnung ist großartig und allein das Geld wert. In der Hitze des Juli war die Briese in der im 7. Stock gelegenen Wohnung sehr angenehm - doch nur für den, dem der Lärm der nächtlichen Straßenreinigung und Müllabfuhr nichts anhaben können. Die Lage der Wohnung ist gut, Metro zu Fuß in 5 und das Gotische Viertel in etwa 15 Minuten zu erreichen. Zudem in unmittelbarer Nachbarschaft des Miro-Museums. Pöble Sec ist ein sehr schönes Viertel, noch recht authentisch, mit guten Restaurants und Bars.  Ignacio und Sonia begrüßten uns sehr herzlich und haben in der Wohnung auch ein paar gute Tips bzgl. Restaurants hinterlassen. Fazit: ein toller Aufenthalt und wärmste Empfehlung!

Sonia was lovely and really helpful. The apartment itself is just great - really spacious, clean and comfortable. The views are even better in real life than in the photos. 

The neighborhood was also a great place to base our stay. It felt very local, with loads of restaurants, bakeries, coffee shops and fruit and veg shops.

Super awesome property and host. This was our first trip to Barcelona. Both Ignacio and Sonia were a lot of help. They gave us advise on good restaurants and areas to visit.

They were very thoughtful and the place had everything you needed. It is about a 10 min walk to the Metro. There are multiple small grocery stores nearby.

This was our favorite place compared to the other 8 places we stayed in Europe.

Highly recommended!
Sonia was a very helpful and nice host. The apartment is perfectly situated in a calm but central quarter, and it's not small. The view is breathtaking!

Much has already been said in praise of Ignacio & Sonia's beautiful apartment and I can only add to that. Our family of four (including 2 teenage girls) stayed for a week in August. It was a perfect spot to explore everything Barcelona has to offer and an ideal place to come back to you at the end of the day - sitting on the balcony overlooking the city was an unforgettable experience. 

Ignacio & Sonia were lovely people and i can wholeheartedly recommend their amazing apartment to future vistiors to Barcelona.

Appartement superbement situé pour avoir une vue de Barcelone incroyable dans un quartier calme et moins touristique que le centre! Les deux terrasses sont très agréables et nous ont permis d'être au frais le soir et le matin. Ce fut un excellent séjour, Ignacio est vraiment super et nous a donné quelques bons plans pour profiter au maximum de la vie espagnole! 
À refaire !!

Firstly, the apartment was absolutely lovely, the views were fantastic and everything was exactly as described (if not better!) Ignacio met us on the first day and was informative and friendly, he answered any questions we had and made us feel very welcome. Communication beforehand with both Ignacio and Sonia was very quick and helpful. Overall the apartment was perfect, a great base for exploring Barcelona and I would fully recommend Sonia and Ignacio as hosts.
Thank you so much Ignacio & Sonia! We had the best time in Barcelona thanks to you and your beautiful apartment. We did not want to leave and can't wait to come back!

Ignacio and Sonia's apartment was exactly what we expected. It is a charm of Barcelona. They were so friendly with open doors. The neighborhood was great too. Very multi cultural and lots of locals. They gave us great recommendations about where to eat and we were not disappointed.

Muy buenos anfitriones. Amables, atentos y flexibles con los horarios. El piso es ideal muy bien decorado y cómodo. Las medidas para 4 personas, una terraza cerrada, una terraza exterior donde disfrutar de un buen desayuno o una cena con unas vistas impresionantes de la ciudad son un muy buen reclamo. El barrio muy tranquilo y con muchas opciones para comer y el acceso a la casa es realmente sencillo. Ha sido un placer poder disfrutar de vuestro piso.

This is an amazing apartment with sweeping views of Barcelona. My wife and I loved our honeymoon stay here and would definitely rent here again if we come back to Barcelona.
Ignacio was very welcoming when we arrived early and allowed us to drop off our luggage and relax as he finished touching up the apartment.

The apt is beautiful with an amazing view of the city. Sonia was very welcoming and had lots of helpful information to make us feel comfortable. I would definitely be staying here again the next time I visit.
A lovely apartment in a beautiful area well located , Ignacio was really nice and tried to take care of us .

We stayed at Sonia and Ignacio's beautiful apartment for 4 days in mid-October. I've stayed at many hotels and bnb's through my travels and this was honestly the best experience I've ever had. 
Igancio was there to greet and gave us some really helpful tips, he is very kind and sincerely wants you to enjoy your stay. As great as the pictures are, they really don't do the place justice. It's nice and open with 2 amazing terraces with breathtaking views. The kitchen is fully functional and a pleasure to use and the bathroom is spotless. 
The area is also really nice, away from the crowds of downtown but also near a really cool strip of bars and restaurants on Carrer de Blai. The metro is just a few minutes walk as well. 
Our only issue was that we didn't want to leave! Thanks again Sonia and Ignacio, we hope to come back to Barcelona soon!

Ignacio welcomed us in this wonderful little apartment on Montjuic and explained us everything we needed to know, had a collection of recommendations for us and was a very open and friendly host. The apartment itself is a wonderful marvel in Barcelona - the view from the balconies is incredible and makes it easy just to spend some lovely days relaxing while still experiencing Barcelona from a very unique angle. It is beautifully designed, and a lot of thought has been put in - making it an instant home away from home. I wish I had that view from my shower! :D We enjoyed it very much and were very sad to leave after just a few days but hope to be coming back for another stay!

We had a great time in Barcelona. We loved staying at this cosy apartment. The view is great at both sides of the apartment. You can even see the Sagrada familia from the terrace.  Ignacio gave us a warm welcome. The apartment is good located, close to the metro and you can also walk to the centre. Good resaturants in the neighbourhood.

Hello Ignacio
I just go home and read my emails.
We had a great stay in your apartment
I hope we have left in good condition
We were leaving early and coming back late and for example we did not eat on the terrace, another time perhaps
Everything was perfect, except perhaps the small pot for milk ;)
I would put in a few days a good comment on the site
Thanks for all
Best memories
Denis and Catherine
PS You would put another book for comments because the latter is full!

Beautiful apartment, with the most incredible views! Communication was very smooth, and our hosts very welcoming. The area was lovely and quiet, but you're only a short walk from great bars and restaurants. Would highly recommend!

We had the pleasure in staying in this lovely apartment  during our time in Barcelona. Ignacio and Sonia are everything hosts should be, attentive, welcoming and knowledgeable. The neighborhood, itself, has a ton to offer, we had the best meal of our lives at Montalban! If we ever have the good fortune to travel to Barcelona again,we would definitely book this charming atico.

We had a great time at Ignacio & Sonia's place! We stayed there for the weekend. The apartment is more spacious than it looks on the photos, and the view over Barcelona is incredible and a very big plus! The place is comfortable, everything you need is there, and you can feel at home quickly.
The neighbourhood is very nice, quiet, "real", with everything you need in the vicinity: shops, restaurants, transport. Easy to get there from the airport in less than an hour.
Communication was with Ignacio and went friendly and clearly. At the apartment we met Sonia, who was very nice.
I would definately recommend this place!

The apartment was beautiful and location was breathtaking! The view from the north-facing terrace is AMAZING and spectacular. Truly unbelievable.

After spending several days in a hotel in the middle of the city it was great to have time in Ignacio and Sonia's apartment in a quieter neighborhood. It was close to great food, the Joan Miro Foundation, and Montjuic.

Ignacio met us and explained all the quirks of the apartment, provided us with a notebook full of recommendations, and was overall a gracious host.

A note to other travelers -- the apartment is up small hill and about a 5-7 minute walk to the nearest metro stop. Nothing too bad even after a long night of eating a drinking :)

We have spent 2 days in Ignacio and Sonia roof top flat. The flat is very nice with beautiful view and a lot of character . The flat was very clean and tidy. Our flight was quite late and Ignacio stayed a bit late to wait for us. Flat has good WiFi connection. And the fire place is very cool. 10 -15 mins walk to Town centre 
We will stay again next time if available .
Thank you so much for everything guys.

Florin , Christian and Bogdan

Sonia and Ignacio truly made our Barcelona experience unforgettable. My girlfriend and I decided to spend our Christmas in this lovely home, our first away from our families, and believe it to both be one of our favorite Christmases. 

The apartment was well outfitted with all appropriate cooking supplies, bathroom supplies, and sheets and blankets. The fireplace kept us warm at night as well as the extra heater. Everything was perfect! 

Finally the views from the apartment were absolutely stunning. I felt like I could stay all day watching the views from the apartment and would have still had a great time in Barcelona! 

Thank you guys so much!

We were welcomed to the apartment by Ignacio and Sonia. They showed us around the in great apartment, and they even went out to buy a clothes drying rack for us (we had been traveling for some time and needed to do some laundry). 

Communication with Ignacio and Sonia was great, before and during out trip. The apartment has excellent views of Barcelona and it's very spacious. You have absolutely everything you need in the apartment. Wifi is working really well. The location in the Poble Sec neighborhood is fantastic as it's not very touristy. It has many bakeries, restaurants, coffee shops, grocery stores... anything you could possibly need. 

Thanks for a wonderful time in Barcelona. I can recommend staying at the apartment of Ignacio and Sonia. Great hosts!

Amazing apartment in Barcelona, highly recommended. Close enough to walk to all major places and around the corner from the best tapas restaurant in the city. The hosts were very helpful, it was a pleasure dealing with them. If you're after a nice place to stay for your visit, this is it.

AMAZING!! This apartment is MUCH better than the pictures show!  The view is breathtaking! Plenty of room in the apartment and everything you need to feel comfortable. This will certainly be my first option when I return to Barcelona! Ignacio was so friendly and very helpful! Don't miss this opportunity!

I stayed in Ignacio and Sonia's apartment for the weekend when visiting my friend in Barcelona. The apartment is a dream. The apartment is such a joy to spend time in, I almost didn't want to explore Barcelona itself. (I could have stared at the view of Barcelona from the terrace for hours). The location is perfect, in a very cool neighbourhood with lots of amenities. A very short walk to the nearest Metro so you can get to anywhere you want in Barcelona. Ignacio was very accommodating and provided everything we'd ever need! Cannot recommend more! Would choose to stay here again!

We had a fantastic stay at Ignacio and Sonia's beautiful apartment. Ignacio met us at the apartment even though we didn't arrive until quite late which we really appreciated. The location was great with metro lines easily accessible and loads of great bars just streets away. Would definitely recommend this apartment to our friends - it is the perfect base for a holiday in Barcelona. The views are hard to beat!

We had a perfect stay at the appartment. Ignacio was there to welcome us. he was very kind, and told us everything we needed to know about the appartment and the area. The view is absolutely stunning,- it feels like the top of Barcelona, and still you're close to everything. We would absolutely visit again!
这个房子,唉,不说了｡

The apartment is great, the 2 terraces are priceless and the neighbourhood is really cool, lots of nice bars and restaurants and the Montjuic area is lovely. We had a great weekend there and would recommend to anyone wishing to visit Barcelona.

This place sits on top of the world - views are stunning.
The place is cosy and has a nice potbelly fireplace. There was not a lot there for us to light the fire so we tried turning on the gas heater which was out of gas. Sonja responded immediately by bringing us a new gas cylinder. We also managed to get the fire going on other nights we were there.
Toilet was leaking a bit so we were asked to turn off the little tap in cistern after flushing.  Ignacio informed us that he was waiting for a part so this should be fixed very soon.
The area is quiet which was good. The elevator makes a loud clunking sound whenever it's used but it is an old building so can't expect more. The National Art Museum is about a 700 metre walk.
We enjoyed our stay.

Das Appartement entsprach absolut unseren Vorstellungen und den angegebenen Fotos der Anzeige. 
Die Aussicht von der Terrasse war einzigartig und die Wohnung war charmant und stilvoll eingerichtet, so dass man sich sehr wohl gefühlt hat (fast wie zuhause) ! 
Auch der vorhandene Kamin hat der Wohnung einen speziellen Charm gegeben. 
Das Bett war sehr gemütlich und der angrenzende Wintergarten bietet die  perfekte Location für ein morgendliches Frühstück in der Sonne mit tollem Ausblick. 
Die Lage der Wohnung hat uns ebenfalls positiv überrascht, wir waren sehr zentral an einer nahegelegenen Kneipenkultur, mit vielen Tapasbars zu guten Preisen! 
Öffentliche Verkehrsmittel waren binnen weniger Minuten zu erreichen, aber auch zu Fuß kann man viele Teile der Stadt (El Born, Ramblas etc.) erreichen. 
Die Wohnung ist definitiv etwas besonderes und wir können sie nur jedem weiterempfehlen. 
Wir kommen ebenfalls gerne wieder zurück. 

Der Gastgeber Ignacio war ebenfalls sehr freundlich und hat uns auf sein handgeschriebenes Buch aufmerksam gemacht, wo er eigene Empfehlungen für Restaurants und Bars eingetragen hat, sodass man nicht ganz verloren ist, in solch einer großen Stadt. 

Vielen Dank, 
dass wir unsere Zeit in eurem tollen Appartement verbringen durften!
The apartment was clean and homely, great views of the city and located close to bars and restaurants.  Ignacio was very welcoming and friendly.  I was very happy with the apartment.

The apartment was nice and well maintained. Beautiful views indeed, and the place is very quiet and close to some main attractions. Good accommodation for 2-4 people. I've been greeted by Silvia who was very helpful and nice. 
The only slight issue is with heating - not something very necessary in Barcelona, admittedly. When I stayed, weather was pretty cold - less than 10 Celsius. The apartment has a stove and a gas burner, but they are less than ideal, obviously.

Sonia and Ignacios apartment is amazing: The location in Poble Sec close to the metro, lots of breakfast and tapas bars nearby, the views from the two balconies, the romantic fireplace for colder nights and the walking distance to the harbor and the city center make it a perfect place for any visitor, especially couples. Sonia and Ignacio were super friendly and communication with them was very easy. Check-in and check-out worked flawlessly. My girlfriend and I would always come again and recommend the apartment to anyone travelling to Barcelona. Thanks for having us! :)

We stayed at Ignacio & Sonia's flat in early March. In short, it's a wonderful place in a great location.

There are decent bars and restaurants in the nearby area. Parc Montjuic, the Olympic stadium and the cable car are also within walking distance. Poble Sec metro station connects you with the rest of the city - this helped us to cram loads of sights into a relatively short break.

The flat itself has incredible views of Barcelona. It's such a fantastic experience to sit on the main balcony as the sun is setting and enjoy a few drinks. Even the shower has an amazing view! Certainly the best I've ever seen from a shower! The kitchen and living area is a decent size - all nice and clean too. There's also a log burning stove.

There was a small issue with the toilet during our stay - you had to reach into the cistern and turn the tap on and then off again each time you used it. This wasn't a significant problem though and didn't really detract from what was a really positive experience overall.

It's also worth mentioning that Ignacio and Sonia kindly allowed us to check in early on our first day - this meant we could drop off our bags and get stuck into the city straight away. Overall we had a fantastic time and will probably try and stay here again next time we come to Barcelona!
Sonia nous a réservé un superbe accueil, très chaleureuse, souriant. L'appartement est encore mieux que sur les photos, la vue depuis la terrasse est superbe!!

Ignacio and Sonia warmly welcomed us to their apartment when we arrived. We immediately felt at home. They also communicated clearly with us so we had a very easy time finding their place. It is easily accessible to the Metro and also close to Montjuic and the Font Magic. The neighborhood has many little shops. We found a good bakery, restaurant and grocery store within easy walking distance.
The apartment itself is both spacious and cozy. And the views are unforgettable! We sat out on the one patio for breakfast since it gets the morning sun. And we looked out across the city on the other patio. The night skyline is memorable. We enjoyed the wood stove which reminded us of ours at home. Also, their shower has the best view.
When we return to Barcelona, we want to stay here again!
Magnifique appartement avec une vue extraordinaire. Situation superbe dans un quartier vivant mais calme, et avec peu de touriste. Idéal pour découvrir Barcelone !
Die Beschreibung der Unterkunft und der Umgebung war vollständig zutreffend.Wir wurden sehr nett empfangen, es wurde uns alles gezeigt und erklärt. Der Urlaub konnte wunderbar beginnen.

We got a warm welcome and could check in hours before official time. The appartment has the most beautiful view from the terrace and we could borrow both a small travel bed and baby chair. A little cold at night, but we could have turned on the fire place if necessary (although a little inconvenient). But definitely worth a visit!

What a great apartment. A place of character and comfort with fantastic views and a quiet neighbourhood. Some night life, bars, restaurants, fab ice cream, supermarkets and the metro stop just a few minutes walk away but the attico itself is peaceful and overlooks this great city. The hosts were very helpful and I would recommend this place to anyone.

We had a wonderful visit in Barcelona and it all started with our charming stay in Ignacio and Sonia's apartment!  Ignacio met us and welcomed us to his home, gave us ideas on what to see first and things to do in the city.  We loved the cute apartment, its location and how safe and secure we felt.  My only sadness was that it rained a little too much to enjoy the lovely patios!  My fondest memory was waking (from jet lag) in the middle of the night to the most beautiful Spanish guitar music floating in my window from somewhere below!
There are lots of equipment in the apartment  to use, so it is very convenient. The small balcony is good to enjoy the views. However,  the hair dryer is difficult to use, especially for girls.

Both Ignacio & Sonia were so accommodating and welcoming! All their neighborhood recommendations were perfect. The listing was exactly as we anticipated. The view is even better than the pictures portray! Very comfortable home base for our trip.

Great location in Poble Sec, beautiful and character filled apartment with incredible views. Clean, fully equipped and perfect for us travelling as a couple with a toddler. Would highly recommend and Ignacio was very helpful meeting us for a late check in. Thank you.

What a fantastic place! Sonia was nice enough to meet us super late and give us the tour of the apartment. Afterwards she walked us to a place to grab some food because most places were closed. 
The views were stunning! The place itself was perfect... dry towels to use, beds were great, plenty of space so you don't feel cramped.
Hint for those who stay out late and cab home- have a pic of a map of the location on the apartment to show the cab driver along with the address. It helped alot!
I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great view for a great price.

The communication prior to me arriving to the Airbnb was fantastic. Sophia and Ignacio kept right on it to provide me with information and guides to the apartment. 

Upon arriving, I met Ignacio at the apartment. It was such a lovely apartment. Definitely superceeded my expectations based on the photographs. It had a lovely terrace for you to enjoy the sun and lovely breeze once you get the windows open.

The gem of the apartment I would say is the lovely restaurant recommendation guide they have. It's a small booklet but filled with all sorts of recommendations from tapas to churros to coffee and bakery/brunch.

Will definitely come back for a longer stay in the future!

Amazing location and great host. The pictures give you a hint about the view and surrounding area, but they can't do it justice. We wanted to stay and live in this apartment. Ignacio met us at the door and gave us a tour of the place. He has a book of recommendations with place to eat and shop. Our entire time was really magical - sunset on the balcony, walking through Poble Sec and finding a place for Pinchos.
Also, the couch that converts into a bed is very comfortable and has thick curtains to make it more private. I think this place could easily be use for two people/couples wanting separate rooms. It was a little out of our budget, but I'm so glad we stayed here.

This is HANDS DOWN the best airbnb I've ever been to, and I've been to loads. It's the airiest, most welcoming, more visually appealing flat ever, and Ignacio was super informative and friendly. The pictures don't do it justice - we saw a two hour sunset just sitting outside, and walked to some incredible bars and restaurants in under ten minutes. 
If I'm going back to Barcelona... it's going to be in here!

Best stay in Barcelona!  We really love this apartment! It's location 10 min up streets from metro Poble Sec and bus stops, where many supermarkets, bakeries, nice restaurants are all around. The apartment is on the top floor with elevator, it is big, clean, well equipped and lovely decorated. The two balconies are our most favorite part! You can either enjoy the stunning city view from top everyday or to enjoy the street view nearby.  It's great to have a drink, breakfast or even do nothing at the balconies! And you can have the city view when having shower too!

We met Ignacio at the first day and when checking-out. He is truly friendly and nice! He showed us the apartment and rules clearly upon arrival, and recommended some restaurants to go for. We've tried some and they are really nice!  Haven't got chance to meet Sonia during stay, but we have a very smooth communication by text before and during stay, thanks for that.

No doubt it's a highlight in our trip, and cant wait to get back again next time! Thanks Ignacio and Sonia!

We had such a fantastic stay at Ignacio and Sonia's apartment. Everything was perfect! The contact before, including good detailed instructions on how to find the apartment, the location, the facilities, the views!! I would highly recommend staying here- 100%!

Ignacio and Sonja were such lovely hosts! They provided clear instructions on how to arrive, and once I did, Ignacio showed me around, gave so many great suggestions on where to eat and drink, and let me drop off my heavy luggage early while he cleaned. The apartment itself was such a dream - so breezy, open and heavenly. I felt like I was in a little Spanish oasis. The views are unbeatable...the entire city looks so vast and beautiful, especially during the sunsets. Everything was clean, cozy and perfect for my getaway! I would highly recommend this spot to anyone staying in BCN, and I would definitely love to come back again!

Sonia met us & was very welcoming. A wonderful apartment with fantastic views and a great location for exploring/relaxing around the beautiful Montjuic & easy walking to the centre. Would love to come back, many thanks!

This house was an amazing dream!! Great spot, great view from every room and an open, airy feeling. The balcony overlooking Barcelona was incredible and the sun room was heavenly! Ignacio and Sonia let us check in earlier, as we were arriving in the morning from a very long flight. They were very friendly and helpful. I definitely recommend this amazing apartment!

Ignacio was very nice and even met us at the apartment before check in so we didn't have to carry our bags around the city, so that was very helpful. He recommended restaurants and how to use the public transportation. The apartment was absolutely beautiful and the balconies were our favorite part. We walked almost everywhere, except for taking the subway or bus to destinations that were farther away. It was easy to navigate and there are many restaurants located near the apartment.

Sonia and Ignacio were very responsive in the days leading up to our stay, and I am confident that they would have responded immediately if there had been anything we needed during our 2 weeks there. 
The apartment is even more beautiful than the pictures make it look. We lived on the terrace! The view is breathtaking, and the breeze made it comfortable even when the temperatures in the city were 33 degrees. 
We loved the neighbourhood too! Off the beaten track of touristy Barcelona--great neighbourhood feel, cool places to discover that are not part of any guidebook. 
I would totally recommend this for anyone...I can't wait to come back!

We stayed 1 week at Sonia's and Ignacio apartment. The flat is perfect, clean and cosy. 
And the view from the balcony is just breathtaking! 
Would absolutely recommend it !

Très bon service de la part de Sonia et Ignacio. Communication rapide et efficace avec eux. Sonia nous a fait un bon accueil à notre arrivée. L'appartement était très propre. La vue sur Barcelone est spectaculaire. La proximité du Montjui est agréable. Deux lignes de métro sont proches.
Bon rapport qualité prix selon nous pour loger au calme  à Barcelone.
Séjour parfait !
Best view in all of Barcelona. Close to main shopping and eating districts. Great neighbourhood and really authentic apartment. Felt like a real local. Would definitely stay here again.

We had a wonderful time at this apartment. It was ideally located in a nice neighbourhood with lots of interesting shops nearby. The views of the city from the two terraces are incredible. The apartment is very large and well equipped. There is a wonderful breeze that passes through the apartment when the windows are open. It is on the top floor but is easily accessible by elevator. The hosts were very accommodating, friendly and reachable. The only thing negative we could say is that we found the apartment door a bit tricky to open but that should not stop you from considering this unit. Thanks Ignacio for a great stay!

Ignacio, who was in the flat, is a very nice host. He introduced me in the flat and he was very kind and interested. 
The flat is very big and due to its many windows there's always fresh breezy air in the flat. The flat does not have air conditioning I think, but it really doesn't need it because of that. The flat has 2 nice terraces, one of them a bit bigger and with a nice view over the city, which was very nice to see. The bathroom was good, and the view you can have while showering is just beautiful. The kitchen had everything I needed, the wifi was fast. Overall I can definitely say that this was my best Airbnb experience so far and I'm glad to come back hopefully soon.

Ignacio was a great host and showed us around the apartment when we arrived.  The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures - very clean, spacious and renovated.  The view from the terrace was simply amazing! My husband and I enjoyed many dinners out there.  The apartment is also a very short 10 minute walk to the metro, and is tucked away on a nice quiet street away from the crowds! There are also many supermarkets and restaurants within walking distance.  Thank you for the great stay on our honeymoon!

We enjoyed our stay very much! The apartment was lovely with everything we needed and with an amazing view of the city.

Ignacio was very helpful in allowing us to leave our luggage in the apartment after checkout time.

We highly recommand it to everyone visiting Barcelona.

Our staying at the appartment of Ignacio & Sonia is unforgettable. A great view from the terraces, a nice neighborhood and located nearby a metro and nice restaurants & bars. An extraordinary place to stay in Barcelona!

Ignacio's apartment was everything the reviews said and more. Great location and neighborhood and  beautiful views of Barcelona. He's a gracious host and we would definitely come back. 
Thanks Ignacio!

Great location and amazing views from the balcony overlooking Barcelona. The door was a little challenging but not an issue. The only thing that took us off guard was a random extra small fee (extra .65/night per person). Still not totally sure what it was but again it didn't cost much.

amazing views from every window - panoramic view of the city on one side, and of the mountain on the other. peaceful and lovely appointed place.
location: off the beaten path of tourists but near public transit to get to the city center when we wanted to explore. 
thank you for the comfortable stay!

Great place - nice flat. Clean and tidy and spaceious for 2 people. 
We enjoyed our stay. Sonia is helpful! Thanks!

We had such a great time in Sonia and Ignacio's apartment. The views are just amazing from the terrace and being in a real neighbourhood is such a great experience. It was a lovely to meet Sonia, she was a great host and explained everything we needed to know. We hope to return one day!

The flat was comfortable, very tastefully furnished and convenient for Montjuic, local tapas bars and restos, and the centre - we walked most places. Enjoyed our breakfasts on the terrace with fresh bread from local bakers and wonderful views. Ignacio and Sonia speak excellent English and were very helpful. I will definitely try to stay in their flat next time I go to Barcelona.
A great view, comfortable apartment, and a good location.  Ignacio and Sonia were very responsive. I would like to return and stay here again someday.

Ignacio communicated directions clearly to me me prior to arrival. Unfortunately, what wasn't communicated was that the door lock was damaged and that it could take on average 20-30 minutes to enter the unit. When I contacted Ignacio about this problem he suggested that a locksmith would be by the next day to fix it. Two days passed and when I reached out again he seemed surprised. I was disappointed to learn that previous guests had experienced the same problem but nothing was done to fix it. Further, the apartment was incredibly cold and required us to start a small wood fire each day to stay warm (barely). After two nights Ignacio appeared with a fire extinguisher noting that we might need it. I was very alarmed by this, and couldn't help but wonder why this was addressed when we first checked in. The bathroom in particular was icy, making morning showers quite miserable. Lastly, while the apartment was spacious, it lacked basic kitchen essentials - such as a pot to boil water - and had a very dirty sink and shower. I hate to be so negative but my experience was less than stellar.
Apartment was fantastic. Ignacio was very helpful!

What a gem! 
I've stayed in a few places across Barcelona but I think this one is the best so far. 
Truly stunning views looking down on the city, yet so close. 
The area is quiet, safe and so close to the garden walks on top of the hill. 
I found the apartment very quiet considering it's location and the bed is super comfortable. 
Great places to eat and drink nearby as well as the usual shops, supermarkets etc. 

Looking forward to visiting again in the summer.

Appartement avec beaucoup de charme (quelle lumière et quelle vue !), idéalement situé, dans lequel nous avons passé un excellent séjour. Il est très bien tenu, globalement bien équipé, sauf peut-être l'équipement de la cuisine qui pourrait être complété (une grande casserole par exemple...). Nous avons beaucoup aimé pouvoir nous chauffer au poêle à bois ; une découverte agréable bien que cela n'était pas précisé dans l'annonce. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Sonia mais le contact a été très bon avec Ignacio lors de l'entrée dans les lieux.
