Sonia was really helpful from day one. She allowed us to drop off our luggage prior to checking in. The place is well located and very close to lots of pinxto bars and metro stations. Would definitely recommend it.

Sonia received us with the smile, she prepared everything for us to spend a perfect stay. The place is very atypical, cosy and the view is extraordinary. We keep this place for next time in Barcelona!

What a view. What a great location. Very close to the Poble Sec Metro stop. Easy access all over town from there. Good Pinxtos restaurants nearby. New Year's Eve - watched fireworks all over Barcelona.
Was met by Sonia. What a delightful person. Energetic, helpful, full of life. Brought us more wood and pine boxes for kindling. She was just a really nice person.
The views from the South balcony and the north balcony were wonderful. You could see the ocean from the north one.
If you can't build a fire, you will not enjoy the winter. You need to be able to keep the wood stove working. The apartment was adequately warmed. Not as warm as some may be used to, but it worked for us.
We loved that recycling bins were used. It was a great stay and we spent our 20th anniversary there. Special time.

Ignacio and Sonia's àtico was just what we hoped it would be! The panoramic views from the terraces are even more amazing than the pictures. Ignacio greeted us right away and gave us tips for where do eat and things to explore around the city. We had a lovely time and hope to be back soon!
Amazing views in cozy apartment. Ignacio and Sonia were very nice.

We had an amazing stay at Ignacio&Sonia's place. The apartment was so cozy just as pictured and had an beautiful view from balcony. Ignacio was very helpful to explain everything about what I need to know.
I would definitely come back to them if I ever get a chance to stay in Barcelona! Thank you so much :)
Todo genial, vistas preciosas, personas encantadoras.. Perfecto!!

We loved our stay here. Communication was great and we were able to drop our bags off early so we didn't have to carry them around all day. The apartment was beautifully furnished with amazing views. Only 20 min walk into the centre and it's really close to museums like the Joan Miro Foundacion. Would definitely recommend!

Very nice apartment - we were couple there and it was great.
Excellent location on the slopes of monjuic: so you see the city amazingly like no one does - but remember you need to walk 15 minutes from Rambla out of them 5 minutes uphill in order to get to the apartment.

This was truly a dream come true. I am so glad we did not opt for a hotel-- Ignacio & Sonia's home was an experience to remember. The sunrises and sunsets had us in a trance. Ignacio greeted us and got us in, he was incredibly friendly and helpful. We hope we have the chance to stay here on our next trip to spain.

We visited for 6 nights and the apartment was just perfect. Located in a "local' area, a few blocks away from the tourist madness. The location allows you to explore the city in pretty much any direction. Supermarkets and bus stop are literally seconds away from the door and the famous "Pintchos" street is only minutes away. We used (Hidden by Airbnb) to search for public transport when we walked too far and didn't feel like waking back at the end of the day

The house itself is like a hidden pearl. Its decorated with a lot of creativity, putting simple materials together in a way that makes is special. The building is super quiet and, even though there is a school close by, its not on the side of the room, so we had absolutely no problem with any noise. 

Kitchen is not equipped with state of the art appliances, but it does the trick for a few days.

Ignacio was super welcoming and gave us lots of tips. There's also lots of documentation available in the house to keep you more than busy with tips.

All in all, a 5 star stay in Barcelona, at a very special place.

wir haben sehr kurzfristig eine Unterkunft für 2 Nächte gesucht...nicht nur das der preis für die Lage, sauberkeit und kommunikation absolut in ordnung geht...sonia gab sich Viel Mühe uns in der kurzen Zeit die beste bäckerei, pizzeria, lokale,...zu empfehlen und den weg genau zu beschreiben. als sonia mir noch meine online tickets für ein Konzert (ich vergaß die Tickets auszudrucken) ausdruckte und diese uns über eine Freundin zukommen ließ, sprengte das all meine Erwartungen und bestätigte einmal mehr die unendliche spanische Gastfreundschaft!!!
des weiteren war es überhaupt kein Problem statt um 12:00 erst um 16:00 auszuchecken...ohne Aufpreis, ganz unkompliziert!
einfach super empfehlenswert...von dem ausblick der wohnung ganz zu schweigen.

Lovely apartment with an awesome view in a great neighbourhood.
We stayed for six nights as a family with our 7 months old son and it was all ideal.
The hosts had great recommendations about the area we really valued these.

Sonia is very friendly and helpful :)
The view of the apartment is amazing

This was our first experience in Barcelona, and Ignacio & Sonia's apartment was the perfect platform from which to do so. A great top floor apartment with amazing views over Barcelona as the sun rises; a location that allows you to easily walk to a close metro station or wander into the city centre on hoof; and the location in Poble Sec allows you to experience a local setting as a resident would. The apartment itself is wonderful--quirky and fully equipped for a comfortable and pleasurable stay. Ignacio & Sonia are brilliant hosts, and they made everything easy and stress-free. In sum, we'd stay here again, and we wouldn't hesitate to recommend this AirBnB to others.

This apartment was so cool and Ignacio and Sonia were incredibly responsive and kind! Ignacio checked us in and was so kind and gave my wife and I great tips! The apartment is just incredible. It's clean and spacious and the views are incredible!!! You can see all of Barcelona while you shower! Also, the neighborhood is great and the transportation is so convenient and easy. My wife and I took a bus from El Born neighborhood and it dropped us off 30 seconds away from the apartment. All in all, just so glad we got to stay here!

We were looking to try airbnb for the first time, looking for something more cosy than a standard hotel room. We found Ignacio & Sonia's apartment and went for it based on the promise of the views, and they didn't disappoint!

The apartment is situated just on the outskirts of an area called Poble Sec and provides great views of the city (when I say great, I mean amazing). There are some great places to eat and drink in Poble Sec, especially along Carrera de Blai, where we sat and ate Pinchxos whilst sipping the local beer.

The area is hilly, so if you find it difficult to get about by foot this might not be the best location for you. We enjoyed exploring the city from this apartment, with La Rambla a 20 minute walk away.

We would certainly stay here again as the apartment is quiet and being able to eat breakfast or enjoy a glass of the wine in the evening with views of the city, the mountains and the seas was an unbelievable experience.

Thank you Sonia & Ignaccio!
Awesome views! Great location...highly recommend this place. Hated to leave. Thanks to these spectacular hosts!
Fantastisk beliggenhed, venlige og imødekommende værter! Fantastisk udsigt! vil helt klart anbefale denne lejlighed!
Great vieuw over Barcelona!! Nice Appartement and a friendly welcome!!

Ignacio and Sonia's place was perfect for our stay in Barcelona! The apartment is beautiful with an amazing view of the city from the balcony. Ignacio and Sonia were wonderful and super helpful. We had a problem with the wifi on our first day and they made sure it got fixed as quickly as possible. I would definitely stay here again!

If you want to get great views of the city with beautiful sunrises and sunsets, this is your place. It was open, airy, comfortable, and had everything we could want to end our 16-day trip around Spain. If you want to see the big city sites (La Sagrada, Arc de Triomf, etc.) You will want to take a cab or bike or be prepared for a nice long walk. Walking wasn't sure big deal for us as we wanted to see the city by foot. There are great restaurants right by the apartment and a beautiful park right behind it. It's a simple 15 minutes drive to the airport. Can't miss this gem in the city!
Great apartment with views either side. Quick access to El Parallel and the Metro, but Las Ramblas and centre is walking distance! We had a great time.

Rooms with a view, or views! The views from all windows and terrace of this apartment are amazing, including from the shower where you have a window open to the city.
We loved our stay in Poole Sec and Ignacio and Sonia's apartment was in a perfect area to explore Barcelona, the metro is easy to use and is close by.  There are lots of great cafes, fruit and veg and patisserie shops just around the corner.  Ignacio was there to meet us at arrival.  We would recommend this as a place to either relax or explore the city from.

This place is gorgeous, spacious, and comfortable with spectacular views of the city. The location is outstanding, there is a lot to see and do around the neighbourhood. The metro, which takes you to many of Barcelona's 'must see' spots, is just down the road. The balcony is a standout and we really enjoyed a quiet glass of wine looking out over magnificent Barcelona.

Absolutely incredible views! I stayed for about 5 days and the apartment was spacious, clean and comfortable. Very nice memory foam mattress and the pull out couch was comfortable too. The neighborhood is in a great location and within walking distance of almost everything you might want to see. When you shower, you can look out the window and see the most beautiful view of the city as you wash your hair lol. Will definitely be back soon! Thanks, Ignacio and Sonia!

Words can not describe how utterly gorgeous this place is. The views from both balcony areas are stunning. There is a small elevator that gets you to the top. I never heard a peep from neighbors. The location is a bit away from the main tourist areas (maybe like 15-20 minute walk) but generally I found Barcelona as a city to be a little ugly, whereas where this apartment is located is close to the prettiest areas near the Joan Miró museum and the mountain. The El Poble-sec neighborhood is nice and pleasant to walk in. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again. The view from the shower is amazing as well. Probably the prettiest AirBnB we've ever stayed in.

I stayed at Ignacio & Sonia's place with a friend and we thought the accommodation was great! Perfect location, it was about a 15 to 20 mins walk to Las ramblas. We found there were lots of different restaurants close by and shops to look in on the way. The views from the terrace were fantastic and also great views from the shower! I would recommend this accommodation to anyone, it looks just like the pictures and it's a great location to explore the city! 
Thank you, 
Becky

Perfect everything! Ignacio took good care of us at check-in and showed us around. The apartment is well equipped and both the terrace and the balcony are really cozy. Great neighborhood with bars and restaurants and a supermarket just around the corner, close to the metro and with the city center within walking distance. There is a schoolyard nearby, which was pretty noisy on a couple of mornings though nothing unacceptable. I would love to stay at this place again!
This place has an awesome view and is well located. Highly reccomend!!

Séjour très agréable, appartement superbe, calme et frais, avec une vue magnifique. 
Nous avons été ravis de ce séjour et ne pouvons que recommander l'appartement d'Ignacio et Sonia !

We loved this roomy attic apartment, it was bigger than we expected and had the most amazing views from the front and back terraces, which were lovely to sit out on and relax day and night. Given we were there in July it was great to have these spaces to come back to after being in the busy city centre, which although only 20 minutes walk away (downhill) is a contrast to the residential area of Poble Sec. The Montjuic/Poble Sec area although more residential has lots of great places to eat. Carrer de Blai is a five minute walk away, and has many lovely tapas bars which are much better and cheaper than the ones near the more tourist areas such as Las Ramblas. No need to venture any further afield in the evening. The area is close to many museums, and we also swam at the Piscine Municipal 
de Montjuic which is a 10 minute uphill walk away. A well kept secret, and preferable to us than the busy beach in July. I highly recommend the attic apartment and the local area, and we would love to return.

We loved staying here. Ignacio gave us a great overview on arrival, their place was homely, clean, and had everything we needed for four people. Heaps of vege and pastry shops closeby as well as supermarkets and ATMs. We enjoyed some lovely evenings out on the deck and wouldn't hesitate to stay again in the future. Tips for anyone visiting Barcelona for the first time; get your shopping done before the 1/1:30pm siesta (most shops close) and keep in mind that many restaurants don't open until 8/9pm. The city feels really different based on the time of day!
Best view in Barcelona.
Beautiful views. Very friendly. Great place.

Views are lovely and a great feature of this apartment. This cannot be understated! Barca has so much to see and do, but the time spent at home, especially during hot days - the apartment was nice and cool - was very pleasant. The location benefits from being close to Carrer de Blai, THE place for evening pinchos in BCN, it's near to the Montjuic cable car, local restaurants are reasonably priced, and the Poble Sec area and wonderful Carrer de Parlament are perfect for cafes, wine bars and other local entertainment. In this sense there is lots to do and the apartment was located in a very peaceful area which can be contrasted to other places to say such as Raval, or El Born, which would be much louder at night. However, the entertainment mentioned above was all 2-5 minutes walk away. Ignacio and Sonia were always quick to respond via the app.

je recommanderai l'appartement de Ignaco et Sonia sans problème. 
l'appartement est traversant. les 2 terrasses ont une vue imprenable sur Barcelone. l'appartement est très fonctionnel et très bien agencé. L'accès à la ville est très simple par Metro Bus Taxi. Tout est facle d'accès pour toutes les envies quelles soient cultrelles récréatives ou balnéaires.
This flat is in a wonderful neighborhood in Barcelona! It also has THE BEST view of any AirBnB that I have stayed in...two decks and very relaxed vibe. I def plan on returning!
The view was absolutely stunning and Ignacio was a friendly and helpful host
Great little apartment. Pretty good access to dining and Metro. No AC and a bit hot and noisy.
Great spot way from crazy crowds. Breezy and wonderful views. Only wish we could have stayed longer.

Amazing apartment in a cool part of Barcelona. The terrace has incredible views of the whole city. Very close to metro, bars and restaurants and Sonia made us feel so welcome on arrival. Couldn't recommend more. Sonia was kind enough to meet us after a late flight and let us leave our bags on departure.

Great, unique apartment. Was a great location, your just outside of the super busy areas and was very quiet at night. 

The view from the balcony is stunning, would stay in the apt for that alone.

Place was very clean, plenty of room for two people. And was great having coffee every morning from the balcony. 

Would recommend

Contras del departamento:
- Apenas llegamos nos pidieron que paguemos una tasa extra de 20 euros por las 4 noches. Nunca nos comunicaron de esto antes de llegar para que lo supiéramos antes de reservar. No fue grato que nos recibieran pidiéndonos más dinero, encima en efectivo y sin entregarnos un recibo. No tenemos forma de saber que esos 20 euros fueron destinados a donde realmente deberían ir. Como no teníamos cambio, le dejamos los 20 euros en el departamento el último día antes de irnos. Se ve que el arrendador no los encontró y en lugar de preguntarnos donde los habíamos dejado, nos acusó de no haber pagado diciendo que "está cansado de que sea siempre lo mismo". Hubiese sido más amable que nos consultara donde estaba el dinero antes de acusar de no pagar. Malos modos. 
- La ducha. El agua simplemente no se mantiene tibia. O está congelada o te prendes fuego. 
- Los almohadones de la terraza estaban empapados. Imposible sentarse. No pudimos usarla. 
- No hay calefacción eléctrica en la habitación. Solo un hogar (creo que a leña o algo para encender) y no había nada con que encenderlo. 
- No había frazadas gruesas. Tuvimos que reforzar el abrigo con más sabanas. 
- El ventilador no funcionaba. Nos tocó una noche de calor en la que no pudimos dormir.  

Pros del departamento:
- Muy linda vista, amplio y súper luminoso. 
- Buena ubicación con un bus que usamos mucho a solo 1 minuto del departamento. 
- Plaza España a 10 minutos andando. 
- El arrendador nos recibió en el departamento unas horas antes del check
In oficial para que podamos dejar las valijas y nos sugirió lugares para comer. 

Conclusión:
- Es recomendable para alquilar pero no sé si al precio que está publicado.

Awesome stay in Barcelona. Such a great apartment with the most fantastic views over the city. Loved the outdoor spaces. Great location near tapas bars, local hangouts. Easy walk into town. Would recommend!

Die Kommunikation und das Check-in liefen reibungslos und unproblematisch.
Die Lage des Apartments ist sehr gut. Die Ausstattung ebenfalls. Die Sicht von der Terrasse ist toll.
Alles in Allem ein sehr schöner Aufenthalt.
Ignacio war sehr hilfreich und nett.
Wir würden wieder buchen.
Very scenic, cozy and clean place in quiet residential area. Sonia is very nice and quick to respond. Highly recommend.

We enjoyed meeting Ignacio and staying in his spacious apartment with awesome views over looking the city. There are a lot of nooks and crannies to relax in - living room, solarium, terrace, quiet bedroom, and dining area. The bathroom was really big with lots of counter space and a good shower. Windows on both sides gave wonderful breezes and light. The kitchen was equipped with just about all amenities (except microwave) and lots of cooking starters, tea and sugar.  Ignacio & Sonia have compiled a very useful book with restaurant and cafe suggestions in the neighborhood, which unfortunately we could not take full advantage of, just ran out of time! The location of the flat is just perfect, 5 blocks to the metro, just a block from the stairs that lead into the expansive park, and a few blocks in the other direction to the cable car you take up to Montjuic Castle! The only "con" was the noise. A very active school recess yard on one side, and a busy street and soccer field on the other. With the windows shut it was better, and was quieter at night. If you're out all day sightseeing, it shouldn't affect your stay. And Ignacio's prompt communication and helpful suggestions, the amenities and the views more than compensated for it. All in all, a very enjoyable stay!

Ignacio and Sonia's apartment was exactly what we expected.  It was a perfect location, only about 5 minutes from the closest metro, so we were away from heavily tourist populated areas, but still close enough to get anywhere in the city quickly.  The Montjuic mountain is right behind the property is a must-see spot!  Then, of course, there is the amazing terrace that over looks the city.  Unfortunately it was cold when we were there so we didn't use it as much as we would have liked, but it was still amazing to wake up and drink a coffee with that view every morning.

Die Lage in der Stadt ist für alle die gerne über die Stadt blicken fantastisch! Auch zum sportlichen Morgenstart liegt der Hügel mit Park direkt vor dem Haus.
Die orginellen überdeckten Sitzplätze bieten einen romantischen Platz für das Morgenessen mit Ausblick. Ignacio war sehr bemüht alles zum besten zu richten.
Wir können die Wohnung gerne weiterempfehlen.

The most INCREDIBLE airbnb we've ever had!! The house was new, clean and sooo spacious! 

Very well equipped , from kitchen utensils to cooking spices, very clean and comfy!!! 
THE TERRACE -oh my days!!! We didn't want to get back inside, we just cuddled in blankets and stayed on the terrace with that stunning view every evening ! And the second terrace in the bedroom just absolutely perfect for breakfast with the morning sun!!!

Just one thing to mention is that it was a bit chilly in the house , but the provided heater did it's job when moved to the bedroom, so at the end it was not a big problem ! 

The house is just as it is described! And even better ! 

We did not meet Sonia, but Ignacio was very cool, it was very easy to communicate ! MOREOVER he was very nice to offer us a ride to the station when we were leaving :) thanks you for that !

We had a great stay at Ignacio & Sonia's place. Sonia welcomed us at our arrival and was so kind. The views from the balcony are insane, and there are so many good restaurants and cafes within walking distance in Poble Sec. I would definitely recommend.
Hi Ignacio. A fantastic place close to the town and Montjuis. Views from the decks are brilliant. Hop on - off busses are a great way to see everything. Great to meet you on arrival Recommend to all.

I strongly recommend to live in this apartment during your stay in Barcelona. Though it’s not located in the very center of the city and needs to take public transportation to get to the main tourist attractions, it is quite for sleep. One impressive part of this apartment is that it has two scenic balcony from which you could see amazing view of Barcelona, one is the city view and the other one is the city view. The host is very very hospitable.

Ignacio place was amazing! Great location. Pablo sec is a really cool (Website hidden by Airbnb) was a very loco feel to it.
Great place if you want to stay alway from the tourist attractions but just a 15m walk alway from LA rambla.
The apt is fantastic with the most amazing views of Barcelona. The view alone was worth everything. Ignacio was a great Communicator. The fire place was great for when you get home  and just want to chill and drink some wine and start the fireplace and look at Barcelona.i Highly  recommend this place to spend your vacation in Barcelona.

The place was outstanding. We were there for the 1/12018 and could see fireworks from all over the city. It was very clean and neat with amazing views. The hosts were very quick to respond to us and were very helpful. I would highly recommend this place. In walking distance of just about everything.

We had a great time in Ignacio & Sonia's Appartment! The terrece is very sunny and it's a nice place to have a breakfast or a Cup of tee. The kichen had everything you Need to cook. And the bathroom was clean and nice.

The Area was quiet and green, and you can walk to the Centrum in 20 Minutes. Bus and Metro were also available. There were several supermarkets, Shops, really nice restautants!

One of the Highlight was Ignacio's private book of restaturant-recommendation! We tried some of them -  they were fantastic! We'll definitly visit them again!

All in all a five star experience! Strongly recommended!

Magnifica estancia. El apartamento reúne las características idóneas para pasar unos dias en Barcelona. El barrio es muy cómodo y accesible, alejado de aglomeraciones. Magnífico para una acabar las jornadas en su terraza, conas increíbles vistas. Para repetir. La atención de sus propietarios perfecta.
Great apartment, even better than the photos. Ignacio was welcoming and accommodating - thank you for being so lovely! Would 100% recommend this lovely apartment with incredible terraced views.

A cute apartment in a beautiful part of Barcelona. Very walkable to everywhere and close to public transport but feels a bit secluded also. Nice space that feels very open, especially with the terraces.

We had a wonderful few days staying at Ignacio & Sonia's. The apartment is really beautiful with amazing views. Great neighbourhood with lots of delicious restaurants and tapas bars! Close to public transport and easy to get to the rest of the city.

Lovely flat in a very quiet corner of a lively neighborhood. Amazing views of the city from the different terraces. The appartment is very cozy and it even has a chimney. Great hosts! Very welcoming and nice! I highly recommend Ignacio's and Sonia's flat!
Amazing place, Ignacio is a great host and very attentive to his guests. I would  highly recommend this place

High recommend for Ignacio&Sonia's apartment,very nice interior ,mix Classico furitrue :) I love it so much ..super good view from the mountain top  ,5 mins walk to the bar and shop  ...would like to stay again:) see u soon
Highly recommend

This place was even better than we had imagined. The views were amazing, and I loved that there were great views all around the apartment including the bathroom! Ignacio was very friendly and his great communication made check-in very easy. It was only about a 10 minute walk from the metro, and there were so many great food options nearby. Ignacio left a book of recommendations, and I referred to that a few times. The location felt very local, and was still easy to reach major tourist sites on foot or through the subway.

Ignacio and Sonia's place was perfect for our 3 night stay! Fun neighborhood within walking distance of many local restaurants tucked away from busy areas. The view was breathtaking and space was beautifully decorated and comfortable. Very kind and hospitable hosts. Would definitely recommend and stay here again!
Fantastic views and a great location—would highly recommend!

This apartment is in a lovely part of Barcelona away from the hustle and bustle of the main tourist areas. It’s an easy, pleasant 20 mins walk into town, which allowed us to discover parts of the city we otherwise wouldn’t have stumbled across. The flat itself is full of charm and the view from the back balcony is wonderful. Couldn’t recommend highly enough! Thank you Ignacio!!

Igancio est très sympathique et donne en plus de très bonnes suggestions pour profiter du quartier. L'appartement très bien avec une belle décoration et deux superbes terrasses, dans un quartier populaire et très chaleureux. À consommer sans modération !
Perfect flat. Perfect view. You are near everything by walk. Ignacio is a perfect host. You just have to book This flat.
Sehr feine Wohnung! Schön geschnitten und mit der besten Aussicht ever. Top.

The view from this apartment is FANTASTIC. We barely ever closed the windows of the apartment because we loved hearing all of the hustle and bustle of the city below us and enjoyed sitting out on the multiple patios to sip on coffee or a bottle of wine. Because this apartment overlooks the city in the Northern direction, you get to view the sunrise over the ocean and the sunset over the mountains all from your back porch. Ignacio was great and gave us some local tips on how to get around and what to see. My wife and I found that Poble Sec is a great area of town to stay in - there are some fantastic restaurants that aren't overcrowded by tourists and it is within walking distance to almost anywhere in the city. No complaints about our stay whatsoever! Would highly recommend staying here.

The outside space is amazing, which an incredible view over Barcelona. Much preferred this neighbourhood to the very crowded centre- but you are close enough to walk there. So many nice restaurants around.  Clean and as the images suggest. No problems and would definitely go back!

Ignacio est vraiment adorable. Il prend le temps de répondre à toutes vos attentes, c'est un hôte très attentionné. Il a réservé un restaurant pour nous, à 2 pas de son logement et nous n'avons pas été déçus. L'appartement est incroyable, les 2 terrasses  offrent une vue inoubliable sur Barcelone. Quel chance de se doucher en contemplant la Sagrada Familia. Merci encore pour ce délicieux séjour. 
Nadine et Bruno

The place is fantastic and so peaceful! We loved the area it was in as it is tranquil and quiet, but close to all necessary amenities. It’s also beautiful, with two spectacular views at opposite ends of the apartment, and a wonderful terrace that we enjoyed drinking vermouth and red wine on while staring at the amazing view of all of Barcelona ! Ignacio was super communicative and kind, and we felt well taken care of. There are also lots of recommendations for spots to go from both the hosts and other past guests! We would definitely return!

I don't know how it could be better. You'll love the hosts, the style is completely charming, everything comfortable and functional,  location gave very easy access everywhere, two opposite & beautiful views -the one over city stunning and if it wasn't for the fact that they deserve every bit of business they get I would want to hope you don't go so that it was available always for me!! Selfishness aside GGOOO! You won't regret it!  Vas-y-la! C'est impecable! La view est pour mourir (Website hidden by Airbnb) Todos van amar el ático es perfectamente situado, la belleza dentro y a la vista es perfecta y la hospitalidad  de los anfitriones es perfecta (Website hidden by Airbnb) Amici no aspettare! Partire (Website hidden by Airbnb) Ja es ist sehr gut in ihrer Wohnung. Shönheit über alle.
Charming place, perfect hosts.

Truly amazing place! Ignacio did a fantastic job communicating throughout the whole time before the stay. Super friendly and great job showing us around the apartment and giving us tips for the area. I was even surprised with fruit and champagne seeing as it was my birthday weekend! I was a bit skeptical about not having AC but once we were there, it wasn’t needed at all. The apartment has two balconies and tons of windows in every room, so the breeze was perfect throughout the day and night. The view from the terrace is the cherry on top! I would recommend it to any person coming to Barcelona. It’s located just up the hill but only a 3 min walk to Poble Sec metro stop. Perfectly located near Blai street where you can find lots of lovely tapas restaurants and bars. There’s a blow dryer that works perfectly ( i used it every other day) , along with washing machine. The apartment is much more beautiful and spacious in person and has been renovated from what the posted pictures show. DON’T MISS OUT ON BOOKING THIS PLACE!
Great location, beautiful views, clean  quaint apartment. Won’t be disappointed!

This is a wonderful place. Just like the photos- the comfort and style of the place make you feel relaxed and at home. The balconies and windows and the views are amazing. As it’s summer we had the windows open as there’s no a/c and the street below is quite loud so if you’re a light sleeper just be aware of that. Ignacio went above and beyond to ensure we had a great check in as our flight was delayed numerous times and he had to meet us late. Greatly appreciated everything!

Ignacio & Sonia's apartment is really amazing, we had a great time here and would recommend it to anyone visiting Barcelona.
Many thanks

Absolutely loved the flat; the location was convenient and the flat itself was beautiful. The view was breathtaking and, as previous reviewers have mentioned, you don’t miss the AC while you’re there. If we find ourselves in Barcelona again, we will definitely be staying here!

Lägenheten är luftig, ljus, rymlig och charmigt bohemisk. Det finns all utrustning man behöver om man t ex vill laga mat och många olika sittplatser både inom- och utomhus. Närområdet Poble Sec/ Sant Antoni är också helt fantastiskt. Rekommenderar varmt detta boende och återvänder gärna!

Ignacio and Sonia’s Poole Sec home is beautiful. It was such an amazing oasis to retreat to after a long day of touring Barcelona. It’s located in an amazing location to tour the Olympic grounds, Montjuic Mountain, the Fountains, and Castle and just a 15 minute walk to La Rambla! I highly recommend hitting up Blais Street for tapas - just a 3 minute walk from this retreat. Also, this airbnb has a full size washer, which was such a nice treat for a long Euro vacation! Ignacio was incredibly helpful and kind - we would definitely stay here again!

Beautifully decorated and in a great spot for exploring the city. A more residential area so great to relax in after a busy day exploring and nice and cool as is near to the mountain. The views from the two terraces are wonderful. The little extras like the guidebooks about Barcelona and the boom of recommendations about local cafes was really appreciated and so helpful. Would recommend this place.
Everything was great with this apartment, amazing view and very comfortable place. 5 stars!

Quirky flat, very spacious,comfy bed, cool breeze throughout. The kitchen is basic but had everything we needed. What makes this flat so worthwhile is the wonderful balcony with incredible views of the city! Worth the slight trek up hill (5 mins) to the flat. Great shower and again, incredible views through the window whilst showering! The location was also great as away from the busy centre but in a very cool, relaxed neighbourhood which is well connected.
It was very good. Ignacio is very friendly and helpfull. Next time in Barcelona we will come back on this beautiful appartement by Sonia and Ignacio.  Thanks!

Wonderful place to stay in Barcelona! Metro is only a few blocks away and it is easy to get around to the center. The apartment is clean. The views are outstanding. Would highly recommend staying at Ignacio and Sonia’s place!
Très bel appartement très bien équipé et très bien situé (Montjuic - Poble Sec) dans lequel nous sommes revenus. Accueil parfait d'Ignacio.

Ignacio and Sonia’s flat was incredible. The check-in process was easy, and Ignacio was there to greet us and show us the apartment and provide some local tips. Wonderful location! Only a 5 minute walk to the metro. There are many great tapa bars and restaurants nearby - be sure to check out Xemei, La Platilleria, and Quimet y Quimet. The space was bigger than we had expected, but the views just as breathtaking as the photos; you can even overlook Barcelona while showering! The apartment gets a good breeze with the windows open. The bedroom has blackout curtains if you prefer. Be mindful that there are your standard street sounds and it’s close to a school so you’ll hear the school bells. Would definitely recommend this spot.

Absolutely loved our stay here and can offer nothing but positive feedback.

The view from the terrace is absolutely amazing, the pictures only give you a small idea of how spectacular it actually is. It’s around an 8 min walk to the metro station and there were always Uber’s readily available nearby.

The apartment is so light, spacious and airy.

Our hosts were always quick to respond to questions and Ignacio very kindly allowed us to drop our bags off early whilst he cleaned the apartment.

For the view alone this is hands down the best listing for Barcelona on Air BnB, if we return to the city we would certainly book this place again.

It is a beautiful and stylish house. Located on the uppermost floor of the building, you can see the wonderful scenery of Barcelona on the balcony in front and back of the house. On Sunday night when my wife and I arrived, we could see a fireworks display both east and west on the balcony. How romantic! It is a great place to see both sunrise and sunset. If you visit Barcelona, don't miss this place!!

My wife and I loved this place! We traveled to 5 countries during our trip, stayed in Airbnb for all, and this was our favorite of them all. The inside is very spacious and the views are unbeatable. The location was within walking distance to many things like Plaza Espana, restaurants, and the metro station. We recommend staying here!

Beautiful home with even more beautiful views, just a few blocks away from a lively part of town with delicious restauarants and tapas! Ignacio was very kind and welcoming. Would definitely recommend this place to stay!

I had high hopes for this apartment. The reviews looked great and the pictures were outstanding.  It was BETTER than I expected.  Perfect location.  Ignacio met me to show me around.  They have a guest book of great suggestions!  I used many of them. As a solo traveler I was looking for safe and I found it!  The building was wonderful.  The elevator was handy after a long day of walking around; who wants to do stairs after that!   They were quick to help me with any questions I had!  And the view.  Wow. I didn’t find a better view anywhere in Barcelona.  I’ve stayed in Airbnb’s all around the world and this one tops the charts!!!
Great location, close enough to everything but in a quiet neighborhood. Fabulous views from every room. Ignacio was extremely helpful and welcoming. Highly recommended!
Super séjour dans un logement bien placé à montjuic à l’écart des touristes! Vue imprenable
Unique place with great views on both sides. Having a shower with views like that is a real treat. Ignacio is a cool dude with all the answers - just go for it!
Wonderful home in an amazing neighborhood.
That view from the balcony!
Ignacio was a great host, very responsive and accommodating. The apartment itself was just as described. Would definitely stay here when I come back to Barcelona!
This apartment is delightful. Excellent views of Barcelona and in such a great area!

Ignacio and Sonia had a lovely apartment with gorgeous views. All amenities were available and the apartment was in walking distance of everything. Perfect location combined with perfect hosts, what more could you ask for.
We loved our stay in Barcelona and recommend this place to anyone going there! Everything was great!

Amazing views and clean apartment. A short walk to Poble sec metro stop which is a great option to get into the more touristy parts of the city very quickly. The neighborhood is quiet and safe. The apartment is clean and comfortable. Elevator helped with the stairs. I couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay for our week in Barcelona.

This location was wonderful! The views are stunning and the sunrises were the best we've seen in all of Barcelona. 

Great food and drinks are within a mile and just a few blocks from some high-traffic shopping areas.
Amazing place with great style, location, and views!
Très bel appartement avec des vues magnifiques sur la ville. Emplacement parfait.
Great apartment in a great city!

This apartment is just the dream, we had such a great time here.  Views across the whole city (even from the shower!), beautiful terrace, sun room, comfy bed, we loved the kitchen too!  Such a great part of town to stay in, with all that Poble Sec, Sant Antoni and Montjuic have to offer.  We loved it - thank you!

Wonderful apartment with the most stunning views!! The apartment is beautiful, spacious and everything you need is present. We had a fantastic relaxing stay and can highly recommend. Both Sonia and Ignacio welcomed us upon arrival, we immediately felt at home. Both were incredibly kind and helpful. We will definitely stay here again when in Barcelona !
Everything was perfect. Ignacio and Sonia are really reactive !! Thank you very much.

Ignacio is a gracious host; he keeps it sparkling clean and it is cozy and warm. The views are spectacular and the location near the metro makes all of Barcelona easily accessible.  Don’t miss Montjuic Parc; such a gem and right in the neighborhood. Fantastic restaurants right in the neighborhood as well; our two favorites in all of Barcelona were right there: Palo Cortao and Malevo.  Great stay and a very nice place.

name: 5star apt walk to Chatswood close to Sydney City
summary: Welcome to this luxurious and fully-furnished apartment in Roseville, Sydney's wonderful Upper North Shore. This apartment is super close to Chatswood just one station by train or 5min by driving. Only 20min drive to Sydney CBD.  There is a large balcony with lovely furniture. You can have morning coffee or afternoon tea while enjoying the beautiful view of Roseville.  This is a quiet and pleasant place to live in. Great choice for family, and tourists to enjoy an impressive North Sydney life!
space: This unit is newly-built and fully furnished with almost everything you need during your stay.  The living room is spacious with paid TV and cozy sofa. Not like staying in hotels, you can make yourself at home here.  The kitchen is equipped with gas stove, refrigerator, wine closet for you to lead a high quality life. You can sitting at the dining table and enjoy your meals. Both the two bedrooms have double beds and bedside table, as well as large storage space. You can relax and enjoy morning sunshine or afternoon tea on the large and airy balcony.  This place is close to Roseville College, and Roseville is a very friendly and peaceful neighborhood in Upper North Sydney.  If you are a new comer or tourist to Sydney, it is super safe and convenient to live here. Oh, if you like shopping, you cannot miss the famous Chatswood CBD, which is just 5 minute drive from here!
description: Welcome to this luxurious and fully-furnished apartment in Roseville, Sydney's wonderful Upper North Shore. This apartment is super close to Chatswood just one station by train or 5min by driving. Only 20min drive to Sydney CBD.  There is a large balcony with lovely furniture. You can have morning coffee or afternoon tea while enjoying the beautiful view of Roseville.  This is a quiet and pleasant place to live in. Great choice for family, and tourists to enjoy an impressive North Sydney life! This unit is newly-built and fully furnished with almost everything you need during your stay.  The living room is spacious with paid TV and cozy sofa. Not like staying in hotels, you can make yourself at home here.  The kitchen is equipped with gas stove, refrigerator, wine closet for you to lead a high quality life. You can sitting at the dining table and enjoy your meals. Both the two bedrooms have double beds and bedside table, as well as large storage space. You can relax and enjoy morning s
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located in the beautiful and peaceful Roseville in Upper North Shore of Sydney. Basically, this place is convenient to almost every popular places in Sydney. This apartment is only 5min walk to Roseville station and only one station traveling by train from here to Chatswood CBD! 5-miniute drive to Chatswood CBD and only 2min WALK to Roseville College. 15min drive to Macquarie University. Also, here is super close to Sydney City and almost everything!
notes: Please do NOT use the dryer in the laundry. Please be careful of using the gas stove, and don’t leave the stove on when cooking.  Please close the windows and turn off the lights when you leave the room. Please lock the living room door when you are out.
transit: Take the train from Roseville station and just one stop to Chatswood CBD. Or you can just Uber to anywhere you want:)
access: Please do NOT use the dryer machine in the laundry.  Guests can have access to Wi-Fi, Television, bedrooms, bathrooms and kitchen facilities.
interaction: If you want to book the room or have any inquiries, please send me a message first, as I might be at work. I will wait for you at the apartment building upon arrival to hand over keys and introduce you to the room.
house_rules: - Keeping quiet after 9 p.m. - Not using the dryer in the laundry. A clothes rack is provided for drying the laundry. - No parties, and no BBQ in the apartment. - Not using the dish washer and the oven in the kitchen. - Not using the bath tub.

host.host_about: Hello, I’m Amy. Welcome to my sweet home and hope you enjoy your stay here in the beautiful Roseville. Thank you.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 107 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Good location Four Triple room One Quadruple room
summary: Aslan home apart sirkeci metro istasyonunun hemen yaninda olup ,tramvay ,gemi,otobüs duraklarına ve Mısır çarşısı,kapalı çarşı,Ayasofya,Sultanahmet ,yerebatan sarnıcı,Topkapı sarayı Gülhane parkına adım mesafededir.Sokağımızda tarihi local restorantlar bulunur ve fiyatları uygundur.Apartımızın altında hediyelik mağazamız bulunmaktadır .Hemen yanımızda en ucuz süper market vardır.Gerçekten İstanbul’un her yerine çok kolay ulaşabileceğiniz bir konuma sahiptir.Havalimanından metroyla gelebilirsiniz
space: Her kat 35 metrekareden oluşur. Her katta 1 çift kişilik  1  tek kişilik yatak vardır. 3. Ve 4. katlarda 1 çift kişilik+2 tek kişilik yatak vardır. Çocuklu aileler için uygundur. 4 yetişkin rahatça kalabilir. Banyolarımız geniş ve konforludur. Sokağımızda yerel lokantalar mevcut olup fiyatları çok uygundur. İsterseniz sipariş verip odanıza getirtebilirsiniz. Her türlü sorunuzu telefonla ve apartımızın altında bulunan hediyelik mağazamızda ki personelimizle paylaşabilirsiniz.

Her türlü sorunuzu telefonla ve apartımızın altında bulunan hediyelik mağazamızda ki personelimizle paylaşabilirsiniz. Misafirlerimiz apar
neighborhood_overview: İstanbul’u gezmek ve görmek isteyen kesinlikle bu bölgede olmalı ve bizim sokağımızda tarihi filibe köfte,şehzade cağ kebabı,birecikli kebap Resturant ,tarihi hocapaşa pidecisi ,Türk  yemekleri yapan Balkan lokantası ,döner ve İskender,evvela kafe ve buna benzer bir çok yer bulunur. İstanbul’da en iyi semazen gösterisi yapılan Hocapaşa kültür center bizim sokaktadır. Tarihi büyük postane çok yakın olup adım mesafededir .
notes: Güvenli,sakin ve güzel bir sokaktayız,odalarımız rahat  ve konforludur.Pencerelerimiz geniş ve her odamız sokağa bakmaktadır.
transit: Her yere çok kolay gidilir ve her konuda onlara yardımcı oluruz.
access: Misafirlerimiz apartımızın altında bulunan hediyelik dükkanımızdan bilgi alabilir .
interaction: Müşterilerle diyalog kurmak ve onlara her türlü konuda  yardımcı olmak en önemli davranışımızdır.Özellikle İstanbul’u daha kolay gezme konusunda ve yemek yerleri konusunda yönlendiriyoruz.
house_rules: Missfirler odaya zarar vermeden istedigi sekilde davranabilir

name: Sunny and Spacious Bedroom w/ Private Bathroom
summary: This is a beautiful and very spacious apartment with high ceilings in the heart of East Williamsburg. The building is very quiet, clean and located in a safe area. The supermarket is 1 block away and the trains 2 blocks away. It's only a 15 minute trip to Manhattan. Walking distance from hip bars, gourmet restaurants, health food stores and art galleries.
space: The apartment has great light throughout and everything looks brand new. The kitchen is huge for an apartment in the city and is equipped with a microwave, blender and oven, so if you like to cook this is the kitchen to be in. There is a shared rooftop deck with great views of the city and Brooklyn.  You will be sleeping in a completely private, cozy bedroom with a smart TV and two single beds that can also become one king bed. Your bathroom is private, you don't have to share it with anyone, and it's equipped with towels, shampoo and hair dryer.  When you're not in your room, you can relax in in the spacious living room/dining room area.
description: This is a beautiful and very spacious apartment with high ceilings in the heart of East Williamsburg. The building is very quiet, clean and located in a safe area. The supermarket is 1 block away and the trains 2 blocks away. It's only a 15 minute trip to Manhattan. Walking distance from hip bars, gourmet restaurants, health food stores and art galleries. The apartment has great light throughout and everything looks brand new. The kitchen is huge for an apartment in the city and is equipped with a microwave, blender and oven, so if you like to cook this is the kitchen to be in. There is a shared rooftop deck with great views of the city and Brooklyn.  You will be sleeping in a completely private, cozy bedroom with a smart TV and two single beds that can also become one king bed. Your bathroom is private, you don't have to share it with anyone, and it's equipped with towels, shampoo and hair dryer.  When you're not in your room, you can relax in in the spacious living room/dining room a
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located near the center of Williamsburg. Just a 2 minute walk to the M or J train at the Flushing stop, and only 15 minutes from Manhattan. It is a 10 minute walk to the L train. There is a huge grocery store, a Wallgreens, Seven Eleven, McDonalds and Bank of America only 2 blocks away. And it's a short walk to hip bars and gourmet restaurants.
notes: I like to keep the house clean and tidy, so please clean after yourselves and don't leave dirty dishes in the sink.
transit: 2 blocks from the J,M,Z trains at the Flushing stop, only 15 minutes to Manhattan. 10 minute walk to the L train at the Montrose stop. 8 minute walk to the G train at the Broadway stop.
access: Guests have access to the their bedroom and their private bathroom, the spacious fully equipped living room, full kitchen and the shared building rooftop.  Basically the entire apartment, except for my bedroom.
interaction: Feel free to reach out, I'm here to make your stay as comfortable as possible! Any questions, comments, or concerns, I'm happy to help! I give my guests space but am available when needed.
house_rules: - Quiet after 11:30pm - Please get dressed to be around the shared spaces. I had guests walk around in their underwear  - please wear something else over that.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hey! I'm Agus, I'm a Graphic Designer and Motion Graphics Artist from Argentina based in NY.

reviews.comments: Good

Excelente experiencia. El apartamento muy amplio, acogedor, súper limpio y ubicado en una buena zona. El metro queda a dos cuadras del lugar. La anfitriona siempre estuvo pendiente de todo. Sin duda volvería!

Agus was absolutely great, really responsive, friendly and clear. And the apartment was beautiful! Super clean and very comfortable beds. Very convenient location too! Would definitely stay here again.
Property is as photographs on the website. Near to the subway. There were 3 of us therefore was a bit tight.

El departamento es muy lindo y limpio. Las camas super confortables y con calefacción para sobrellevar el frío del invierno. No tuvimos la posibilidad de conocer a Agus, pero siempre estuvo atenta mediante mensajes. El departamento esta a dos cuadras del tren, y en la zona hay muchas tiendas y locales para comer. Definitivamente volveria! Super recomendado!

My friend and I had a great weekend staying at Agus's place. We were only able to meet her briefly, but the apartment was beautiful and clean, it was located a short walking distance from two subway stops and the neighborhood was funky. I would definitely recommend staying here.
A room is stylish and clean. Agus is very kind. This trip became a wonderful memory thanks to her. I'd love to stay again.
The host canceled this reservation 44 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
El departamento es bonito y amplio. Agus es agradable y amable.
Perfect place to stay. Cleanliness and location is an A. Agus is friendly and make our stay very comfortable. She's easy going and accommodative. The 3 of us totally enjoy our homestay with her!

We loved the style and decor of the apartment, really spacious and bright.  Agus was really accommodating to our schedule and very responsive to any of our needs.   The location is close to the trains but didn't feel it was in the safest neighborhood.

We had a great stay in this apartment. Clean, modern, well looked after - a welcome place to rest after long days exploring the city. We were really happy with the location, close to M, J, L and G subway lines. Definitely not the hip happening parts of Williamsburg, but we really enjoyed exploring a different part of the neighbourhood and community there. The bedroom is perfect for two people sharing and having our own bathroom was such a luxury! Would stay here again.

We loved our stay. It was very comfortable and the apartment is well decorated and nice and clean. The few blocks around the apartment are kind of dirty but it was an easy ride into Manhattan. Would definitely stay again. Thank you!

Agus atenta y servicial respuestas rapidas a tus preguntas te ubica y te orienta  con lo que necesita (Website hidden by Airbnb) su departamento bien ubicado , cerca del metro que te lleva a todos lados a 10 o 15 minutos caminando limpio elegante muy limpio.  volvería a tomarlo y quedarme  en su casa gracias por todo

Our stay at Agus's place was very nice. Since it was my brother and I traveling together it was nice to have the option of twin beds. The home was clean, nicely decorated, and spacious. Agus was also great at replying to any messages I sent. Thanks Agus!

Super clean. Nice big bedroom. Great to come back to for a solid sleep after a long day exploring. Agus texted me ahead and made sure I got her instructions to get into the apartment which I appreciated. Also, the kitchen/dining/living room are very nice and clean. We used the kitchen to make a quick breakfast every day before we headed out which was great.
Excellent appartement
Great accommodation and host. Perfect description and check-in. Great tips for excellent steaks. She really gave us the feeling of „mi casa - su casa“.
Everything was as expected! The building was easy to get into, and the place was super clean. Agus was super flexible and understanding and communicated effectively! Loved our stay!
Agus ist eine sehr freundliche Gastgeberin. Der check in ist unkompliziert und die Wohnung ist sauber.

Our stay at agus's place was wonderful. The flat is clean, well located, well decorated, with all furniture we needed. Subway station is really close (even if sometimes New York Subway is an adventure!!) Not loudy, we slept very well, the beds are so confortable, and it was a luxe having tweens beds and our private bathroom. There aren't a lot of restaurants down the street (mostly fast food) but Williamsburg's center offer more nice places. There's a food market just next the corner. Agus always answered very quickly, her explanations are accurate, we felt like home. There's an elevator, convenient when we have our luggage. There was the air conditionner and it was great for our stay's begining because it was hot outside. 
We really enjoyed the big apple, there's a lot of things to do, a lot of things to see. And New Yorkers are nice people, always ready to help you ! Don't hesitate to come at agus's place!

Wir hatten einen super Aufenthalt.  Alles stand für uns bereit und wir konnten sogar eher das Zimmer beziehen. Die Wohnung ist sehr gut ausgestattet und  bietet alles was man braucht. Die Gastgeberin ist unaufdringlich und sehr freundlich. Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen.

A lovely apartment that’s conveniently located by the subway/train stations. The spacious room (and whole apartment) were very clean and always tidy. Agus was a great host and there’s plenty of great bars and restaurants in walking distance or a short Uber away

We had a great stay at Agus place! The apartment was very nice and cozy and we felt at home. The nearest subway station was only two blocks away and there is a big grocery store across the street. The central parts of Williamsburg is in walking distance. All communication with Agus has been good. We highly recommend staying at her place!
Great place to stay for a visit to Manhattan.

Agus is very friendly and helpful, so is her boyfriend. Bedroom and bathroom clean and tidy. Location is perfect, nearby big supermarket and subway station with good connection to Manhattan and JFK. Great stay :)

The room where we stayed was spacious, luminous and clean, as was the flat as a whole. We had a bathroom just for ourselves, which was also greatly appreciated. Agus answered all of our questions with speed and clarity. This is an address to be recommended.

Never Never would I go here again. The house is nice and situated in a good place but the owner is not caring much after her guests. She is making a lot of noice (with her boyfriend). The noise is from the television (on 10 and after our question if they could turn it lower they turm it to 9). They had friends over and said they would leave at around 11 pm. That turned out to be midnight and there was gitar playing, loud talking and music till that time. We had to walk in our pyama's to the bathroom through the same space where the owner and her friends were sitting. Not very nice.

Great place to stay, really cute and clean. Convenient to the subway. Really good coffee shop just a 2 minute walk away. Agus is very nice and a great host! Nice sized bathroom! Would definitely recommend!
Agus’s place was perfect for our girls trip. Clean and stylish space we had the place all to ourselves. Good location to subway and overall great place to stay.
Lindo apartamento y muy bien ubicado. Siempre esta presta a ayudar!!!

She was very considerate when she had friends over, responded quickly, extremely clean space. Only downside is the pillows were extremely soft and we had to purchase 2 of our own for comfort, but the bed itself was extremely comfortable! The area is safe and is convenient to stores, restaurants and trains. The bathroom was exceptionally clean! Would 10/10 stay here again!!

Totally a place to recommend, me and a friend stayed there in January and we received exactly what was described on her airbnb site, plus hostility. When there was any questions or issues, she answered asap and was really helpful at that. The apartment was clean and beautifully decorated and didn't lack anything. Totally a place you should consider :)
Modern and spacious place. Very comfortable.
Very nice place, clean and a very friendly host. Also good very good connections towards Manhattan
Very nice apartment ! Well located, well furnished and beautiful place. Angus has been very nice to us.

name: Suitable and centric apartment at Milton Park
summary: One-bedroom loft apartment located just one minute walk from Saint Laurent Boulevard. The balcony gives way to beautiful views up to the Plateau area. You will be just 5 minutes walking from Quartier des Spectacles and 10 minutes to Mont Royal Park. It is a perfect place for a couple, business travelers and up to 4 people to stay comfortably.
space: It is a one bedroom unit, with a sofa-bed located in the living area. The dining area has four chairs. The kitchen is full equipped and the apartment has everything you need for a cozy escape amidst the hustle of the city.
description: One-bedroom loft apartment located just one minute walk from Saint Laurent Boulevard. The balcony gives way to beautiful views up to the Plateau area. You will be just 5 minutes walking from Quartier des Spectacles and 10 minutes to Mont Royal Park. It is a perfect place for a couple, business travelers and up to 4 people to stay comfortably. It is a one bedroom unit, with a sofa-bed located in the living area. The dining area has four chairs. The kitchen is full equipped and the apartment has everything you need for a cozy escape amidst the hustle of the city. You'll have access to the entire apartment. I am always available if you wish to contact me via email or over the phone. Well located to go everywhere walking. Downtown is just 15 minutes walking and metro stations (Sherbrooke) is also 10 minutes away giving you a beautiful walk through one of the most beautiful architectural houses of the Plateau area (Saint-Louis Square). Grocery stores and plenty of restaurants are accessible
neighborhood_overview: Well located to go everywhere walking. Downtown is just 15 minutes walking and metro stations (Sherbrooke) is also 10 minutes away giving you a beautiful walk through one of the most beautiful architectural houses of the Plateau area (Saint-Louis Square). Grocery stores and plenty of restaurants are accessible just a few minutes away.
notes: - The building is under surveillance and has a security guard. - There is a laundromat just 3 minutes walking.
transit: - 2 metro stations under 10 minutes walk (Sherbrooke and Place des Arts) - Bus station just in front of the building
access: You'll have access to the entire apartment.
interaction: I am always available if you wish to contact me via email or over the phone.
