description: New town house Quite house  5 minutes walking to train station

name: Unit 5, 65A Fitzroy St, Surry Hills
summary: The entrance to 5/65A is from Fanny Place which is the back lane.  Clean, quiet, comfortable studio in the heart of Surry Hills. Ideal for 2 people who wish to have friends for dinner.  The studio is quite spacious and opens onto a private courtyard. The studio has been freshly painted and fitted out with new furniture. It has a fully equipped modern kitchen with quality Bosch appliances. The apartment has Air Conditioning. No off street parking. Definitely NO PETS.
space: This is a ground floor studio in a small apartment block of 6 apartments. Easiest access is via back lane. It is quite spacious with internal laundry, modern kitchen with quality appliances. Opens onto a private courtyard. Air Conditioning. Fast internet. The studio is double glazed on street side and is very quiet. Located 1/2 way between Central station and SCG. One block from Crown st.
description: The entrance to 5/65A is from Fanny Place which is the back lane.  Clean, quiet, comfortable studio in the heart of Surry Hills. Ideal for 2 people who wish to have friends for dinner.  The studio is quite spacious and opens onto a private courtyard. The studio has been freshly painted and fitted out with new furniture. It has a fully equipped modern kitchen with quality Bosch appliances. The apartment has Air Conditioning. No off street parking. Definitely NO PETS. This is a ground floor studio in a small apartment block of 6 apartments. Easiest access is via back lane. It is quite spacious with internal laundry, modern kitchen with quality appliances. Opens onto a private courtyard. Air Conditioning. Fast internet. The studio is double glazed on street side and is very quiet. Located 1/2 way between Central station and SCG. One block from Crown st. The apartment is self contained with internal laundry. Access via Fanny Place. or up stairs to the front door. Fanny Place is very well l
neighborhood_overview: Situated in buzzy Surry Hills. Lots of restaurants and bars to choose from. Close to the Sydney Cricket  Ground, football stadium, fox studios and centennial park.
notes: Just finished preparing studio for Airbnb. Fresh paint and new furniture. New Bosch washer and dryer.
transit: Good public transport. Bus stop to central station and city 50m from door. Central station 15 min walk. 2 supermarkets within 10mins walk. 20mins walk to Hyde Park in CBD. There are quite a lot of Go Get and Hertz 24/7 cars for hire by the on the hour parked in surrounding streets.
access: The apartment is self contained with internal laundry. Access via Fanny Place. or up stairs to the front door. Fanny Place is very well lit at night and is safe. There is a street map in photos showing directions to 5/65A via Bennett place and Fanny Place from Bourke Street. Please check photos so you are familiar with Fanny Place. There is a key safe for No 5 at the back gate. Code is supplied before arrival.
interaction: Available to help out with any problems
house_rules: This is not a party house. Late night noise won't be tolerated.

host.host_location: Surry Hills, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: I bought the building in 1996 in a very run down state. It was originally a grand Victorian Terrace and had been divided into 5 flats with shared bathrooms.  I embarked on a full renovation with my builder and later employer Michael Wagstaffe which included building another level on top where I now live. I decided to trial Airbnb in mid 2017 in the smallest apartment which has been very successful. In December 2017 apartment 5 became vacant so I upgraded  it for Airbnb to be ready for NYE. I   have installed double glazing and acoustic flooring to make my guests stay as comfortable as possible.  My building is in  vibrant Surry Hills so you can step out the door and find restaurants and bars a plenty than come back to peace and quiet. I try to give the best service possible to my guests.

reviews.comments: Don was a really helpful host who responded straight away to all our questions. The apartment itself is very nice and also located in a great area. Would definitely stay here again!
The best place where I have hosted ever !! And Don have been the only Airbnb host who thinks in each detail to make us feel comfortable and plenty . Thanks

This location in Surry Hills is very convenient to the SCG and Sydney CBD.
The apartment is stylish,  clean and quiet, and host Don is very helpful with anything you need to know. 
Also for us, we loved the inner city feel, its vibe, and the funky cafes in the surrounding streets. Dons place has plenty to offer if you love walking around in an interesting neighborhood.

This is a brilliant place to stay if you want to be in the middle of Surry Hills and yet cocooned at the end of a little laneway. There are so many great cafes, restaurants, shops and yoga classes within walking distance, but if you need a car there are at least 10 GoGet cars within minutes walking distance. The space is lovely and clean and Don has lived there for a long time so can give great advice on local things to check out. Great for a couple or one person. I'll definitely be back!

Don’s place exceeded all our expectations. The location was is the heart of Surrey Hills. The apartment was the spacious and had a beautiful patio. Not too mention very clean and new. Don’s hospitality was fantastic and I couldn’t ask for more. He made us feel at home!

If you are wanting to experience living in arguably Sydney’s best neighborhood, look no further than one of Don’s perfectly appointed apartments in Surrey Hills.  Located in a terrace house playfully and surprisingly accurately named after Barbary Lane, the multistory (and multi-storied) complex in Armistead Maupin’s Tales Of The City, you can easily blend into the vibrant local scene.  Shops, restaurants, and nightlife are all within the surrounding blocks; while the major attractions like the opera house and Harbour Bridge are either a short ride or slightly longer walk away.  Both apartments feature outdoor space; well-equipped kitchens and bathrooms; washer/dryer; air conditioning; and designated living, dining & sleeping areas.  Everything was spotless; the mattress was comfortable; and the towels were soft and fluffy. 

Don was the perfect host — excellent communication, there whenever you needed him and yet invisible if want/need privacy.  He even offered to take me and my rather cumbersome bike box to the airport.  On a national holiday, no less!  I would happily stay here again during future trips to Sydney.

I stayed in Don's apartment for a week. It's a large studio, nice and private, and very comfortable. It's a short walk to all that Surrey Hills has to offer. (And that's a lot!) I'd definitely stay here again.
Booked the accommodation for my aunt and her fiancé during their visit. Everything went well. Don is always responsive when needed. Thanks for hosting them! :)

Such a lovely space, exactly as depicted.  All the amenities you could ask for with a few thoughtful touches thrown in.  Don was super responsive and check in was a breeze.  Can highly recommend, and would definitely stay here again next time I'm in Sydney!

I really enjoyed my stay at Don's well appointed, comfortable and quiet inner city pied a terre. Really great location and had everything I needed. Don was a courteous and pleasant host. I would definitely stay again!

Don's flat is spacious and cozy and it has everything you need to enjoy a great stay, including a nice little garden and a fully equipped kitchen.

The flat is very quite but it's just around the  corner from so many superb cafes and restaurants. The area, Surry Hills, is in my opinion the most vibrant and interesting in Sydney and Don's place is right in its heart.

Don is a fantastic host and a very nice person: communication was great from the moment I booked to when I checked out and during my 9-day stay he constantly made sure I was enjoying my staying. And I certainly did: I hope I'll have the chance to travel again to Sydney and stay at Don's flat once more

Don's place is a beautiful, clean apartment with a secluded courtyard, a beautiful respite from exploring Sydney streets. There is lots to see and do within walking distance. Don was extremely responsive to messages and even met us at the corner of the lane to make sure we didn't get lost finding the place. Our flight wasn't till the evening and even though we had to check out earlier in the day he stored our bags for us till we needed them. Overall this apartment was everything we needed including incredibly fluffy towels and the most comfortable pillows! We wish we had booked another night!!

I can honestly say that Don is one of the best (and nicest)  hosts in my experience.  Besides having a place that is super clean and has a comfortable bed/furnishings, he has thought of everything that you might need/want for your visit.  The kitchen has everything you need to cook if you don't want to eat out every night, he provided granola/milk/cookies,  a card with 2 coffees from a local coffee shop, power converters, a hair dryer, and a line and clothes pins to dry your clothes outside if you like (he has a washer and dryer).   He responded immediately when I had questions about anything.  Oh, and the place is super quite.  I never heard any street noise (even though Surry Hills is a happening place).  There are a ton of good places to eat nearby that aren't super expensive compared to other parts of Sydney. You will love it at Don's place!

Great little studio in an awesome neighborhood. Lots of cafes, bars, shops nearby and easy access to many busses or a 10 minute walk to Central train station. We also appreciated that there were dishes, cooking supplies, and a few basics in the kitchen to make the stay even more comfortable. Don was quick to respond to all messages and very welcoming.

Surry Hills is just adorable and Don’s place is a perfect retreat.  Really cute space, private outdoor area, comfy bed, sparkling clean with good linens and great location.  We use Airbnb frequently and this was one on top of the list.  Many thoughtful touches.  For a traveling couple having washer, dryer, equipped kitchen make for a great stay.  Thank you Don!
Beautiful hidden apartment, very well presented, everything you need at your fingertips, great host, great communication, will definitely be back next time I'm in Sydney!! Thanks for everything Don!!

What a great place to stay at. Central, close to good restaurants and nightlife and had a great feel to it. The amenities were perfect and Don was a very helpful host, thank you. I would definitely return.

Don was a great host and very hospitable. My girlfriend and I also enjoyed a good cup of coffee at the nearby cafe on Don’s tab. The central location was perfect for our trip, walkable to a bunch of restaurants and gelato. The unit was awesome, with everything we needed. It was also void of any outside noises, so we got a great night’s rest. Great place. Great stay.

Don is an amazing host, nothing is too much trouble, very welcoming and friendly, making sure that you have everything you need.  The apartment is beautifully clean and well equipped with lots of extras that you would not expect. Everything from first booking to check in has been seamless and Don's response rate is first class. The apartment is so well situated, really central and convenient.  Cant fault this apartment and will definitely be returning, thank you Don for your amazing hospitality and attention to detail!

An excellent stay in Surry Hills. The location was perfect, close (and far enough away) from the train station, and buses. The studio unit was equipped with all the necessities for a great stay. Don was a superb host - nice to be met on arrival, and he gave some great local food and coffee suggestions.

I've been staying in airbnb rentals for more than six years and I can say without hesitation that Don's place in Surry Hills was my best Airbnb experience to date. Don's hospitality was first rate - he responding quickly to my inquires, greeting me upon my arrival, and made sure I had everything I needed for a comfortable experience. The rental itself was sparkling clean and comfortable.  I was amazed at how quiet it was, being in the middle of a large city. The location is wonderful - just a short walk from Central station with a bus stop less than a block away. In addition, there are lots of fine restaurants in close proximity. My two favorites for breakfast were Cafe Con Leche just across Fitzroy Street and Suzie Q, a short walk away on Hutchinson.  I had a wonderful 7 night stay at Don's place in Surry Hills and I highly recommend.  A great value!
This place was great. Only stayed a night but very clean and had everything I needed. Don was very helpful in showing me everything. Would recommend.
Great accommodation.  Thanks
Great location
Good location nice clean apartment
A fantastic find in a perfect location. Don's communication made the stay easy. A perfect, affordable space for a couple to explore the city.

Fantastic apartment in a fantastic spot. So close to great food and transport. It had everything you could need - and all the appliances and furniture etc were quality and seemed brand new. Very clean. The only negative for us was the mattress on the bed was very firm - we prefer a softer one. But won’t stop us staying again :)
Great little apartment close to everything! Would recommend for anyone wanting to be close to the city.

Unfortunately my stay with Don was cut short as he changed his mind about allowing my dog to stay with me, but other than this the apartment is perfect in every way. It’s a great area and well equipped, and I’d definitely recommend it especially for shorter stays. While I was disappointed in my stay - I understand it was a very particular situation that will probably not apply to future guests as I imagine Don will now implement a strict no-pets policy.
Great location & service.

Don est très accueillant et serviable, l'appartement se trouve idéalement dans Surry Hill, proche de la gare (15 min à pied), arrêt de bus à 300m, des restaurants, cafés et bars. Tout était propre et il y avait tout à dispostion, tout est neuf idéal pour une longue durée et surtout un très bon WIFI. Je le recommande sans aucune hésitation. À bientôt
Very convenient, clean and well presented. I would definitely stay here again.

Don sure deserves his super host. Could not fault a thing 
Thanks Don
Schönes, gut ausgestattetes Appartment in ruhiger Umgebung. Im Viertel sind einige Restaurants und coole Bars, die gut zu Fuss zu erreichen sind. Don war ein sehr aufmerksamer Gastgeber.

The apartment is spacious, clean and comfortable. Very convenient location. There are many good restaurants and cafes nearby. Public transportation within walking distance. Don is a friendly and kind host. Highly recommend!

Don was very kind, everything in the apartment was very clean, the apartment has everything you could need. The neighborhood is quiet and near to supermarket, convenience store and easy walking to sydney center. Could not be better.

Don was a fantastic host. Easy to communicate with and always responded quickly. The location was perfect, close to pubs, restaurants and an easy walk to the SCG. The apartment was clean and tidy and had all the comforts of home. Really appreciated the coffee card with 2 pre paid coffees for the local cafe! Would stay here again!
Thank you so much Don we enjoyed our weekend stay very much. definatly will stay again

Don was an amazing host offering all amenities even the ones you wouldn’t think about. From all the basics down to the awesome towel warmer, the place had everything and Don was willing to help with any detail. I highly recommend it!
Room is sooo clean. He is very nice and good location. Perfect airbnb!!
Magnificent space, great location, host couldn't have been better. Highly recommended if you want a place anywhere around Surry Hills.

Beautiful comfortable space that has great attention to detail - amazing, caring & attentive host.
I highly recommend this for great inner city getaway - quiet and safe too. Amazing comfortable bed and lounge. Kitchen has everything you need in terms of pots and pans.
Thoughtful host, great communication, perfect Surry Hills location. My 2nd time staying with Don. I hope to be back.

Don's place was perfect! The space is spacious and clean and it was a pleasure staying there for the three nights that I was in town. The location is fantastic, and Don was extremely friendly and helpful. I'd definitely stay there again next time I'm in Sydney!

Dons place was great - super clean, with all the amenities of hotels that usually carry a much heftier price tag. 

Best part was that Don was an absolute lifesaver - my flight was cancelled and I needed somewhere to stay but booked late at night on a Friday - Don gave up his evening to come and meet me personally and make sure I was settled in. 

Highly recommend anyone visiting Sydney!

Wonderful place. Perfect location and convenient to walk everywhere. My husband and I really enjoyed the neighborhood. The place has nice amenities and was very clean and taken care of well. We are thankful for Don’s hospitality and the coffee was a nice touch.
What a great place to stay at, central great restaurants close by and the accommodation has everything you need.  Thanks Don for a great stay.

We will always be grateful for the wonderful experience of staying in two of Don's units/Flats in Surry Hills in September 2018. We are certain that we could not have stayed anywhere else within our budget that would have been a better experience. Don is a top bloke an absolute gentlemen his kindness will never be forgotten. We will not hesitate to recommend Don's units to any of our family, friends and colleagues if ever they plan to visit Sydney Australia. Don's units are modern, stylish and very comfortable, we were fortunate to find this gem of a place.
Don was friendly and helpful, would highly recommend...
Very nice private place and wonderful neighborhood.
Fantastic space at Don's apartment. A delight to stay in and I will be back for sure.
Recommendable
I really love staying at Don's apartment. It's large and light, very modern and in a great area. I will be back for sure.

Wonderful flat in Surry Hills! The place was exactly as listed and a perfect location. Great updated furniture and appliances- a towel warmer was an added bonus! Don communicated well and it was great to have him accessible in the flat above.. we blew a fuse and he was down to help out in moments. He was also kind to leave a card prepaid for two coffees at the cafe across the street.  Would 100% stay here again!!
As always, a great stay at Don's beautiful apartment.

It was just PERFECT place to stay! 
better than picture; SUPER CLEAN! 5G wifi, great amenity, awesome facility(fridge, smart tv, fan, air con, microwave), large space, free coffee coupon!
Don is really kind and nice. 
It is absolutely much better than hotel! amazing experience. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
Very clean place and everything you need is in there. He responds really fast and he is willing to help you with anything! Just ask him.
Great place to stay in Surry Hills!   Wonderful location and host.
Clean central great little townhouse will everything you need
Seriously great location and Don is a very knowledgeable host .

Incredible location, sparkling clean and a fantastic host who responds quickly and goes the extra mile. Very thoughtful and helpful - all round a fantastic stay in Surry Hills and great value. Highly recommend to all.

Dons place is a travelers heaven, as a constant Air B&B user for Business, l found Don’s place a wonderful retreat, a true gem with quality amenities, beautiful high end decor right down to the cutlery.  Thankyou .

We really enjoyed our stay at Don's place. It's such a cozy little studio in a good location. Very quiet and comfortable. Don is a fantastic host who let us stay longer on the check out day as our flight was not until late evening. The place has everything you need and is super clean. Would definitely stay again in the future!

What a cute trendy studio apartment with awesome set up. Best host ever and location is super amazing with restaurants all around. Love the ability to contact Don anytime for small needs and the quality of bed, pillows and linen was super high. High quality touches I personally appreciate. Thanks
Can't wait to stay again xx

Don is a fantastic host. Excellent communicator and very friendly and accommodating. The apartment was well equipped, clean, comfortable and quiet, and well located near bus stops and Crown Street. Would love to stay here again.
Fantastic -thanks for having us.
This is a brilliant place to stay, kept perfectly clean, in a great part of Sydney and overall a wonderful experience.
Very clean, better experience than staying at a hotel. Don was courteous and helpful, would recommend Don's place to anyone wanting to stay in Sydney!
Always a pleasure to stay at Don's lovely apartment. It's a home away from home.

This a great studio in an excellent location. There is a washer and dryer that's very convenient for travel, and all the basics in the kitchen for cooking. I'd say it's easily big enough for 1-2 people. My fiance and I stayed here for a week together and loved it. We really fell in love with the neighborhood while we were there. Surry Hills is such a cute neighborhood with a bunch of delicious restaurants nearby. This apartment is very close to a couple of great bakeries and a gelato shop that we frequented often. There are also multiple grocery stores of varying sizes within walking distance (5-10 minutes). It's right next to a park that's great to relax at. There are a couple of bus stops that are a 2-5 minute walk away, and Central station (train and bus stop) is only a 10 minute walk away. We didn't have a car and only used the buses to get around, and it worked out really well. It is only about a 15 minute bus ride to the downtown Sydney area with the Opera House, and a very scenic (over the bridge) 45 minute bus ride to the zoo. We really enjoyed our trip to Sydney, and would recommend this apartment to others if they plan to visit.

Dons place is wonderful absolutely loved it... it’s very stylish ideal for a couple.. it was also very clean and Don had left some lovely touches as it was stocked up with tea,coffee sugar even a bottle of milk which was definitely appreciated as we only arrived late at night. The apartment is ideally situated very close to bars and restaurants and also the train station... I would definitely recommend and I would love to stay here again... it was nice to know that Don was there and you know that you could call on him whatever the time day or night

Don's place is in a fantastic location in surry hills. Close to the best cafes and restaurants Sydney has to offer. The apartment is spacious, clean and has all the amenties for a comfortable stay in Sydney

Five Stars!!!! Amazing host who is super professional and attentive. This was my favorite Airbnb rental ever and I have rented quite a few.  Amazing space that is clean, modern, and nestled in the best neighborhood. The space boast all the comforts you should expect on vacation and many more. I highly recommend this space and I can’t wait to return to Sydney to stay again.

name: Mid Century Modern Guesthouse with Pool and Views!
summary: Newly Renovated Mid Century Modern Guesthouse with a Pool and Hot tub. Two beds in a spacious studio with small sitting area, table, wifi, and refrigerator. Only a short walk to Honoli`i Beach park along a historic road past waterfalls and lush tropical vegetation. Just 3 miles north of Hilo with ocean views. The guesthouse is adjacent to our mainhouse and we are happy to fill you in on Hawaii Island's best adventures.
space: Our home is located in Paukaa which three miles away from downtown Hilo. There are several nice restaurants, a farmers market, museums and cultural landmarks in Hilo town.
description: Newly Renovated Mid Century Modern Guesthouse with a Pool and Hot tub. Two beds in a spacious studio with small sitting area, table, wifi, and refrigerator. Only a short walk to Honoli`i Beach park along a historic road past waterfalls and lush tropical vegetation. Just 3 miles north of Hilo with ocean views. The guesthouse is adjacent to our mainhouse and we are happy to fill you in on Hawaii Island's best adventures. Our home is located in Paukaa which three miles away from downtown Hilo. There are several nice restaurants, a farmers market, museums and cultural landmarks in Hilo town. Guest have access to the swimming pool and deck. They are also access to the hot tub and large fenced yard. We are available by phone, text, email and if we are at home guests are welcome to knock on our door. Quiet neighborhood and walking distance to Honolii county beach park. Best to have a car because of limited public transportation and minimal bike lanes. There is a small refrigerator in the pool
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighborhood and walking distance to Honolii county beach park.
notes: There is a small refrigerator in the pool house; however, there are no cooking facilities.
transit: Best to have a car because of limited public transportation and minimal bike lanes.
access: Guest have access to the swimming pool and deck. They are also access to the hot tub and large fenced yard.
interaction: We are available by phone, text, email and if we are at home guests are welcome to knock on our door.
house_rules: - Quiet Hours are from 9pm to 7am. Please leave shoes outside and no smoking. - We have a pool. Please watch all children

host.host_about: Kalani is a native Hawaiian Psychologist and Lisa is a Biologist loving living on the most diverse island on earth. We surf, run, and enjoy exploring Hawaii Island. We look forward to being your host!

reviews.comments: Beautiful view and beautiful pool. Hosts are very friendly and courteous, loved the stylish decor and the thoughtful touch of welcome chocolates and beers.
Very lovely place with friendly host who was willing to help with any local info he could provide

Beautiful scenic drive to the property just minutes from Downtown Hilo. 

We enjoyed our stay at the pool house. Loved the vibrant teal colors, the gorgeous ocean views, cleanliness and coziness. It was so quiet, peaceful and was just as pictured in the photos.

Mahalo Kalani and Lisa!

Not only is the location beautiful, Kalani and Lisa were both very kind and welcoming. It was wonderful being 15 minutes from Hilo International and 5 minutes from the beach. The volcano and some really cool hot springs are also less than an hour away. Their puppy Iwa was one of the highlights of our stay, she was always so happy to us! I definitely plan to visit again.

This was our first airbnb experience and it went flawlessly. Loved the location, the accommodations, the hosts... everything we could have hoped for and more. Would do it all over again in a heartbeat!
Kalani and Lisa are very kind. The house is great. We had wonderful experience here!
Cute puppy!
A very safe choice.

Great place, great location, excellent hosts and great atmosphere. The pool house is stylish, private, elegant, functional and it's few minutes from Downtown Hilo. Kalani and Lisa are excellent hosts and we strongly recommend staying at their poolhouse.
We had a great stay at the Pool House! It was clean and modern, and the hosts were very friendly and very responsive with communication. Thanks for having us!

Great Ohana with comfortable beds, awesome pool and hot tub.  We had an excellent overnight stay while working our way around the Big Island. Enjoyed good conversation with Lisa and Kalani and would recommend their place anytime.
Beautiful place, amazing hospitality! Want to come back ASAP!
Would stay here again in a heart beat.
The house is quite close to Hilo so it’s very convenient. And I really like the color style of the entire room.

This beautiful pool house is the perfect home base for exploring Hilo and this half of the island. Lisa and Kalani were wonderful hosts and recommended walking to a secluded beach nearby. A very clean, modern space with an ocean view.
Good location and very clean.  We would definitely stay here again next time.

Beautiful spot close to Hilo but secluded enough to enjoy the peace and serenity of the rainforests that border the area. Beautiful walk through the forests with bridges and waterfalls brings you to beach access. Great spot for surfers and beach lovers alike. Hosts are very sweet and the puppy love (they have an adorable  Cairn Terrier) makes the stay all the better!

Beautiful spot! Was exeptionally clean and well taken care of, we didn’t have time to use the pool or hot tub but both looked amazing! Location is very close to Hilo airport. Kalani is very friendly and quick to respond, and let us borrow some snorkeling equipment for the day. Also their little dog Eva is so precious! Had a great stay, definitely recommend.

We recommend this lovely retro cottage. Hosts are very responsive and a new puppy in the main house can visit if you need an animal fix. Out of the busy downtown - but easy to drive the short distance to Kona, or take an Uber as we did. 
Mahalo!!
The place is awesome. Thank you so much for this wonderful place
Beautiful home!

Very well kept! We loved Evalani, the little puppy watch your Slippas! ;) 
We had a great time thank you.

Kalani & Lisa are amazing people; they embraced us into their Ohana immediately.  Awesome place, great pool, and close to everything in Hilo.  Lisa gave us great advice  about activities and ensured we were armed with local knowledge.  The ocean view and pool/hot tub are incredible.  Mahalo!!!

We would have liked to stay longer (we had three nights at Kalanis & Lisas pool house)!
Highlights: The beautiful surrounding with the nearby beach, the pool, the hot tub and the friendly host-family with their puppet.
Thumbs up! Great place!
We had a nice stay at the pool house. Kalani and Lisa are lovely people and the place is exactly how it is described on the listing.
We stayed 2nights. The place is about 10minutes away from downtown and very close to surf spot. We enjoyed the view from the room! Beautiful sunrise and ocean!

This pool house is super nice ! You can be 4 adults easily.
Definitely a place I will recommend :)
Super-cute spot minutes from downtown Hilo. Right next to some truly beautiful forested gullies and a view of the water. We really enjoyed staying here.
Property is clean but very basic with no TV, microwave, stove, etc.
Really clean and comfortable space for our family of four. The kids loved the pool. Would definitely recommend!
A very clean home, we felt very comfortable, the communication was top notch, we even got some eating utensils we needed for breakfast.
Close to town yet out of the traffic.  Also convenient to good surf spot viewing. Loved my morning swim in the pool and appreciated restaurant  and activity tips.

Kalani and Lisa were excellent hosts. The pool house was renovated and it felt very chic on the inside.  We were very pleased with the accommodations  and the tips our hosts gave us.  We would recommend this place for anyone wishing to set up in the Hilo area.
A very nice, clean and simple place.  Wish we had time to stay a few nights longer.

The pool house itself was clean and stylish. Shampoo and conditioner were provided however, soap was not. The puppy is incredibly cute and friendly. We wanted to use the hot tub, however, it didn't seem clean so we opted not to.
Super cute pool house! Really close to downtown Hilo. Host was very nice and accommodating
A nice airy guest house away from downtown and up in the hills. Great beaches within a 15-20 minute drive. The pool was fantastic and the hosts were super friendly (so was the dog Eva!).

Der Aufenthalt war super schön und gemütlich. Das Pool Haus ist sauber und sehr modern. Die Gegend ist ebenfalls sehr ruhig...man ist jedoch schnell in der Stadt hilo und auch sehr nah am Strand. Wir können diese Unterkunft jedem weiterempfehlen!

非常棒的房子,很親切的屋主!
喜歡大自然的你這是最棒的選擇｡
This is a great spot to stay close to Hilo! The guest house is very clean and modern and a great place to recharge after a day of exploring.
what a lovely place to stay, loved it even if it was just for one night.

Highly recommend staying here if you’re visiting Hilo! My husband and I stayed here two nights.  The private room/house was just as described! There were great views of Hilo from the house (including a distant view of the lava).  Home location was not impacted at all by the volcano; very safe distance away.  The house was also very close to downtown Hilo, an easy 10 minute drive down the street.  Kalani and Lisa are fantastic hosts! They will give you great tips on things to do. 

Thanks for a great stay!

We loved staying here with Super hosts Lisa and Kalani! Especially the little puppy Eva, who was a friend to our children during the stay. Everything that we need to say has already been said by previous guests so no need for us to repeat it because it was all greatDefinitely book this place if you're looking for  a fun family oriented experience for any length of time in Hilo!

There was nothing not to love about Kalani and Lisa's place!  They are beautiful people with a beautiful home in the most beautiful location on the Big Island!  Our trip to the Big Island was better than I could have ever dreamed or imagined!  Kalani and Lisa's is the place to be!
The place was clean and nice. Matching colors for a stylish cozy place. Views of the Kilauea, especially at night.
This was a wonderful little getaway spot. We hope to able able to stay again one day.

This was a great place to stay! It was very clean, adorable, the host was very helpful and communicated with me quickly, quiet, an adorable puppy that was quiet, and there was an amazing view. I would definitely recommend staying here!
Planning to stay here again!
Great location! We were able to see orange glow of Puna lava flow at night. Awesome pool and hot tub!
We had a very nice time at the Pool House. It was beautiful with a lot of space. The view is amazing. The swimming pool is a plus. And the puppy is so adorable ! Thanks Kalani & Lisa !

We stayed at Kalani and Lisa's place just one night but it would be perfect for a longer stay in the Hilo area as they're close to town. The space is cozy and impeccably arranged, and we found it very comfortable. I was able to meet Kalani and Lisa, who are lovely people - kind, quick to respond, and quite flexible, they made us feel very much at home. They also provided recommendations for running routes and even let my wife borrow a surfboard to check out the local surfing spot! We have been missing our own dogs on this trip so it was a delight to get to spend some time with their puppy Iwa. Definitely recommend this Airbnb for your stay in Hilo!
Simple place with great amenities in a great location. The hosts are very respectful and kind. The dog Iwa is awesome and fun to watch chase the dragonflies around.
Pool house molto confortevole e splendida posizione se si ha una macchina a disposizione (ca 5 min di macchina dal centro di Hilo). Ci ritorneremo sicuramente se ritorniamo a Hilo.

We loved our stay here. Kalani and Lisa were responsive, friendly and inviting - made us feel right at home. There place is amazingly decorated, with a lot of character. It is secluded and quiet and yet super close to Hilo with its shops and restaurants. It is also easy access heading north as well towards Waipi’o Valley. We would definitely stay here again.
Nice place.
Super Haus mit toller Lage. Kannst abends in den Pool hüpfen und den Sonnenuntergang sehen. Kann ich nur empfehlen, hammer Unterkunft!

Nice place well located near Hilo.  The pool house is clean and looks newly renovated with a nice mini fridge and a coffee maker.  We were definitely happy to be able to use the pool at the end of a hot day.  Plus, we could even see the lava glow at the horizon at night.
Kalani and Lisa were welcoming and the space was clean and beautiful. We enjoyed our stay!
New,  pretty & very clean ...I would recommend this place! There was also an adorable and well-behaved puppy.
the pool was nice and cool with great night lighting as well as having the ability to view the lava glow from the pool deck area.

We stayed 3 nights at Kalani & Lisa's pool house and had the most amazing time there. The views on the ocean, the pool and hot tub : perfect combo to enjoy Hilo and the whole east coast of Big Island ! I absolutely recommend this place !

Perfect place to stay to explore Hilo, Volcanos, and the Hamkua Coast.  It's close to town and convenient. Simple and clean and private --- with a pool and a beautiful view of Hilo Bay.  It's delightful.

We could not have had a better experience.  A beautiful home  in a very convenient location just minutes north of Hilo.  A great family!  From the pool you have views of the Pacific ocean with great surfing just right around the corner.  The guest house is nicely updated and well kept.  We highly recommend this location!  Great hosts and wonderful little dog!
Aloha, the room is beautiful and beds are very comfortable.  We didn't use the pool because of the rain but it's big and clean.   Kalani and Lisa are very kind. We recommend their pool House.
Pool house was very comfortable, super cute! Excellent location, close to town. Fast internet!

Check in was a breeze and in a great location. We were greeted by they’re sweet pup Iwa who my little one loved and got plenty of puppy kisses. Lisa and Kalani were just the nicest people and made us feel comfortable and welcomed in their home. It was spacious and clean and had everything you needed in arms reach! Their view from the pool is also breathtaking! Really enjoyed our stay!

Kalani and Lisa have a cool pool house. Two great comfortable beds instead of the usual sofa bed/1 bed combo which was a treat. They have a friendly playful dog who will keep you amused. A lovely beach within walking distance that surprisingly avoids the highway. Such a pity Hurricane Lane prevented us from making the most of the place, though I definitely enjoyed an early morning dip in the pool when we still had the lovely ocean view!
Very clean accommodation well located and with the necessary amenities for a perfect stay.
Location good for Hilo, Botanical Gardens and waterfall exploration. Cute puppy to greet you.

The location of this stay was absolutely perfect for us! Close enough to run in to Hilo for a meal, but far enough out that we didn’t feel like we were in a city. There is beautiful, lush landscape in this area, that made us feel like we were sleeping in a dream. 

Information for our stay was incredibly quick and thorough, especially as we book the afternoon of our arrival. I would definitely recommend this spot to others.
Loved this spot! Close to town without all the busy traffic. The pool and hot tub are a bonus.
Nice host

I surely recommend Kalani and Lisa pool house ! We spend two night there and everything was great. 
There’s a nice surf spot near by their place. They are super nice and helpful.
We had a great stay at the pool house of Kalani and Lisa. It was very clean and modern. The pool is awesome and we had some time to relax there and enjoy our last day there :)
We stayed for 2 nights and the place is amazing. Great location, quick communication, clean and private. As a bonus there is a cute puppy. I definitely recommend.
Great spot with a view of the Hilo waterfront.  Quiet area but only a few minute drive to downtown.  Would stay again!
This house has a lot of style and personality! Me and my girlfriend really enjoyed staying here. The pool and jacuzzi are a welcome addition.
Bon logement pour passer quelques jours à Hilo. , Le logement est bien malgré son vis à vis sur la maison des hôtes. La vue est superbe et l’emplacement est top.

This space is amazing! The pool house is spacious, the bed were super comfy, and everything is clean and updated, but still feels very retro. The pool space and views were beautiful. I was able to explore lots of the Big Island, and looked forward to calling this home, even for just a few nights.
The House is really nice and comfortable. Evertything was clean. Good located as it is only a short drive to Hilo.

Kalani and Lisa’s place was lovely! Views of Hilo from the pool and the cutest dog ever. There was easy access to the pool house with a super comfortable bed and lovely sitting place. We’ll definitely be back to stay!
Très agréable séjour chez Kalani & Lisa. Le logement est proche d'Hilo et accessible. La chambre était parfaitement propre. Nous vous le conseillons sans hésiter !

What a great space! I loved staying in Kalani and Lisa's pool house. It was just as described, super cute and comfy, simple but very clean, and we loved being able to use the hot tub and pool - what a wonderful bonus. And they have the cutest dog ever! I will definitely stay here again and highly recommend it.
高台に建つ一軒家の敷地内にあるｺﾃｰｼﾞ｡ｵｰﾅｰ宅のﾌﾟｰﾙｻｲﾄﾞに建ち､寝室を一歩出れば､すぐにﾌﾟｰﾙで泳ぎｼﾞｬｸﾞｼﾞｰで温まることができる贅沢な環境です｡広い庭は柵で囲まれていて､犬が自由に遊んでいます｡とても人懐こい犬なので､一緒に外に出てしまわないように注意｡ｷｯﾁﾝはなく､冷蔵庫のみ､食器はｸﾞﾗｽのみなので､買ってきたものを食べるなら紙皿やお箸があると便利｡
Cute little casita , great  and quiet location . Hosts were helpful with local info and pool/jacuzzi easily accessible. Puppy was adorable and a great babysiter for our 7 year old.
Good location just to the north of Hilo. Pretty view oft the town, especially in the evening. Didn’t used the pool or hot tub, but really nice to have access to.

The guesthouse was very cute and clean. We really enjoyed the space! Bring eye masks if you’re sensitive to light because it can get bright in the morning. We didn’t have time to use the pool or hot tub but they looked inviting!
super clean and fun atmosphere. wonderful views of the ocean.  hot tub was great at night.  classy hosts.  easy to check in and out.  felt like I was a local.

A quaint pool house with views over Hilo Bay. We enjoyed our stay here. Host were friendly, but not intrusive. it is a few minutes out of Hilo, so a car is a must. Some noise in the evening from local wildlife (frogs maybe???), but was a calming sound - I suspect this will be the same wherever you stay in Hilo.
Beautiful place very close to Hilo. We enjoyed our stay very much. The place is clean, safe and beautiful. We would definitely come again!

We loved our stay and appreciated the hosts' quick responses and helpfulness when asked.  Would stay there again in a heartbeat.  It's a gorgeous home and really convenient location.  Loved the jacuzzi and the views.  Thanks :-)

Overall, we had a pleasant stay at Kalani & Lisa's place. However, we were a bit unfortunate with the timing of our stay at Kalani & Lisa's place. They happen to have had contractor work on the deck being done the day that we arrived so we did not have access to the great pool (for the first day) and hot tub (for our stay). Kalani and Lisa were responsive to this issue and had worked to address some of the problems. Otherwise, everything was great. Close to Hilo and the beach were a big bonus.
This cozy cottage was perfectly located close to Honolii Bay and downtown Hilo. We both got a great nights sleep as it was quite and comfortable. Very clean and stylish, we loved the vintage frig.
It was nice- but a littlebit less privacy

Spacious, comfy, and the best location to experience what Hilo has to offer. I grew up in Hilo and returned for a visit and this place really made a memorable trip. Walking distance to the beach and waterfalls.  5 minutes to downtown for shopping and food. Convenient location, loved the hot tub option and pool was so clean and refreshing. Will definitely stay there again.
It is quiet. Where you can hear the sounds of nature at night.

This is a lovely spot, Lisa & Kalani’s pool house is delightful. I arrived in the dark after a long day and night of traveling and so what a lovely surprise to wake up to the sun rising above the ocean from the bedroom window. The pool and hot tub are the perfect place to relax and unwind and the location is great for Hilo and other towns close by. I did not meet Lisa & Kalani however all instructions given fo check in were clear and easy. I definitely recommend staying here.
Its a great location and very clean. We really enjoyed the jacuzzi with a great view. It was a stylish room with basic amenities, good for a short stay.
Very nice and clean. Decorated nicely. Very cute dog! Close to downtown Hilo and lots to do that side.
A very pleasant stay during our visit to Hilo. I
Great location!
Kalani and Lisa are very helpful and quite responsive. This is a handy place to stay near Hilo with comfortable beds.
Très propre et très bien situé! Le jacuzzi en chauffe vous y attend à votre arrivée! Un vrai volcan! :) Parfait pour vous relaxer de votre journée de route!

Lisa & Kalani's converted pool house is an awesome place to stay in Hilo. Gorgeous ocean views, very clean and stylish interior, a pool and hot tub (!!) for visitors' use, and very convenient location to Hilo downtown. Our hosts were excellent in communicating and with check-in instructions and directions. I highly recommend this Airbnb for anyone visiting beautiful Hilo!

Great location, bring utensils, very comfortable sleeping, and some occasional outdoor bugs so don’t leave food out for ants. Amazing sunrises that wake you up if you leave the blinds open. Excellent communication and hospitality! :)
We loved our stay.
The location was good with a view to the ocean, the place had a modern look with nice turquoise accents in its interior.
Spacious, excellent location, easy to find, close to Hilo, beautiful evening view, and accommodating hosts.   Bonus pool and hot tub, for a relaxing evening after a long day!
Amazing experience! Great location and breathtaking views! Lisa and Kalani were great hosts and communication with them was super fast and easy. Definitely a great deal!

This pool house is terrific! Perfectly located with a beautiful view, this guest home has all the modern touches along with maintaining its original charm and architecture. 

The guest quarters had ample space-and while it is disclosed in description, it is worth noting that there is only a coffee maker and mini fridge in the room itself. We ate out most meals, so this was perfect for our needs. But, considering there are two beds in the house, if you have a family, there isn’t a microwave/toaster or way to keep warm foods warm-didn’t pose an issue for us. 

Also, there is no TV (again no problem for us, we just happened to be exhausted on our last night and opted to stay in). We had a laptop so we were able to connect to wifi and watch hulu/netflix on our last night-nice and relaxing. 

The hosts are super friendly, very very communicative and gave us wonderful tips and recommendations during our stay. We were beyond grateful for the pool and hot tub-It was the key factor in selecting this house versus others, and it didn’t disappoint! We highly recommend this property for the amenities and location.
This place was clean but it was noisier than expected and way too much light entering room at night time if that type of thing bothers you.
The houses is beautiful! Location is good!
awesome place, with a great view and close to town location.

The house of Kalani and Lisa is very well located and very nice. It has a wonderful pool and a jacuzzi. You can easily reach everything from the house by car. Everything was very clean. And you even have two beds.
A big compliment also for the friendliness and the quick reaction. A big recommendation! Thank you for everything.
Mahalo !!

Lisa & Kalani's place is well located a few miles north of Hilo in a quiet neighborhood.  They have a nice pool & hot tub. Lisa & Kalani were very responsive and generous hosts (let me borrow one of their surfboards) and went out of the way to make sure we were comfortable - they provided us with extra linens when we requested them, and were kind enough to invite us to share dinner with them on Valentine's Day. I definitely recommend their place.
The property was clean and well presented. When we asked for crockery it was provided.
Best value and view in hilo town!
The pool house was nice and cozy.
Convenient location and very clean! Bugs/birds were a little loud but not too bothersome. Thanks!
A beautiful pool house with an amazing view and waterfalls within a 2 minute walk!
Kalani’s place is great ; very clean and stylish. There is a jacuzzi and swimming pool outside. We really enjoyed staying there with my friend ! I highly recommend their place. Thank you !

name: Location appartement entier ou chambre
summary: Appartement tout inclus avec deux chambres, un salon (qui peut servir de troisième chambre), cuisine, balcon, salle de bain. A 50m du bus pour aller en centre ville et d'une station de vélo A 12min à pieds du métro
space: Situé au 3e et dernier étage. Accessible par un escalier exterieur et un 2e intérieur. Entierement équipé!
description: Appartement tout inclus avec deux chambres, un salon (qui peut servir de troisième chambre), cuisine, balcon, salle de bain. A 50m du bus pour aller en centre ville et d'une station de vélo A 12min à pieds du métro Situé au 3e et dernier étage. Accessible par un escalier exterieur et un 2e intérieur. Entierement équipé! L'intégralité de l'appartement pas de pièce à partager avec dautres locataires J'habite l'appartement à côté donc très joignable Quartier calme pas loin du centre en teansport en commun. Piscine ouverte en face de la maison, plusieurs epiceries accessibles à pieds Une station service et l'avenue du mont royale à moins de 10min Les bus 24 et 29 qui vont en centre ville et passent toutes les 7 min sont à 50m.  Il y a une station de bixi au coin de la rue Le metro est à 12min a pieds
neighborhood_overview: Quartier calme pas loin du centre en teansport en commun. Piscine ouverte en face de la maison, plusieurs epiceries accessibles à pieds Une station service et l'avenue du mont royale à moins de 10min
transit: Les bus 24 et 29 qui vont en centre ville et passent toutes les 7 min sont à 50m.  Il y a une station de bixi au coin de la rue Le metro est à 12min a pieds

host.host_about: I am friendly, easing going with 3 beautiful children.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Juliette's home had the most stunning views of the sea from her living room and is only a short car or bus journey to the nearest beach.
The room is exactly as seen in the pictures with lots of useful amenities such as your own TV with foxtel, fridge and microwave. 
Juliette was very speedy to respond to any queries, helpful with local knowledge and would go out of her way to help, e.g. we mentioned we were going to visit the Blue Mountains the next day, and quickly Juliette was on on the phone to her neighbour asking about local spots to see/hike that were less touristy.
I would highly recommend staying with Juliette and I would love to stay there again if I'm in the area.

Great large room, with two very comfortable beds. One single and one queen, perfect for the two of us on a work trip. 
Loads of shelving to unpack into, with a small bar fridge for left overs. A desk in the room was fantastic as a computer desk for our stay. 
Juliette invited us to use anything in he kitchen for cooking, as well as provided us with delicious filtered water and space in her family fridge.
The bathroom was clean and sizeable, private and accessible, just across from where the room was. 
Access to the patio and garden through the room too! 
Lovely family and supportive vibe in the house, I’ll certainly be back next time I’m in town! 
Thanks again Juliette!

A delightful family, lovely big room, in a clean and welcoming house! 
Thanks for having me
Nice room ans freshwater is a great place!!
Great place, super friendly family. We had an amazing time staying at Juliette' house. Absolutely recommended :)

Juliette has a beautiful, modern and spacious home. She welcomes you with a smile and three wonderful children. Prepare to become their new best friends. The home is well equipped and Juliette is an exceptional host. Thank you forking us feel so welcome. I would have loved to stay longer.

We really enjoy our stay at Juliette’s
The house is nice modern and bright
The room was big enough for 3 with everything we need. The bathroom just for us was a plus and very nice
Juliette is so lovely and welcoming
Thank you :)
Juliette's place is beautiful, magnificent views. I was made so welcome. it was a joy to stay with them.
Beautiful place with a beautiful, accomodating family that made us feel right at home! Will definitely come back if I’m back in the area :)

Our room and bathroom were sparkling clean and very spacious. It was also lovely to have our own kettle and fridge. We really felt at home here and it was lovely to meet Juliette’s friendly children. We felt really welcomed and were grateful of the local knowledge Juliette shared with us. We were also really glad to find somewhere so easy to park our hire car. Thank you for having us!

Me and the Girls had a great stay at the house of Juliette and for sure we will back again when visiting Sydney again .
Thank you very much again for everything.Regards.Ernest
Juliette's house was amazing and beautiful. I love the city view from her dining room. her childrens are very lovely. Thankyou for the place :)
Lovely place, and a lovely family! Was such a pleasure getting to know the area and the family. Would definitely recommend staying here

Juliette's place has such a lovely-homey feel to it. House is sparkling clean and everything you need or can think of Juliette's got it. On top of it, Juliette is an amazingly warm person! Would definitely stay again!
A very private part of the house. It was very quiet, good for study. There was table space and a fridge which I obviously didn't read about because I was so excited to see that.
Great value for money. Friendly host. Great position for our needs.
Beautiful place thank you for your hospitality

Outstanding stay! Everything about staying here was perfect, the location is incredible. Right along side all the beautiful northern beaches, just a walk away from public transport - although there are hills around it wasn’t an issue at all. There are shops and restaurants nearby also. We had use of the kitchen area which was wonderful, one of the nicest houses we’ve ever had the pleasure of staying in. The moment we arrived we felt at home. We have two young children and she was incredibly accommodating, even going to the lengths of pulling her children’s old toys out for our children to play with. Cannot recommend staying here enough, you’ll love it. Thank you Juliette
You will get an extraordinary view from the kitchen/ dining room across the northern beaches to manly!

Our stay in North Curl Curl was just great. The location is good, it is only a 15-20 minutes walk away from the beach. The place is very clean. If we have had some questions, Juliette always helped us. I would highly recommend this place!
Beautiful house and great location.  Easy access to the beaches (20 minute walk).  Lovely spacious room with all amenities nicely organized.  Friendly interesting people.  We felt right at home!

super sauber, Lage top, mit dem Bus in die City in 30 Minuten, Haltestelle unweit der Unterkunft, Strände Curl Curl und Dee Why um die Ecke. Jederzeit wieder! Wir können die Unterkunft auf jeden Fall weiter empfehlen!
Very comfortable with lovely views from the kitchen area. Friendly family and very modern house with all amenities.

name: Soho Sanctuary with Rooftop Terrace
summary: This apt is located in SoHo, and within in walking distance to Central, LKF, & the MTR.  It is also a 5-10 min walk to some wonderful fitness trails. The apt is quiet despite being in a bustling neighborhood.  The apt is a walk-up. So it might not be suitable for everyone.  However, when you reach the apt you'll be greeted with cozy decor, a lovely bathroom, and a chef's kitchen. Also there is an exclusive rooftop available for your use. A perfect sanctuary in the heart of Hong Kong.

I had a perfect 1+ month stay at Katherine's apartment.

The apartment is decorated with very much tatse, very well equipped, centrally located in a lively area but still very quiet, and large per HK standards. It was too cold outside to enjoy the provate rooftop, but the later was definitely large and nice. On top of that, communication with Katherine was reactive and friendly.

Only drawback is the stairs to access the 5th floor apartement, but it was not an issue for me.

I strongly recommend staying in Katherine's place.

neighborhood_overview: There's plenty to offer within walking distance. Try out Agrikol or Le Passé Composé for some of Montreal's best dining. For shopping head over to Rue Sainte-Catherine. To explore the rest of the city, hop on the metro at the Beaudry Station or head out on foot. Montreal is a diversity-friendly city and a center of LGBT+/ LGBTQIA+ life in Canada. The Village is a lively neighborhood, with delicious eats, lovely boutiques, summer street fairs, and exciting nightlife. The Village is within walking distance to La Fontaine Park (one of Montreal's nicest outdoor spaces), the Old Port, Saint Denis Street, Saint Laurent Boulevard, and Place des Arts.
notes: This Sonder is a 2nd floor walk-up with stair access only, and no elevator. This Sonder is located directly above a bar, and close to a metro station, and guests will likely experience city noise late into the evening. This Sonder comes with an HDMI cord so that you can connect your laptop to the TV and log in to your personal streaming accounts, but it does not have cable.
transit: Drivers can find paid parking options nearby and minimal free street parking, but please be mindful of street signs.
interaction: Our concierge is available by phone, email, or Messenger 24/7. Don’t hesitate to contact us if you need anything, from extra towels to restaurant recommendations. Otherwise, we’ll leave you to enjoy your stay.

Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

reviews.comments: Sonders place came with hotel amenities. Little shampoos and little body washes. Everything was wiped down and the location was perfect! Right across the street from the Metro and right on the main bar drag of gay village. I would say this is not an ideal location if you need a lot of quiet sleep. I travel with earplugs so I was fine but the floor does vibrate until 0300 with the club right below. Stay here if you don't mind the noise or will be out most nights anyway, it is perfect for a weekend getaway with friends! I was visiting when 15 cm of snow fell and Sonders gave me the option of staying another night when I messaged explaining. I didn't need the extra night, but it was definitely an accommodation that made my stay stress free. They had Tea and small Olive Oil packets available for cooking. The kitchen was stocked with every pan and cookie sheet needed. My only complaint would be the booking process. Sonders is an investment travel company. So when you book through Airbnb you aren't done there. You have to validate yourself with their systems and surveys. Save your time and just book on their website. I would stay here and try other Sonders Properties in the future. Safe Travels!
My friend and I had a great stay in the village, it was the perfect location to walk to all of the locations we wanted. On street parking was easy and accessible.
Ok
The apartment was so beautiful and in such a great/central location. Loved the decor, and amenities included. Hosts response time was quick. Definitely the place to stay!

Amazing place. Great location and easy access. One thing is that the bar directly below is very loud 7 days a week. The bass is blasting sometimes until 3-4 am. I had trouble getting to sleep until the bar closed down.
Had a great stay at the apartment, even though there was an issue with the keypad getting into the building. I text the number that was listed and received a quick response. Great service
Great location for night-owls, as long as there aren't early risers staying above....
Noise is crazy each night , bringing a laptop or a HDMI Chrome cast would be recommended too , otherwise tv is useless to avoid noise
Super bien placé , bonne logistique , appartement agréable .. attention cependant au bruit de la vie nocturne . Juste au dessus d ine bar disco

Overall very positive experience with this apartment. Very clean space and washrooms. Provides everything needed for a weekend stay (kitchen supplies, towels, soap, shampoo). Location was good but very loud at night so it might be difficult to sleep. Also the curtains are very thin which makes it very bright in the morning so it might wake you up early.

Excellent location. Very central. Nice view of St. Catherine street. Beautifully renovated, very nice and clean. 

Music in the bar below ends at 3:00 am, but can start early such as 10:00 am in the morning.

Absolutely highly recommended, meticulously clean and well stocked. Strategically located smack in the middle of the village for those so inclined. Noisy and right above the bar which is fine for those of us who like to hang out at gay bars. Couldn’t be better! We will be back.

L’équipe Sonder a étais super ils ont étais réactifs et à notre disposition. Le logement est vraiment bien situé dans un des Cartier les plus vivant de Montreal ( si vous êtes pas fêtard je vous direz d’éviter ce logement ), ce qui est de l’appartement il est vraiment très agréable propre très jolie et très agréable.
Great location and well managed. Tastefully decorated.

Clean, well-appointed apartment with nice amenities. Great location. Noise level from bar directly beneath apartment was extreme and lasted until 4am. If you choose to rent this apartment, be forewarned: it is NOISY.
A very nice place to stay in the heart of Montreal’s unique Village. Had a wonderful trip over New Years and look forward to my next visit.

name: LUXICO - Vaucluse Manor
summary: Offering all the glamour and class of a seductive Mediterranean-style coastal lifestyle where curvaceous terraces, stately columns, tropical gardens, harbour views, poolside entertaining and generous indoor living awaits. Vaucluse Manor delivers on coastal luxury with a prestigious Vaucluse location and is just a casual stroll from beaches and Sydney harbour. No matter the season, this private two-storey family home is the ideal restful beachside escape.
space: Vaucluse Manor is quick to impress you with its striking entrance, curved architecture and irresistible harbour views. There’s no better place to enjoy those views than on the ground floor’s curved terrace. This space is made for relaxation, whether you settle in for a sumptuous brunch, BBQ or evening drink. Indeed, you’re spoilt for choice when it comes to dining. You have a formal dining room off the entrance that provides seating for up to 12 guests, while a dining area off the classic white kitchen has access to the terrace and is bathed in natural light via a wall of windows and doors. The kitchen offers high-end appliances and plenty of bench space, making meal preparations a breeze. In the two living rooms, curved walls of windows provide views of the harbour beyond and pool below. In the informal living room, cool nights can be spent around the fire, while the formal living area is the place to retreat after an evening on the terrace.  There are four bedrooms on the ground floo

neighborhood_overview: Located just a 10-minute walk from beautiful Parsley Bay Beach and within walking distance to Kutti Beach, harbour parks, bush tracks and local cafes and shops, everything you need is close by. Historic Watsons Bay Village is a quick car trip, as is the stunning coastline and historic buildings of South Head. If you want to travel to the CBD, there’s a bus stop right on your doorstep, while a car trip to the city will take around 30 minutes. And if you want to see more of the picturesque harbour, simply catch a ferry from Watsons Bay Wharf.
notes: Bookings made via AirBNB are subject to the standard booking terms and conditions displayed on the Luxico Holiday Homes website. Payment of your deposit constitutes acceptance of our terms and conditions. Please contact us if you would like a copy of these terms prior to booking. For security reasons, a copy of your Australian Drivers License or International Passport is required prior to check-in along with confirmed names for all guests staying at the property along with a signed Booking Agreement before access details can be provided. This is not negotiable! Please don’t book with us if you are not comfortable providing this information.
access: All Luxico guests receive a bottle of bubbles in the fridge plus a gourmet welcome hamper including tea, coffee, jams, muesli, milk and some tasty treats. We supply luxury toiletries and towels and our beds are made up with top quality linen ensuring a comfortable stay.
interaction: One of our superhosts will meet you at the property to hand over keys and answer any queries you may have about the home. Our 24/7 concierge team are on hand to help you with any special requests during your stay.
house_rules: - STRICTLY NO PARTIES. $5000 PENALTY (refer to terms and conditions) - No smoking inside the house - Please respect our neighbours. Fines may apply for excessive noise if reported - If you break something, please let us know so that we can replace it for the next guests

host.host_about:
Why stay in a hotel when you can enjoy the space and amenity of a designer home?

Luxico manages designer and luxury homes across Melbourne, Sydney, Palm Beach, Byron Bay, Noosa and the Mornington Peninsula with many new locations coming in 2018.

All Luxico homes are  fully equipped with 5-star linens, towels, luxury toiletries, gourmet welcome hampers, free Wi-Fi and all the essential items that you will require during your stay.

Luxico's Housekeeping and Concierge Services teams are on hand to assist with airport transfers, grocery deliveries, catering, extra cleaning and anything else you might require.

Guests travelling with children can request toys, activities, travel cots and high chairs, whilst pet owners have a number of great properties to choose from with doggy beds, water bowls and other items provided to minimize your luggage.

name: Cozy studio with balcony in kennedy town
summary: It's near the heart of hong kong, 2mins from kennedy town MTR station. 5mins from bus stop. You can take a bus A10 from the airport to my place which is cheaper and easier. 10mins from central station by MTR. Well managed place since a helper come to my place to clean it every week.  Cozy comfortable studio with a balcony. Lots of supermarket and nice restaurants around it. You can search kennedy town via (Hidden by Airbnb) map, you can find out how convenient this location is. Smoke is only at the balcony.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The best places I rented in Hong Kong... all was perfect.. the spaces are not small.. the bathroom also.. excellent experience.

非常舒适的房子,小巧却设施齐全,地理位置非常好,离地铁站很近,附近还有港大和西环海边,以及很受欢迎的餐厅,Jiyeon非常贴心和热情地提供了帮助,也感谢她的朋友Jayi,性价比很高的住所｡
Nice and cozy place! Cute and fully equipped,perfect position,very convenient, Jiyeon is so nice and warm,strongly recommended!

Jiyeon is a very nice host and offered a flexible checkin time for my trip. Her studio is in a typical Hong Kong building but providing a simple and elegant condition place like Korean studio. We love it very much! Especially the terrace! It really suitable to have a cup of coffee and enjoy a lazy afternoon

The place is very comfortable with a balcony and laundry machine with drying option.  MTR is steps away with 7 eleven and market nearby.  

After a couple of short blocks there are restaurants both local and abroad. Egyptian, Thai, Japanese and a dessert store.
The host canceled this reservation 46 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

host.host_about:
Hi there!
My name’s Tim andI live with my partner Liz in Sydney.

I have recently returned from living in London for 2 years. I have traveled alot in the UK and Europe using Airbnb, I now welcome you to stay in my apartment!

I have lived in Sydney most of my life and I invite you to stay in my flat to see my beautiful city. I can give you travel tips and where to eat!

I work in Environmnetal Management but I have worked in several sectors from Recycling, to Governance, Pizza Delivery and McDonalds!

I love to watch football (or soccer here in Aus), binge on Netflix and  youtube. I love to go camping around Sydney too.

reviews.comments: Overall, I rate Tim's place 5 stars. Its a great place to stay for sight seeing. Its very close to the train station, city and airport. The place was clean and had a large clean shower. He was easy to talk to. I would stay again.
A great place in a great location.  Tim was very hospitable and provided us with local tips, breakfast and use of his apartment.  I would definitely recommend staying with Tim!
Very nice experience

I had a fantastic stay at Tims house 
Very clean, very warm and friendly atmosphere 
Right beside train line in quiet cul de sac street 
I will definitely return to Tims when I am in Sydney again
房主非常热情友好,位置交通非常便利,值得再次入住
Tim and Liz are very friendly and warm-hearted persons. I felt like I was at home! Highly recommended :-)
excellent value
My boyfriend stayed at Tim's and his wife's for one night and had an excellent stay there. It's perfectly located when you're on transit.

Tim and his wife are very nice. They not only give us so many advice about our travel but also make our travel happy and convinient. When we want to go out,he will take us to the train with his car. More then that,he took us to the sydney beach by car and introduce Austrailian food in woolwoth in detail to us. And even having dinner with us together with delicious food. Thank Tim and his wife very well and if I come back to sydney again,I’ll choose Tim’s house absolutely!

Very professional and friendly hosts with nice personal touches.

Great location for access to Sydney International Airport
I love the bed and the kitchen:)The location is very convenient:)
Very friendly host and a nice space to relax and work. Fully recommended, surely happy to come over again.
Tims place is sensational if you want an easy walk to the airport through the park.  No taxi,  no bus,  no train needed. Bloody great!!
Great one night stay for next day early departure to the airport
Tim’s place is convenient, clean and perfect for travellers who are seeking a central location, close to public transport.
Nice space, really well located, Tim was a really easy to communicate with host. Thanks very much
房东很热情!
I had a really great time at Tim’s place. Clean and tidy room. Close to the train station and not too far from the CBD.

Tim’s place has great access to public transport and is a quick uber ride to the airport. Comfy bed and very clean - would highly recommend to anyone with an early flight or in need of a place to stay for a night!
Perfect location for airport. And easy transport into the city. Great apartment
Tim is a very nice landlord and His partner Liz is so kind. The good environment and different type of facilities are provided. also, he provide some food, drink and sources to us.
Nice place near airport
깨끗하고 침대가 푹신푹신 했고 아침에 눈뜨면 햇살이 들어왔고 공항이랑 가까워서 지하철로 이동하기 좋았다
Fill comfortable
Great place for an overnight stopover. Good bed and pillows and a nice apartment.
It was a pleasure to stay at Tim's. The apartment was clean and had everything I needed, Tim and his girlfriend are friendly and easy to talk to. I would stay again.
Tim went out of his way to help me out during my stay. He is unbelievably generous and accommodating. Neat little set up. Perfect location to the airport.

Tim and Liz were a great host. He replied very fast and was very informative in giving local tips and signs all over the apartment to make sure the visitor wouldn't feel confused when they were not around. Their place was really homey and clean. Overall really great experience during my stay there.

The location is very easy to access since Arncliff station is just next to the apartment and Wolli Creek station within 15 min walk!! A Uber only cost about $18 to the airport (Same as the train but much better). 
       The apartment is very clean and lovely decorated. I loved the clean bathroom and the spacious living room. Tim & Liz kindly used very clear and specific sticky note to help familiarize everything. (Website hidden by Airbnb) I did enjoy the short stay and recommend it to the other travelers . :))
very nice experience!
They have a super host literally. The room was cozy and sparkling clean! The mattress is awesome I went to sleep soon as my head hit the pillow.

Quick communication 
Flexible self check in.
Warm welcome
No cars or trains noise
Convenient place to city, trains and  airport

The flat is a lovely, homely space. I felt very comfortable in it. Tim and his girlfriend had prepared a folder with lots of useful information, instructions for the washing machine etc. and tips on how to get around and where to eat locally. They even left train cards in the room for you to use to get into town, along with maps and leaflets about tourist attractions. 

Sadly, I never got to meet Tim or his girlfriend as we missed each other in the evening and I left too early to catch a flight the next morning. However, by email Tim seemed very charming and helpful!
I had a great stay at Tim’s place, very convenient to shops and airport.
想像以上にとても清潔で､帰りたくなるお家でした｡Timさんはとても親切で､最初何もわからない私を駅まで車で送ってくれました｡すごく快適でした｡

name: Ninho das Cegonhas
summary: O apartamento insere-se num Condomínio Reservado com Court de Ténis, zona ajardinada, existindo ainda um lugar de estacionamento para um carro. Um T1 bastante acolhedor e moderno para que se sinta em casa.  Excelente para casais com filhos pois dispõe de uma zona exterior onde poderão disfrutar de momentos ao ar livre, assim como para pessoas com mobilidade reduzida pois o prédio tem elevador.

name: Big Bright Room in a Historic Surry Hills Pub
summary: Nice big room upstairs in a historically central Hotel. Bright. You can even catch some rays during the late morning and early afternoon. Northwest-facing BIG windows. There is a BIG tv and an HDMI/thunderbolt cable. My clothes are in the cupboards but you can use the third drawer down that I emptied. Housemates are nice, respectful. I'll arrange you picking up the key from UNSW or via Uber. Don't interact with property managers at bar downstairs.
