reviews.comments: The apartment is small but in a great location. Good value.

name: MANHATTAN, HELL'S KITCHEN, CLEAN, COMFY, 6 GUESTS
summary: Located in the best zone of Manhattan the all new gentrified area of Hell's Kitchen offers visitors the opportunity to feel like a local. Shops, restaurants and a vibrant local scene. The apartment is perfectly located right on 10th Av., centrical but quiet.
description: Located in the best zone of Manhattan the all new gentrified area of Hell's Kitchen offers visitors the opportunity to feel like a local. Shops, restaurants and a vibrant local scene. The apartment is perfectly located right on 10th Av., centrical but quiet.
house_rules: - Be respectful of neighbors by being quiet during late hours - Removes shoes to walk around the house for your comfort and hygiene -$40 late fee for check ins after 10pm

host.host_about:
I'm just a California guy in the Art, Tech and Design industry who enjoys finding the deeper meanings in the smaller things. I travel often and I enjoy experiencing my trips from a local perspective I also like hosting people while I'm away.
 Hygiene, style, convenience and comfort can describe me and my place.

reviews.comments: Convenient and exactly as advertised. All good.
It's a warm and cozy apartment. We can conveniently get theaters or malls from here. We all like this place!

Excellent location 
Great host

We loved staying here! 5 of us stayed for a long weekend to see some broadway shows. The apartment is in a great location to walk to theaters and public transit. It’s quite small, but we fit fine.  Rob was super responsive to any questions/requests, and extremely accommodating when we asked about storing our luggage before check-in and after check-out. We were given our check-in/check-out instructions a few days before our arrival, so everything was very clear and super easy! We had no issues during our stay. I’d recommend staying here if you want a clean apartment near Broadway!

This is a cozy, clean comfortable apartment in a good central location. It’s close to Time Square, Columbus Circle, Central Park and the Hudson. Many restaurants nearby. 
The apartment is very well-equipped. 
The front bedroom faces onto 10th Avenue so if you’re a light sleeper, you might need earplugs. 
Rob and Ashley were very friendly and responsive hosts. 
We enjoyed our stay from what is a good central base.

The apartment is greatly located only 2 blocks from times square. Even it is not big, it was sufficient for a family with 2 teens. Very clean. The check-in process was very clear, although fast responses to all emails.  Clear recommendation for other AirBnB users.
Rob’s room was really comfortable and homelike! I and my friend had awesome days❤︎
Hosts are very easy to work with and accommodating. Great location just minutes to time square and restaurant and bars out the front door!

Great location we walked everywhere Times Square, Top of the Rock, Flatiron District.  Many restaurants to choose from close by. The only issue we had was the neighbor next door threw a party and was quite loud and lasted till 4am. But I would still stay this is a great place to stay.

There were 6 of us that stayed for the weekend. The apartment size was as expected for NYC. The location was great and walking distance to many restaurants and Times Square. The apartment was comfortable with the basic amenities available. The hosts were very responsive. No elevator and there is street noise in case you are a light sleeper, but would definitely stay here again!

The space and location were great right by Times Square. The apartment was true to the pictures. The host were great and always checking to make sure everything was going good. I don’t have any complaints. (Be prepared to climb stairs to get to apt). I would def come back or recommend this Airbnb to anyone else :)

The place was really dirty. The toilet seat had urine all over it and on the wall. The kitchen was so dirty, we would of never used a thing in it. Every corner of in the entire place was filthy; like they never cleaned the corners. The walls in the entire place need to painted, they are filthy! We did not stay we left as soon as we saw the inside of the place. They also were over an hour and a half late. We waited in a Uber out front of the place with our 4 kids for an hour and a half.
Very clean and beautiful place. Excellent location too!

beware of scalding hot heaters, visible gaps between window openings and air conditioning units, a blocked fire escape, and good luck finding the damaged air mattress if you have more than four yes in your party, that won't inflate. The host's responses were automated as if we hadn't made any complaints at all. We only stayed for a few hours overnight that we didn't sleep at all, and then they gave us a 5-star rating and asked us how they could help make it better next time and offer to repeat discount. This whole thing is a rent control scam.

Daniel was super friendly and understandable. He allowed us to check in a little bit earlier and was super helpful. I would totally come back and stay on this place again. Is only 4 blocks away walking from times square and from any tour bus.

name: Camp Cove Tropical Retreat at Watsons Bay
summary: A spacious contemporary apartment with a large under cover verandah, and private tropical garden and pool. The newly renovated space is located a 1 minute walk to beautiful Camp Cove Beach and a 5 minute walk to the ferry. The living area is filled with natural light and looks out to a beautiful and tranquil palm-filled garden.
space: Access is via outdoor stairs down the side of the house, through a secure gate leading onto the veranda and garden.  Enjoy the luxury of a king-size bed and hotel quality linen.   The galley kitchen is equipped with microwave, an electric cooktop, espresso machine, kettle, toaster, plunger coffee & tea pot.  A Weber gas barbecue is located on the outdoor verandah.
description: A spacious contemporary apartment with a large under cover verandah, and private tropical garden and pool. The newly renovated space is located a 1 minute walk to beautiful Camp Cove Beach and a 5 minute walk to the ferry. The living area is filled with natural light and looks out to a beautiful and tranquil palm-filled garden. Access is via outdoor stairs down the side of the house, through a secure gate leading onto the veranda and garden.  Enjoy the luxury of a king-size bed and hotel quality linen.   The galley kitchen is equipped with microwave, an electric cooktop, espresso machine, kettle, toaster, plunger coffee & tea pot.  A Weber gas barbecue is located on the outdoor verandah. The pool and garden are for your private  use during your stay.   Use of the pool is restricted to 10pm. Please respect our neighbours by keeping noise to a minimum. After a swim or a day on the beach please use the outdoor shower (hot & cold) at the top of the stairs. We would like you to feel at home
neighborhood_overview: Watsons Bay is a destination suburb with beautiful beaches, coastal walks, and several popular local restaurants and coffee shops. It is home to the iconic Doyle's beachfront seafood restaurant and the Watsons Bay Hotel.
notes: The kitchen larder and fridge is stocked with a selection of delicious breakfast items including fresh baked crusty bread, cereal, muesli, fruit juice & yoghurt.  There is espresso and plunger coffee and a selection of Twinings teas.  And the bottle wine is with our compliments.
transit: Watsons Bay is easily accessible by public transport as well as car. Frequent ferries run to the Sydney CBD, Manly, Milson's Point, Balmain and Barangaroo. It is also serviced by several regular bus routes.
access: The pool and garden are for your private  use during your stay.   Use of the pool is restricted to 10pm. Please respect our neighbours by keeping noise to a minimum. After a swim or a day on the beach please use the outdoor shower (hot & cold) at the top of the stairs.
interaction: We would like you to feel at home during your stay and therefore respect your privacy.  However if at any time you need assistance or have questions please contact us by mobile (our numbers are in the compendium), or knock on the front door.
house_rules: Guests must seek permission from Host prior to inviting friends to the property. Pool not to be used after 9pm

host.host_location: Watsons Bay, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: I have enjoyed a career in accommodation hospitality for over 40 years managing hotels in Melbourne and regional cities in Victoria and NSW.  I am now semi-retired living in Sydney and have just started operating a fantastic little B&B property in the Eastern Suburbs.   Both my partner & I have had busy careers (she is an architect) and we both have grown up families.  We are now at a stage in our lives where we have the freedom and opportunity to enjoy travel and all the good things in life.

reviews.comments:
Absolutely beautiful house, just a stones throw to camp cove. Our host was fantastic and made sure we had everything we needed, even breakfast in the morning. We will definitely stay again      when in Sydney next. This listing is perfect, a must stay, ticks every box, it is beyond 5stars and it doesn't get much better than this
Cheers

One of the best Airbnb we stayed in. The hosts are friendly, welcoming and have a really good taste for interior design. 

When we are going back to Sydney, we are definitely staying at this place. Not only because of the hosts but also for the location itself and it’s nice beaches!

Fantastic location near the beach, harbour and restaurants/bars. All no more than 5/6 minutes away.
Lovely apartment with beautiful garden.
Amazing! location and lovely hosts added with a lot of attention to details

This was the best air bnb I’ve ever stayed in! Book it and experience beautiful, relaxing Watson’s Bay! Neil and Jane were great hosts and our entire stay was exceptional! I’ve already recommended to family and friends and I’ll be looking to stay again in the near future. Thanks Neil and Jane!!
As others have said this is one of the best air bnb places I have stayed at - the place is gorgeous and private yet conveniently located and has such a wonderful feel. I would highly recommend it.

Neil and Jane's place is absolutely lovely on every level!  The neighborhood is wonderful and provides a nice break from the bustle of Sydney, yet is easily accessible to all the great spots by ferry.   The apartment is beautifully appointed and affords plenty of privacy.  The breakfast and wine provided were delicious.  Neil and Jane were exceptionally responsive and helpful prior to, and throughout, our stay.  We truly enjoyed meeting them and can't wait to return!  Highly recommend staying here!

Neil sure knows how to host, this place is just what you require if you are going  stay in Sydney, communication was easy and the self contained apartment was more than we hoped for. Modern fresh super clean and all the small things catered for like Robes beautiful  hand wash, shower gel , fruit , muesli, wine etc etc. 
Camp cove is only a short 2 minute walk and with a bottle of wine in one hand and a glass in the other you get to watch a sunset in a place like no other, All in all one of the best places we have stayed while experiencing Airbnb .

WOW!!  This may be the best Airbnb experience you will ever have, it's got everything.  The host is professional and super friendly and the apartment the location is premium with easy access to a beautiful beach, amazing walking trails with gorgeous views and

This is an absolutely fantastic airbnb destination. The hosts are fantastic. The location is perfect. The actual apartment is REALLY nice  (much better than the photos let on) and spacious. 

We will definately be coming back. Neil & Jane are the best.
Amazing space love staying here and Neil and Jane make it so welcoming

Everything had an exceptional attention to detail, was hidden away in a private beautiful garden in a exclusive part of Sydney, Neil was very helpful and a great host, would definitely recommend and stay again.

Watsons Bay and Camp Cove are one of our favourite places in Sydney but to have a stylist accommodation with a wonderful host made our stay so enjoyable.
Neil the accommodation was so cosy on a wet winter day but the complimentary bottle of red looking into the red hot stones of the gas fire next to the person you love was perfect.
We can not fault this ABNB and we will be back with our swimmers to enjoy the pool and beautiful Camp Cove beach.
Gorgeous private space with tranquil garden outlook. Warm and generous hosts. Couldn't fault it!

My husband and I stayed in this beautiful space as our friends were getting married near by at the Watson’s Bay Hotel.  This was a prefect location as it was only a short walk (3-5 min) to the wedding venue yet far enough away that we felt like we had a bit of space from the hustle and bustle of the weekend.

Neil was excellent in communicating and answering any questions we had leading up to our arrival and checkin.  We didn’t really need much attention while there, but he was quick to reply when we did.

What really made this space special was not only the beautiful decor (so clean and relaxing), but really the extra amenities provided were absolutely amazing.  From the wonderfully yummy breakfast items,  the bottle of wine, the soft bathrobes, the comfortable pillows & bed, the lovely bathroom amenities (which we liked so much that we went out and purchased some for own home!), the beautifully scented living room candle, I could go on and on.

If you are thinking of staying here, I wouldn’t think any further!  It was a perfect oasis nestled into a lovely quiet neighbourhood.  If there was a love button, I’d click it!  Thanks for the exceptional stay guys!
My parents stayed here for their anniversary and it was perfect! Comfortable, beautiful, cosy and so close to the beach! Thank you

Wonderful space in a great location. The apartment was spotlessly clean and very welcoming. Every light welcomed us when we arrived near midnight after an unpleasant flight and roadworks near the airport and it felt like we had found a quiet oasis after a hectic trip.

The supplied croissants, bread, wine, fruit, milk (and other things I have forgotten) were all great and helped us survive our early morning business meeting.

If you are coming to Watson's Bay, this place should definitely be on top of your list. We loved the village feel of the place, even though it is on the edge of Sydney and hosts a fairly major tourist attraction (The Gap). We are more than happy to recommend it.

Highlights:
1.  The food
2.  The garden outlook and sense of privacy
3.  The welcome provided to us by Neil, the host
4.  Proximity to spectacular locations and lovely walks

Problems:
The only thing that we could call a problem was that the Wifi kept dropping out BUT Neil specifically came to tell us about the problem and apologise and to tell us that a technician was coming out the next day to fix it. In other words, whilst the loss of Wifi was a little inconvenient, we cannot fault the response.

A very tasteful apartment with a tropical outlook. Everything you would need is supplied and it is a magical location with gorgeous homes along the way when you walk from the ferry and water front.
The most lovely small beach on Camp Cove is also just around the corner. 
This place is an oasis from the hustle and bustle of the city and you just need to jump on the ferry a short walk to reach many of the destinations on offer in Sydney.
Thank you again to both Jane and Neil we appreciated the thoughtful attention to detail  and the privacy you provided with the feeling that you were both very approachable if we needed anything.

Neil's place is absolutely beautiful! The studio has everything you need and more! It is well located and very quiet. Neil and his wife Jane are great hosts, they have the best wine and the best bread and are very friendly, helpful, respectful and interesting conversation partners. Great eye for details! and good uber skills too :) we will come back 100%
I’ve used bnb a couple of times, and Neil’s place is the best.  Very comfortable, clean and equipped with everything we can ask for.  Most of all I love bbq in the garden.  Will definitely come back.
Clean stylish place in a great location. Neil was an excellent host throughout  the stay. I will definitely be back. Thanks Neil.

Neil and Jane are the best hosts!!! Their spot is a little piece of heaven on earth and they go out of their way to make you feel superbly well taken care of and at home. I would highly recommend their place. It is very comfortable, has everything you need and close to fabulous restaurants and public transport. I had the most magical stay. Treat yourself!

We came for a staycation away from Sydney, and it was everything we wanted and more.
Staying here at Neil's place went far beyond our expectations. The actual place is impeccably and luxuriously designed. It feels incredibly spacious, yet grounded and cozy.  The linens, couch, and king mattress were excellent quality for deep restoration. We ended up planning our trip during an uncharacteristically dreary and rainy week in October, and Neil did everything he could to accomodate us on our beach holiday. We thoroughly enjoyed warming up near the fireplace, and delighted in some sleep ins knowing Neil had already generously taken care of breakfast- a full fruit basket, loaf of bread, yoghurts, croissants, assortment of jams, butter, nut butter, eggs, three kinds of cereal, milk and honey. We mentioned before heading out one evening we were going to get some take away and bring it back, and when we came back Neil had a couple of beers waiting for us packed in ice out in the lush backyard that we had to enjoy in privacy the entire stay. Neil struck the perfect balance between being available when we needed, and giving us lots of privacy. 

The home is on a very quiet street, quality/luxury neighbourhood. It is located a short walking distance from the major Watson's Bay sites, and there are plenty of even quieter and accessible coastal bush walks.

One of the best Airbnb experiences we have had anywhere in the world. Neil is an excellent host who went out of his way to be helpful and welcoming, even giving us a lift back from the supermarket when it was raining! A beautiful place right near the beach. Very quiet and relaxing yet an easy ferry or bus ride into the city. We could not fault it and  cannot recommend highly enough.

Camp Cove is a real gem and Neil is a terrific host. The property is located within 5 mins walk to the Watsons Bay wharf which makes it easily accessible to the Sydney ferries while being in quiet Watsons Bay. The property is also a minutes walk to camp cove which is a beautiful small beach. There are many additional local walks as well. The property is beautifully decorated and private. There are so many thoughtful touches and everything you could possibly need is there. The property is also stocked with delicious breakfast items. Neil provided a lot of useful local information and is extremely friendly. Overall an outstanding stay and we would definitely return.

We had an outstanding visit and will be recommending Neil’s apartment to anyone we know visiting Sydney. We really enjoyed the wine and all of his recommendations in the area, it made for a wonderful visit to Watson’s Bay. Thank you Neil, for sharing your slice of paradise.
Excellent location. Great hosts

Neil's place was everything and more. A great location for getting around Sydney but located in a beautiful & peaceful location with great walks and beaches nearby. The accommodation itself was excellent, well thought out with good touches from breakfast and toiletries to the layout of the apartment. Would most definitely recommend and only wish I could have stayed longer.
Great apartment close to lovely beach and easy access to Sydney.  Neil is great host and would definitely recommend.
Great location in beautiful Watsons Bay. Neil has great recommendations on restaurants and activities!!

What a wonderful location with complete amenities, relaxing space, and a superb host. Neil is beyond gracious, ready to lend a helping hand or provide answers. His information on enjoying Watson's Bay is spot on including great dining recommendations (absolutely check out Brown Sugar!), flexibility and care. Thank you for a memorable and relaxing stay!
Neil was a super host. The accommodation was fantastic and so well located to walks around the harbour. We will definitely stay here again.

Amazing location steps away from a beautiful sandy beach.  Brightly lit living space with a large comfortable bed.  TV Chanel selection was great, I was able to watch the NFL games and they had Netflix.  Neil was great answering questions and pointed us out to some amazing restaurants within walking distance.

This was by far the best Airbnb Experience we have ever had! Neil and Jane's place is a DREAM, the accommodations, the beach, the restaurants nearby, the ferry, the cliff walks!  We literally kept pinching ourselves because we couldn't believe we were living (and could afford) such a luxury vacation in a luxury paradise! 
We cannot say enough wonderful things about this rental.  It is absolutely a decision you will not regret, we loved the place so much, that we never even got out and explored the city.  We truly just thought that it couldn't be better then exactly where we were.  An absolutely perfect relaxing and splendid holiday.  
Many thanks to you, Neil and Jane!

Neil’s place was absolutely beautiful and Neil was a great host. I had some questions early on that he addressed quickly and made our international trip much easier. We will stay here again if we are back in the Sydney area!
Wonderful place. Beautifully decorated with thoughtful extra touches.
This is an outstanding place to stay in Sydney with so much to see and do and even just to unwind. Great hosts and will be coming back for sure. Highly recommend
Neils place is a treasure in the middle of paradise. Not much more to say, we just enjoyed our stay. Neil is a great host!
Amazing garden, wonderful location close to the beach, yummy welcome package, great people. Highly recommended for a relaxing retreat in Sydney!

From the outset this was a hugely positive experience.  Very quick responses and Neil and Jane kindly allowed us to drop our luggage before we were due to check in.  The apartment is really gorgeous and brilliantly located a two minute walk from the lovely camp cove beach.  There were many thoughtful and generous touches from lovely soaps to loads of food, wine and even a bottle of sparkly on New Years Eve!  Neil and Jane could give lessons in being fabulous hosts.   The beds were comfortable and the linen was fresh and beautiful, great pillows and the bathroom/shower was great. The apartment even has a pool and barbecue.  
I really couldn't recommend this property enough for a couple or three people - I was with my two adult daughters and we had plenty of room etc

The final kindness was when we were leaving when Neil drove us to the ferry with our luggage!

5 Stars all round!

What a pleasure it was to stay here.  immaculate presentation & our hosts Neil & Jane were so very accommodating, nothing was a worry and were very informative about our surroundings & just delightful to chat with.  Camp Cove is a fantastic, well equipped and quiet apartment.  Every little detail had special thought put into it & we felt right at home.  cannot recommend it highly enough & we are booked for the next trip already.  Thankyou Neil & Jane for a lovely experience!

Location is A+++; walking distance to world class beach; sunset views across the street.  Quite space with magnificent garden.  Unit itself is much larger then photos suggest.  Great design aesthetic; devoured books on hand.  Neil is a wonderful host:  gracious, helpful.  Unit is fully appointed with all you need to enjoy a long stay in beautiful Watsons Bay.  Best Airbnb stay to date!
Neil was an excellent host, and the unit was a lovely place to stay. We'd certainly love to come back and stay again

Neil’s place in Watson’s Bay, is the perfect location for a get away in Sydney. He is easy to communicate with and very accommodating, providing beautiful fresh produce for our stay. 

The house is beautifully furnished, it feels like you are in your own little tropical oasis and then as soon as you step out the front door you are a minute away from the lovely camp cove beach and a couple of minutes walk to Watson’s Bay hotel and the famous Doyle’s restaurant. There are also so many lovely walking tracks along the foreshore that provide you with spectacular views of the city. 

My husband and I had a fabulous time and would highly recommend Neil’s place!
An amazing property with so much to offer. Could not fault one thing. The perfect weekend!
You will meet a true super host who anticipates your every need and who is as responsive as we have ever experienced.

Very happy with my stay. Neil was great with taking any worry out of the visit. The place itself was a tropical getaway from the hustle and bustle of the city, yet very accessible. It was a joy to take the ferry’s everywhere around Sydney (and much more affordable than Uber or taxi). I took at least 10 boat rides in 48 hours which added to the adventure. Download the app as suggested to find all the pick up times. Watson’s bay is a cool little beach town with one hotel. Loved the tropical back yard and swimming pool. Also all the breakfast foods and coffee Neil arranged were great. Thanks again!

name: Beautiful Bondi Beachside Home

The house has three bedrooms opening to a brand new open plan kitchen and family room, with bi-folds that open to a deck and garden. High ceilings, polished floorboards and white shutters make this a beautiful beachside home. It is baby and child friendly (cot, high chair, and toys available).

No noise, and the sound of birds, yet five minute walk to everything. It is very light and airy. host.host_about: I live in Bondi Beach, Sydney, Australia. I love the outdoors and love to be active.

reviews.comments: Treen’s place is lovely, clean and charming. A great place to relax if you’re coming for a holiday, and its location to nearby shops, cafes, and Bondi beach is icing on the cake. Highly recommended.

A lovely house, stylish and well appointed close to Bondi beach. Perfect for my family to stay, on a business trip with me. 5 stars from us and would absolutely stay again. Treen was an absolute pleasure to communicate with.
Amazing place to stay. Beautifully styled, spacious, comfortable home. 5 min walk to the beach. Loved it.

The bedrooms were comfortable with lots of storage and air conditioning. The bathroom was clean and for longer stays there is a washing machine. The lounge and kitchen and spacious offering a great area to entertain. We made good use of the BBQ too.

The kitchen is well stocked with herbs and spices and all cooking equipment which we had access to.

Treen was fully accommodating with arrival times and any questions we had.

A great stay had by all!

Treen's place is perfect for families. It's excellently located in close proximity to restaurants, Harris farm and other markets, excellent coffee, and many other shops, and is of course an easy stroll to the beach. Treen is very responsive to any needs or concerns. The place is well stocked with kitchen supplies and condiments, and baby toys for the bath. We would love to stay again in the future and recommend to others.
The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Treen’s place is fantastic, and suited our family of 6 perfectly. It’s spacious, modern and bright, and she was kind enough to leave toys and books for our kids, which was incredibly helpful. The location is ideal, just 3 minutes walk to the trendy cafes on Hall St and 5 minutes walk to the beach. Treen was a fantastic host - very helpful and accommodating before our arrival, and available during our stay - though we didn’t need her, since the place was so great. Her home is perfect for families or a group of 6 looking for a charming house in the heart of one of Sydney’s best neighborhoods.

The most perfect location to enjoy all that Bondi has to offer and just far enough out of the madding crowd to feel like you are in a peaceful home. Fantastic local tips and if you have children it is the perfect house. A big long hallway, safe and green private backyard, gorgeous books and toys and a five minute walk to the beach. We will be back!
Great property in a prime Bondi location. Amazing living spaces and backyard with lots of thoughtful amenities (basic food, toiletries etc) which made it feel like a home away from home.

We had such a wonderful time at this beautiful Bondi home. It is clean, bright, stylish and perfectly located close to great restaurants, cafes, shops and of course- Bondi beach. It was so hard to leave as it felt like home! 
We will be back!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Treen's beautiful house at Bondi :) the location was fantastic we could easily walk to cafes, restaurants, grocery shopping and of course the beach! 
The atmosphere of the house was lovely, it really did have a beautiful positive feel to the property. 
I would definitely stay here again :)
Thank you Treen
The host canceled this reservation 55 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The house is in a great location - just 5 minutes walk to the beach and a few minutes from Hall Street cafes and restaurants. The neighborhood is quiet and residential. 

We enjoyed our stay. Treen was very helpful and quick to respond to our queries.  The house is all we needed with 3 bedrooms, open plan kitchen and living and a small back garden.  A second or bigger bathroom would have been ideal but the houses in the area tend to be small, so not an option. 

Would recommend for a stay in Bondi.

We loved staying in Treen’s beautiful home. It suited us - four old friends - perfectly. The home is beautiful and well laid out with a lovely private garden and a great kitchen and living area. The beds were comfortable and the home immaculate and beautifully styled. It is a short walk to Bondi beach and we loved waking to Bronte and swimming at Icebergs. It’s a great neighbourhood. Treen was a kind and gracious host. Thankyou for having us.
A fantastic house in a fantastic location.  Super comfortable place in walking distance to shops, fantastic coffee and the beach.  Treen is a wonderful host and couldn’t be more welcoming.

Fabulous place to stay.
Great house... lager than photos show...
Great location and very attentive host.
Would stay again

name: Douro view Apartment
summary: Apartamento com 2 quartos junto ao Rio Douro
description: Apartamento com 2 quartos junto ao Rio Douro

reviews.comments:
Mixed feelings on this one. 
On the positive side: it's clean (it's run by a management company), the host was very welcoming, the location is perfect, and it's very attractive and comfortable.
On the negative side: there was a serious problem with the electricity (short circuits and electric shocks from the kitchen sink). As a result, we could not cook food there and had some cost and hassle (we have kids) getting food in, especially at short notice. I didn't ask for compensation for this, and the host didn't offer any. The host said that they were going to get an electrician in before the next guest, and I have no reason to doubt this, but I would definitely enquire first.
Also: the drains don't smell great, and there is no washing machine (the listing is accurate in this respect).
Un accueil parfait de la part de Damas, des conseils au top pour une visite de porto.

Amei minha estadia neste apartamento. À vista é belíssima, vale a pena. Fui muito bem recebida pela Sr Cláudia. Muito atenciosa e gentil. O apartamento bem decorado e aconchegante. Foram dias maravilhosos. Voltarei com certeza, muitas vezes
The Place is really beautiful and communication was super easy. Would definitely recommend staying there!

super emplacement super vue accès bus tramway impeccable. 
propreté à améliorer et aussi l'équipement de cuisine.
Obligado Damas

Nisantasi, Istanbul’s equivalent to London’s Chelsea or New York’s Upper East Side, used to be dominated b
neighborhood_overview: My place is in the middle of Besiktas-Nisantasi and Taksim. Besiktas is the leading culture, art and education capital and district of Istanbul as well as one of the most valuable regions of Istanbul with its Ortakoy, Arnavutkoy, Kurucesme and Bebek neighborhoods located by the Bosphorus. Nisantasi, Istanbul’s equivalent to London’s Chelsea or New York’s Upper East Side, used to be dominated by strawberry orchards in the 18th century. It was here that the sultan’s soldiers used to train their target, hence its name – Nisantasi means “target stone “ .Taksim Square is the center of Istanbul today, and Beyoglu has a very nice pedestrian street.  Besiktas is the best place to observe the lively Istanbul city life. It is also the popular meeting point as well as the most important junction for sea transportation. Besiktas also hosts the historical heritage of the Ottomans, culture and art with its Dolmabahce, Ciragan and Yildiz Palace. Besiktas is also one of the best places to see in Istan
notes: There are 3 supermarkets and 1 bakery on the road.
transit: Besiktas, Taksim And Nisantasi neighbourhood within walking distance of the house. Nearest metro station takes 7 minutes by walking: Osmanbey Metro.
access: You can use guest room, main hall,  kitchen and bathroom.

name: Bondi Beach Large Studio with Ocean Views
summary: Embracing the idyllic oceanfront lifestyle of a superb location, this large studio features sun-drenched, open-plan living space with beautiful partial ocean and beach views.
space: Set back from the road on the eastern side of the landmark Bondi Pacific Tower, the studio captures superb partial views over the beach and ocean, and features convenient dual access with an alternative entry via Notts Avenue to the beach, Icebergs Pool and the Bondi to Coogee coastal walk. Enviably positioned on the southern end of the golden stretch of Bondi Beach, it is just a leisurely stroll to the popular cosmopolitan strip of local shops, trendy restaurants, cafes and CBD bus transport. The Features: • 1 x Bedroom • 1 x Bathroom • 1 min to Bondi Beach • Beautiful partial ocean and beach views  • Right next to Bondi Icebergs and pool • 55 inch Smart TV with unlimited complimentary Netflix • Bluetooth speakers  • Unlimited Wi-Fi • Fully equipped kitchen with stove top, oven, fridge/freezer, microwave, kettle and toaster  • Dining table with seating for 4 • Electric heating • Pedestal fan with remote control  plus cross ventilation and cool ocean breeze • Vacuum cleaner, iron, iron

Set back from the road on the eastern side of the landmark Bondi Pacific Tower, the studio captures superb partial views over the beach and ocean, and features convenient dual access with an alternative entry via Notts Avenue to the beach, Icebergs Pool and the Bondi to Coogee coastal walk. neighborhood_overview: Worldly famous Bondi Beach offers a great choice of Hipsters cafes and restaurants, trendy boutiques and a super cool Sunday market. Walk down Campbell Parade to immerse yourself in the Bondi bubble. Get a take away coffee across the road at Bondi Massive, breakfast with a view at Trio Cafe, a healthy Middle Eastern pita bread for lunch at Sababbah and some tasty Asian Fusion tapas at China Diner or a traditional simple but really tasty pizza or pasta at Gelbison. Finish up with an amazing 'Specials board' gelato at Messina or.. if you are young, free and fabulous, or want to mingle with the locals, grab a drink at Bondi Hardware or Cafe Bikini.
notes: Please get in touch in advance if you wish to book undercover parking space subject to availability It costs an extra $20/day.
transit: Bus stop is located directly to the front right of the building. Jump on the 333, 380 or 381 to get to Westfield's Bondi Junction where you can find all the exclusive shops or Bondi Junction Train Station. The 333, 380 bus takes you to the City all the way to Circular Quay to the Opera House approximately 30-40 minutes From Circular Quay you can catch the Ferry to Mosman, Balmoral Beach, Manly, Birkenhead Point - Sydney's largest outlet shopping centre.
access: Fresh quality bed linen and bath towels are provided. Bring your own beach towels. 2 folding beach chair are provided.  We also provide Nescafe, tea, sugar, milk, biscuits, shared bathroom essentials including Full Size shampoo, conditioner, body wash, soap and body lotion. Guests can also help themselves to cooking condiments, cleaning / washing products, and whatever else is available at the property.
interaction: We will check you in and will be just a phone call away to help with anything you need throughout your stay. :) Self check in also available.

host.host_location: Bondi Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: I am a ex-Hospitality professional who now works in Real Estate. l love travel, movies, decoration and renovation. I recently started my Airbnb journey and stayed in some lovely homes in Europe. Had an amazing experience in Trieste and Budapest. I look forward to meeting guests from all over the world in Bondi Beach where I have a lovely holiday studio with amazing views.

reviews.comments: Anita is a pleaser. She will do all she can to make your stay in her perfectly situated flat on bondi beach. If you search for a spot in Bondi, here it is ! Highly recommanded
The studio was so beautiful! Amazing design and so clean! Everything was perfect, Anita is very kind and everything that we needed she answered us! Thank you so muchh

We enjoyed a nice ocean view from the window. The apartment is located right next to a bus stop to/from the city, and everything you need - beach, shops, cafes, restaurants are all within walking distance but yet it’s surprisingly very quiet. We enjoyed morning coastal walks to North Bondi and Bronte. Anita provided a few cups of yogurt, milk, butter, etc as well as beach towels and they were all helpful. I highly recommend this place!

This apartment was great for our quick Bondi stay. Location is great; right on main street, but beach side so the noise is not much. Beautiful view of Bondi from window and walking distance from all shops/entertainment and scenic walks. Check-in/ out easy with help from Anita, who also provided us with lots of helpful tips about the neighborhood. Bus to Sydney right outside apartment making for easy access to the other sites. No air-con, but fan and window helped immensely. Great place for a beach vacation in Bondi! Definitely would recommend to anyone.

Stylish studio with amazing views of Bondi beach and the ocean. Good kitchen and bathroom, well equipped - perfect place to stay in Bondi. 2 minute walk to Icebergs or to the Beach. Anita was easy to communicate with and very welcoming. Thoroughly recommended.

Anita is an absolutely lovely person and outstanding host. 
Her communication was proactive and timely; she greeted us with a warm welcome and wished us safe travels upon departure; and she went out of her way to ensure that we enjoyed our stay.
The location is perfect, the view is amazing, and the apartment is clean and cozy with all the amenities you could need. 
Anita is a beautiful soul who radiates positive vibes. Our experience in Bondi Beach wouldn’t have been the same if we hadn’t met her. Thanks, Anita!

Anita’s place is very well decorated and perfectly located right near Bondi beach. Wow, the view! There were little touches like the basic food and shower products provided which is great for the light traveler. Anita was very helpful and hospitable, and gave some great tips for things to do in the area. Comfortable bed and very clean. Very highly recommend!
Great location and felt at home right away!! Host was excellent play was well presented and tidy. we'll be coming back for sure.

What an absolutely amazing find. Anita was so wonderful and accomodating, even letting us check out late and store our luggage for us while we explored Bondi. Check in was easy and Anita was always in touch to make sure we had the perfect stay. The property is stunning, beautifully decorated and absolutely immaculate and clean. Anita has thought of every detail even leaving us snacks and toiletries. I couldn’t recommend this place more highly and will be staying here again! 10/10 from us !

From the minute we booked to stay in Anita’s Bondi apartment everything was perfect. Communication was quick, the apartment looked exactly as it does in the photos, the location is amazing and Anita goes out of her way at check in to ensure that your stay is perfect.

I booked this room for a colleague who was visiting on a secondment, and he was very happy with the stay. A great way to wow visitors from London - access to one of our most iconic beaches. He said it was very convenient, well-appointment, comfortable and well-stocked with thoughtful additions, which was really useful to him. It's very likely we will be booking again.
Anita has a wonderful, comfortable place with a beautiful view. Highly recommend!

The studio was as described, location for us absolutely fantastic, the apartment was comfortable and clean
Carolina and Anita were fantastic hosts and we got some great tips on local restaurants 
We really enjoyed our stay
Amazing, thoroughly enjoyed!

Anita was a fantastic host and went above and beyond. This was my second time in Bondi Beach and next time I visit I’ll be staying here again. 5 stars! The location is central to all the Bondi has to offer. It’s near a busy street but with the windows closed you don’t hear much.

This apartment was a perfect getaway. It had everything you need. It was walking distance from shops and restaurants and a bus stop a stones throw away. Anita was super helpful and very hospitable making our stay that little bit better.

When we visit  Sydney we usually stay at the Four Seasons Hotel. This time we tried booking Airbnb in Sydney. We arrived 11pm at the apartment and our self check-in was so easy. We got surprised that our host Anita prepared cheese, ham, and bread for us. It was a very thoughtful gesture because we were so hungry. She even prepared milk and cookies. Wow, its the first time i ever experienced  this in an Airbnb. Her apartment is way bigger than the normal room at Four Seasons.Everything was so clean.  Plus the amenities are even better.She even had beach towels prepared and beach chairs.  Her bed sheets and towels are high quality. The bed also was very comfortable.  We love her apartment so much.  Personally, we think its the best we have ever stayed at. I'm surprised that this apartment is not yet in the Airbnb Plus category. Because Anita's apartment should be at the Airbnb Super Plus category. She even has Netflix in her Smart TV. Her kitchen is so complete with all the cooking amenities.She even had pasta for us.  In our last night, she even gave us a going away gift. Anita was so sweet and thoughtful.  If there was an award body that gives out awards, Anita should be given the Super Super Host Award for Airbnb. We stayed for 8 days.  She is the best and her apartment is the best we have ever stayed so far. We will surely  be back. A million Thanks Anita!!!!
Fantastic location, great host and spotless apartment.   Perfect

Great apartment. Anita is very kind and prepare everything I may need which is way too much beyond my expectation. You can see bondi beach in the apt and bus stop only 10meter away. Overall it is good choice when you travell to bondi. Thx Anita.

Home away from home! I can't write enough good things about this cute Airbnb in Bondi Beach! The sunrise view & ocean view was impeccable and it the best location, right near Icebergs and the amazing Coastal Walk. 

Anita was an exceptional host. She met me when I arrived early to help with my luggage and allowed me to leave my bags while I explored Bondi until the place was ready. She gave the best tutorial of everything I would need to know in the apartment building and checked in with me throughout my stay. Complete white glove service! Thanks, Anita. I'll be back!

Anita was easy to contact and quick to respond to all our requests. The apartment was everything it is advertised to be and more. It was extremely clean and had everything we needed to make our stay feel homely and very comfortable. We look forward to staying here next time. 
Thanks Anita
Very comfortable bed, the ‘partial’ view of the beach is great. Anita is a lovely and generous host, who made us feel welcome. We enjoyed our stay very much. Thank you!
Anita's place is lovely. It is in an excellent location and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Would definitely recommend staying here.
Lovely location; comfortable, clean, well equipped and spacious apartment with superb view. Anita was welcoming and extremely helpful.

Exactly as described. The location was spot on, the apartment was exactly what was pictured. Anita went above and beyond to make sure that we were comfortable and provided additional information as first time guests to Australia. ie. public transportation. We arrived much earlier than check-in and she allowed us to leave our luggage at the apartment while we explored the beautiful Bondi Beach. Everything was provided in the apartment. There was no additional stress to locate sunscreen, beach towels, beach chair, even a beach hat was available! Comfortable cozy place, cozy bed, and it was so lovely waking up in the morning to see the beautiful sunrise off of the ocean while sipping a cup of coffee in the comfort of our room.

Anita’s place made for a wonderful weekend away with our grandson!  A perfect location, lovely flat, great view, and up to date and really comfortable. Anita was a pleasure to meet and deal with. She made everything easy!  We loved our stay and can recommend Anita’s place unreservedly!  Thank you Anita!

Really good studio apartment in perfect location in Bondi Beach. The apartment is right next to the 333 bus stops on Campbell Parade and one minute from the beach, Bondi icebergs and the Bondi to Bronte Coastal walk. And It has a great view of the beach! Anita was a wonderful host, on time, helpful, welcoming. We had a great experience. We will be back to this apartment and would definitely recommend it to others.

Anita is a fantastic host! She made sure my parents’ stay was pleasant and comfortable. She would check on them regularly to make sure they had everything they needed, and accommodated them at the check-in and check-out.

The apartment is beautiful and extremely well located. You definitely can’t find a better spot in Bondi! 

I highly recommend Anita’s apartment for a short or a longer stay if you want to experience Bondi at its best!

I & wife stayed here for the first trip in Sydney.
We really enjoyed days and never forget our memory in here. Room is very clean and all stuff we need are prepared in a room. I think it is ok to bring your personal things like a clothes.

And this room has a very nice view of Bondi beach.

If you want to have a good memory in Bondi beach, I strongly recommend Anita's room. 

Thank you so much for your help, Anita! :)

This studio apartment is in a wonderful location in Bondi Beach. With stunning views from the studio and panoramic views from the rooftop! We stayed 11 days and it was relaxing and enjoyable! It was the perfect home away from home. Anita was the most helpful and gracious of hosts. The apartment is fully ready, with everything you’d need in the kitchen, bathroom and even beach towels and beach chairs! 
Thank You Anita!
We had the most incredible stay at Anita’s property in Bondi. Anita is a lovely, helpful and generous host and the apartment was just perfect! Highly recommend!

Many thanks Anita for your warm hospitality. The apartment is very nice with very spectacular Bondi Beach view with excellent location. Your tips for the local restaurants and all the information are very useful. We had some good local  experience of the Bondi Beach and enjoyed so much with the kids. Also thanks for the special kid meal plates for the kids.

Perfect beach location with classic Bondi Beach views from the apartment and rooftop terrace.

A really good sized studio space, It was super clean and well presented - just like the photos. 

Anita is an outstanding host, very responsive, helpful and friendly.

Anita’s place is the perfect location for anyone who wants the beachside holiday. Located right across from the famous Bondi Icebergs, you can easily get to Bondi Beach and walk the coastal walk to many of the other beaches. The apartment itself is sparking clean, beautifully decorated and has everything you’d need for a great stay. Anita was there to help with anything I needed and gave me a tour around the area showing me the pools and restaurants nearby and the shortcuts on how to get there. Anita was very sweet and extremely helpful going above and beyond to help with both check in and check out. Would highly recommend staying here!

Anita’s place is better than the pictures!
Everything went wonderfully! Anita is an amazing host!
Stunning location. Very clean. Comfortable bed. Even down to the smaller touches like beach towels and tea bags. Anita was a very helpful host and easy to communicate with. Highly recommend.
When you wake up in the morning, you can see beautiful sunrise. Very nice ocean view in cozy house.
Anita’s place was in a perfect location with an amazing view. Everything about the apartment was clean, neat and tidy. I had a fantastic stay and would recommend staying there.
Had a great few days in Bondi in a well located apartment. Anita was fantastic, recommending a few local spots to visit. Will definitely be back and highly recommend.

Great location with a nice view. Clean and central to Bondi. It is a part of a complex where other air bnb people rent, and some of the guests were noisy, especially late at night. The walls were super thin. Very comfy bed and big window that allows fresh air in all night!

Strong recommendation for this place! Staying at Anita's place was just amazing. The apartment was absolutely clean and there was everything you could wish for your stay. Anita even left few eggs for me to eat! The location is fantastic. Just next to Bondi Beach or almost ON the beach. :) And Anita was one of the kindest and caring host and she helped me with everything I needed. I would definitely come back here.

This apartment was one of the best experiences I have had on Air B&B. Anita has a tidy, organized and comfortable home with the most spectacular views. The apartment sits on the south end of Bondi with direct access to the beach. The building is a little older, but that does not matter when you have a home in such a magical place. Anita is a wonderful host, taking the time to share local information, being always readily available and just a lovely, kind person. The access to the city is super easy, with the bus directly outside the front door. I would never stay in a hotel in Bondi again, as this place is far better value.
very good  place

name: Cozy home at Futian,1min2Metro,near customs to HK
summary: The hosts of this little sweet apartment are a couple. One is an architect, the other is an IT programmer. The architect is Pisces, the programmer is Capricorn. It's a kind of perfect combination of art and technology. We both have a dream to share a nice place for travelers. So architect designed, programmer decorated. At last, we have this new cozy home on airbnb.
space: It's a 35㎡ apartment on the 8th floor. There are 3 lifts in the building. Living room: There is a queen-size bed suit for 2 persons. Sheets are all clean for each guest. A desk is provided if you need to work or read. Mi TV is connected to internet, a lot of free movies can be watched. Refrigerator is filled with drink and fast food, but need extra charge. Books are mainly in kinds of architecture and technology, but in Chinese. Washing machine is in balcony. Bathroom has a separate shower. Towels, toothbrushes&toothpaste, shampoo&bodywash, soap and slippers are provided. Kitchen is all equipped. You can easily start your cooking. If you need any special tools for cooking, just tell us before you arrive, we are glad to prepare for you.  Technology: 100M free wifi, Mi TV, smart door lock(you can use password to open the door, the password will become effective just before you arrive and lose effective on 12:00 the day you leaving), smart air condition(cold&heat).

neighborhood_overview: Our apartment is located at the center of Shenzhen, along the Binhe road, one of the main streets. It is very very near the Huanggang checkpoint to Hong Kong(not in Hong Kong, don't be confused by airbnb map, Hong Kong is a river beyond). Our apartment is in a big community. If you want to experience the true Shenzhen lifestyle, this is suitable for you.  Floor -1 to 3 of the building is commercial complex. You can find garden, swimming pools( both in door and out door), gym, basketball court, supermarket, community library, beauty salons, massage, restaurants, almost all the things you need. At downstairs, there are all kinds of delicious restaurants and great street food. You can try different tasty cuisines. At least, if you want a quick meal, we have McDonald's.
transit: Chiwei metro station exit C is next to downstairs. 2 stops(1 stop in fact because of still not open of Fulin station) 5 mins metro to Huanggang checkpoint(24 hours) to Hong Kong. 10 mins metro(4 stops) to Futian checkpoint to Hong Kong.(Metro connected on both sides) 3 stops by bus 369 to shenzhen conference and exhibition center, 10 mins(4 stops) by metro. 2 stops to Huaqiang Bei by metro. To Airport: Take metro line 7, transfer to line 11 at Chegongmiao. 36.9 km takes 59 mins.  To Shenzhen railway station(Luohu) or Luohu checkpoint: about 4.2km, but metro and bus will take a long way to there, taxi is a better choice.  To Futian railway station: metro line 7 transfer to line 3, 6 stops in total. To Shenzhen North railway station: metro line 7 transfer to line 4, 11 stops in total.
access: 起居室厨房卫生间阳台提供的设施都可以使用｡ 房间内有存放一些房屋维护与经营相关的物料和工具,如有需要请跟我们联系｡
interaction: We are friendly and supportive hosts.  No matter how long you are staying, as hosts, We will personally make sure your stay as comfortable as possible. Just please tell your requirements. We can speak English and Mandarin. If you need any recommendations to go around the city(local cool areas, good events, transport links etc), we will be available for any questions anytime.

房东夫妇是建筑师｡所以房子虽然格局普通,但家具和色彩搭配非常有时尚感,又温馨｡浴室加了木质板,踩着特别舒服｡记忆床垫､布艺沙发､地毯,灯光,都很舒适｡还有小米电视｡
地理位置极好,地铁出来3分钟距离｡
唯一可以挑毛病的是房子隔音效果不好,左右邻里,楼上楼下的响动还是会听到些｡
非常好!离地铁很近!里面装饰很好看!房东也很好!走的时候落东西了 房东答应给寄回来~人超好~很满意!下次去深圳还住这里~
非常棒的房间,超出预期｡交通位置超级优越,房间装饰风格很温馨舒适｡很干净整洁｡房东的书品赞一个,跟我有蛮多重合,出门在外遇到熟悉的书让人很安心｡这间房推荐给大家｡
Nice place for one night stay !

This place is very close to the Chu Wei metro station (right next to exit C). The host couple are extremely nice, were very prompt in their replies, thorough with the instructions and went out of the way to help us!

The apartment is very thoughtfully and beautifully decorated - books, plants, posters, photo frames, paintings, towels - everything! I especially loved their book collection. The building that this apartment is in is also pretty ok, no complaints there.
 
I highly recommend this to anyone visiting Shenzhen. I know where I am staying on my next trip here :D

很棒的一次体验 设施一应俱全 最重要的是!!房东用咕咕鸡传讯息 真的很萌!哈哈哈哈哈哈 房间也很漂亮 还有自己的手绘的房间物品放置图 超级棒!楼下就是商场 有吃的 又喝的 还有电影院 距离地铁口就一分钟的步行路程 真的棒! 下次来深圳 还是会考虑来这里住

我相信 交通的便利程度是一名游客在陌生城市的首要考量因素 该房源恰恰就处在地铁口｡房间里随处体现着房东的细心 打开每个储物盒或者抽屉 都有可能给你一点小惊喜｡手绘的房间提示图 以及房东手写的其怀孕日记 无不体现着房东对于房客的尊重和分享｡最有意思的 身为高冷男子的我 竟然忍不住跟房东斗颜文字 哈哈哈(⁎⁍̴̛ᴗ⁍̴̛⁎)

入住感觉很好

不错,装修很用心

很推荐大家入住 很好

name: Apartamento Design VIP Praia da Barra - 3 quartos
summary: Maravilhoso apartamento 3 quartos novo e decorado por arquiteta + 2 Tv's à cabo NET + Internet Wif + 5 split's + Roupas cama e banho de excelente qualidade + cozinha montada + limpeza máxima. Recebemos com Luxo à beira mar, guardamos suas bagagens, ficamos ao lado de Hotéis como Windsor e Sheraton, na Avenida Lúcio Costa,  Posto 4, melhor ponto da praia, com lazer completo e 2 Mall's de conveniências: mercado, padaria, restaurantes, farmácia, cabeleireiro. Temos mais opções, Fale com o Anfitrião
space: Se precisar chegar antes ou sair depois do horário de check-in e check-out consulte para saber se existe viabilidade. De toda forma sua anfitriã reside no mesmo prédio e está acostumada a guardar e cuidar dos pertences e bagagens de nossos hospedes, então entre 9 horas e 18 horas conte com um local para guardar suas bagagens. Nós também locamos outros espaço no mesmo prédio consulte, estamos em um condomínio extremamente familiar com dezenas de itens de lazer como piscinas, quadras, sauna, academia, tatâmi, parquinhos, salões de Jogos, Etc. Localizado na Rua da praia, Av. Lúcio Costa, na Barra da Tijuca, proporciona uma estadia confortável e ao mesmo tempo com o pé na aguá do mar. No condomínio tem Mercado, Padaria c/ almoço à Quilo, Salão de beleza Feminino e Masculino, Farmácia, Lavanderia, papelaria com acesso à internet, Etc. Ao Lado do Condomínio tem Baladinha (BaladaMix), Devassa e o Restaurante Japôneis Mini Moc. Tudo com acesso à pé. Apartamento  100m² Totalmente montado em alt

neighborhood_overview: A Barra da Tijuca dispensa comentários, e a localização do apartamento na minha opinião sincera é a melhor possível, realmente na rua da praia em um ponto central e muito bem frequentado entre os postos 4 e 5, um dos mais tradicionais condomínios da Barra da Tijuca O Bairro calmo e imponente, a Barra da Tijuca é uma das zonas de maior interesse no Rio de Janeiro, e o condomínio em questão é tradicional e de alto padrão, vizinhança tranquila e não barulhenta.  O fato de ser na frente da praia é um atrativo à mais para quem curte da aquele mergulho, as águas são maravilhosas, e sem tubarão é claro! Sua proximidade ao parque olímpico e à maioria das instalações das Olimpíadas Rio 2016 foi um atrativo à mais para quem veio por causa do evento internacional. E também para você que pretende vir e curtir o melhor do mar do Rio e ao mesmo tempo estar perto do seu objetivo na Barra da Tijuca o mais lindo bairro do Rio de Janeiro.
notes: Queremos que o hospede se sinta em casa e sejam cuidadosos ao utilizar os utensílios que estarão lá para melhor servi-los!
transit: Transporte publico na porta do condomínio (praia da Barra). Tem ponto de Taxi convencional dentro do condomínio, e serviço de táxi executivo funciona ao lado no Hotel Sheraton, e o UBER chega super rápido aqui. Região de fácil acesso a toda a cidade e fica perto da maioria dos locais onde as Olimpíadas Rio 2016 ocorreram! Como alternativa temos também o transporte fluvial nos fundos do condomínio, onde é possível pegar balsa para atravessar ou mesmo pode agendar um passeio pelo canal que percorre todo o bairro da Barra da Tijuca, uma bela forma de se conhecer melhor esse paraíso que chamamos Barra ---------------------------------------------------------------- TRANSPORTE PARA A BARRA DA TIJUCA ---------------------------------------------------------------- DICAS DE TRANSPORTE: ***** SEMPRE PERGUNTE ANTES DE EMBARCAR, SE O DESTINO É A ALVORADA na Barra da Tijuca ou se o ônibus vai passar pela praia de nome Av. Lúcio Costa para você poder descer na nossa porta:  ***** Para transporte d
access: Todo o apartamento privativo para vocês e infraestrutura do condomínio. Consulte já a suas necessidades, atendimento 24 horas.
interaction: Sua anfitriã reside no mesmo condomínio, e sempre que precisarem podem contar com sua presença para ajudar com tudo!
house_rules: Permitido fumar apenas na varanda! Deve fazer pouco barulho após as 22 horas!

host.host_about: Busco um atendimento 5 estrelas para quem quer se hospedar no Rio de Janeiro. contratar uma de minhas acomodações é sinônimo de satisfação. Conte  com compromisso, limpeza e fidelidade das informações anunciadas além de um excelente suporte com as dificuldades comuns de pessoas que vem de fora para se hospedar no Rio. Conte também com o suporte do Corretor de imóveis Israel Fagundes que ajuda a organizar os espaços, regras, e condutas do bom anfitrião. Tanto a trabalho como a lazer venha ser feliz de verdade no Rio de Janeiro nos nossos espaços. Estamos te esperando!

address.street: Barra da Tijuca, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
El departamento es igual a las fotos! Muy lindo, con mucho diseño
La ubicacion es muy buena, frente a la playa, y en el puesto 4 de barra
La pasamos increible!! Muchas gracias Fatima por todo

Estadia incrível!! 
Apartamento exatamente como as fotos: tudo novinho, limpo e de muito bom gosto. 
Recepção e atenção da D. Fatima e Israel foram impecáveis!
Localização excelente, com acesso à praia, mercado, padaria, restaurantes.. tudo pertinho!

The apartment is the perfect location in Barra. Beautiful views of the mountains and a slight view of the beach. The whole apartment is air conditioned which is a nice plus. The pool and sauna are great. They had a lovely spread of food and beverages for us. The kitchen has everything you could need to cook meals. We hope to stay again.
Lo único que le faltaría es vista al mar, el resto todo perfecto.

name: Great Location! One Bedroom Apt. in LES
summary: Beautiful newly renovated apartment in the Lower East Side, with high ceilings and new appliances.  The apartment is quiet at night and full of light during the day thanks to six windows (including one in the bathroom!). The apartment is only one walk up! Access to kitchen equipment, linens, plates and glassware. The apartment is close to all the art galleries and hot spots of the neighborhood. 5 minutes away from the F, B and D train and 10 minutes away from J, 6, NQRW trains.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Красивая и удобная квартира на Манхетте, в прекрасном состоянии. До Тайм Сквер 30 минут на метро.
Semhar is very welcoming and the appartment is well located !
Appartement à la propreté impeccable. Le quartier est idéal pour visiter New York. Semhar est une personne agréable et serviable. Tout s'est bien déroulé, nous sommes ravis.
The place was nice and clean. Semhar was a great host!

Semhar's bright and spacious apartment exceeded my expectations. A great neighborhood with cool restaurants and local dives yet relatively quiet. She made check in easy and was always quick to respond to any questions. I stayed for a month and felt at home.

Semhar's home was perfect. It's clean, cute and in the perfect location. Close to everything including subway and citibikes. Very easy to get to Brooklyn and Chelsea and midtown which is where we needed to go some days during our stay. Semhar was super responsive and checkin was super simple. 

It's small but has incredibly high ceilings and giant windows. Lots of sun but also at the crack of dawn so if that is an issue, bring an eye mask. 

I highly recommend Semhar's place on the Lower East Side.
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Awesome little apartment in Lower East Side. Well-decorated, great location, and Semhar was a fantastic host. Would love to stay there again!

Это был наш первый опыт в использовании Airbnb. Мы очень рады, что остановились у Semhar. Квартира в точности как на фото. Светлая, уютная и очень чистая. Район удобный, до Манхеттена очень легко и быстро добираться на метро. Мы чувствовали себя очень комфортно. Очень советую!!! We had a very nice time in this cozy and clean apartment. Great location!  Semhar  was very responsive, and everything was exactly as advertised. Highly recommend!
Great place, very clean and a good location.
Very cosy place and sparkling clean. Semhar is very kind and helpful young lady. Everything was smooth with comunication wirh her. For NY, great value for money. I recomend the place.
Really great location, everything is so convenient and I love this place.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Born and raised on Long Island, I moved to the city after graduating college and work in Finance. I like to take frequent trips visit friends living around the country and to escape the hustle and bustle of the city. Renting my apartment on Airbnb helps make this affordable for me.

name: Basement Loft in Plateau Mont-Royal
summary: Spacious basement loft in a triplex with a surface of 70 m2 (750 Square-Foot). Retractable Queen size bed and double sofa bed.  The loft is furnished and well equipped (Stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, washing machine and dryer). Bathroom with Jacuzzi. Wi-Fi.  Close to Fullum park (with public swimming pool) and Lafontaine park.  Located on a tranquil Street yet close to Mont-royal Avenue where you can find many restaurants, coffee shops, pubs, disco, supermarkets, and many other services.
space: The loft is really spacious with a very comfortable bathroom that has a relaxing jacuzzi. You have also access to a yard that is very nice in Summer, Spring or Autumn to relax or prepare a barbecue.

It's the location of some famous attractions on Saint Laurent Boulevard, including Schwartz's Deli (famous for its Montreal smoked meat), and a weekend street fair during the summer that sees extreme
neighborhood_overview: The Plateau is characterized by brightly coloured houses, cafés, book shops, and a laissez-faire attitude. It's the location of some famous attractions on Saint Laurent Boulevard, including Schwartz's Deli (famous for its Montreal smoked meat), and a weekend street fair during the summer that sees extremely crowded streets. In 1997, Utne Reader rated it one of the 15 "hippest" neighbourhoods in North America.
transit: Two metro line stations at around 15 minutes walk. 4 buses at a block or 2 books distance. Two of them belong to the 10 minutes lines. You have also bicycle rental points nearby and the bike path is a street away. Montreal is a beautiful city to ride.
house_rules: - Pas de bruit après 23 h

host.host_about:
Hemos viajado por muchos países y nos ha gustado compartir experiencias y utilizar airbnb para alojarnos. Esperamos que ustedes puedan compartir con nosotros bellas experiencias.

Nous avons eu la possibilité de connaître plusieurs pays et de partager des expériences, en utilisant airbnb. Nous attendons que vous puissiez partager avec nous de belles expériences.

reviews.comments:
Fantastic and Stylish loft space with an absolutely ideal location! 
Amazing and helpful hosts who ensured the stay ran without any sort of problems!

Logement agréable et spacieux.
Sandra est facilement joignable.
Je recommande :)
Très bien loges pendant 3 semaine, gustavo et sa famille on été très accueillant et arrangeant. Je recommande !

Le loft de Sandra est spacieux et très bien situé pour visiter Montréal, le quartier est super : pas trop bruyant mais vivant. 
Nous n’avons pas rencontré Sandra en revanche, c’est dommage ..

Sin duda volvería a quedarme en el Loft de Sandra y Gustavo, han sido muy amables y han cuidado cada detalle del lugar, la calle en dónde está situada la casa es muy hermosa, el loft está muy bien cuidado, amplio y tiene hasta jacuzzi, 5 estrellas para ellos, gracias por su hospitalidad.

Very clean and quite place. very nice location with a nice pool close by that my kids just loved. owners were super great and offered nice suggestions of local food and entertainment. would definately stay again.
Spacious place and pleasing to the eye. Good amenities and host was flexible to our needs and kind.
Idéal pour visiter Montréal! Spacieux

Merci à Sandra et Gustavo pour leur gentillesse, leur réceptivité et leur accueil.
Logement très bien situé et il est agréable d'y séjourner.
Clean and tidy place in a great neighborhood. The biggest draw was how close it was to busy streets with bars and restaurants, and beautiful parks.
Nice place, very spacious, older style basement. Very near transit and a busy street with shops and restaurants erc. Sandra was very helpful with any request. Would recommend.
Sandra was very polite and cooperative, and the space was very quaint and comfortable.

Appartement en sous sol, spacieux et équipée (cuisinière, frigo, lave vaisselle, lave linge et sèche linge). Salle de bain avec fenêtre dans la douche donnant sur l’extérieur, sans rideau ni rien. Niveau ustensiles, nous n’avions qu’un verre pour deux, trois tasses. Pas de condiments (ni sel ni poivre), pas de pastilles pour le lave vaisselle, ni pour le lave linge. 
Assez loin du centre, compter une bonne vingtaine de minutes pour rejoindre le metro, une petite demi heure pour Mont-Royal. Arrêts de bus pas loin. Commerces proches aussi, très pratique.
Après le prix est vraiment très attractif !

Great stay in a beautiful area! Perfect for what was needed. Great restos and cafes steps from the apartment. Sandra and her husband were very accommodating to us, making for the perfect short-term stay in Montreal.
Merci à Sandra de nous avoir accueillis chez elle ! Très bon séjour ! Appartement idéalement situé et très fonctionnel
The location is great, the space is perfect.

El alojamiento de Sandra y Gustavo es muy bonito y muy privado.

Mi esposo y yo nos quedamos acá por una semana y fue bastante cómodo. 

Estuvimos durante época de frío y ellos se esforzaron mucho por hacernos sentir cómodos en todo sentido.

Hay muchos lugares cercanos para comer y está muy bien conectado con autobuses, aunque el metro no está del todo cerca.

Hay supermercados y todo lo necesario para una estancia grandiosa.

name: Tree Fern Garden Appt, Private, Peaceful, Roomy
summary: Kitchen  New  with breakfast bar. Dining room,  table chairs  sideboard, placemats Lounge area , Couch , lounge chair , TV.  radio and cd player. Air Conditioning Reverse Cycle. Bathroom , Double Bowl Vanity  and Shower. Seperate Toilet 2 bedrooms with QS beds. Air mattresses on request. Built in robs ,drawers,  Laundry ,washing machine, drier, clothes rack, outside line, Enclosed Backyard. Outdoor table and chairs, sun umbrella , water feature in yard, BBQ available on request
space: No parking on property but we live In a very quiet culdesac with plenty of parking.  There is a nature strip you can drive and park on to left of driveway.
