neighborhood_overview: Very quiet and peaceful. Great outlook to the bush, waterfall in backyard, nice to sit outside at the BBQ table  and listen to the water running, lots of birds around as well If you like bush walking a great area for it. Close to Kuringai National Park, Bobbin Head,  Berowra Waters and Brooklyn on The Hawkesbury. Central coast , 30 to 40 min drive.
notes: Kitchen fully Equiped, underbench oven ,dishwasher,and microwave Tea ,coffee and sugar provided. Detergents for kitchen and Laundry, laundry with long stays is shared please be aware of this . Basics supplied in bathroom , shower wash, shampoo, conditioner and liquid soap on vanity.
transit: Trains 15 min walk. Bus at top of street. Hornsby Westfield 10 min drive Asquith Golf Club 5 mins Alds supermarkret nearby at Mt Kuringai , 15 minute walk, 3 min drive. You can get around to most places by public transport but a car would make it a lot easier.
access: Access to all downstairs area and enclosed backyard, no starirs to access. Laundry facilities are shared , long stays , must be aware of this.
interaction: You may see Ralph or Lucy in the yard gardening , around for any help needed! We live upstairs total seperate access. Laundry access shared with long stays, please be aware of this.
house_rules: No smoking inside , please adhere to this.

host.host_about:
Hi I am semi-retired ,have lived in Australia since 1979 coming from New Zealand, with my husband Ralph and two boys.
We sold a Business within the building industry last year which we ran together for 35 yrs, Ralph being a ex builder and myself out of admin work .
We love sailing, travelling , gardening, swimming, bushwalking, catching up with friends and spending time with our grandchildren also a glass or two of nice wine.
We both love the contact with Air B and B and the people we meet, we just want to be good at it and enjoy the journey.

reviews.comments:
Much better than the photos. Tastefully done up decor. (Even the collection of books)Nice and clean,had everything we needed. 
Lucy and Ralph lovely people,very warm welcome and very friendly. Happy to have found this place. 40 minutes from cbd,great getaway!would love to visit again
Clean, modern, comfortable, lots to see and do in the area. It was a get away from the holidays for me and I loved the change of scenery and alone time.

We stayed at Lucy and Ralph's for a couple if nights with our 2 teenage boys.  The unit was fresh and clean and the beds were amazingly comfortable.   Beautiful garden bush setting and all the amenities were wonderful.   Lucy and Ralph were warm and friendly and extremely helpful.  Thank you

I am reticent to write a good review as I would love to keep this place a secret. But so deserving of praise - Lucy and Ralph have got this SO right. Terrific spacious and well equipped. Private bush setting, modern awesome kitchen. A true home away from home. Have already booked a return trip. So nice to be out of the rat race and relax in a peaceful leafy cul de sac location. Bravo Lucy and Ralph! 10/10.

My second time here now and a LOT more to come. The peace and quiet is excellent as are the amenities and accommodation. Awesome hosts who leave you in peace but are all but a holler away. My preferred stop for time to come. Very spacious, modern, clean and well equipped.
Loved staying here! It was such a beautiful place! Can't wait to visit again
Outstanding value. Spacious, clean and beautiful in a very quiet location. I'm happy to book again in the future. Highly recommended. Thanks again, Lucy.

The place was very organised, clean and beautiful. Our host Lucy was extremely helpful and quick in response. Travellers can stay there as the space is new and close to beautiful sites in Sydney. So, This place is highly recommended for travellers.

I just keep coming back. My favourite of all times. Lucy provides a superb air bnb experience. The peace  privacy and tranquillity combined with an incredibly comfortable and well appointed accommodation makes this feel like your second home.
We absolutely loved Lucy’s place- absolutely beautiful, immaculately clean and set in gorgeous trees with a backyard for the kids! Loved it, and will def be back. Thanks Lucy!

This wonderful hideaway in Mount Colah is the perfect place for a work trip with family! A true home away from home. 
Plenty of living area options so that everyone can find their own space. Great kitchen facilities and dining area to feed the whole family. Teenage children and young children are all well catered for with a wonderful secure private outdoor space - all safety concerns taken care of! Local shops, takeaway, wonderful sports grounds, playgrounds and beautiful bush walks just a minute’s drive away. Close to major shopping centres and public transport. An easy commute to the city yet you can wake up in the tree tops with bird song!!! 
Lucy has thought of everything to make your stay a pleasure. We will be back for sure.

BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT!!! The host, Lucy was so hospitable and thoughtful, although this time we only had a short meet up.  The place is extremely clean and comfortable.  Highly recommend to all of you wanna explore another side of Sydney.

Perfect place for a peaceful getaway!  
We loved the apartment. The light-filled space was clean, beautifully well-equipped with great amenities and plenty of space to relax.  We really enjoyed our time there and would definitely stay again. Thanks Lucy for your hospitality.

This is an outstanding apartment with fabulously comfortable beds, excellent bathroom and fully contained kitchen. One of the best air bnb apartments I have stayed in. The host was great with communication, the key was easy to find and the partner was immaculate! Thankyou. We loved our stay xx
Lucy maintains a wonderful property - clean with everything you need and in a quiet area but not too far from town for a night out. Lovely hosts and highly recommend Tree Fern Garden Apartment.

Immaculate apartment, spacious, clean, pretty outlook. Lucy has thought of every thing. Very well equipped kitchen if you want to cook and a dinning area inside and out. Lovely outdoor area. Comfortable bed.

The apartment was beautiful, spacious, clean and quiet. My only regret was that I didn’t get to spend more time there. Lucy was very thoughtful and considerate. Communication was excellent. I look forward to returning soon.

We had a wonderful stay!  The apartment is clean, modern, open and delightful.  Great kitchen, dining area and yard.  Hosts – Lucy and Ralph – helpful, friendly, welcoming but also unobtrusive.  Pleasant 15 minute walk to train station.  Would definitely try to stay here again.
I absolutely love how spacious the place is.  It's fantastic when travelling with family.

Wonderful clean and beautifully decorated place, well equipped kitchen and plentiful linen. access to backyard with native birds, laundry and washing line. great place for the family to come and spend time in a quiet par of the city. close to a bus stop if you dont want to walk 20min to the station. had trouble getting an uber XL or maxi cab to leave though. we will pason the details of the private maxi cab to Lucy so others can use.
This was very suitable for our needs and we enjoyed our time. Have recommended it to other family members.

An outstanding apartment and very clean, everything you would expect and more, with an excellent bathroom and fully contained kitchen. The hosts are really lovely people. Clear communication and access made very easy. Many thanks!! We'll def be back.
What a great place you both have. Close to the things we need and affordable. Very well appointed and nice to have a place to sit and relax with your own hot drink at the end of a long day.

Lucy and Ralph were both very friendly, nice and easy to talk to. Such a nice, HUGE place to stay, and absolutely loved all the green in the gardens! Was very relaxing coming home to the waterfall going in the pond. 
Thank you so much for having myself and Jade whilst we were training for work. I highly recommend Lucy and Ralph’s home to anyone!
Excellent, clean, everything you need for your stay

Best spot I have stayed in in Sydney.
Well worth it 5 Star renovated accomodation,

I absolutely love staying at Lucy’s. The unit is very clean and comfortable. Lucy and her husband are very kind and thoughtful. They gave me fresh flowers from the garden and remember the little things I like. I look forward to returning soon.

Perfect apartment in a beautiful, quiet, relaxed setting still so handy to all that Sydney has to offer. Lucy and Ralph are the perfect hosts, we were welcomed with lovely, considerate gifts and kind hospitality. The apartment is comfortable, well equipped and private with lovely views and a gorgeous outdoor area that makes the most of the beautiful area. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay Lucy and Ralph!
I just keep coming back. a home away from home. very spacious and well appointed and very quiet environment. A true gem.
The apartment was beautiful, luxurious and cosy.  The beds were very comfortable. Lucy was a great host. She even had plastic plates, cups and a kids stool to make our kids stay easy too.
Ralph and Lucy were excellent hosts. The apartment was light and airy, spacious with an excellent kitchen and had everything we wanted. We will stay again.

Ferntrees is one of the best Airbnb's I have ever had the pleasure to stay at.
Lucy and Ralph were the perfect hosts, friendly and most welcoming.
The apartment was spotless and such a lovely space to stay. Everything I needed was there and loved the yard with the waterfall and visiting birds.
Would highly recommend Ferntrees and will certainly return for future visits.
Thank you Lucy and Ralph and all my best to you both.
Amazing experience! Extremely clean, tidy, welcoming and comfortable. 10 out of 10, do not think twice before booking it.
I just keep on coming back. Always a pleasure to stay. My favourite home away from home.

You can expect a modern comfortable apartment under the hosts home. The apartment is in a quiet street in leafy Mt Colah.
Well supplied with linen, utensils and cutlery. 
The hosts are always available but are happy to leave guests alone if that’s your preference.
Great accommodate, spotlessly clean, well equipped, nicely appointed with a fantastic host.  I heartily recommend this place.
Great Host, great house, great location which is near to a beautiful national park. You will not go wrong with this Airbnb.
can recommend this place.  But you need your own transport

What lovely home. It really felt like a home, instead of a hotel. So many lovely decorator touches, plus books and magazines. Beds and lounges were very comfy. Beautiful outlook with lovely trees and very quiet. Close to national parks and a short drive to shops.

한적하고 조용한 공간
깨끗하게 정리되고 모든 것을 갖춘 공간
즉각적인 호스트의 대응과 따뜻함이 있는
이 공간을 추천합니다

ps 시티로 나가는 길이 조금 멀지만(40분) 
시티 외곽이나 시드니 북쪽 관광을 생각한다면 위치도 지리적으로도 나쁘지 않음
가격대비 흘륭한 숙소

This littlehome away from home is by far the nicest accommodation we have stayed at. So much thought went into making it a lovely time to spend our holiday at.Spotlessly clean,everything you might possibly need is at youre fingertips. Lucy and Ralph are down to earth friendly people and very approachable. If you are lucky enough to stay at this beautiful accommodation Im sure you will have a wonderful experience as my Son Grandaughter and myself did.Great location lovely outdoor area and even fresh milk and coffee available on our arrival. Thankyou Lucy and Ralph we loved our stay and look forward to seeing you again.
The kitchen was great to cook in and was stocked well with the small things that one can sometimes forget when traveling like cooking oil, salt n pepper

Good communication, very clean and contemporary facilities. Private with lovely garden around.  Easy access.  Couldn't have been a better experience.  The hosts went out of their way to make our stay enjoyable.
Fantastic apartment in a quiet neighbourhood, very comfortable place to stay with very friendly and responsive hosts!

Wonderful child friendly accomodation which was amazing clean and immaculate with everything you could think of to need! Beds were super comfy and it was lovely being surrounded by beautiful fauna. Lucy and Ralph were really friendly and made us feel very welcome and at home. Would def stay again at this wonderful home .

Extremely clean apartment inside& out. The hosts Lucy &Ralph are very welcoming.
Beautifully decorated.  A lot of thought has been put into the finer details. There is wifi& (Website hidden by Airbnb) abundance of extra Manchester. Aircon. Anything you need is definitely there. A lovely kitchen with excellent cooking facilities.

Lucy & Ralph were amazing hosts, above and beyond our expectations for our family stay.  Their property is nestled in a beautiful leafy suburb that creates a very relaxing vibe for a holiday, the train station was nice and close which made for an easy commute into the city.  The space is huge for a 2 bedroom and our family of five comfortably fitted, and the laundry facilities were great for catching up on all our children's washing.  We really enjoyed our stay.

Very good experience staying at Lucy’s spacious apartment. There space is clean and tidy with all the necessities we need for a comfortable 16 nights stay. And Lucy and her husband are very nice and considerate, they went extra miles to make us feel at home and comfortable. I recommend her place for future airbnbers.

This unit was private, modern, comfortable and welcoming. More than big enough for our family of four.
Lucy and Ralph are so lovely, there was plenty of tea bags, oil, salt and pepper etc, plus toiletries for those who forget or don’t have what they need.
5 stars from me, it was perfect !

It’s an awesome place more than our expectations. The hospitality, warmth and passion from Lucy and Ralphs impressed us a lot. Frankly speaking, Lucy and Ralphs are the best householder we met in the world. We will choose the same place without any hesitation if we come back to Sydney next time!

We really enjoyed staying here, Lucy took excellent care of us and we enjoyed the peaceful space she provided! The extra amenities were very helpful, including the nice picnic table outside! I would definitely recommend to a friend!

Fantastic accomodation. A home away from home and much better than we expected, with lovely thoughtful touches on arrival. Both Lucy and Ralph are fine people. Very warm, friendly and hospitable. Highly recommend.

name: 4twoLoft at Great Location
summary: Local Accommodation n.º 35666/AL Apartment fully reburbished located a few meters from Batalha square and historical center! The apartment is located in one of the famous zones of the city and closer to important city buildings such Majestic Café, São Bento train station, São João National Theatre, Sé Cathedral and Aliados. The center of this magnificent city it´s just around the corner.
space: "4twoLoft" is located at a few meters from Batalha square and historical city center, on the 2nd floor of a traditional building completely renovated! Its located near all you need to enjoy your stay at the city but also far enough to have a confortable sleep/relax without any disturbs.  "4twoLoft" is perfect for city travelers, well integrated in Porto spirit, modern, practical and comfortable.    "4twoLoft" has a dimension of 50 m2 with one bedroom that offers a confortable king size bed (2.00m x 1.60m). The living room offers a confortable sofa-bed for two persons.  If one of the guests is a baby, we can provide a baby cot (just inform that you need one!  Subject to availability and with a cost of 5€/per night). The kitchen is fully equipped with culinary utensils and all kinds of equipment, including stove with 4 ceramic points, hooven, microwave, refrigerator/freezer, toaster, coffee machine, teapot and a kettle. Basic spices are available to prepare your meals if you prefer to ea

neighborhood_overview: From "4twoLoft" you can walk to the best restaurants, concerts, museums, theatre, shopping zone (Santa Catarina), Majestic Café, Bolhão Market, São Bento train station, Sé Cathedral, Ribeira and Aliados. In the neighborhood you can find supermarkets, restaurants, cofeeshops, historical monuments, concept stores and all services you may need.  You will be staying in a central and emblematic neighborhood of Porto. "4twoLoft" is located in one of the famous zones of the city and closer to important city buildings and the nearest metro station is availabe within 600 meters.
transit: From/to airport you can take the metro (Line E) and leave at 'Bolhão' station. "4twoLoft" is located at 600 meters (or 7 minues walking)  from the metro station. If you reserve "St Ildefonso Loft"  to your stay in Porto, I will send an email with detailed instrucions. Notes: Walking distance Key Points METRO LINE: 'Bolhão' or '24 de Agosto stations– less than 10 min TRAIN STATION: 'São Bento Train station' – less than 10 min POINTS OF INTEREST:  Batalha square – 3 min Santa Catarina street – 3 min / Majestic Café – 4 min / Bolhao Market  - less than 10 min / Lello Bookstore - 12 min / Clérigos Tower - 12 min / Aliados – 10min / Sé Cathedral – 10min / Douro river and 'Ribeira' – less than 20 min walking or 9 min to the Funicular where you can travel until Ribeira /  NIGHTLIFE: less than 15 min
interaction: Please note that "4twoLoft" does not offers a reception, therefore an estimated arrival time must be provided! At check-in we will be waiting to welcome you. We will present the apartment facilities as well some important tips about our city so you can enjoy all the city's potential. If you have any question please feel free to contact us, we will be happy to answer. We will be always acessible by phone and email.
house_rules: - There is no big rules! We dedicate our effort to make "4twoLoft" cosy to host our guests! Please treat the apartment as your own!   - Please respect the neighbors: no noise allowed before 09am or 10pm.   - The person that made the reservation will be responsible for any issues during the stay. The apartment can only be occupied for the number of persons identified on the reserve. - Smoking is not allowed! - Pets are not allowed!! - Please be aware that since 2015 Portugal has more strictly enforced a long-standing law requiring anyone providing paid holiday accommodation to record the entry, exit, and identification details of all non-Portuguese nationals who use that accommodation. This law has been brought into force in Portugal and most other EU countries at some point since the gradual implementation of the 1990 Schengen Agreement that aims to stop human trafficking and other illegal practices. Therefore, for each guest, a valid ID or passport must be showed and some data such na

reviews.comments: Un logement idéal pour quelques jours à Porto (ou plus!): tout est faisable à pieds, l’hôte est hyper réactif, le loft est calme et spacieux. On a même le droit à un panier ptit dej pour le 1er matin! La boulangerie du bas propose des très bons ptits dejs pour les matins suivants. Je recommande à 100%!!
Obrigado pela simpatia e disponibilidade. O apartamento é muito bom e tudo estava perfeito.

Très bel appartement, propre, bien équipé et bien situé. Super accueil de José, très disponible et de bons conseils pour notre séjour. Merci pour tout !
Je recommande vivement !

José nous a réservé un excellent accueil, il nous avait déjà envoyé bon nombre de renseignements très utiles pour notre séjour. Il nous attendait aux portes de son appartement qui correspond parfaitement aux photos du site. Tout était très propre, très bien aménagé, très bien équipé. Sa petite attention pour nous offrir un petit déjeuner nous a beaucoup touchés.  Qui plus est, son français est impeccable ! Merci pour tout José !
Logement bien situé, très propre et joliment décoré. Nous le recommandons sans problèmes
Adequate housing in a central location. José was a responsive and warm host.
Just great .

Definitely a recommendation! 
About the host:
-Jose is very nice and pleasant 
-answers very quick if you have questions
-he had a lot of usefull tips for us when we arrived
-very flexible check-in and -out times
-even a little breakfast waited for us after the check in
About the apartment:
-very central
-very clean
-near to the metro station 
-in-walking-distance to the city center
-nearby grocery, bakery store and everything else you need
-nearby parking area if you have a rental
I will definetly stay here again if i will come back to the wunderfull Porto again!
Super bem localizado, limpo, estiloso e bem aconchegante, adoramos!!!
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour, le logement est comme neuf, propre et bien placé, je le recommande vivement.
Excelente localização, ótimo espaço.

Cet appart est parfaitement situé au coeur de Porto, toutes les attractions se font facilement a pied. Rien ne manque a ce splendide appart, tout a bien été pensé! José est très disponible et ses conseils sont précieux: manger local à bon prix, détails importants a propos du Porto, etc. Les infos qu’il donne sont claires, autant avant le voyage pour la reservation du train que pour se rendre a l’appart le jour de l’arrivée ou
même pendant le séjour... José, you’re amazing! Obligado!!!

José and Diana were top notch hosts. They provide everything you need, and more. They had a breakfast hamper ready, a guidebook they’d created and many tips! Really cool flat too, very centric. Porto is worth another visit as well!

It was a great location: close to the main streets but on a quiet streeet. It was a good size and a comfortable space. Jose met us as arranged and he had lots of useful advice. It was a lovely gesture to leave items for our first breakfast.

L’appartement de José est très bien situé pour découvrir Porto. Il est très agréable et bien équipé, de plus très calme.
Séjour des plus agréables.
Merci à José pour sa réactivité et son accueil
Muy buena ubicación. El apartamento inmejorable, a destacar la luz con sus grandes ventanales y la limpieza. Mucho gusto decorándolo. Todo genial. Muy recomendable.

Appartement idéalement placé à Porto 
José est très attentionné et donne de très bons conseils

We had a perfect experience staying at Jose’s apartment. He was nice, helpful and the place itself was perfection! I highly recommend. Don’t miss out on this spot. Great location and so comfortable and pleasant!

Nuestra estancia en Porto ha sido inmejorable. El apartamento localizado en el centro de la ciudad, nos permitía ir a todos los sitios caminando. La estación de metro y tren a pocos minutos del apartamento. Supermercados y restaurantes a menos de un minuto. José nos trató de maravilla, hasta nos reservó taxi para el día de salida ya que marchamos de madrugada. No hemos tenido ni una sola queja. Íbamos con dos niñ@s y hemos estado muy cómodos. Todo perfecto. Gracias José

Josè was really helpful and friendly. He gives us all the infos we need and a lot of interesting suggestions! His flat is perfect both for the position, central, close to the metro and to the attractive points of the city, and for the cleanliness, and for all the comforts it has. Our staying in Porto was really amazing. Thanks Josè!
Appartamento molto centrale , la posizione è ottima,  non si può chiedere di più. Molto pulito , accoglienza ottima . Grazie per avermi ospitato nel tuo appartamento.

Jose’s place was perfect - great location and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Jose was a great host - very responsive and hospitable, personally checked us in and gave us a lot of great tips and recommendations. We have a 3 year old and he even gave us a a crib and also booked us a cab for us for our early morning flight. We enjoyed our short trip to Porto and hope to come back again. Highly recommend this place!
Vraiment tout a été conforme à nos attentes. Merci à notre hôte pour l’accueil et les informations transmises qui nous ont permis de passer un agréable séjour à Porto.

Appartement parfait pour passer quelques jours à Porto. Très bien situé, possibilité de tout faire à pied. José à été très disponible lors de notre séjour. Nous recommandons fortement cet appartement.
Absolutamente recomendable!
El alojamiento perfecto, equipado con todo lo necesario, la ubicación muy próxima a todos los lugares de interés y la atención de José muy buena, sin duda lo recomendamos.
Super amazing location, bright, stylish. Both the bed and sofa bed are comfortable! Recommend.

I would recommend this air b n b for a group of 2-3 people travelling to Porto. José was a wonderful host. He communicated well with us prior to arrival and met us promptly at check in. The flat is centrally located and stocked with everything you will need for your stay. José had a full list of recommendations for food, drink and attractions.
Jose is such a great host with excellent communication. It’s located very center of Porto and easy to access key sightseeing area. I definitely would recommend to stay Jose’s apartment.

Jose was an excellent host. He showed us everywhere to go, how to get there and extra little tips. His initiation for Porto set the pace for us to enjoy and live this city in our 4 days there. Amazing location and the hintful advice from where to eat and where to drink and visit was exceptional.  We loved Porto and it has become one of our favourite holiday destinations.

Loved this apartment for the light,bright and quiet well thought out space. Loved the location as it was walkable to literally everything and had great local restaurants. Jose was fantastic with his welcome and local tips. A great stay obrigado!!! We will be back !!
A great pied-a-terre and a thoughtful host.
We really enjoyed our stay in Porto and the apartment was very well located.

The appartment in Porto was great. It is very central, walking distance from the Old City and from the Monuments. Porto has a great feel to it. The flat was very clean, comfortable and spacious. Jose Greeted us as we arrived and explained everything about the flat and area. I would recommend  this flat if you want to spend some time in this beautiful city.
Jose was a great host, very available and responsive! The apartment was very clean and functional. I recommend!
Excellent! José s flat is comfortable and perfectly situated to discover the city easily. Our host was so efficient and helpful. A place we recommend without any hesitation!
Très bon séjour dans l'appartement de José. Proche de tous les centres d'intérêts et restaurants.

Super endroit, très propre et bien situé. 
Accueil exceptionnel.

Desde o ínicio a comunicação com José foi ótima. Me ajudou com diversas dicas. Sua hospitalidade e presteza no check in fizeram a diferença. Além dos mimos deixados por ele para nós, após uma longa viagem.
Recomendo o apartamento e voltaria a me hospedar lá sem dúvidas!
Increible lugar! José fue el perfecto host, nos ayudo muchísimo

Porto was such a lovely city to visit, and being within walking distance from the main attractions made our stay at this airbnb very enjoyable. From the beginning of the trip, you will find that the location is great, the place is beautiful, and the host is very kind and helpful!
El trato y comunicación con José fue excelente, él fue muy atento con nosotros en todo momento. El piso bien ubicado,  bonito y muy limpio. Recomendable para quien quiera visitar Oporto.
Very comfortable appartment
A great place in a perfect location! Jose is a wonderful host, the apartment is very clean and has all the equipment you could need
Heel proper en ruim appartement op een goede locatie! José is een super gastheer!
Was great!

The apartment was in a very central location so super easy for exploring Porto. Jose was a great host and gave great tips on the city. Lovely and clean too! My only downside was that you could hear the neighbours coming home quite late at night which woke me up a few times. However it was a Fri/Sat night so this was expected! It wouldn’t stop me visiting again

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour. L’appartement est très bien situé au calme et proche de tout. Il est propre et bien équipé.
L’accueil de José est super et ses conseils pour les visites sont top.

Jose was a good host and the apartment is centrally located near the main shopping street in Porto  and pretty much walking distance to all main tourist attractions. Very good bakery nearby as well. The place was clean, big, and perfect for 2 people.

José’s apartment was stylish, modern and comfortable.  Great location, close to the Douro River with a lot of shops and restaurants near by.  Only downside is that there is no AC but a fan was provided which helped with the heat. 
José was very friendly and helpful with his tips and recommendations. Would definitely recommend staying here!
A nice well equipped apartment in ideal location close to shops, restaurants, metro and train station. Jose was very welcoming.
Localização 5 estrelas. Dá para visitar a cidade a pé mas com bons restaurantes também por perto. Edifício bem reciperado.
José is a great host. He is very polity, we had a warm welcome. The apartment has everything you need and there is plenty of space! The location is perfect.

Hemos tenido una fantástica estancia. El apartamento es muy cómodo y está muy bien ubicado. Lugar céntrico y calle tranquila. Se puede ir caminando a muchos lugares de interés. Muy bien comunicado con transporte público. José es muy buen anfitrión y responde enseguida a cualquier consulta. Muy recomendable

It was very cozy and lovely place for traveller.
Clean and great location to go any where you want. Also luggage storage is next to apartment. 

If i come back porto again, i want to stay this place.
And host was so kind:)

Thank you so much!
Séjour très agréable , José est très professionnel . L appartement est très bien situé .

J’ai adoré mon séjour.L’appartement est très bien situé. Il y a une rue piétonnière devant l’appartement mais la nuit c’est très tranquille et on dors bien.Il y une petite épicerie à 2 mins à pieds et beaucoup de restaurants.
Je recommande fortement. La seule chose qui nous a déplus ce sont les oreillers qui étaient un peu trop grosses mais le matelas et la literie très confortable.
The location of the apartment is perfect! We had a great time and will come back soon! José was very nice and let us check in earlier.

El piso de José es GENIAL.
Tal y como aparece en las fotos. Totalmente equipado, limpio, moderno y muy bien decorado. Localización inmejorable.
José nos recibió en el apartamento y nos dio información sobre la ciudad. Respondió a todos nuestros mensajes al momento.
Nos encontramos un desayuno completo de regalo.
Edificio moderno en una calle tranquila. Cama enorme y cómoda. 
Recomendamos sin duda este piso para visitar Oporto. Parking justo al lado

Great apartment well located. Everything is walking distance. Jose was very flexible with our arriving time. The flat is super decorated, and very comfortable. Everything was perfect, except the weather. But we really enjoyed our time in Porto.

Amazing location. Jose was so kind on check in and keeping in touch.
Apartment was clean, stylish and comfortable, a real home in Porto!
una estancia maravillosa

Couple in our 20s, stayed from 25th - 29th November. 
Very cosy apartment despite having cold temperatures outside. All amenities provided (with no hidden costs) and well equipped kitchen. Great location! The apartment is the perfect size for two people. It is also very clean. José is very friendly and he gave us some great tips and locations where we should visit. Would stay again!
we had a great time. would recomend the apartment to my friends. great host.

It was perfecy place to enjoy Porto.
The host accepted early check-in and welcomed us. 
Room condition is as nice as the pictures.
He replied messages very quickly so I don’t have troubles in Porto.
Все было супер. Квартира очень удобно расположена относительно вокзала. Очень удобно ездить по пригородам Порту. Рядом есть все необходимое. Квартира в точности как на фото.
Jose est un host très réactif et sympa et son appartement est top. Très propre, bien situé et bien équipé !
Super séjour, appartement et hôte très accueillant ! Nous reviendrons pour un prochain séjour à porto !

Very cute apartment in an excellent location! Much bigger than we expected and with so many amenities. José and his girlfriend were helpful, kind and responsive. Some of the best hosts we’ve ever had! 
One note, the building is a little loud (thin walls) so I’d bring earplugs if you are a light sleeper. Other than that, everything was great!!

name: Plaza two bedroom apartment
summary: Plaza two bedroom apartment
space: Apartment located close to Plaça Espanya and Sants station. The building is new and has elevator, communal terrace, parking and reception. In the main room there is a lot of natural light thanks to its large windows. There you will find the living room, which has a convertible sofa in a double bed, satellite TV and DVD; the dining room, which has a table and chairs and an open concept kitchen equipped with modern house appliances and utensils so you can prepare your meals at home. The bathroom has a shower and you will find a hairdryer. The master bedroom has a double bed, ample closets and a safety box. It also enjoys natural light. The second bedroom has one single bed. Tourist registration code: HUTB-010439

There is parking in the same building. You can book a seat for 15EUR / night. There is an elevator. We have a recep
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a quiet street. In the neighborhood you will find all the products that you will need during your stay. There are multiple local and international shops, and 2 minutes from the apartment you will have the Mercat de Hostafrancs where they sell fresh ingredients. Nearby is Plaça Espanya, where you can visit The Park Miró or Las Arenas, an old bullring turned into a shopping center, and Montjuïc, where you can have a walk through its parks and gardens, enjoy views of the city and go to the spectacle of the Magic Fountains. In Plaça Espanya there is a venue of the Fira de Barcelona.
notes: One set of linen and towels is provided at the beginning of the stay. We will offer you a basic welcome pack of basic products. You can acquire the rest that you may need in the shops available nearby. For long stays (more than 7 nights) an extra cleaning service will be done for free.
transit: The nearest metro line is Hostafrancs (L1 red) which will take you to the historic center of the city in 10 minutes. Sants train station is also nearby, where you will have access to all Renfe's lines that pass through Barcelona. Also close you will find Plaça Espanya, where there are two metro lines (L1 - red and L3 - green), the FGC that will take you to the Fira de Barcelona Gran Via II venue, the Aerobus stop, which connects directly with the airport, and other bus lines.
access: The building has a communal terrace on the roof top with loungers and tables where you can enjoy views of the neighborhood and Montjuïc. There is parking in the same building. You can book a seat for 15EUR / night. There is an elevator. We have a reception located at the entrance.
interaction: Before your stay, if you need any information to plan your trip, you can send us an e-mail or call us by phone. During your stay, you can stop by the reception during opening hours or call our phone if you have an emergency and we are not there.
house_rules: In compliance with current local regulations, the applicable taxes on stays in tourist apartments will be collected (2,48EUR / person / night). Guests under the age of 17 are exempt from paying this rate. Other residents are living in the building, so parties and noises at night are totally forbidden.

name: Newly Reno’d Chic Quiet Exec 1BR
summary: New York City living at its finest. A warm, cozy, and colorful respite from the city streets. A walk-up three flights above street level, the unit consists of two rooms with totally updated electrical and FIOS WiFi.  We're in the heart of Alphabet City's gardens, including 6 b/c, la plaza cultural and C Garden. The best shops, restaurants and art galleries are all within easy walking distance.
space: Surrounded by some of Manhattan's best eateries, boutiques and nightlife, this apartment features newly renovated modern decor -- a serene setting in the heart of NYC's hottest neighborhood, with exceptional restaurants, bars, and shopping, as well as a load of coffee houses and cafes. I live in this apartment thus your booking is secure provided you comply with house rules. You are renting the entire apartment space for your exclusive use. No need to ask if the dates you want are available because you can't make a reservation request if your dates are not available. Unit is a three-flights walk-up. CHECK IN AND CHECK OUT: Check in is at 4pm and check out is at 11am. You'll get an email request to set up access. You are not checked out until you return your keys. Late/early check-in/out may be possible for a $35 fee, ask when you book.   Free wi-fi, near great restaurants, 3 flight walk up, lots of light and windows and a courtyard view = quiet! Everything is up to code yet the rooms r
description: New York City living at its finest. A warm, cozy, and colorful respite from the city streets. A walk-up three flights above street level, the unit consists of two rooms with totally updated electrical and FIOS WiFi.  We're in the heart of Alphabet City's gardens, including 6 b/c, la plaza cultural and C Garden. The best shops, restaurants and art galleries are all within easy walking distance. Surrounded by some of Manhattan's best eateries, boutiques and nightlife, this apartment features newly renovated modern decor -- a serene setting in the heart of NYC's hottest neighborhood, with exceptional restaurants, bars, and shopping, as well as a load of coffee houses and cafes. I live in this apartment thus your booking is secure provided you comply with house rules. You are renting the entire apartment space for your exclusive use. No need to ask if the dates you want are available because you can't make a reservation request if your dates are not available. Unit is a three-flights walk-
neighborhood_overview: Alphabet City is the best. Great shops, bars, restaurants with ample transit, yet enough off center that it's not overrun by students and tourists. It's a real neighborhood.
notes: KEY PICK  UP & RETURN: When you book you'll get an email to set up key access at City Co-Pilot, 166 Allen Street. Failure to return keys to City Co-Pilot will result in forfeiture of deposit. If you lose keys during your stay, it's $50 to replace the keys plus courier fees.  ADDITIONAL GUESTS/BED: Two guests using one bed are covered by the nightly fee. If you have 2 guests needing 2 beds, there is a $35 for linen set up. For 3 guests there's an additional nightly fee. The number of guests/beds must be clearly indicated when you book. EARLY CHECK IN/LATE CHECK OUT: IF Your request can be accommodated, the fee is $35 per early or late.
transit: Subways a 15 minute walk in either direction, and the busses stop half a block away. There is also a CitiBike stand a block over.
access: You get WiFi and a TV with basic cable. Fresh linens are provided. There's a corner bodgea for anything more, and a laundromat a block away. Areas for guest storage are marked, and guests are not to disturb other closets and drawers. If it's hard to reach or covered, it's not for guest use. Guests are not to disturb my neighbors in the building under ANY circumstances, this includes asking for directions or assistance of any kind.
interaction: I am always available by text for any questions during your stay. I will let you know if I need to get something out of my apartment. Guests are not to disturb my neighbors in the building under ANY circumstances, this includes asking for directions or assistance of any kind. The neighbors are not a concierge service, but private people living in their home. Thank you.
house_rules: This is a self check-in. Keys may be picked up anytime after 3pm on check-in day, and must be returned by 11 am at checkout. You'll get an email from Keycafe to set up access. The lockbox is at 32 Avenue B, NY, NY; the sign reads “Benjamin’s Deli,” but on Maps it’s El Hasel Grocery. Keys must be returned and deposited to the Keycafe or you forfeit your deposit. No loud music. Quiet activities only before 9am and after 10pm. The community in this building is small and will inform me of any disturbance.  No matches, lighters, candles/incense/sage whatsoever. Shoes should be removed upon entering the property. Dispose of all food and trash when you leave. The fee for lost keys is $50 to replace the keys. If you need the spare bed made the fee is $35. Fees will be added to your booking. Please remember you are a guest in my home. You are not a tenant, and you are not subletting.

host.host_about:
Hi there, and welcome! We've traveled throughout Europe and Asia and love having guests from all over the world, because we live in the best neighborhood in NYC! 

We travel frequently, and love sharing our flat. Our style is minimal, but comfy. We also like things tranquil. The environment reflects that -- colorful, yet off of a courtyard so it's quiet.

We've not yet made it to New Zealand. Very keen to!

reviews.comments:
I really enjoyed our stay at Lisa's apt. It was clean, comfortable and cute. It is in a great neighborhood with lots of yummy food, cool bars. The Lower East Side, East Village and Nolita are easy walking distance. If you are looking for a hip, vibrant area to stay in while in NYC, this is it. Lisa was great . I would definitely recommend Lisa's apt!
    
Nguyet T.
This was a fantastic stay. Lisa is a very accommodating and friendly person and made us feel most welcome. Thank you!

Lisa was very easy to work with. This was my first experience with airbnb and it was excellent. Lisa accommodated our arrival and departure situation and made us feel welcome. The building felt secure and modern. The apartment is petite but well designed. A large bathroom, comfortable bed, new kitchen, bright living room. Very quiet. Very clean. Very nicely decorated. The neighborhood has everything you need. The subway is about 8 interesting blocks away. We look forward to our next trip - and our next stay in the East Village!
The host canceled my reservation 5 days before arrival.
Perfect apartment; very clean and quiet!  It smelled great too!  Lisa was nice and welcoming.

Our stay in Lisa's 1BR was great. It's perfectly located in the East Village, with great restaurants, cafés, bars and shops of countless permutations just 'round the corner! The apartment is very clean, nicely decorated and comfy, and Lisa is a super friendly host, full of well-informed suggestions of places to go and things to do. Would definitely stay there again!

It was my first time in NYC and my first time using airbnb, and it couldn't be better ! Lisa's place is in an excellent location in the East Village neighborhood (short walk to Nolita and Lower East Side). We were a hort walk away from the train stations to get us to all the attractions we wanted to see.  Her place was very clean and cozy. She provided me and my girlfriend with clean towels and clean sheets for the bed. Lisa was very friendly and responsive. I would definitely stay here again!

Loved having a space to call my own in the Village. The apartment was exactly as advertised. The building was quiet (there's a tenant with a dog across the hall, but the dog rarely barked), the street is quiet, but you're just a few minutes from St. Mark's Place, with every kind of restaurant you could want. If you stay, be sure to try the Cuban place nearby, Casa Adele. I had a great lunch there my first day in the 'hood.

For a first time in NYC, the East village is a perfect location, Lisa's place is for sure part of our great experience in NYC. 10 mn away from the metro and 8 mn from great bars. Definitely hard to do better.

Lisa's flat is exactly as showed as on the pictures. Actually you do not see very well the shower on the Airbnb website. And It is a great one! The flat was super clean and definitely big enough for 2 people. The all building is vey welcoming also as is Lisa's flat

To get all the rest of NYC, you just pick and choose. For my first experience with Airbnb it is a full succes

Lisa was a great hostess, and her place is exactly as advertised, plus quiet, clean and in an awesome neighborhood. I did find it a bit far from the subway, but if you don't mind walking that's ok. I recommend!

Lisa's apartment has been recently renovated with a full kitchen, comfortable bed and great bathroom. The location is excellent. Just a 10 minute walk to Nolita and Soho. Very quiet. The only downside was that it was unseasonably hot while we where there and  the air conditioner  beside the bed was really noisy.

Lisa's flat was just perfect for our stay in the Big Apple. Ideally located in the East Village, in a quiet street not far at all from all the night buzz...Since it's fully equipped, you can even enjoy cooking at home if you want but who would do that when you have so many good and cheap places to eat in the area, right ?! Even if Lisa could not be home when we arrived, everything was perfectly organized at our arrival (keys, instructions, etc.). We would definitely go back to this place, but hoping to meet Lisa this time :-)

While Lisa's place was nicely renovated and tidy, we didn't feel as though it was incredibly clean. 
The bed is definitely NOT a queen, and while it is comfortable it is only a double and definitely too small for a couple. 
The location is nice and quite, but be prepared to walk ALOT as it's a good 20 minute walk to the closest subway, not ideal! 
Lisa was lovely to liaise with in the lead up to our visit, but we were disappointed we were not able to leave our bags in the apartment until 3pm on the day we were due to leave, despite correspondence from Lisa saying this may be possible.

The place is great and exactly like the photos!  Lisa was great about coordinating with us to get us the keys (we had a late flight in).  The place is cozy and a perfect fit for two travelers.  I would definitely stay there again!
Very beautiful place and conveniently located. I'd stay here again!

I had a great experience staying at Lisa's place for two nights. It's very spacious for an apartment in the LES and the space is used wisely. I liked the southeast Asian and Indian inspired decor as well. I would definitely recommend staying here. It's a great location for exploring all of the non touristy parts of the lower east side.

Lisa's apartment was perfect for us, a nice walk to the recital we were attending at NYU.  A great location in general ( close to the best bagels I have ever eaten!), as well as clean and comfortable. I would recommend it!
Lisa was a great host. Perfect size apt for a couple, comfortable and very clean. Nice vibe in the building. We would definitely stay there again. Thx!

Great moment in Big Apple ! The appartment is well located, near a bus line that brings you to Union Square in less than 10 minutes ! 
Between Avenue D (supermarkets, fast foods) and Avenue C (Pubs and restaurants) it´s a good choice to stay in Manhattan !

What a fabulous place!  My husband and I loved Lisa's East Village apartment.  It is in the perfect New York neighbourhood within easy walking distance to heaps of restaurants, bars, and public transport.  It took us about 10mins to walk to the subway but that just meant we could check out more of the neighbourhood.  Lisa was an excellent host- she answered all our questions quickly, key pickup/drop off was easy and she was non-intrusive but contactable if need be.  We are so happy that we came across her apartment and will return!

We had a great stay at Lisa's apartment. Lisa was quick with communication and the check-in was easy. It was as per the photos and very clean. It's also quiet at night despite being close to so many bars and restaurants. It's a 15-minute walk to either 1 Av or 2 Av subway stations but that wasn't an issue for us. The air conditioning and fans also worked well. All in all, very good.
Great location (love the neighborhood!), cute apartment and Lisa is great and very helpful. Would recommend this place to other people. Thanks Lisa!

Cosy little apartment in a great location. Fantastic dining and nightlife options within easy walking distance. It is located on 4th floor so carrying luggage up/down stairs isn't easy, but it does help burn off all the New York pizza! We enjoyed our stay, thank you Lisa.

Place was very clean and the location was great. Liza was very easy to get in touch with and checking in and out was very easy. Can't wait to come back and stay again as we just didn't have time to see it all.

Great place and great location. We loved the local character of the neighborhood. It is a bit far from the train but using the local buses was very convenient. Lisa was very helpful and warm. Although we arrived early, she let us into her apartment 30 minutes earlier than check-in time. Thanks Lisa!
Super clean apt, good location,good communication. Try abc beer co.

I spent a month in Lisa's tidy and comfortable apartment in ABC city.  Lisa was a gracious and accommodating host.  I appreciate very much that she allowed me to pick up the keys one day prior to check-in.  

As an ex-New Yorker, there are a few things I'm already prepared for, but there are a few that I wish other reviewers would list:

Is it quiet?  Yes, very much so, especially back where the bed is located.  Also the neighbors are very considerate in keeping to the quiet hours. 
Is the bed comfortable?  The Murphy bed is surprisingly so, although a lot of movement may make the panels rattle a bit.
How is the water pressure in the shower?  Good.  Water temperature stayed constant.
Is it a walk-up?  yes, be prepared to walk up a few flights of stairs.  I didn't mind and this is very typical for NYC.
How is the neighborhood?  I bit more remote then usual, but safe and accessible. Lots of places to go eat and have a drink nearby.  I also +1 the recommendation for ABC Beer Co.  
Was there storage space?  yes, Lisa made a closet, a large drawer in a chest of drawers, shelves in the pantry available, and cleared out the bathroom cabinet.  Plenty of room for my needs.
All in all a good experience.

The apartment was great!! It was well located, very nicely decorated, calm, zen environment and cozy! Also very clean! Lisa is a very good host,she was available! 
We really appreciated that there was a hair dryer, and towel in the bathroom;) 
Just perfect! thanks Lisa ;)

Lisa's apartment is nestled on a quiet street in the East Village. She graciously let us check in a bit early and was very easy to communicate with. Her apartment was very clean and perfectly suited for two!

My experience in Lisa's apartment was amazing. I loved living there! Everything works properly and the area is perfect to live. It's quiet but also you have the opportunity to walk around and enjoy the coffee shops and bars! East Village is the greatest place to live or be a tourist!
Lisa is a wonderful host!

Lisa's place was convenient and comfortable. Everything worked well - aircon, wifi etc. etc. The subway is about 15 minutes walk away, but I enjoyed exploring the area. Especially loved Animals Food and Drink on E9th street - highly recommend the sandwiches! Lisa was really easy to contact, and always responded quickly to any messages, the key handover went smoothy, and Lisa kindly let me check out late morning. An excellent stay. Thanks Lisa.

We loved the apartment. It was close to bars and cafés and the apartment and the whole building was clearly well looked after. It felt spacious, with a separate living area, although the bed may feel a bit cramped if you're used to space. Lisa left us a key at a local grocery and was available to answer questions through our stay. The 3 flights of stairs don't feel that bad, but the nearest subway is 15-20 mins away. Don't feel afraid to use the city's bike hire scheme which is available around the corner!

My husband and I were very excited for our vacation in NYC and also very excited as first time users of Airbnb. We heard such great things! However, Lisa had a cold demeanor upon meeting with her, she wasn't very friendly as we anticipated.  And then she told us not to snoop through her things.  I think we knew that from the get go, but it was just interesting that she told us that.  It seemed like she was in a hurry, so just left the keys and went out the door.  

We questioned the apartment at first glanced as well, but we wanted to give the experience a chance based on all the great reviews we read.  FYI - the pictures on Airbnb did not showcase the apartment's realistic look. The pictures were obviously enhanced by a professional camera and usage of lighting because half of the apartment is actually dark and dingy. We chose to stay here because we're huge fanatics of natural light, which disappointed us.  The apartment building smelled of really strong incense if you're into that kind of thing, but it just became bothersome after a while.  The bed was not comfortable to sleep on and we woke up several times during the night because it dipped in the center that caused me and my husband to roll inwards.  Super uncomfy! 

The ad states that this apartment is located in one of the up and coming areas, which was a cool area, however it fails to mention that its location is on a block where it's pretty sketchy and unsafe to walk around in the late hours especially when coming home late at night.  Not our cup of tea!

Finally, we decided to hold our baggages until 4pm for an additional cost of $35.  There was a breakdown in communication of when to leave the money so Lisa decides to call us SCREAMING and YELLING at my husband for not leaving the money even when he sincerely apologized for misunderstanding over and over.  She goes on and on and then has the audacity to hang up on us and rudely texted us to grab our bags and just leave.  This is not the proper way to treat anyone for any reason!  Especially when we had been good guests for the entire duration of our stay.  It's not polite, unprofessional, and just not right to scream at people when there's a problem.  So be aware everyone! 

Our recommendation, DO NOT deal with a host like Lisa who is unfriendly and disrespectful.  She ruined our last day of vacation and left a very bad taste of our Airbnb experience.  I most definitely recommend that you spend a few more bucks for a much better apartment, area, and host.

STAY AWAY! :(

I live in Manhattan and stayed at Lisa's apartment for a weekend with my mother who was visiting from out of town.  Lisa's place was just what we were looking for.  It was very clean, newly renovated and updated, and nicely furnished.  She has really made the most of the limited space in an NYC studio apartment and it feels homey and comfortable.  One of the reasons I initially chose her apartment for the weekend was the location- it's a short walk from the many great bars and restaurants that Alphabet City, the Lower East Side and the East Village have to offer.  My mom and I had a great weekend strolling through these neighborhoods.  The only drawback is that the only easily accessible subway is the 2nd Ave F.  If you want to go somewhere that isn't accessible from the F line, some more walking/transferring/cabbing/Ubering is required.  Overall, I would highly recommend Lisa's apartment for a fun, unique downtown experience in NYC.

Lisa's apartment was exactly how it was pictured and described, very comfortable, clean, nice furnishings, great layout and close enough to restaurants, bars, subway etc. Loved the bed area was totally dark for sleeping in...we stayed on CA time, up at 11AM and in bed at 1AM! We were rarely at the apt but a couple simple things made it perfect, extra hot water (you could burn yourself!), great water pressure, natural sunlight, fresh air, super clean with fresh towels and sheets! We would definitely stay at Lisa's the next time we are in NYC!  Thanks for hosting us in your home!
Lisa's place was excellent. Great location in east village. Would recommend highly. Thank you for allowing us to stay.

Everything was perfect, Lisa apartment and how she has arranged everything, totally uncomplicated. We could contact Lisa for questions during our stay. The apartment has a great location, very close to nice bars and restaurants. It was also very clean and had enough space for two person. All in all I would highly recommend this for your stay in NY. Thanks a lot Lisa!

Lisa's flat is great, exactly as showed in the pictures and in a great location close to a lot of nice bars and restaurants of the East Village. It's cosy, clean and very pretty. Lisa has been great in organising the key delivery and drop out: even when plans changed, she notified us in a timely manner and with a solution ready so we didn't have to think but just to follow easy instructions. 
Thanks Lisa for your amazing hospitality!

5/5 for sure.  Lisa was great to work with, she was quick to respond with useful information.

As for the apartment, it was as advertised.  Comfortable, quiet, clean, and in a great location.  

We would definitely recommend Lisa's place to friends who are traveling to NYC in the future.

The apartment was clean, inviting, and very comfortable. The location was perfect with two bus stops at either end of the street as well as supermarkets, restaurants and bars. The area is very safe - I would recommend Lisa's apartment to anyone.

Lisa's appartment was perfect, very well situated, close to a lot of restaurants and nice cafes of the east Village. There is a nice square close to the place. The appartment was as on the photos. Lisa was very helpful and nice. Thank you, Lisa!

Stayed as Lisa's apartment for 4 weeks. Great & safe location with subways within 15 min walk. Good sized apartment - looks exactly like the photos. Lisa was also very accomodating by allowing us to check in early and check out late. Would definitely stay here again!

We had a great time staying at Lisa's in the East Village. Well located, everything is like the pictures, easy communication. All in all a perfect Airbnb experience, with zero problems or surprises. Thanks, Lisa!

we had a great stay in Lisa's apartment. The place is clean and very well located with street parking available right in front. Lisa is a great host and was very kind for answering the questions about the neighborhood. We highly recommend this place for your trip in New York city!

The place was as described, the location was borderline alphabet city/LES but quite acceptable. Neighborhood was pretty decent. If you like motorcycles there is a sweet repair shop on same street that has a great line up of old triumphs and what not in front. We did have a slight problem with the cleanliness. The apt itself was clean (bathroom etc) but the sheets had hair on them and there was lipstick on the towels in the bathroom. We found fresh sheets in the commode and there were fresh towels on the bed. We ended up having to use t-shirts as pillow covers. Lisa was very apologetic but getting clean pillow covers ended up being a bit of a hassle as she was out of town and her handyman had non specific hours.  All in all place was OK, but I feel like maybe we should have just stayed in a hotel. Lisa did offer to pay for linens we bought etc and was concerned about the whole ordeal.

Great stay! I live in Brooklyn and needed to move out for several days during my home renovation. We chose Lisa's place because of its great central location near some of my favorite bars and restaurants, and walking distance to neighborhoods like Union Square and Soho (shopping, movie theaters, parks). During my down time, her apartment was a cozy, quiet place to relax-- clean, with a bright and comfortable sitting area. Ceiling fans and AC kept the apartment cool during a particularly hot week. Be aware that this apartment is best for someone active-- it's up four steep flights of stairs. On the plus side, there are tons of good food options and convenient stores within 2-3 blocks walk (I loved Croissanteria for breakfast!)

Lisa has created a wonderful home in a great neighborhood. I really enjoy it when I get to feel the personality and learn more while I stay at someone's place. Lisa is a great host, very organized and welcoming. No surprises or glitches, great experience.

The communication was swift, pleasant and always to the point. Alphabet city is one of the best kept secrets of Manhattan and I highly recommend this place for your trip in New York city!

We had an absolutely wonderful stay at Lisa's apartment.  Lisa was exceptionally well-organized and generous.  The place was just as nice as advertised - very comfortable and super clean.

What we loved the most was the neighborhood!  Diverse, vibrant, yet peaceful.  

Lisa made our stay in NYC truly fantastic.  I would definitely love to stay again!
This is the 2nd time we have stayed at the apt....clean, well kept, great, location, quiet building, and Lisa is very easy to deal - very responsive!  Thanks for another great stay in NYC!

I stayed in Lisa's apartment for 3 days and everything was great. The apartment is beautiful, clean and cozy, exactly like the pictures. Besides that, Lisa was always very helpful, she answered almost instantly to every question I made and was also flexible with the check in time. I recommend it!

Everything about staying in Lisa's home was perfect.  She is so easy and bright and engaging.  She makes getting keys simple and allows you complete privacy.  Her home was for me a slice of heaven.  As a creative person it was the perfect embrace.  It is also so artistically decorated.  The feeling is authentic, textured, warm and quiet.  The neighborhood is the safe, cool, artistic, energetic, and has the feeling of a village... small shops, good markets, original restaurants and a park.  I am so sad to leave.  If you enjoy walking, it is an easy and engaging walk along sweet streets into Chinatown, the lower east side, Soho, Tribeca, the village, Flatiron, Chelsea, and minutes from midtown by cab.  Delighted by and grateful for this experience in every way.  XO

My stay at Lisa's apartment was fantastic. When I had to change my schedule around due to work commitments, Lisa was very accommodating and had a courier service scheduled. Her apartment is at the perfect location and I appreciated that Lisa checked in on us during our stay to make sure everything was ok. Her apartment was very clean, quiet, and the right size for our NY trip. Towards the end of our trip, my friend and I even discussed if we could stay at Lisa's apartment again on our next trip back to the city. Thanks for everything Lisa!

Buena experiencia!!! tiene lo necesario para hacer una Estadia agradable. No tuvimos ningún problema, Lisa responde dudas de inmediato. 

Gracias Lisa !
Muchos saludos

I was very impressed during our stay at Lisa's apartment. It's in a fantastic location and included all of the amenities that my father and I needed for our 3-day trip to New York. The process of getting and returning the keys was very safe and professional. The apartment is a little far from the main Subway lines, but there are buses that come very close to her street. We'll definitely be back on our next visit!
The host canceled this reservation 51 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lisa's home was very nice clean and comfy. The space was wonderful and Lisa left notes everywhere to help us around the house. Although the location in east village was good the closest subway was a 15 minute walk which is not optimal during New York winter, but many bus services are supplied in the surrounding streets. Lisa's place was very cute and felt very homey it had everything we needed and more.

Lisa's place is adorable and in an amazing location! You're right in the heart of Alphabet City, and there were plenty of restaurants, convenience stores, liquor stores, etc. nearby. It was a short subway ride into Manhattan as well, but we had no difficulty catching a cab in the area either. Her space is also spacious in terms of how tiny NY apartments can be, more than enough room for myself and my boyfriend. We didn't personally meet Lisa, but she was extremely quick to reply to our messages and picking up the keys/getting into the apartment was a breeze. Highly recommend staying at her place if looking for somewhere not super touristy but still close to Manhattan. Thanks again for letting us stay!

Lisa's apartment is just as described and as is on pictures. Me, my husband and a one year old really enjoyed our stay. Everything was clean and worked fine. Lisa is very responsive and accommodating. 
We were very happy with the neighborhood; diverse and fun. The only minus is access to transportation  (10 min to the bus). 
The keys are picked up/dropped off in a cafe in 10 min distance. All in all - everything was very good!

My stay in Lisa's apartment worked out wonderfully. Her place is comfortable, a pleasing space (as you can see in the photos) to be in, and quiet which is most appreciated after a day out and about in the city. I love being in the East Village/Alphabet City area of Manhattan as it has a real community feel. There are not many highrises and lots of community gardens which the the citizens in this area have worked hard to maintain. There are lots of good restaurants,coffee shops, boutiques and services there so you don't even have to leave the neighborhood.
Clean. Good location.

Lisa's apartment was very clean and perfect for our long weekend trip! We were able to find parking right down the street (on the same block) and the location was excellent. We were so close to parks and fun parts of the East Village and not a far walk to subway stations to get all over the city.

Excellent place to stay! Apartment was exactly as described, clean and in perfect location. Lisa was a great host, great communication and the key drop cafe worked well. Would recommend to anyone wishing for a short stay in the city and would definitely use again

Lisa was not in town at our arrival, but we knew this before and she was great in organizing the keys to be passed forward by an agent, of course for additional costs. We had some difficulties with the agency itself, but Lisa's responsiveness and availability over the mobile phone was very fast, so we have always managed to solve all the problems. And the people were all so nice. The apartment was just as can be seen on the photos. Very cozy, quiet and clean. The bed was very good-after long walks all over the city u need a good rest. The grocery shop was just around the corner on the main street where u could easily get a taxi. It was also in walking distance to the restaurants, cafes and bars and a Sunday market in a park where u can chill out in a vivid neighborhood and observe ordinary people from NY, not only tourists. We would definitely choose Lisa's apartment again for our stay.

We had a great stay in NYC and loved the area of Lisa's apartment in alphabet city. She was really helpful in organising a courier to deliver our keys (at an extra fee) as we arrived after 6pm. There's little to no street noise but the AC unit next to the bed is pretty noisy if you need it on during warm nights! I'm a really light sleeper though and after wandering the city all day we were tired enough to sleep right through the night without it being an issue. All in all, the apartment is exactly as described and we had a great time, thanks Lisa!
It was a comfortable size apartment for two in a central location to area. Lisa was very easy to communicate with during our stay for which we were very grateful.

Lisa was a great host, and responded promptly every time I needed to reach out with questions, and luckily, she was able to accommodate our early arrival time with a minimal fee, so we could drop our bags and get exploring! 
Her place was exactly like the pics, and super clean, and it's really quiet because of its position in the building, so no worries about any street noise, but it's a quiet street for the most part anyway, and any neighbors in the building were also quiet. The location is definitely convenient you love any part of Greenwich village, it's literally just a few blocks from all kinds of interesting shops, restaurants, and bars if you want to check out some local nite life..(we had the best burgers of our lives at Pauls da Burger Joint on 2nd Ave) and Tompkins Square park is about two blocks away, along with tonssss of great community parks! We'd definitely come back!

Alles war so wie in der Beschreibung auf Airbnb beschrieben. Lisa hat noch versucht, uns den Schlüssel in einer näher gelegenem Ort zu deponieren und war auch sonst sehr hilfreich und entgegenkommend.

Die Wohnung ist sehr ruhig gelegen, ein Fenster geht in einen Lichtschacht und die anderen in einen Hinterhof. Leider kann man, wenn man selber das Klimagerät in der Wohnung nicht nutzt, die Kondensatoren der Nachbarwohnungen im Lichtschacht hören; dies kann störend laut sein, wenn man es nicht gewohnt ist. Ich habe daher die ersten Tage mit Ohrstöpsel geschlafen.

Die Wohnung liegt am Rande des East Village, viele Lokale auch in der benachbarten Avenue C, unter anderem ein österreichisches (Eddie and the wolf) und ein bayrisches (zum Schneider). "The stone", ein Club mit avantgardistischer Jazzmusik (Betreiber John Zorn), liegt am unteren Ende der Av. C.

Zusammengefasst: gerne wieder New York und bei Lisa.

Cozy apartment with good amenities. Lisa kept in touch with me and was easy to reach when I had questions. The bed was comfy and everything was clean. The four flights of stairs were a bit steep and getting up and down them wasn't fun. All in all a good place and good value. Very quiet and off the busy street which was nice. Very enjoyable.

We had a really great stay at Lisas apt. The apt is totally as described.
Nice, very clean and even enough space for a little family. 
The area is just perfect. You have the best bars and restaurants around the corner.
Lisas correspondence was easy and prompt.
We would definitely be coming back!

The place was exactly how it was stated. We loved the place and the area that it was in, will definitely come back if ever in New York! Highly recommended.

Lisa was an amazing host that responded promptly and took care of any issues we had.
Cute apartment, perfect size for a couple spending a weekend. Lisa was very helpful getting us the key after hours, and the instructions were very helpful.

I stayed at Lisa's place while visiting my son who lives in the East Village. Lisa was a wonderful host! Her place is nicely appointed and very clean. Her description is accurate and everything she says it is it is. I felt very much at home.  Thank you, Lisa, for a wonderful stay (Website hidden by Airbnb)

Absolutely loved our stay at Lisa's place. She was so friendly and very accommodating we specially with last minute details. The apartment is well located in the East Village, on a quiet street, but a short walk from anything you could possibly need. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend!
I had a great stay in the apartment, clean and tidy upon arrival. Lots of useful notes dotted around the apartment, with a helpful apartment guide.

Lisa made everything very smooth and easy. She has been very available and accommodating. The flat is very cute and coosy, a bit hot in the summer time, but luckily A/C and fan can help. The surrounding area is pretty amazing, exiting and enjoyable especially in the night time. We strongly reccomend Lisa's flat for a staying in New York.
Great cozy loft in hip neighborhood

Lovely studio in the East Village( old Alphabet City). Extremely quiet, clean and private. Internet access was fast.  Nearest subway is 14th St or 2nd and Bowery so keep that in mind if you're not into walking. Otherwise cabs and buses are always an option. My wife and myself enjoyed our stay.
PS.  There is no computer( as shown in photo) so don't forget your laptop or Ipad. Also there is no cable TV if that is a concern for you.
Lisa's apartment was perfect for our stay in NYC. Location is great with lots of nice bars, restaurants and Tompkins Square Park nearby. Would definitely recommend!

El departamento de Lisa nos resultó muy cómodo y apropiado para el alojamiento de dos personas. Nos sentimos muy a gusto aunque no estuvimos mucho tiempo en la casa. Todo funcionaba correctamente y Lisa fue muy amable y atenta en la comunicación con nosotras.

Lisa's place is great! Close to public transportation. Lots of cool places for coffee or grabbing a bite. You are just a couple blocks away from the subway or bus. Close enough to experience the city but still a very quiet neighborhood. The apartment is very clean and cozy. Lisa communicates well and is attentive to your needs. Wonderful experience!!

The host is long on rules, and short on welcome.  Host had not sent me the key code, and I sat in the designated spot for over 40 minutes trying to reach her to obtain code.  Finally reached her; she raised her voice, cut me off, and implied that I had done something wrong in not HAVING THE KEY CODE.  This airbnb was so bare-bones.  Every other place I've stayed the host leaves a few necessities to help tide you over til you get to the store, and to make you feel welcome.  Not so here.  Heads up: Bring your own washcloth, soap, coffee grounds for first day, etc, etc, etc.  Inhospitable, unfriendly host.

Lisa's apartment was exactly as described and in a really characterful area. Clean apartment, quiet, great wifi, walking distance to most places. Lisa responded very quickly to any email/text queries, and I would definitely stay there again. Thanks Lisa :-)

departamento super bien ubicado, en un lindo barrio, ideal para conocer Manhattan. es pequeño, pero cómodo y tiene lo necesario. A tener en cuenta.... no tiene ascensor....asi que 3 pisos por escalera. de todas maneras, New York te atrapa y solo subis/bajar para salir a la mañana y volver a la noche! lo recomiendo! excelente balance precio/ calidad/ ubicacion

Lisa's apartment is small but lovely and in a really great location in the East Village which is a very cool area, lots of cafes, bars and restaurants around. The check in was seamless by collecting the keys at a restaurant a few blocks away and returning them at the same spot with a code. Check in is at 4pm, which is quite late but I believe that could be normal for NYC apartments. I was disappointed that an earlier check-in to just drop off our heavy bags and explore the city would cost an additional $35 despite the key drop-off system that wouldn't put the host out.
Wonderful place to stay. Not far from the subway line. My friends and I were very impressed.
Great apartment - perfect size for two people - in a fantastic neighborhood. We enjoyed our stay!

Lisa's place was everything it said on the tin. Plenty of room, a comfy bed and everything I needed to have a comfortable stay in the city. It's location is awesome, close to Tompkin Sq Park and not too far to the subway, plus all the amazing bars and restaurants East Village has to offer. Lisa was super helpful and responded swiftly every time I dropped her a message. I'd recommend this place to anyone wanting to feel like a local and enjoy the city! Thanks for everything Lisa! :) Hollie x

The apartment was as described and clean. It is a 4-flight walk-up with no elevator that we saw. The key must be picked up at a secondary location. Towels for a 3rd person much be supplied by renter. It was within walking distance to bars and restaurants.

Lisa's place is a true gem! 
We loved our stay. The apartment is really clean and tidy, plus quiet & cosy. The bed was so comfy - really nice to come back and rest after a long day of sightseeing.
The apartment is close to lots and lots of good food and bars in the village which we took full advantage of! The best neighbourhood in NYC! 

Lisa left clear check-in instructions that were easy to follow and she's really responsive to messages. Thanks Lisa for being a wonderful host.

Pen leilighet med alt man trenger av fasiliteter. Rene rom og rent bad. Brukte både sovesofaen og dobbeltsengen. Raskt bredbånd i leiligheten. Ligger i en roligere gate på Manhattan, men med gåavstand til det meste en trenger. Livlige og hippe gater i naboområdet. 
Var veldig enkelt å kommunisere med vertinnen. Genialt at nøklene kan plukkes opp og leveres på et byrå i nærheten, samt at man eventuelt har muligheten til å oppbevare koffert der en leverer nøkler på avreisedagen. Ville definitivt valgt dette stedet igjen!

Lisa's apartment is perfectly located a couple of streets away from some bustling parts of the East Village filled with lively restaurants and bars, but is surprisingly quiet, providing for a restful sleep.  The apartment is very clean, and provided a perfect base for our exploration of the city.  The key pick up/drop off is a comfortable 15 minute walk from the apartment, and offers the not-to-be-missed opportunity to pick up a pastrami sandwich from the amazing Katz's Deli which is en route.  I would happily recommend Lisa's apartment for a visit to the city.  Thank you, David
Beautiful apartment. Comfortable and well placed. There is a lot of pubs and bars in surrounding area. Excellent bed!
Nice place, well located and very quiet. No so far from the Subway (15min walk) and close to lots of restaurants and bars.

Lisa's place was really nice, is a very good area of East village. There are quiet a few bars/ lounges in the neighbourhood, and we were minutes drive away from the subway. Would love to come back here again.

Ons verblijf was geweldig. Lisa was erg goed en duidelijk in haar communicatie. Haar huis was erg schoon, ruim en compleet. De locatie is perfect ten opzichte van openbaar vervoer en restaurants en barren. Echt een aanrader!
Great host! Everything was great!

Probably won't stay here again it was up 4 flights of steep stairs. The neighbors had a very noisy barking dog and there was not a lot of accommodations like I'm used to with using air B&B. I'm used to having coffee provided and more towels.

Great cozy little spot in a quiet section of Alphabet City. Clean, comfortable walk-up, AC was useful, super quiet building, in waking distance of great restaurants and bars, public transportation, etc. Would definitely come back.

Clean, comfortable bed, close to Avenue C, which has some interesting places to see, but apartment is slightly off the beaten path.  Getting and dropping off the key is enough of an inconvenience that the renter should be able to charge the host a fee.

Lisa's apartment is clean, adorable and located towards D on sixth street so the traffic is relatively quiet.  I've always loved Alphabet City, and it's current incarnation is still wonderful, so  I would recommend this location and apartment highly.

Lisa is very quick with your responses and is a delight to deal with. She gives clear instructions.

Place is nicely located in a hip area close to many swanky bars and cafes. 

Her place is clean, bed and pillows are super comfortable. 

Opening the front door is a bit of an art but you get the hang of it after a few goes. It appears most front doors are like this in New York anyway!
