interaction: Very happy to chat about area and share my knowledge
house_rules: Please be mindful this is our family home that we love and look after. We are house proud and would like you to enjoy it as much as us but to please be respectful and keep this in mind

name: Bungan Beach House
summary: Beach house with contemporary interior
space: A glass-sided pool looks out over the sea at this contemporary, light-filled villa that's been featured in lifestyle magazines. An elevator links the 4 stories, which house a 6-car garage, fitness room, cinema, and serious views throughout. Arrange for private yoga sessions or kick back in the lounge by the fireplace, bar, and alfresco shower. You've got direct access to Bungan Beach below.
description: Beach house with contemporary interior
interaction: Every guest is a appointed a Personal Concierge, available 24/7
house_rules: All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at check-in.

name: Exquisitely Elegant Sydney Apartment
summary: View the dazzling Sydney skyline from the comfort of the private balcony of this elegant flat. Stretch out in the modern, comfy living room or unwind in the marble bathroom. Guests have access to the entire property which includes a pool and gym.
space: This lovely apartment is located in the heart of Sydney.  This hotelesque apartment is perfect hideaway for your time in Sydney -  whether it be for business or leisure. There is a fully equipped kitchen with all your basic cooking needs - equipped with cutlery, crockery, pots and pans. You will also have access to your own washing and drying machine. The spacious living area consists of a dining room table and a large smart tv -accompanied with a sofa which is perfect for kicking back and relaxing. The bedroom has a comfy queen sized bed and is attached to a huge beautiful marble bathroom. Perhaps the most pronounced aspect of this apartment is the huge balcony, which is perfect for al fresco dining. Then you can unwind on the Balcony sofas and watch the Sydney lights glitter.
description: View the dazzling Sydney skyline from the comfort of the private balcony of this elegant flat. Stretch out in the modern, comfy living room or unwind in the marble bathroom. Guests have access to the entire property which includes a pool and gym.
neighborhood_overview: Walk everywhere!  It is an easy 10-minute stroll to the Sydney Opera House. Other nearby attractions include the Sydney Harbour Bridge, Royal Botanic Gardens, Sydney Observatory, Barangaroo Reserve, Hyde Park, and Chinatown.
notes: There is very limited 15 minute parking outside on Kent street,
transit: My apartment is located in theart of Sydney CBD it is only 5 minutes from Circular Quay Station or alternatively bus stops are located all around the area. Failing that feel free to catch a ferry across the Harbour
access: Guests have access to the entire property - as well as a pool and gym.
interaction: I wont be available in person - but I will be available through the Airbnb guest messaging platform 24/7
house_rules: - No noise after 10pm. - Please remember that if the keys are locked in the apartment at some point of your stay or after check-out, we might need to call a locksmith or have the keys replaced and this will need to be charged to your account. - Please remember that our property is located in a tropical country and therefore some small insects such as mosquitoes and cockroaches are present in the area. We love the warmth of summer and so do these bugs. Be careful with leaving food behind and/or with leaving windows and doors open at night as these critters will find their way in. We do our utmost best to prevent this, but please do not be alarmed if one is sighted and simply inform us and we will make sure we do our best to help you - Please respect the 10am check-out time, if our housekeepers are not able to do the cleaning on time, we may need to charge you a delayed entry fee. Please do send us a message if you wish to check out late and we will do our best to help you.

reviews.comments: Great location and a great appartment in general. Places like these are why I prefer AirBnb above hotels.

This was my second visit and I enjoyed it as much as the first time. The location is perfect both for business travel, being close to the CBD as well as leisure, being close to the harbour.

Thanks again.
The most beautiful apartment. Such a nice pool and good gym. Very happy i choose this place.
Very central and close to Barangaroo restaurants.
Thank you :)

Tam was excellent with her communication with me. She responded immediately and contacted me multiple times to check how my stay was.
The apartment is beautifully decorated. The balcony is huge and perfect to spend time in. Location was great and walkable to all the places including Opera House, Harbour Bridge, Eye Tower etc
This listing is a great location to explore many of Sydney CBDs attractions. Communication was easy & the place is clean with well appointed furnishings.

Great apartment, with the balcony being genuinely amazing! Location is not prime in the CBD which makes it hard to get to the eastern part of the city, but it’s very close to The Rocks and Barangaroo. The team were very helpful with arranging cleaning of the apartment 3 times during my stay. No microwave in the apartment though.
Beautiful, safe building in a great area of Sydney with first-class amenities! The apartment itself is clean, stylish, and comfortable.

Although I did not meet Tam, she is an excellent and proactive communicator.  Because of this, our self-sufficient check in went smoothly and we felt supported, although she was remote.  The space is clean, ideal for it's balcony and proximity to Barangaroo, CBC, The Rocks & Circular Quay.  Our stay was comfortable and enjoyable.  Many thanks, Tam!
Gorgeous place and amazing host!

The apartment in reality looks even better than on the photos. It is very spacious, so it felt really good to rest there after entire day in an office. I especially enjoyed all the comfort furniture: sofa in the living room, couch and armchairs on the balcony. It is very clean and elegant. It has many different sized lamps, so it is easy to make it well lit in the evenings, whatever's your preference. Especially worth mentioning is the balcony. Even though there is no view to speak of, because the neighbouring buildings block it off as it is only 2nd floor, sitting on the balcony during the weekend or in the evenings was surprisingly relaxing. It is probably due to combination of the facts that the balcony is big, the chairs are very comfortable and the sound of the city is somehow dimmed after everyone left the city center. Speaking of which, the location is absolutely great, it is close to everything I wanted to see in Sydney: Opera House, Ice Cream, Restaurants, Offices, Cafes. And if you want to go there in a fresh shirt, there are very well working appliances in the apartment: washing machine, dryer, and a huge ironing board and a very good iron. I wish I had such in my home. Overall, I highly recommend the apartment.

Tam was super accessible, we never felt like we were a hassle if we needed to ask a question. It's a lovely spot, surrounded by a part of Sydney we'd not explored yet. Very comfy bed, spacious bathroom, perfect for a cosy stay or a place to come home to in Sydney. We loved the balcony in particular. A great central home, hosted very well.
Great location
Great spot and great host

Great apartment in Central Sydney. We stayed in the apartment for almost all of July. We were able to walk almost everywhere we wanted to go (although we did make use of our Opal card ... Wynyard station is 2 blocks away).  Both Darling Harbour and Circular Quay are within easy walking distance. We very much enjoyed the gym, pool, and spa pool. Tam was the most responsive host we have encountered in our Airbnb stays: she usually responded within 5 minutes to any questions we had. We had one minor issue which Tam immediately resolved. The huge balcony has partial views of Darling Harbour. We will undoubtedly work  with Tam when we return to Sydney and highly recommend this apartment.
Very nice apartment in a great location right by Barangaroo with a great balcony. Everything was spotless and the bathroom was one of the highlights. Would definitely recommend in the future!

This Apt. was very nice and clean. Close to the Rocks, Bridge Climb, Circular Quey, and Sydney Opera House. We recommend eating at The Lord Nelson Pub and Brewery, just a short walk on the same street as this Apt. Have a pint...or two..Tracy & Julie      Arlington, Texas USA
Stylish, safe and quiet apartment in the heart of the city. Thankyou for your incredible hospitality. I will definitely be staying here again for future trips to Sydney.
Beautiful and stylish home with excellent amenities and in a great location. Will absolutely stay again.
A great to stay! Highly recommended!

Excellent apartment and location. We had no problems at all during our stay! Will hopefully be back soon.

Tam responded almost instantly to all our messages - which was really helpful!
Had a great stay with my wife at this apartment in Sydney.  Great location at the Rocks end of the city, easy stroll from Wynyard Station via Clarence Street. Highly recommend this apartment.

Anne's place is in a service apartment located a few blocks away from the new office and restaurant district of Barangaroo.  It is also very close to the Wynyard train station so convenient transit connections to the airport and other public transit.  Everything in Sydney CBD is very accessible from the apartment.  The apartment is appointed nicely exactly as advertised.  I found the apartment very quiet and private, and I'm a light sleeper!  The apartment is on the 2nd floor facing away from the street and toward Darling Harbour, but doesn't have much of a view of water - just the Barangaroo buildings.  But it is a great homebase for exploring Sydney, with great transit access, a full kitchen, a good washer/dryer, and perfectly nice marble bathroom with large shower and large bathtub.  I was pleased with the rental and would recommend it as a more spacious alternative to a hotel.

Great location but do your research first when walking as  (Hidden by Airbnb) maps sent us a very long way round a few times.

Central to great amenities and nice to have use of the pool.
We had a wonderful time in Sydney while we stayed at this amazing place.  The condo was clean and very nice.  The location was also close to everything we wanted to see.
Really lovely apartment , great location

Cute apartment, exactly like the pictures. The location was great - close to Circular Quay but also had a few cafes and a convenience store right on the same street. Very clean and convenient for anyone who wants to be in The Rocks/Circular Quay area.
A place that makes you feel welcome in which you can relax and enjoy your stay.
Stop your search. Stay here.

Stayed at Anne's place during our 2 night stay in Sydney. The location was great and right in the heart of the CBD. Anne was very responsive and accommodating. Would recommend to anyone traveling to Sydney!
This is a beautiful flat in Barangaroo and easy walking to cool restaurants and cafes on Darling Harbour.  Would definitely stay here again!

Apartment is situated in the heart of Sydney . We walked to nearby sights such as the Rocks , Sydney Aquarium and Barangaroo . Get your Opal Card and take a Ferry over to the Opera House and take in the amazing sight of the Harbor Bridge . Wynyard Station is within walking distance . Take the train up to Katoomba and spend the day at the Blue Mountains . 
After a long day of sightseeing make your way back to the apartment for a quite evening on the Balcony where you can relax and take in the city views of Sydney .
Very clean and tidy and all inclusions  as advertised.
This apartment is lovely, good size and lovely bathroom. Good location too.
Great location, clean, great value. Highly recommend
Updated apartment with kitchen and big balcony. Good location near the rocks area!

This was such a wonderful place. The balcony is way bigger than the photos depict and the decor is just adorable in the apartment. The pool and gym were also state of the art and it is literally the perfect location to stay at if you want to experience Sydney. I would highly recommend this home if you are planning a trip here!

The apartment is very comfortable, well maintained and supplied with all the basics in both kitchen and bathroom.  We really enjoyed the outside deck area for a morning coffee or evening cocktails! The building complex also offers a well equipped gym and swimming pool which was a great way to unwind after a busy day.  The location was excellent for both touring the historical Rocks area or enjoying the shops and restaurants of bustling Bangaroo.   We could not have picked a better location.
Very nice place!

We spent a very enjoyable six nights at this property, it is in great location within walking distance of the Rocks,Barangaroo and Cockle bay which has many lively bars and restaurants. The apartment building is modern and very safe with a 24/7 concierge. You should be aware that there is major development in this area for the next few years and that it can be noisy with construction work during the day, this was not a major issue for us. The apartment is well furnished and is as it appears in the photos it is up to the standard of a good four star hotel. We found the check in to be a little irksome and the apartment a little lacking in what we would consider to be expectations in a top end property such as additional towels and sufficient toilet rolls for a weeks stay. We also felt there should be a house handbook which is particularly important for overseas visitors not familiar with how the air con and appliances worked as well as providing emergency numbers and location of the local hospital.Whilst none of this spoilt our stay we have passed our comments onto the owners who’ve responded positively.

Wonderful location, great layout for the one bedroom apartment with a nice outside deck.  Very responsive to inquiries.  Access to the fitness center in the building was wonderful...Would stay again on if in Sydney again
this place is in an excellent location.
I had a good stay in this apartment. It is centrally located,  Lowe to public transit and felt safe. Pictures are accurate, apartment was clean  and the outdoor space can’t be beat
Exactly as described-will return!  Thank you!

We had a short break at Tams apartment. The photographs accurately show the apartment. It is in a great location being walking distance from Circular Quay,s, The Opera House, Botanical Gardens and Darling Harbour. 

We had a great time and would have loved to stay longer.

name: LEAFY FLAT - QUIET & CENTRAL (TAI PING SHAN ST)
summary: Light, clean, cosy. One bedroom flat - 5 min walk to the heart of Soho in a quiet, leafy street in Tai Ping Shan (Sheung Wan, just off Hollywood road). Super cool  area - all the cool cafes, restaurants etc nearby. Nice wine and cheese place directly downstairs.  It has natural light and high ceilings. You can hear the birds every morning. It has huge trees outside the windows so all you can see is greenery. It's private - no one can see in.  Quiet desk for those looking for to work. Wifi.
space: It's a 3 level walk up (no lift). It's a very basic bathroom, with a shower over toilet situation. It’s totally fine, has hot water – but it’s nothing fancy. It’s okay for a couple but a little cosy - better for 1 person!   It’s not a great place for cooking every night, it’s only a small kitchen and there isn’t a dining table. It’s better for anyone who wants to be in a really nice street and to eat out at restaurants and cafes within walking distance (such as in Soho, Sheung Wan and Sai Yin Pun).

Super cool  area - all the cool cafes, restaurants etc nearby. Nice wine and cheese place directly downstairs.  It has natural light and high ceilings. You can hear the birds every morning. neighborhood_overview: It's the perfect neighourbood! A quiet street overlooking trees and a park but still in the action and near everything. Rare. My favourite thing about the place is it's location!
transit: 10 min walk to Sheung Wan MTR. 10 min walk to Sai Yin Pun MTR. 15 min walk to Central MTR. Walking distance from all the best bars and cafes!
access: You can access all the flat!
interaction: Depending on when you arrive, I might or not be there to pass you the key directly. Let's message to arrange! :)

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: Cosy flat with all you could need, really nice and quet area and close to anything you could ask for.
Top place, top location, would redommed to anyone

Clean, tidy and exactly the same as described and shown. Bridget’s home located in the hippest location at Upper Station Street. 

I found an artistic lively neighbourhood during the day. In the morning natural sunlight climbing through the windows, swaying old banyan trees shading my shyness from the warm vibe outside. At night, I enjoy the early summer breeze with a cup of tea in my hand at an outdoor cafe nearby, it is so comforting before going back to Bridget’s home for a quiet peaceful good night sleep. 

Bridget’s home has numerous green plants, two huge mirrors in the bedroom and the living room, a spacious desk right at the window and many cushions, pillows and a very comfortable double bed . You will find all you find at a home. 

I have a wonderful stay and I am sure yours will be the same as mine — it’s going to be your real Hong Kong experience in a neighbourhood with an old-n-New crossover.
Very nice area and uber quiet for such a great location. Very cute place that’s got enough space for one. Happy to come again :)

My friend and I stayed at Bridget's flat this weekend and overall, had a great time. The location is near all the main attractions of Hong Kong while still being in a quiet neighbourhood. 
We had some issues with the door keys that resulted in us having to call the host well past midnight after being stuck outside for 30 minutes in a dark street. We also had issues with controls in the bathroom that were not detailed to us prior to the stay. The apartment is also rather confusing to navigate to and had we not had pocket WiFi to (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps the route, the directions provided to us by the host would not have sufficed. If it weren't for these issues our stay would have perfect.
The flat is true to Bridget's description and I would recommend it to a single or a pair of friends coming to Hong Kong. It is small but clean and well-ventilated. WiFi provided.
Thanks again for your hospitality!
Kari

Lovely space and had all the basic amenities you'd need for your stay. Bridget was away but still managed to coordinate an easy way for us the check into the flat, we had no trouble finding the place thanks to her instructions. The decorations and plants made us feel right at home.

For those who want to be bang in the middle of the city but away from the noise, Tai Ping Shan is the ideal spot. Only took us 8-minutes to walk to Central and there are plenty of good eateries, bars and cafes nearby. All in all, would recommend!
It was great, thanks for all!
This was a great apartment for two people, in a great location. We stayed for five nights and loved the area. Would highly recommend.

Bridget's place was perfect for my short visit in Hong Kong. She gave great instructions prior to arrival and the place was very easy to live in. I found it perfect for visiting Hong Kong. You can find taxis easily at the bottom of her block, a lot of tourist stuff is within walking distance (for a New Yorker) and lots of cool shops and restaurants around. I'd definitely stay at her place again, but also in the same neighborhood.
The position is really nice which has many good restaurants and also be quite.But the floor actually is 4and the bathroom is really small. There are some problems with shower.There is no room shoes.

Fantastic, comfortable flat in a lovely, quiet and convenient location. Bridget was a pleasure to communicate with, very quick to respond and was generous with her knowledge of the area. Would highly recommend!
Great location and good value base for exploring HK

Petit appartement cosy hyper bien placé pour visiter HongKong ! Les alentours sont assez calmes et le voisinage hyper sympa. Le métro est très proche et il y a toutes les commodités dont on aurait besoin aux alentours. Bridget la propriétaire est d’une amabilité inégalable et d’une disponibilité à tout moment ! Je vous le conseille bien évidemment.
I enjoyed staying at Bridget's place. It's a great place to stay for weekends out in Central.  Thanks for hosting me Bridget!

name: Chambre à louer dans le plateau, près de tout.
summary: La chambre est ensoleillé et confortable. Est située près du parc MontRoyal dans un quartier français près de tout : services commerciaux, restaurants, cafés, bars, parcs, piscines, centres sportifs, métro et bus. The room is sunny and comfortable. It is located near the MontRoyal park in a french quarter close to everything: commercial services, restaurants, cafés, bars, parks, swimming pools, sports centers, subway and buses.

neighborhood_overview: Rio de Janeiro, commonly Referred to simply the Rio, is the capital city of the State of Rio de Janeiro, the second largest city of Brazil, and the third largest metropolitan area and agglomeration in South America, boasting Approximately 6. 3 million people Within the city proper, making it the 6th largest in the Americas, and 26th in the world. Rio de Janeiro is the most visited city in the southern hemisphere and is known for its natural settings, carnival celebrations, samba, Bossa Nova, beaches such as Barra da Tijuca, Copacabana, Ipanema, and Leblon. Some of the most famous landmarks in addition to the beaches include the giant statue of Christ the Redeemer ('Cristo Redentor') atop Corcovado mountain, named one of the New Seven Wonders of the World; Sugarloaf mountain (Pão de Açúcar) with its cable car; the Sambadromo, a permanent grandstand-lined parade avenue Which is used During Carnival; and Maracanã Stadium, one of the world's largest football stadiums.

Should be fine, but please check with us first, otherwise ch

host.host_about: I'm 52 years old living in Barra da Tijuca, Rio de janeiro, Brazil. I live and work in Barra da Tijuca, Rio. I take pride in my property and am responsive to any of our renters needs. Since I am local, I deal with guests directly – from key exchanges, to cleaning, to repairs, and anything in between. My property is fully furnished and have all the amenities of home!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
This is our 2nd time we spend our holidays in Claudia's apartment. Her place is in one word , beautiful. Everything in both occasions was perfect. The apartment is amazing, very cosy, with 3 bed/ 2 bath, a beautiful and modern kitchen and a very large and cosy living room with a breathtaking view of the ocean. 
We went with our 2 little girls, which are 3 and 4 years old. The condo is perfect for kids since it has a wonderful outdoor playground (just outside the building where Claudia has its apartment) and most of all because of its fun and amazing water slides. Our girls love them!!! 
The condo also has: indoor and of course outdoor pools, 2 tennis courts, indoor gym, a bar/restaurant that's very convenient since you can order whatever you want and they bring it upstairs to the apartment. The location also is perfect. The condo it's between Post 6 and Post 7 of Barra. You have beach service, with chairs and umbrella per each apartment. The beach is beautiful, wide  and white sand beach with a perfect blue sea. The neighbourhood is very nice, you have at 1 block a supermarket and also many bars and restaurant a couple of blocks away. I recommend you rent a car to move free from Barra to wherever you want. Also, if you enjoy kitesurfing, just in front of the Condo there's a kite spot that;s perfect to navigate during windy days.
The apartment has everything you need to spend a great vacation time. Claudia is an amazing host. Always very helpful and kind! We cant say more nice words about her place!!!!

Claudia responded to all our requests and was very helpful. She ensured our comfort and satisfaction and assisted us with the language barrier as we did not speak Portuguese.

Her home was beautiful and comfortable and we hope to return one day.

Maravilhoso !!! Fantástico !!!..TOP....Sem palavras, o apartamento é lindo, de extremo bom gosto, perto de tudo, praia, supermercado, o condomínio é super seguro, com estrutura de resort.
A Claudia é super educada, atenciosa, nota 10, Chic, merece todos os adjetivos, e não posso esquecer da assessoria da Maria Alda obrigada lindinha, super atenciosa.
Todo espectacular!!! El departamento hermoso enfrente de la playa. El condominio es espectacular. Claudia excelente!!!

Hermoso el condominio, súper equipado, cómodo, amplio con hermosa vista , fuimos 3 parejas. Excelente los servicios que brinda el complejo, todo incluido desde clases de tenis, sauna, gimnasio, yacusi, fisioterapia, cancha de voley... hay un restaurante en el complejo y un almacén. Muy atentos todos. Muy buena ubicación, hermosa la playa y muy poca gente eso era lo bueno. El súper a una cuadra y con buenos precios. Shoping cercas.

Claudia foi extremamente atenciosa e organizada, tendo inclusive uma pessoa no próprio apartamento para nos receber! O apartamento é espetacular e as comodidades e o espaço comum do condomínio são excelentes! Retorno com absoluta certeza!
You won't regret choosing this apartment.. everything is just perfect!

O apartamento da Cláudia é ainda melhor do que as lindas fotos representam. Muito limpo, bem decorado e bem cuidado! O condomínio também tem um serviço excelente, com ótima segurança. Cláudia também foi muito solícita e atenciosa, solucionando nossas dúvidas sempre muito rapidamente.

Viajamos con mi mujer mis dos hijas y mi suegra. Claudia es una anfitriona genial! Su rapidez y claridad en contestar se destacan. En ayudarnos y darnos consejos de traslado fue de ayuda. Le pedimos una cuna para nuestra beba y no solo que la consiguió sino que también nos brindo un asiento de comer y una piletita. El departamento y el complejo son perfectos para ir en familia, todo el personal amable. El servicio de playa genial !
El departamento es tal cual las fotos que hablan por si solas. Usamos muy seguido airbnb con mi familia en varias vacaciones y sin dudas la mejor experiencia - predisposicion de claudia - el departamento todo de diez. Lo recomendamos. Nosotros esperanos volver !

O ligar é simplesmente um sonho!!! Desde a entrada do condomínio até cada detalhe do apartamento da Claudinha! Ela é uma anfitriã incrível e super atenciosa. Atendeu à vários pedidos da chata aqui. Minha mãe que foi a convite meu como um presente de dia das mães adiantado se encantou tanto que já baixou o aplicativo e está procurando uma data pra ir com o marido dela. E quanto à nós, COM CERTEZA, passou a ser nosso destino preferido!! Obrigada Claudinha. Vc é top!

El lugar es espectacular, servicios de primera calidad , seguridad, ubicación, frente a la playa , gimnasio, piscina climatizada , sauna, panadería , restaurante dentro del condominio. Muy cerca un banco y un supermercado de 24 horas. 
Todo tal cual Las fotos, el lugar es muy adecuado para pasar unas vacaciones en familia con personas de todas las edades. 
Claudia es una excelente anfitriona con detalles personales que hacen que la estadía sea inolvidable. Gracias

Let's be clear, you are not just stayed at a beautiful flat. You are experiencing a lifestyle.  Our stay was a dreamy, the flat and the condominium has everything you could need. It actually a nice and friendly community, a lovely place that we will remember fondly.  Perfect for everyone, particularly families with kids (the adults will actually enjoy the holidays as well as the kids).   My tip : chech out the restaurant by the pool and the small grocery store / bakery near the admin office.

Pasamos unos días maravillosos en el departamento de Claudia..el departamento muy lindo, muy confortable, con una muy linda vista.. suficientemente grande para una familia de 6 personas..inclusive con una habitación extra con baño independiente para llevar servicio doméstico o un invitado extra..
Todo el equipamiento nuevo y funcionante, camas cómodas y muebles muy bonitos.
El condominio muy seguro., frente al mar y con servicios como cancha de tenis, un restaurante muy bueno..peluquería, etc todo dentro del predio..
Realmente 5 ☆ y más...como para volver y quedarse más tiempo..
Y Claudia una SUPER HOST!!!! 5 ☆ Y más!!!
Gracias Claudia!!!

A vista para o mar deste apartamento é algo especial a destacar, é encantador tomar café na sacada deste apto. A Claudia é muito organizada e receptiva com os procedimentos de chegada e saída do imóvel. O apartamento está muito bem localizado na Barra, tem excelente mobília, roupas de cama e facilities.  Perfeito para se hospedar com a família ou grupo de amigos.
Great host. Great place. Great location. Can’t wait to come back and enjoy more of this place.
Sencillamente inmejorable!!!

Claudia is an outstanding host. Not only is her space beautiful in every way, but well located, safe and comfortable. As a woman traveling alone I would not hesitate to return (and recommend to friends). Thank you!
top
Es todo lo que uno espera cuando va de vacaciones que todo funcione como tiene que funcionar, perfecto.

Realmente todo fue mejor de lo que esperaba. El departamento lindisimo, el condominio ni hablar... Un lujo... Excelentes servicios. El personal muy amable y atento siempre. Pasamos unas vacaciones muy relajadas. En cuanto a claudia, la anfitriona, solo tengo palabras de agradecimiento. Siempre estuvo pendiente de nuestras necesidades y fue muy preocupada en todo. Gracias claudia por tu atención!
Claudia will be present for you at all times to help and support your stay at her place... great Host!! Will be definitely coming back!!

O apartamento da Claudia e maravilhoso, exatamente como nas fotos. Fui passar o Ano Novo com minha família e correu tudo perfeito. A comunicação com a Claudia e rápida e precisa, o apartamento estava limpo e e muito bem equipado. A localização é perfeita, não é preciso pegar carro pra nada: o mercado e ao lado, a região e tranquila, a praia na frente do condomínio e ótima, o condomínio oferece varios serviços, inclusive restaurante e todos muito educados. Nosso Ano Novo foi maravilhoso e recomendamos o apartamento para todos! Esperamos poder voltar muitas vezes.

El apto de Claudia es tal cual muestra las fotos...todo de primer nivel tanto el apartamento como el condominio, se destaca la seguridad, amabilidad de todo el personal, limpieza de espacios comunes..el apto tiene una excelente vista todo equipado y limpio... un lugar super recomendable para familias con chicos..Claudia siempre atenta a todo....seguramente volveremos.
Apartamento e condomínio espetacular, com muitas opções de lazer, inclusive para as crianças. curtimos dias muito agradáveis e saímos realizados do RJ.

name: Mong Kok旺角西洋菜南街舒適2人房5102
summary: 賓館位於旺角最熱鬧地段西洋菜南街,位置相當方便｡下樓就有各式各樣的商店及餐廳｡步行至旺角地鐵站僅需5分鐘的步程｡賓館亦提供1000MB極速wifi,讓你休息時可以好好享受網絡｡ 本賓館非常注重乾淨,除了基本的清潔外,我們更會定期利用塵蟎吸塵器清潔床褥,令客人享有更舒適乾淨的環境好好休息｡ Motel located in the main shopping street in Mongkok, it is very convenient. There are many shops and restaurants nearby. It is only 5 mins walk to Mongkok MTR station. Motel also provide high speed wifi network to enjoy while staying. We do pay attention on the cleanness very much. We do love to provide a clean and comfortable room to our guests.
space: 賓館會供應基本的日用品,如毛巾,牙刷牙膏,洗髮水,沐浴露,浴帽,梳子,肥皂等,另外亦會提供吹風機,轉插頭,電話充電線｡ 賓館很注重清潔,除了基本的表面清潔外,我們亦會定期利用塵蟎吸塵機來清理床褥,讓客人有一張更乾淨,更舒適的床可以好好休息 賓館裡有1000MB wifi,可以極速瀏覽網站,觀看影片等都會很順暢｡ 賓館位於西洋菜南街,位置非常方便｡餐廳商店林立,附近有著各式各樣的美食,一眾饕客可以很容易地搜羅各種美食,而且就算消夜時段,也不乏營業至深夜的餐廳｡ 西洋菜南街是行人專用區,街道兩旁佈滿商店及小型商場,讓你可以即時置身於購物天堂｡ 旺角更是香港的交通樞紐,基本上從旺角到香港各區都很方便｡ 由賓館出發到地鐵站僅需5分鐘步程｡ 乘搭港鐵到尖沙咀只需7分鐘 乘搭港鐵到中環只需12分鐘 乘搭港鐵到海洋公園只需19分鐘 乘搭港鐵到迪士尼只需33分鐘 乘搭港鐵來往機場只需38分鐘 往返機場亦可乘坐A20,A21的機場巴士｡ Our accommodation is fully equipped with daily necessaries such as towels, toothbrush, shower gel, shampoo, shower cap, comb, soap etc. Also provided hair dryer and USB and cell phone battery charge plugs, We do pay attention on the cleanness very much, except for the basic cleaning duties, we do also use the mattress vacuum cleaner to clean the bed regularly. We do love to provide a clean and comfortable accommodation to our guests. We provide  1000MB Wifi which can connect internet with Cell phone, computer or iPad to access and enjoy high speed for browsing internet or watch

There are many shops and restaurants nearby. It is only 5 mins walk to Mongkok MTR station. Motel also provide high speed wifi network to enjoy while staying. We do pay attention on the cleanness very much. notes: 房間內不准吸煙

reviews.comments: 交通很方便,楼下就很多商场药房,晚上也很热闹
交通很便利,房主也很热情,不错不错
連續住了兩天,挺好的,房東人很棒,有問必答,很热情｡房间也很干净｡交通也便利｡
这家旅馆交通便利,去香港各个景点都很近｡旅馆总体很好,老板有求必应,而且响应很快,房间内物品基本齐全,我是春节期间去的,房租比平常要贵｡附近有一家翠华餐厅,味道很赞,价格也很便宜,对面朗豪坊是一个综合性的商场,吃喝玩乐一应俱全｡
店主很贴心的给出了从机场到他们那里的公交,而且下了车步行不到五分钟就可以到了,房间虽然不大但是很干净生活设施也很齐全,而且店家有自备转换插头不用自己带过去啦~因为去的时候是元宵节,店家还给了香港元宵节活动信息超级贴心｡最后走的时候不小心落了一条项链,店家发现了以后及时给我快递回来了,特别棒~
房东很好很有礼貌 地址也很好找 谢谢关照
位置非常好  楼下就是各种小吃和购物店  也非常靠近地铁站和公交站  房东很早就把下地铁后的路线发给了我  从机场坐A21大巴过来下车五分钟就可以走到  公寓大门是密码锁  很安全  房间小  但是非常干净  虽然在旺角但是晚上一点也不觉得吵闹  公寓里有去各个景点的路线指示  很贴心  拐一个弯就是弥敦道  喜欢在旺角接地气和朗豪坊的朋友一定一定别错过  强烈推荐
地方很好找 楼下也很热闹 到了晚上也不怎么吵｡麻雀虽小 五脏俱全 老板很耐心房间也比较干净 公共区域有监控 还有贴心的wifi密码和游玩路线参考｡唯一就是洗澡水越洗越凉
連續住了六天,挺好的,房東人很棒,有問必答,很热情｡房间雖然小,但一個人住很夠,很乾淨,廁所也非常乾淨｡交通也便利,樓下有很多在地人吃的地方,菠蘿麵包也很捧｡

We had a great stay! The room was very clean, and was great value for two people in HK. The space was small, but you can’t expect more if you want somewhere clean, central, and low-cost in this city!

Yuen King was very helpful and responsive to our messages. I will definitely stay again next time I’m here!

位置非常好,楼下就是各种小吃和购物店,也非常靠近地铁站和公交站 .
A21大巴过来下车五分钟就可以走到 ,
公寓大门是密码锁很安全 ,房间虽然小,但是非常干净 .
房东很好很有礼貌
房东人很好,住的地方交通便利｡
地理位置非常好,房間雖然有點小但是兩個人夠睡,只是不太適合帶大行李箱的客人入住…很感謝主人耐心解決我的疑問和問題｡

Great location with easy access to airport bus, MTR train and buses. Super easy access to good food and shopping areas too. Clean room. Highly recommended for travelers who wants easy access for traveling.

Small, clean place in a lively area of Kowloon. Host was very accommodating, gave great detailed instructions for check in, and was always available to communicate. Stayed only for one night but was a great place to rest my head after a long flight.
地方很好找,地铁站出来走一会就到了,楼下莎莎卓越屈层氏万宁都有超级方便,住的地方虽小但干净也安静｡
几好啊,近地铁去边度都方便｡就系两个人住太细了,不过由香港又唔出奇,床两个人训差五多,就系空间密｡下次过去再订｡
還不錯 服務很好
打10分的话  4性价比  6分房东比较细心
对于香港这个地段还是不错的了｡!
性价比高,位置很好!
位置和房间装修还不错 比较干净安静 床很舒服 房东沟通也方便 唯一就是房间偏小一进门就是床
房子地段好,出门公共交通四通八达｡在寸土寸金的香港来说,房间已经算是不小,舒适,虽然空余地方也只是刚刚能放下箱子｡设施很齐全,房东超级热情,告知了好多小贴士,哪里好吃,如何去一些地方等等｡还特地搬了冰箱过来,并主动告知,真的是很热情很好的房东｡很安静,休息的很好,性价比真的是很高

房东真的非常贴心!非常细心!来之前怕找不到路,问了房东怎么走,房东很快且很详细的告诉了我们路线,一下就找到了｡而且还告诉了我们香港一些好玩的地方之类的,虽然不太爱说话,但是有求必应｡
中途出了一点小差错,但是非常迅速的解决了,效率非常高,真的觉得房东这些细节做的特别好｡走之前还发 (Hidden by Airbnb) 跟我们祝福,让我们玩的开心!
麻雀虽小,但是五脏俱全｡房东真的超级赞!!!谢谢~
位置很好,在旺角繁华地带,bus 和地铁都好找,就是太小了,比预想的还要找,太多行李的不建议入住,最多两人｡但是房东很好沟通,比较适合闺蜜或者小情侣
在旺角住很方便下楼什么都有,房间比较干净但比较小,房东有提供转换器充电线吹风机,空调较足,热水不太稳定,但总体对得起价格
房间真的很小,香港真是寸土寸金,我没住过这么小的屋子房子位置特别好,不嫌累的话走个20min能到油麻地和佐敦,边走边体验｡我一直不会开空调,不会开电视,感谢房东耐心讲解｡就是一个小问题,屋子里真的不能吃喝东西,一是弄脏了床不好,二来有一些小虫子,有甜食就会聚一小堆｡总体来说,是一次很好的体验,辛苦房东啦
地理位置不错,在旺角附近,刚好遇到山竹台风,基本都在房间里过了,除了热水太慢,挺干净的
位置很好,樓下有很多東西逛和吃｡房東也會推薦很多好去處,很貼心｡房間和廁所很小,但這是意料之內的,只是晚上過夜所以沒什麼關係｡蓮蓬頭水很大,空調很棒
真的性价比很高!寸土寸金的香港这个价格真的超棒,地理位置很好,坐地铁很方便!房东人也很好,有问题都能及时解答｡

Die Lage ist sehr gut. Mitten im Zentrum. 
Zimmer ist klein, aber grundsätzlich ausreichend. Bei unserem Besuch hatte es leider das eine oder andere Tier im Zimmer. Wir würden das Zimmer deshalb nicht mehr buchen.
We loved the downtown location. The space is small but quite clean.
Great location, near MTR Mong Kok station and  easy access to good food and shopping areas too. Overall is good.
nice place . nice location
Very clean and comfortable place in the heart of Mongkok. Very valuable for the price and the host is always available for you to call for assistance.
位置很好,房东很热心,房间干净,自助退房很方便
위치안정확하규 좁음
The place was as expected, good value and what we needed in Hong Kong. We really appreciate the extra directions when we were lost and letting us store our bags when we arrived at 8 in the morning.

The host was very pleasant. The place was a bit difficult to find. Detailed instructions with landmarks and the number of blocks and turns from the subway will be very helpful in finding the place.  The place did not come with a separate shower area; the small bathroom contained a toilet, sink and hand wand to hose yourself off.   The bed takes up 4/5th of the room and only place to sit is on the bed.   Given the cost of real estate in Hong Kong, I believe this place is considered a value.  The location was very close to the subway.
旺角的中心位置,这个价格不算贵,性价比高,服务也挺好｡
房间比较小,卫生间地板入住时发现欠干净
地理位置非常好,离旺角地铁站五分钟不到,下楼就可以shopping,对面就有小吃卖,非常方便｡房间设施齐全,干净整洁,就是开行李箱不是很方便,空位可能能刚好够打开一个箱而已｡隔音有点点差,外面附近还有几只狗半夜在叫｡总体来说很不错 性价比很高｡
位置优越,出行方便,床也够宽,性价比高｡
Host was very responsive! The place is right in the market spot! Thank you :) will definitely come back!
位置很好找.房间也很不错.床睡得很舒服.很好的一次住宿.还会再来的.房东也很贴心.回复什么的都很快.很便捷.

The location was great. Near the popular tourist spot with a lot of eating place and shops

Its proximity to Mongkok station makes the travel less hassle
Toilet blocked other then that everything else is okay

Place is ok for light traveler planning to do shopping in monkok area. Transport n location is convenient including airport express bus stop. The room is clean but much smaller vs what was shown in photo. The place is not easy to locate coz no front signage n address has Chinese character. Do ask for detailed instruction in English n install- use (Hidden by Airbnb) for easy communication with caretaker.
房东热情,有问题都能解决

This place is in an amazing location but the room itself is super small (however this is fairly common in Hong Kong). The room can also be pretty noisy so bring earbuds. Overall I think it is a solid Airbnb but I would not recommend for couples, best for solo travelers who just need a basic bed & bathroom at an affordable price.
位置真的挺方便的,离地铁口和逛街的地方都很近,总体来说很满意,如果下次去的话还会继续入住的
Great location, great room, great experiences.
很方便的一家住宿

交通超级方便,位置也超棒!
房主人也超热情!
性价比超高!
需要住房的宝贝们可以考虑!
地址在旺角很方便噢,离朗豪坊很近,买东西也很方便｡房间有点小,只能打开一个箱子的空位,但是挺干净的,好几个插座,还有大陆的插座很棒!在旺角这边性价比我觉得挺高的了,总体很干净,就是床单上有黄黄的不知道是什么｡
房东人很nice,因为比赛没来得及迟房,房东就晚了一个小时让我退,退房之后可以寄放行李,购物很方便
房东给的位置很准确也很好找,离地铁站很近,周围有很多吃的和店铺,晚上可以逛夜市｡房间很干净也很舒适,走廊有一些攻略可以供来香港游玩的朋友参考｡
房间虽小,五脏俱全｡地段很好,逛吃方便｡唯一瑕疵就是洗澡水不太暖｡
交通很便捷｡房间易找｡干净｡

name: Harlem Oasis
summary: Cozy one bedroom available in a two bedroom shared apartment.  The bedroom as a double bed with a plush pillow top mattress.   Windows face east and get delightful morning sun, drapes can be closed to block light as well. Apartment features bathroom, kitchen, living room, and an entire rooftop with views of both yankee stadium and the Empire State Building.  WiFi, heat, and air conditioning

Windows face east and get delightful morning sun, drapes can be closed to block light as well. Apartment features bathroom, kitchen, living room, and an entire rooftop with views of both yankee stadium and the Empire State Building.  WiFi, heat, and air conditioning

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm fun!  I love to travel with friends, and I will treat your place with respect!

name: Spacious Studio with Private Roof
summary: This Chelsea alcove studio apartment is a 3-block walk from Penn Station/Madison Square Garden and just minutes away from Times Square and the Theatre District. The studio is very spacious, with two separate living spaces and a private outdoor roof. The closet is off limits but everything else is completely taken care of!
description: This Chelsea alcove studio apartment is a 3-block walk from Penn Station/Madison Square Garden and just minutes away from Times Square and the Theatre District. The studio is very spacious, with two separate living spaces and a private outdoor roof. The closet is off limits but everything else is completely taken care of!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Very cute place and totally clean. In really good location too. I booked pretty last minute but for what was available this was by far the best place for the price. Host was really nice and accommodating as well.
Absolutely wonderful location right near Penn Station. Cute studio in an area with a lot to offer. Would definitely stay here again!
Wonderful stay, in a great location. With a bonus of an awesome private rooftop, along with a great magazine collection.

Alex an was awesome host! The location of the bnb was sooo close to Penn and the hustle and bustle of the area, yet inside it was so calm and quiet. She was super helpful about check-in, made sure we were comfortable while we were there and very kind. Overall good experience. Will stay here again.
Good location and good place for the price. Flexibility with check-in and check-out times was appreciated.

Alex’s place is a pretty good find. Bed was comfortable, living room space was very cozy, and the space felt perfect for us two.

My favorite thing about this listing though is the host - Alex was extremely responsive and proactive. She coordinated a toilet repair, informed us of the time of repair, and was even able to schedule it while we were away. Check-in/out was extremely detailed and smooth, and she was very prompt to answer the few questions we did have. Will definitely consider staying here again!
Alex’s place was everything I expected , great location , the decor was great and has a great New York vibe, Alex was extremely accommodating as well, will definitely stay here again .
Decent value and location. However, the shower was by far the grossest I’ve step foot in...so much mold on the curtain
Alex’s place was very nice and central to really great places to eat as well as MSG and pen station. Really enjoyed our stay and how responsive Alex was.

The location was great. The bed was comfortable. The decor was cute. But there is a reason why there's no picture of the bathroom. Mold. We even bought a new shower curtain for the apartment since the old one was COMPLETELY covered in mold spores. That still did not address the lack of cleanliness nor the mold smell. Even just taking a shower in that bathroom would make my eyes burn. I did not consider it safe for habitation. We were extremely disappointed with our stay.

Check-in and check-out was easy via KeyCafe. Apartment was as described, with a generous amount of space given the location. Parking was easier than expected--there are several streets within a few blocks with parking. Public transit is very accessible, and there are plenty of fun things to do within several blocks. Alex's place is an excellent value! I'd definitely stay here again if I was coming to Manhattan.

Needed a cute little place to stay for a night when there was a show at Madison square. Alex had everything needed for our night and she is so sweet and chill I was such a mess when I accidentally left my stuff in the apartment but she stayed calm and professional! The bed was preeeetty comfy. Totally recommend, the rooftop was a plus. Definitely book this place if you’re gonna see a show or something at Madison square it’s walkable and it’s literally right there!
Alex was super awesome and sweet, space was clean, spacious and centrally located to everything. Highly recommend.
This is a Great find! Alex has a very cute spot in a great location. The private balcony truly came in handy for us. Thanks Alex I would definitely stay here again.

Best location ever! So close to anything you need.

I booked this apt for a week-long stay in NYC but found it unsuitable for my needs.
位置便利,取钥匙比较方便,房东人很好,让我们提前入住了

This place was great! Fun neighborhood right by everything that was on the "to see" list. A short walk to HK, the Penn Station if you want to get somewhere, and less busy than other places I've stayed in Manhattan. 
The apartment is super cute and has a great outside porch. Everything to make your stay feel like home.
Alex laid out the instructions and was a great host! Definitely feel good when booking this stay.

Be aware.

This Chelsea location is convenient to get just about anywhere in Manhattan, close to subway, restaurants, and shopping. I loved Biricchino, the District Social wine bar and Gardenia Deli. However, it is important to know what you're getting with Alex's place. This is an Airbnb where the homeowner's personal belongings are still in place and no closet space is available for guests. The rooftop wasn't quite what I envisioned either. Not a place for watching sunsets. There were complications with wifi, no wifi information was initially left, but Alex was supportive and eventually available to resolve this. An acceptable experience and a comfortable bed, though not a choice for clean freaks with high expectations.

This apartment was so close to everything we needed, we were able to get on bikes and go all over the city. The home is super cozy and comfortable, perfect for a couple looking to stay for a weekend in the center of town.

Position is great, near Pennsylvania station and Madison Square. 
Alex has been very kind and helpful.
Good adress.
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Convenient location, very close to Penn Station. Basic NYC apt, not too fancy, basic amenities. Bathroom is pretty cramped but that’s typical for the city. Overall happy with our stay, would recommend to anyone looking to be very close to subway, midtown, etc.
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 91 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Alex’s place was as pictured. Small but very conveniently located for all things to see and do nyc. Alex provided very clear instructions on how to collect the keys and access the apartment. The communication was very prompt and accommodated us checking out later which allowed us to see more of the local area before heading to the airport. The apartment is an older style and is not a modern like a hotel. We are happy with that and enjoyed our stay! Thanks Alex
Great location right in the middle of everything and very clean

Apartment was okay, basic and functional but if, like us, you just wanted somewhere well located to put your head down at the end of a long day it was more than adequate.

Very close to Penn Station/MSG, short walk to the Highline and plenty of nearby metro options. Hassle free communication with host and good instructions for key pick up and departure.

Thanks

El apartamento está situado inmejorablemente, al lado de todo, tren, metro, centro de ciudad, ocio, tiendas... En cuanto al aspecto es mejorable, lo peor para mí ha sido el baño y el rooftop que no salen en las fotos. La entrada al apartamento tampoco es muy agradable. Muy bueno el sistema de entrega y recogida de llaves, me resultó muy cómodo.
Fantastic localitation near to everything.The apartment for two was perfect size.
Alex is amazing! It was a great time

Location location location! This is a great spot, you forget you’re in the middle of NYC when you go back to the apartment. No noise pollution. We don’t like to live out of a suitcase and there was nowhere to store clothes so had to have them in a pile on the floor which isn’t ideal but we managed. Sofa much smaller than what’s on the pics but we didn’t spend much time in the apartment to be honest and used it mainly for a place to crash. Issue with ventilation but there is aircon and a fan provided. Netflix is great for any nights you want to relax before bed and we loved the style of the living room/kitchen area.
The apartment is in the best location for a stay in New York. The cleanliness of the bathroom wasn’t great, but not the end of the world!

Central located place in NYC 
Needs some reconstructions
This was a great little place that was the perfect size for two people. Super easy to get to and easy to grab a cab from

For the price, it was a good deal. **Please note that this is not a rental unit used specifically for Air B&B. **

This is a unit where the host still has there personal belongings. So there is not that much storage and you will find things belonging to the host. The living room furniture was different than pictured but over all, the apartment was in a centralized location.
Cozy and clean apartment that is close to the subway, we enjoyed our stay!
Ideal located, everthing clean, sofa smaller than on the foto, alltogether perfect
Great location! Alex is very responsive to any questions we had. Check in and out is quick and easy.

A great little place close to it all! We walked everywhere from Alex’s place- close to the subway and an easy walk anywhere! It was comfy, cozy and a great place to hang out. Highly recommend this place! The value and location were great

Location for the house is perfect. We liked the little cozy place in the heart of newyork a lot. The problem we faced was the mugs in the kitchen were having some dirty stains, there were no toiletries for ex: no body wash, shampoo bottle was already empty etc. and the third thing was that living room furniture is different than what shown in pictures. Besides this we had wonderful time here and Alex was very proactive and accommodating.

Hi, Alex'  place is in an old building, very central and provides all the small extras that make life in an apartment easy. Communication was easy and swift and he organized the logistics perfectly. Thanks, Alex!
We had a great time!

This apartment did not work out for our stay, for both preventable and unavoidable reasons. The building is just very old. For example, the radiator was insanely loud every time it came on, to the point that it woke us up at night. However, it was impossible not to use it because there was a gap between the window and A/C unit, and a lot of air came in (one day had a low of 4 degrees while we were in NYC). 

Another issue was the kitchen. While there is technically a sink/stove/oven/fridge, there weren't the necessary tools to do any cooking (cutting board, knives, pots, cooking sheets, etc). Part of the reason we wanted to book an Airbnb instead of a hotel was specifically for the use of a kitchen. 

Other than those two major issues, there were a few other, smaller things: the bathroom smelled horrible, like vomit, when we first arrived (though the smell did mostly dissipate), the couch is different from the one in the pictures and much smaller, the bedsheets were very cheap and almost plastic-y/slippery feeling, the cabinets were disorganized and messy, and the place generally felt a bit unclean. 

I will say that the location is amazing (though not the exact entrance to the apartment, which is a graffitied door next to a Dunkin Donuts and adult DVD store). I do think this would work fine for any one who's just looking for a place to crash for a night or two in the heart of Manhattan.
Alex is so sweet and responsive, the only thing was the heater wasn’t working on the coldest day in years in NY and it took all day to get a replacement. Other than that, it was perfect location!

The apartment is in a very central location with easy access to everything. The subway station was no more than a 5 minute walk! Any issues or concerns we had, Alex was easy to reach and quick to respond!

Alex  was very accessible to any questions that we had, she gave very clear instructions for access to the key. Her  apartment is very well situated and within walking distance from time square, restaurants and Broadway plays. We felt safe walking everywhere. The apartment is a nice size
 and the bed is very comfortable.  It was clean but could use a little freshening up.   Overall we enjoyed our stay.
We really enjoyed this apartment! Close to a subway station and a lot of restaurants. Very stylish place! We enjoyed staying here!
Fantastic location and communication

Great location, spacious apartment and a very friendly host. Alex was fast to reply to all of our questions and needs. The house in general is a little noisy (you can hear the people walking around upstairs and the heater is loud) so if you're a light sleeper this might not be for you.

name: Mong Kok 西洋菜南街舒適3人房 5106
summary: 賓館位於旺角最熱鬧地段西洋菜南街,位置相當方便｡下樓就有各式各樣的商店及餐廳｡步行至旺角地鐵站僅需5分鐘的步程｡賓館亦提供1000MB極速wifi,讓你休息時可以好好享受網絡｡ 本賓館非常注重乾淨,除了基本的清潔外,我們更會定期利用塵蟎吸塵器清潔床褥,令客人享有更舒適乾淨的環境好好休息｡ Motel located in the main shopping street in Mongkok, it is very convenient. There are many shops and restaurants nearby. It is only 5 mins walk to Mongkok MTR station. Motel also provide high speed wifi network to enjoy while staying. We do pay attention on the cleanness very much. We do love to provide a clean and comfortable room to our guests.
space: 賓館會供應基本的日用品,如毛巾,牙刷牙膏,洗髮水,沐浴露,浴帽,梳子,肥皂等,另外亦會提供吹風機,轉插頭,電話充電線｡ 賓館很注重清潔,除了基本的表面清潔外,我們亦會定期利用塵蟎吸塵機來清理床褥,讓客人有一張更乾淨,更舒適的床可以好好休息 賓館裡有1000MB wifi,可以極速瀏覽網站,觀看影片等都會很順暢｡ 賓館位於西洋菜南街,位置非常方便｡餐廳商店林立,附近有著各式各樣的美食,一眾饕客可以很容易地搜羅各種美食,而且就算消夜時段,也不乏營業至深夜的餐廳｡ 西洋菜南街是行人專用區,街道兩旁佈滿商店及小型商場,讓你可以即時置身於購物天堂｡ 旺角更是香港的交通樞紐,基本上從旺角到香港各區都很方便｡ 由賓館出發到地鐵站僅需5分鐘步程｡ 乘搭港鐵到尖沙咀只需7分鐘 乘搭港鐵到中環只需12分鐘 乘搭港鐵到海洋公園只需19分鐘 乘搭港鐵到迪士尼只需33分鐘 乘搭港鐵來往機場只需38分鐘 往返機場亦可乘坐A20,A21的機場巴士｡ Our accommodation is fully equipped with daily necessaries such as towels, toothbrush, shower gel, shampoo, shower cap, comb, soap etc. Also provided hair dryer and USB and cell phone battery charge plugs, We do pay attention on the cleanness very much, except for the basic cleaning duties, we do also use the mattress vacuum cleaner to clean the bed regularly. We do love to provide a clean and comfortable accommodation to our guests. We provide  1000MB Wifi which can connect internet with Cell phone, computer or iPad to access and enjoy high speed for browsing internet or watch
