We do pay attention on the cleanness very much. We do love to provide a clean and comfortable room to our guests. 賓館會供應基本的日用品,如毛巾,牙刷牙膏,洗髮水,沐浴露,浴帽,梳子,肥皂等,另外亦會提供吹風機,轉插頭,電話充電線｡ 賓館很注重清潔,除了基本的表面清潔外,我們亦會定期利用塵蟎吸塵機來清理床褥,讓客人有一張更乾淨,更舒適的床可以好好休息 賓館裡有1000MB wifi,可以極速瀏覽網站,觀看影片等都會很順暢｡ 賓館位於西洋菜南街,位置非常方便｡餐廳商店林立,附近有著各式各樣的美食,一眾饕客可以很容易地搜羅各種美食,而且就算消夜時段,也不乏營業至深夜的餐廳｡ 西洋菜南街是行人專用區,街道兩旁佈滿商店及小型商場,讓你可以即時置身於購物天堂｡ 旺角更是香港的交通樞紐,基本上從旺角到香港各區都很方便｡ 由賓館出發到地鐵站僅需5分鐘步程｡ 乘搭港鐵到尖沙咀只需7分鐘 乘搭港鐵到中環只需12分鐘 乘搭港鐵到海洋公園只需19分鐘 乘搭港鐵到迪士尼只需33分鐘 乘搭港鐵來往機場只需38分鐘 往返機場亦可乘坐A20,A21的機場巴士｡ Our accommodation is fully equipped with daily necessaries such as towels, toothbrush, sh
notes: 房間內不准吸煙

reviews.comments: 在旺角中心,很方便,虽然房间不大,但是房东人很好｡推荐给大家｡
地点便利 空间稍小
房间卫生还是不错的,大厦也很安全,吃喝玩乐购物也很方便,以后还会再来的｡老板人也很好,就是只见过一次哈哈哈
房间没有窗 很小 有行李的不建议 因为没地方放 胜在位置方便 近市中心
还不错
很干净,尤其床上用品,三个人住一晚h很舒适,希望再多一点储纳空间就更好了,总体很划算
交通方便,购物也很方便
空间没有很大!不过在香港这个寸土寸金的地方是可以理解的啦!地理位置很棒噢!女孩子可以在附近看到KIKO NYX insfree等化妆品店!有什么问题房东回得很快态度也很好!关键很帅哈哈哈
房东很贴心 教我们在哪里下地铁走哪个出口 发图片给我指路 地段不错 下楼就有很多逛的吃的非常方便 虽然大厦在闹市区 但房间里很安静 3个人住一间房很挤 不过设备齐全 干净卫生 的确是不错的选择!
房东人挺好的,床也挺舒服的,好评
間房好乾淨,位置非常好,班friend都訓得好舒服｡落樓行100米左右就有間大家樂,飲食方便｡
就是一家私人开的小旅馆,房间实在是太小了,两张床放了剩下空间都没两个平方,如果有行李箱的话要在床上才能打开,地理位置还算不错,离地铁站比较近,离旺角周边的商业街也比较近,周边吃的也很多｡房间没有窗,有点闷｡其他还行｡
房間稍小,但距離地鐵站近且房源乾淨整齊~在我們被颱風延誤班機時即時回覆讓我們續住,且提供泡麵充饑,謝謝房東的熱情款待!

地點好(離一點心近)且一下樓就是逛街(超商也近),重點是房東超大器(任何問題都解決且耐性十足)｡
讓這趟旅完美結束｡
其他都还可以的,小也可以理解毕竟香港寸土寸金｡就是床单被子没有洗｡我睡的身上好痒｡总体还是可以
位置优越 就是略小 其他ok 房东人不错
As advertised. Cheap and great location, just extremely cramped. Only one room key, so if you have multiple people doing different things it can be hard to coordinate.
人均200多的賓館在香港可想而知是不盡人意的了 位置離地鐵站很近 附近能逛能吃的地方也很多 地理位置很好 房間是真的小 三人房兩個人住 轉身的位置也夠辛苦的 洗手間算幹淨 房間唯一缺點是沒有窗戶 有點悶 不過沒有異味 但是床上留有客人的指甲碎和頭髮 這個是完全受不了的 枕頭套和床單有汙漬 賓館半自助入住 隔音不怎麼好 第一次住airbnb 算是真正體驗了一次香港的小
交通便利,房间非常干净整洁,设备齐全,态度很nice,很好的一次住宿体验
it's what expected for place in mongkok. small but value for money. near to almost everything
房東非常非常友善,積極回覆問題｡房間真的很小,但香港地狹人稠,這樣的價格已經很棒了
Communication with the team is lightning speed and attended to our needs quickly. Our stay was short but overall a pretty good experience.
在香港住了好多次這次的房間性價比很高,房間小是可以理解的,房東熱情回復迅速,房間還是很乾淨的,還可以寄存行李,地理位置在旺角西洋菜街,周邊購物非常便利,非常滿意這個房源啦
體驗很好,很實惠,位置在中心地帶很好,晚上順便逛旺角(っ'-')╮=͟͟͞͞
地理位置绝佳,交通方便,房间干净,推荐!
房间位置非常好,附近吃的网红店很近｡但是房间确实小的可怜,三个人住非常勉强,卫生间更小,空调声音超级大,但是性价比在香港这边来看算不错了｡
地理位置很好,房东也很及时耐心地回答问题,在香港寸金尺土的城市房间小是很正常的,不过不影响短期的入住｡
入住方便,地段繁华
就在市中心,非常方便,距离旺角地铁站也很近,附近有很多万宁呀什么的,朗豪坊也在附近,反正就是购物什么的超级方便,房间是一张大床一张小床,三个人住完全ok,但是如果是很高的人就算了,可能对于高个人来说会比较窄小,房间没有窗但是有抽风机,总体来说还是很满意的,还是独卫,不会太小,完全ok｡
地段方便,房间配件齐全,舒适
What you see is what you get haha. Location is super super near MTR.
Small, clean space perfectly located to get anywhere in Hong Kong quickly and efficiently.

name: Cozy trendy appartement
summary: 10min away from 2 metro station (vendome and villa Maria) this cozy -trendy appartement is in between to neighborhood which makes it perfect for any taste in food.(ndg and Westmount) This quiet apartment is filled with movies and books to relax,chill and pamper yourself. Truly confortable inflatable double layers bed in the bedroom! You won’t believe it! we also have a convertible in the living room
space: You have your own bedroom and access to kitchen and living room no problem!
description: 10min away from 2 metro station (vendome and villa Maria) this cozy -trendy appartement is in between to neighborhood which makes it perfect for any taste in food.(ndg and Westmount) This quiet apartment is filled with movies and books to relax,chill and pamper yourself. Truly confortable inflatable double layers bed in the bedroom! You won’t believe it! we also have a convertible in the living room You have your own bedroom and access to kitchen and living room no problem! There is a locked room where we keep all our private stuff, the rest of the house is yours to share with us ! The cabinet are well labeled (Airbnb and private) feel free to use anything in the Airbnb labeled closet and cabinet Also there is 2 yoga mat in the guestroom , feel free to use them You can reach me at anytime with the Airbnb app or by mail (Email hidden by Airbnb)  This appartement is between two up and comers neighborhood: NDG (at the corner of Sherbrooke turn right) And Westmount (corner Sherbrooke turn
neighborhood_overview: This appartement is between two up and comers neighborhood: NDG (at the corner of Sherbrooke turn right) And Westmount (corner Sherbrooke turn left) Westmount is full of little store, designer close, YMCA , coffee and restaurant (Park, sushi YU-MI , Mandy’s etc) NDG is full of trif shop and taverns (go up on decarie a few block and turn left on Monkland (best mexicain restaurant : Amaranto)
transit: The #24 bus is down the street and will take you downtown fast The is 2 subway station real close  Vendome and Villa-Maria
access: There is a locked room where we keep all our private stuff, the rest of the house is yours to share with us ! The cabinet are well labeled (Airbnb and private) feel free to use anything in the Airbnb labeled closet and cabinet Also there is 2 yoga mat in the guestroom , feel free to use them
interaction: You can reach me at anytime with the Airbnb app or by mail (Email hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: Since it is our primary appartement we ask you to be considerate with our stuff. Please clean your dishes before leaving and take out the trash/compost and recycling also. Feel free to read and watch any movies /books you would like.

host.host_about: Hi! Movie makeup artist quiet, relax, clean. Looking forward relaxation and travels

name: Delightful Downtown with View★Parking★Jacuzzi★Pool
summary: [Walking Distance to Honolulu Biennial March Events] Enjoy 650 sqft/60sqm spacious condo with floor to ceiling windows on 34th floor. Jacuzzi tub, washer and dryer in unit. Pool and hot tub in building. Secured and designated free parking stall. Fully equipped kitchen. Walk to the best restaurants and bars and visit historic Iolani Palace. Book now! "I have stayed in Airbnb in Shanghai, Denver, New York, Los Angeles, etc. This is so far the best Airbnb I have ever had." ~Jia Stephanie
space: This stunning one-bedroom condo is most requested for birthdays and anniversaries. Enjoy breathtaking view, tastefully renovated interior, eco and organic amenities. Save $25-35 a night with free parking. Enjoy building pool & hot tub 7 days a week. 24-hour doormen. Starbucks/Ross/Walmart on ground floor for your daily needs. "Great value for the price especially due to its central location and amenities (including a full and new kitchen, washer and dryer). The parking space in an adjacent garage was a huge plus as well. The view of the city from the 34th floor was stunning." ~Azhar
description: [Walking Distance to Honolulu Biennial March Events] Enjoy 650 sqft/60sqm spacious condo with floor to ceiling windows on 34th floor. Jacuzzi tub, washer and dryer in unit. Pool and hot tub in building. Secured and designated free parking stall. Fully equipped kitchen. Walk to the best restaurants and bars and visit historic Iolani Palace. Book now! "I have stayed in Airbnb in Shanghai, Denver, New York, Los Angeles, etc. This is so far the best Airbnb I have ever had." ~Jia Stephanie This stunning one-bedroom condo is most requested for birthdays and anniversaries. Enjoy breathtaking view, tastefully renovated interior, eco and organic amenities. Save $25-35 a night with free parking. Enjoy building pool & hot tub 7 days a week. 24-hour doormen. Starbucks/Ross/Walmart on ground floor for your daily needs. "Great value for the price especially due to its central location and amenities (including a full and new kitchen, washer and dryer). The parking space in an adjacent garage was a hu
neighborhood_overview: DOWNTOWN vs. WAIKIKI - If you love authentic local culture in the forms of best boutiques/restaurants/landmarks, then Downtown is for you. "The location was perfect right in the hustle and bustle of downtown. There are so many restaurants, bars, clubs right in the heart of downtown." ~Michelle
notes: KAMAA'INA RATE - 10% off room rate if you have a valid Hawaii ID. Please note - I do not discount cleaning fee as it supports a living wage for local cleaning crew. "The property is in prime location for all business agencies in town, I can walk to my meetings easily, free parking made my packed day very efficient!" ~Maggie
transit: The closest beach is Ala Moana Beach Park (1.6mi/2.6km, 5 minutes by car). It offers free parking and Friday night fireworks. Waikiki has very limited street parking, but you can take a bus right in front of condo to Waikiki. Bus fare is $5.50 round-trip and child under 6 rides free. Or, you can take a Biki, Honolulu's popular bike share service, and cycle to Ala Moana/Waikiki at $3.50 per ride (bike station in front of condo).
access: Access your unit 24 hours a day. "Great location, save on the resort and parking fees. In the heart of Honolulu, with great access to all the wonderful sites of this island paradise." ~Adam
interaction: Message me anytime and I’ll be quick to respond. "Angela was so thoughtful to leave little notes and suggestions of places to go and see during our stay. She is also incredibly easy to get a hold of if you have any questions during your stay." ~Alicia
house_rules: If you open it, close it.  If you turn it on, turn it off.  If you borrow it, return it.  If you use it, take care of it.  If you break it, fix it.  If you make a mess, clean it up.

host.host_about: Aloha! Thank you for stopping by. I am so excited about your upcoming holiday in Hawaii! I am from the Bay Area and New York and came to Honolulu 5 years ago as a network planner for Hawaiian Airlines (developing and launching new routes). Having visited 30+ countries, I believe that true luxury is not about how much money you spend, but a deep sense of being well taken care of.  I'd love to create that experience for you. Find me on Instagram @angie_hawaii.

reviews.comments:
Angela’s place is in a fantastic location close to everything. It comes equipped with everything you would need for a brief duration. Downtown Honolulu close to museums and historical sites.
Angela was a super host.
Angela's place was amazing. Very clean and everything I expected. Breath taking view and simply a great experience

Me and wife stayed here for a week for our babymoon. Lovely, charming, caring place with a great host. Waking up every morning with a beautiful view, close to all night life and restaurants. Great place to stay when you are traveling to honolulu. 

Tip: parking is available, if you plan to rent a car this place is perfect for you

Angela's place is beautiful, centrally located, can not be beaten! It was perfect for what we needed and Angela made our stay even more special with a surprise gift! She offers crystal clear instructions for what to expect and great recommendations for things to do in the area. We highly recommend her place.

Very decent apartment on the 34th floor. The windows are completed glass all the way to the floor. We could watch the sunrise from the bed room every morning. We enjoyed our stay very much and already have plans to visit the apartment again. It is a financial district, but you have Wall-Markt and a lot of restaurants in walking distance. It just takes you 10 min. to Waikiki by car. Highly recommended by us. Angela was also an awesome host and helped us out when ever we had issues.

Angela is a diligent host. I predict that her condo unit will repeatedly exceed guest expectations because of her deligence. She is always available by email or in person if need be. I loved the bottle of wine - nice touch. Also like the simplicity and elegance of the hidabed. Appreciate the tasteful aesthetics and spectacular view from bedroom. Thanks again, Angela.

Angela was a wonderful host, Communication was clear and timely. The unit was beautifully appointed and had an amazing view. It was sparkling clean and her welcoming touches made the stay extra special. We will definitely stay here again!

Our stay at Angela’s place was one of the highlights of my girlfriend and I’s trip to Oahu. This was our very first time booking a place with Airbnb and Angela definitely surpassed our expectations with this unit and her amazing hospitality. 

The place comes with an incredible view. It comes with free covered parking — a MUST when staying in Downtown Honolulu as parking is very limited or very expensive. It is walking distance to just about everything you need — Walmart, Long Drugs, Walgreens, McDonald’s, etc. Restaurants nearby are yummy like Marukame Udon and the Pig & the Lady (recommended by Angela). The unit also comes with a kitchenette and living room! Bed is comfy too! Waikiki strip is a short driving distance (10-15 mins) from Angela’s unit, very convenient! 

My girlfriend had a little trouble getting into the unit and called Angela and she picked up on the first ring! My girlfriend eventually got into the unit with Angela’s help. Angela even gifted us with a bottle of wine upon entry, so thoughtful and well-needed after spending hours in the plane. Angela was prompt when answering any questions we had through Airbnb app. She even sent us some suggestions and recommendations for food and things to do around the area which we found very helpful! 

In short, look no further and book now as this is truly a hidden gem and amazing and a great value for its price! 10/10, would stay here again if we get the chance (:

Great location in downtown with off street parking, a huge benefit.  We stayed in Angela's lovely place for 5 nights and absolutely loved the morning views of the sun rising.  We were gone all day after morning and rented a car to drive to our destinations while we visited.  The place is decorated with up to date style and Angela was available when we needed her for anything that we could't find on our own.  The bed was not as soft as we are used to, and Angela said she would look into a mattress top to address that issue.  We loved the stay, and even had the opportunity to use the restaurant in the lobby.  The food they served was great.  I felt very happy with the amenities and what we got for the value for what we paid.  Thanks for being a great host.

Staying comfortable at good location is the key for vacation.
This place is very clean and come with separate bed room, kitchen, washer and dryer, WIFI and garage.
Service was excellent.
Great place for a stay in downtown Honolulu. Very cozy, clean and great location. Angela was very responsive and helpful. We really enjoyed our stay here.

This apartement has everything you need if you intend to stay for a couple of days. There are plenty of restaurants situated close to the tower. However, don‘t expect Downtown to be as lively as Waikiki. This is a totaly different area. Howver, we felt very welcomed and comfortable in the apartment and both the check in and check out have been smoothly. As you are located in the 34th floor the view over the town with all its light in the evening is just amazing. If you thought this cannot be beaten, the sunrise will proof you wrong. We would stay here again. Thanks to Angela for making this possible.

Angela's house is very clean and is closely located with many cafe's and restaurants. Especially, we can enjoy the view of the sunrise at the house located on the 34 floor. 
The free parking space is available in the building but the parking card is required before entering the parking building. On the date of check out, Angela provided an instruction on how we can hand over the card, which was very convenient and smooth.
If some pans and pots are provided, it would be much convenient. There are only dishes and we can cook in the microwave. Also, it is little chilly during rainy days. If a thick blanket is available, it would be better. 
Overall, we are satisfied with staying at Angela's house. I can highly recommend the place for your staying in Honolulu.

Angela's apartment was ideal for our two days of work at the Hawaii State Capitol, just a short walk. Her communication was outstanding throughout the experience of booking, arriving, and departing. The apartment is very clean and well appointed; we made use of both the bedroom bed and the living room convertible bed, and both were very comfortable. Angela was helpful and professional with our special requests. We will definitely stay here again when we have work to do at the Capitol! Mahalo nui, Angela.
Very good place and clean with walking in Honolulu Downtown, nice for vacation thanks!

We had the greatest time in Oahu, part of which was due to choosing this fabulous place to stay at. Everything was super clean in the apartment and matched the photos completely. It was stocked with all household supplies we needed and having a washer/dryer was a huge plus. Angela was very responsive whenever we messaged her and provided ample instructions for everything from check in to check out.
Angela is a very nice and helpful host. The place is very clean, quiet and convientent to everywhere in Honolulu. We love this place and had a unforgettable time there.

Stayed at Angela's place for about a week, and the it was amazing! You get a really nice view, and the place is close to everything, which is great. Not to forget, Angela is an amazing host,  very helpful! I'd definitely recommend staying at her place:) I loved it!
Great place close to Chinatown and the Financial District. Angela is excellent at communicating quickly, even when she is away and busy.
Excellent clean space. Friendly host. Wonderful location. Nice features and gorgeous view. Thank you! Will be back soon!

Angela's place is exactly as pictured with spectacular views! The neighborhood is filled with endless restaurants along with numerous cultural attractions. This was my 1st time staying away from the beach and Waikiki, this was definitely a new way to experience Hawaii.
Nice host! Amazing view!
good place to stay

Angela is definitely by far the best host I’ve had from Airbnb! Her genuine hospitality was outstanding and her communication was amazing. She was always available and very helpful with information during our stay. The condo was absolutely fabulous and looked exactly if not better than the photos. Most importantly my daughter enjoyed her stay for her birthday and that’s what really mattered for me. Highly recommend! Mahalo

This is a great location, right in the middle of downtown and close to the up and coming Chinatown and near Waikiki and Ala Moana! This bright, clean unit is very well-appointed and Angela is an ideal host and was very communicative and informative both on how to get to the building and apartment and on various things to do and eat in the area. We loved our stay!

Oferta zgodna z opisem. 
Apartament położony w centrum miasta, blisko sklepów i restauracji, łatwy dojazd do Waikiki (samochodem lub autobusem). Super bonus - darmowe miejsce parkingowe. 
Mieszkanie czyste, widoki z okna niezwykłe. Oferta godna polecenia.

Our stay at Angela's apartment was fantastic. She is a great and responsive host.
The apartment is centrally located ( but not in the craziness of Waikiki) to all amenities, entertainment and great eateries. And it has a parking space!
The apartment was clean and had all the essentials required.
Angela left great recommendations for activities as well as local dining options which we greatly appreciated. 
Loved the apartment and I highly recommend it!
Beautiful view, beautiful apartment, great value!

This place is very nice, clean, and we felt welcomed as soon as we walked in. The host was very available and helpful for us - even giving food tips and replacing a kitchen knife that had a chip in it. The place is very clean and comfortable. The bathroom and bedrooms were in excellent condition. We blinds keep out most ambient light and the bed is very comfy, so we were able to get a good night's rest each night. And we were able to catch a few rainbows over the city!

We enjoyed our time at the pool and love the Chinese food that is available within walking distance. (Waking up next to a donut shop is nice too!) There is a bus stop nearby so public trans around Honolulu was very possible (no need to Uber).
L appartement était très bien, spacieux, accueillant et propre. L immeuble est bien situé et bien placé dans downtown.  La place de parking incluse est clairement un avantage.

Very neat experience staying at Angela’s place. She’s a fabulous host who shows she truly cares about your stay. We loved the free parking and the convienent shops surrounding the condo. If you like to be in the hustle and bustle of the city this place is for you!

Angela's place is better than the pictures you see online. The view is breath taking and everything in the condo is squeaky clean. It took me a very long time to narrow down my air bnb options and I'm so glad I chose this place. If you're contemplating whether or not you should stay here, look no further! This place has everything you need and it's location is unbeatable. Communication with Angela was almost immediate and she's an attentive host. 

Thanks for everything, Angela!
-Espy

Angela is a fantastic host and provides nearly immediate responses to questions. I missed my connection to Hawaii and she contacted support to provide me a refund for the night I wasn't able to make it in, even though she didn't have to. 

This is a great space all to yourself. The free parking and private apartment isn't something you can typical find for the price. It's nice to find a home away from home!
Great location. Immaculate place. My friends and I wish we could have stayed longer!

Angela's 34th floor condo was like staying in the lap of luxury. Check-in was easy, the views were incredible, the pool was lovely, and the location was convenient. Comfy beds, great AC, laundry in the unit, even wine and coffee to greet us. When we had questions Angela was fast to respond and make us feel welcome and at home. Thank you Angela for a wonderful stay!

Angela was a great hostess. She provided very clear and concise instructions and kept in clear contact via messaging.

My family of four stayed in her 34th floor condo in Honolulu. It was very clean, comfortable and has huge windows giving a great view of the area. The central location made for convenient drives to many awesome features of the island in the Honolulu area (Pearl Harbor, Diamond Head, Koko Head, Hanauma Bay, Manoa Falls, Waikiki Beach, Makapu’u Beach and more). So many cool things to do just a short drive away.

This property was so much better than staying in a hotel. We would certainly have no hesitation booking again with Angela!
The apartment is as described and the host thorough with instructions and recommendations. A beautiful city view in comfortable accommodations. Thank you for your assistance.
Very clean and close to shops and restaurants.
Lovely apartment with a terrific view from the 34th floor! Angela was also an understanding and thoughtful host. We had a great experience; thanks Angela!
Great place to stay in Downtown Honolulu.
Angela's place is clean, modern and in a convenient location in downtown Honolulu. Truly enjoyed my stay!
Die Unterkunft war sehr schön! Die Aussicht aus dem Appartment im 34 Stock war atemberaubend!! Wir kommen gerne nochmals.

ﾛｰｶﾙの雰囲気を感じながら､素敵な部屋で滞在することができました｡設備は充実していますし､ちかかくにｽｰﾊﾟｰやﾚｽﾄﾗﾝもおおいので､不便さは感じません｡
ただ､景色がｵﾌｨｽ風景なのと､ﾗﾅｲがなくせっかくのﾊﾜｲの風を部屋で感じられないのが少し残念でした｡
ﾊﾜｲﾘﾋﾟｰﾀｰの方にはｵｽｽﾒしたいです｡

This is a beautiful place to stay and get a nice view of Hawaii!!so far best Airbnb we have reserved!the place is well maintained and instructions to check in and check out are fairly easy and you have Chinatown and Waikiki close by next time we come back we won't hesitate to stay here again.

The condo was clean, well decorated with beautiful views of the city. A great central location and easy to walk to restaurants and stores for necessities. The property it self was very impressive, the glass building, lobby and pool were beautiful. 
Communication was quick. The extra touches of water and coffee were much appreciated. The condo was well equipped with everything needed for a comfortable stay. 
My check in and out went smooth. Check out was a little earlier then most I’ve experienced but understandable. Free parking was a big plus in Honolulu. 
Wish I would have been able to stay longer. Angela was a great hostess and I would defiantly stay at her place again.

Angela's place was great. I stayed at her place for 2 night with my parents and fiance and we were satisfied. The apt was clean and equipped with basic kitchen appliances and bathroom supplies (enough towels for all us & soap). 

We let my parents use the bedroom and slept on the pull out couch (transforms into a bed), and it was surprisingly comfortable. During our stay, we were able to cook a quick breakfast (egg, coffee, tea, ramen) using the kitchen appliances provided and that was very nice. 

There is a designated parking spot for this unit in the parking garage of the building. It was a bit of hassle to go in and out of the garage as the parking spot is on the 8th floor but this is far better than looking for a free parking around this area as parking is always hard in downtown.  

I recommend Angela's place to any couple or family looking for a comfortable place to stay in downtown Honolulu.

하와이에서 에어비앤비를 통해 4곳의 숙소를 사용했고 그중 가장 청결하고 호텔같은 느낌을 준 숙소였습니다.

렌트를 해서 무료주차가 필요하시거나 바퀴벌레 없는 깨끗한 주방에서 요리를 하고싶으신 분이나  보안이 철저하게 되어있기를 바라시는분께 적극추천드려요^^

호스트의 빠른피드백과 친절함은 게스트에게 행복한 여행을 보장해줄꺼에요~
Angela was a great host! We truly enjoyed our stay. Place had a great view and our kids truly enjoyed themselves. I would recommend this property to friends and family.

The tub has jets and I really enjoyed taking a bath! If you want to be in the middle of downtown within walking distance of bars and restaurants (Chinatown), this location is perfect. About 10-15 min drive to Waikiki beach.

Angela is absolutely amazing! She’s super organized with her detailed information that she provides in preparing you for your stay and checks in with you in a timely manner prior to checking in and out of the unit. Angela notified me that she’d be out of the country during my stay and provided me with a back up contact, but still managed to make herself available throughout the time I was in Hawaii. 

I loved the laminated visuals she left on the kitchen counter outlining all detailed information pertaining to the unit, in addition to recommended places to visit. The unit appeared just as it did in the photos, if not better. In the exact words of my toddler walking into the bedroom, “This is amaaaaazing!” 

Location is also very convenient. Ross, Longs, and Walgreens are all right downstairs, along with other cafes and small restaurants all short walking distances away. My daughter and I had fun strolling down to Aloha tower to capture views from the deck, and on another day walked to Iolani Palace and continued all the way down to Kaka’ako Waterfront Park (that walk was a bit of a stretch, but we did it). 

Thank you, Angela! My daughter now tells me she misses her “big home.” Lol!

숙소 위치도 좋고 숙소도 좋았어요. 가까이에 스타벅스, 월마트, 마루카메 우동, 로스 등등 여러 가게들이 바로 위치해 있어서 좋았어요!! 특히 좋았던 것은 Angela의 빠른 답과 메세지였습니다. 허리케인 관련 소식을 계속해서 보내주고 물어보는 것에 대해 친절하고 빠르게 대답해주어 많은 도움이 되었습니다. 이 숙소를 이용하시면 만족 하실 거라고 생각합니다~~

Angela Thank u for your pleasure:D
This room is best!

Our stay was wonderful with only a few slight issues. The description of how to park the vehicle and get the parking pass wasn’t correct. There was no assistant to assist in getting a temp parking pass and when I asked they stated all you had to do was park in your assigned spot, go get your parking pass from your room and put it in the car and toss the ticket you get from the automated ticket booth as you won’t have to pay when you leave since you’ll have your pass to scan. The condo was so lovely, and the views are better than photos can show. It was modern and beautiful. We did have a few issues with the local homeless community who would yell while we walked by and one night a man yelled outside from 3 am for several hours. We should have called the police but we weren’t sure what good that would do. The bed is also very very squeaky and any small movement like waking up to go the bathroom or simply rolling over would wake myself our my partner up. One night we debated sleeping on the futon just so we could have a quite night sleep. Overall the views are so amazing I feel like it really won us over. We loved waking up the sunrise over the mountains. The host Angela was amazing! She assured us our concerns were valid and would be addressed and checked in with us during our stay. I would recommend this place to others including my own friends and family and despite the few issues we encountered we both agreed we would stay at this Airbnb again.

Great view, comfy stay and excellence host. Angela goes above and beyond to ensure that we have a comfy stay at one of her units in downtown. She provided a comprehensive guide to the unit right after booking; and it would be at your advantage to go over the initial parking instruction before hand since it could get a little tricky.  Make sure to ask Angela questions if you are unsure since she is excellence in replying to messages.

Would definitely stay here again! Great location if you are looking for a downtown experience of the city. Quick drive to waikiki, close drive to attractions, and feels like your own private suite. Angela was super attentive, gave clear organized instructions, and the place was amazing! Very comfortable and loved the simple and elegant decor.

I also left a review for one of her other locations as I rented two simultaneously. Very nice place! We loved staying in Chinatown for the proximity to restaurants and it's central location to other places on the island. The place was as described.. Angela was a great host. She was very responsive to any messages and worked hard to make our stay wonderful. I would definitely recommend this place for anyone visiting the island who wants a affordable place away from busy Waikiki!
During our two weeks stay in Oahu, we stayed in a few units on different parts of the island. Angela's unit was by far the best!!! I will definitely book it again in the future!

Great location and nice break from Waikiki. Close to shops, restaurants and Chinatown. Apartment had everything you could need and great views. Angela was a great host, quick responses and offered great recommendations. Pool was also handy in the complex. Loved our stay here and highly recommend to stay here.
Great location, very clean. Love having washer dryer. Perfect for business travel.

If you want to take in more of a local scene but still have the convenience of being close to the airport and highway, then this is the place for you. A great apartment in a high rise with access to Chinatown and the downturn Honolulu area. You’ll be away from the craziness that can be Waikiki but close enough to pop over and enjoy the beaches and restaurants. Great responsiveness and service...

Clean and close to everything! We slept well in this quiet apartment and we loved having laundry and parking at our fingertips. A great home base if you plan to travel around the island and aren’t sticking to one location.

Everything about this Airbnb is spectacular. Great location right downtown, spectacular views from every angle, stylish decor and thoughtful amenities. 

My wife and I stayed here during our honeymoon, we felt like we were right at home. Angela and her team made our stay perfect- from check in to check out. Angela is a wonderful host with local recommendations and she was timely with all communication. 

The only things we wished for were better remote controls for the TV’s and a less squeaky bed/better mattress cover that didn’t make the sheets slide off. However the sunrise views and multiple full rainbows we saw from our window during our stay made up for it! 

Overall this was a fantastic experience and we hope to come back soon!
If you're looking for a place in the heart of Honolulu look no further. Great location and condo with amazing views. Walking distance to everything.

Angela is super helpful and very responsive. The property is in prime location for all business agencies in town, I can walk to my meetings easily, free parking made my packed day very efficient!  Thank you!

This is my first vacation with my love together, Angela has been a great host being very responsive always. I have stayed in Airbnb in Shanghai, Denver, New York, Los Angeles; etc. This is so far the best Airbnb I have ever had: Room is extremely clean and bright, identical to the pictures !!! The laundry definitely is a good help for us to clean our swim-wears after the beach. Location is convenient, pretty much we could get to any major tourism attractions within 15 minutes of drive or walk. Highly recommended!!

It was lovely staying at Angela's place. It is stylish, comfortable and clean. The bed is very comfortable, especially the sofa bed which is beyond expected. Angela also responsed to any of my requests promptly and being very helpful. 

The location of the unit is in downtown which is just minutes walk away from the Iolani Palace and Chinatown. Although traffic can be very busy during peak hour in weekdays if you drive. 

Definitely recommend Angela's place and would like to stay again when we return.

We really enjoyed staying at Angela's condominium. her Airbnb was a great value for the price (especially due to its central location near Waikiki Beach, diamondhead trail, etc) and it's amenities (including a full and new kitchen, washer and dryer). The parking space in an adjacent garage was a huge plus as well. The view of the city from the 34th floor was stunning. 
She was always very responsive to any questions and would regularly check in to make sure we were enjoying our stay.

I love this place the location was perfect right in the hustle and bustle of downtown also place is immaculately clean and super nice it's got everything you could ever need there , there's so many restaurants bars clubs right in the heart of downtown  and the owner is very nice so patient with me as I had forgotten to return the key on time and so she reminded me kindly to return it. even though the washer wasn't working I didn't bother to bother them about itI know if I had probably called them they probably would have gotten that fixed immediately since they were quick she asked me about it after checkout I know by now if they have it fixed because they had noticed it was not working right away after we had left though.

Our stay at Angela’s place helped make our trip that much more memorable. The location is centrally located to all of the hip restaurants and happy hours in downtown Honolulu, and the view of the city is fantastic! Angela was so thoughtful to leave little notes and suggestions of places to go and see during our stay. She is also incredibly easy to get a hold of if you have any questions during your stay. I would definitely recommend staying at her place if you’re in the area.
Angela was perfect host. Helped when needed. Everything went smoothly. With bikibike bicycle system you could get easily around the city. Mahalo
Great location, save on the resort and parking fees. In the heart of Honolulu, with great access to all the wonderful sites of this island paradise.

Angela's place was a great option for us during our short vacation/anniversary in Honolulu. It is located in downtown in a very well-managed high rise. The view is spectacular, waking up to the sunrise felt very exclusive and awesome.  Angela has planned everything for her guests to the last detail.  All amenities included, informative notes on the surrounding area and the apartment was very clean. There are several stores and cafes near the building adding to the convenience. Checkin was the easiest Ive experienced with detailed pictures and information on how to check in and where to park. Compared to anywhere else I've stayed in Honolulu, the value is unbeatable. Waikiki is a short drive away, and entrance to Pali highway is close in case you're heading to the other side of the island.   I would highly recommend this place to anyone.

This condo was very good for our 4 family with enough space and easy access to Walmart, starbucks, longs drugs, Mcdonald etc. One queen size bed and two sofa beds gave comfortable rest and good sleep. Angela is very prompt to response and proposed various advices from check-in to check-out. No balcony was only one inconvenience for me because I’m a smoker ^^. Free parking, fast wifi and clean room conditions are good though it’s a bit old building. I recommend 4 member family to stay in this condo.
Great place to stay

Would highly recommend Angela’s place! Great location that’s within walking distance to many sites and restaurants. Her place was comfortable, clean, and offered beautiful views of the city. We loved her recommendations and thoughtful touches throughout the apartment. Would stay here again without hesitation!

I absolutely loved Angela's place!
It was very welcoming and had a lot of amenities!

It was close to the airport and the location isn't too bad if you can overlook the homelessness around the area. 

Overall, I enjoyed my stay and cant wait to stay again!

Very satisfied with the apartment, landscape room, large Windows, complete facilities, a very warm family living.
The landlord was also enthusiastic. The location is also good. Shopping, travel is very convenient. Walk to the dock to do cruise whale watching.
If I go to Hawaii again, I will stay here. Look forward to next time.
Great space! Super convenient and close to everything- Exactly as described! Angela is a great host and I couldn’t have asked for a better experience  Very pleased with everything- Thanks!!!!
We had a great stay! My fiancé and I had just gotten engaged and decided to have a special night out in Waikiki to celebrate. It’s only about a 7 minute Uber. We had a great time!

비행기와 호텔예약에 착오가 생겨 
하루를 에어비엔비를 통해 지내게
되었습니다.

호스트의 신속한 응대로 쉽게 체크인
할수 있었고, 생각했던것 보다 룸 컨디션이 훌륭했습니다. 또한, 34층에서 내려다보는야경도 훌륭했구요 
다만 와이키키비치와는 조금거리가 있었습니다 하지만 유명한 마루카메 우동 집 근처였고  이동하는데 큰 불편함은 없었습니다 

감사합니다
Angela’s space is exactly as described. We thoroughly enjoyed the unit and would definitely recommend. Thank you Angela and we look forward to seeing you in the future.

name: Darling Point
summary: This light filled apartment offers a great Sydney experience. City views from the living area highlight its great location. An amazing garden to enjoy the spring time blooms. Newly renovated bathroom with internal washer/dryer for your convenience. Unfortunately, this apartment is not suitable for children under 13 years.
description: This light filled apartment offers a great Sydney experience. City views from the living area highlight its great location. An amazing garden to enjoy the spring time blooms. Newly renovated bathroom with internal washer/dryer for your convenience. Unfortunately, this apartment is not suitable for children under 13 years. Our place is a 5-10 minute walk to Edgecliff station which provides lots of trains and buses to the wider SYDNEY area. A beautiful 5 minute walk down to Rushcutters bay to enjoy the harbour. On the other side of the hill, we have the hustle and bustle of trendy Double Bay.
transit: Our place is a 5-10 minute walk to Edgecliff station which provides lots of trains and buses to the wider SYDNEY area. A beautiful 5 minute walk down to Rushcutters bay to enjoy the harbour. On the other side of the hill, we have the hustle and bustle of trendy Double Bay.
house_rules: All dishes to be washed.  Linen stripped at conclusion of stay. Strictly no parties.

reviews.comments: We absolutely loved our time at Leah’s! The location was amazing, super close to the train station so it was a breeze getting around. The place itself was modern, very clean, spacious, had all the amenities you need and more! Would recommend to anyone, thanks again :)
We had a fantastic stay thanks Leah!

Perfect place to stay in Sydney. We were very happy with this clean and large appartment. The location is really good; we took the train or the ferry to go to the CBD which is a really short stroll either way. 

Leah was really nice and responsive. Even with our late arrival, everything was easy. I only have positive things to say about this place!

name: Perfect Location! QUIET ROOM just off LA RAMBLA
summary: We offer you a cozy room, comfortable, clean and quiet, with an incredible central location, right next to La Rambla and 5 minute walk to Plaza Catalunya. Ideal spot for someone who wants to discover real Barcelona's culture and top spots but sleep in a quiet atmosphere.
space: • We aim to offer what we like to find when we travel: a comfortable, nice, clean room with a relaxed and warm atmosphere.  • The flat is functional. Cozy and simple. It has a relaxed atmosphere with a very nice and peaceful energy.     • The room is quiet and dark at night to allow you a good sleep. Ideal for a single person. It has a comfortable double bed (135x200cm), inner door lock and some storage space.  • Includes clean sheets, towels and a personal bathmat.
description: We offer you a cozy room, comfortable, clean and quiet, with an incredible central location, right next to La Rambla and 5 minute walk to Plaza Catalunya. Ideal spot for someone who wants to discover real Barcelona's culture and top spots but sleep in a quiet atmosphere.  • We aim to offer what we like to find when we travel: a comfortable, nice, clean room with a relaxed and warm atmosphere.  • The flat is functional. Cozy and simple. It has a relaxed atmosphere with a very nice and peaceful energy.     • The room is quiet and dark at night to allow you a good sleep. Ideal for a single person. It has a comfortable double bed (135x200cm), inner door lock and some storage space.  • Includes clean sheets, towels and a personal bathmat. • High Speed Internet (WiFi signal) in the whole flat.  • Access to the kitchen only for quick meals (salads, sandwiches). It's equipped with a wide variety of utensils. • Our street is a pedestrian promenade. It's central location allows you to find plent
notes: • The location of the flat is central. It's right next to La Rambla. Five minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. "Liceu" Metro station is 1 minute walk so you can get everywhere. • The flat is close to several supermarkets -Simply (round the corner), Condis (1 minute walk), Carrefour (3 minutes walk on La Rambla).   If you have any question, feel free to ask us :) Looking forward to hear from you soon and hoping you have a wonderful stay in this vibrant and amazing city! Best regards, Caro and Mike
transit: • Our street is a pedestrian promenade. It's central location allows you to find plenty options for restaurants, bars and other stores. You may reach the famous Boqueria Market on an easy 5 minute walk from the flat.  • The beach is only 10 minutes from the flat by subway or bike. You may also get there within a 20-25 minute walk passing by Port Vell, the oldest port in Barcelona. • Transportation: one line of subway 50 metres away from the flat that can quickly take you anywhere in the city. You also have numerous bus lines, including the Night Bus which works the whole night.
access: • High Speed Internet (WiFi signal) in the whole flat.  • Access to the kitchen only for quick meals (salads, sandwiches). It's equipped with a wide variety of utensils.
house_rules: -  Please, keep the common areas clean and be careful with electrodomestics. - This is a smoke-free flat. - Our rules are based on respect, reciprocity and honesty. - The room is for checked-in guests only, not allowed to bring new guests to the room.

host.host_about:
Hello, we are Carolina and Mike. I am from Buenos Aires and he is from London. 

We live in Barcelona because we love how arty, multicultural and lively it is. A big plus is the weather, 300 plus days of sun a year makes our experience even better! We also enjoy having the beach and the mountain so close as we love being out in nature. 

Mike is a plant-based chef and I am a health coach. We have a nice home that reflects tranquility, harmony and good energy. 

We enjoy cooking healthy tasty meals. Sharing delicious and flavourful plant-based foods is one of our most enjoyable hobbies. "By doing what you love you inspire and awaken the hearts of others" is our motto.

We speak fluent English, Spanish and can understand some Italian and Portuguese :)

We are currently renting a single room in an amazing location. The room is quiet and cozy and would fit perfectly any solo traveller. We like to offer an atmosphere of tranquility and happiness at home, as any kind of tip and help during your stay. 

Looking forward to hear from you soon!

Hoping you have a wonderful stay in this vibrant and amazing city... Welcome! 

Best regards,

Caro and Mike

name: Comfy & quiet 1 BR - East Williamsburg
summary: Cozy, quiet apartment. The space is always freshly cleaned, overlooking a communal courtyard, in a well-kept new building with code access. 2 min. walk to Montrose L stop. Just a short walk to everything in endlessly trendy Williamsburg or to under-the-radar local faves and awesome street art in Bushwick.  I will not be living full-time in the space, so there will be plenty of closet, dresser, and under the bed storage for guests.
description: Cozy, quiet apartment. The space is always freshly cleaned, overlooking a communal courtyard, in a well-kept new building with code access. 2 min. walk to Montrose L stop. Just a short walk to everything in endlessly trendy Williamsburg or to under-the-radar local faves and awesome street art in Bushwick.  I will not be living full-time in the space, so there will be plenty of closet, dresser, and under the bed storage for guests. There are washers/dryers (accepts quarters) in the building, which can be accessed with a code. Courtyard is shared, but please be respectful about noise. Feel free to reach out at anytime with questions, I'm also happy to share neighborhood recommendations or ideas for exploring NYC. Best neighborhood in the world (maybe biased)! Lots of cafes, bars, restaurants, and nightlife. Restaurants like Win Son and Roberta's are big highlights. Fun late night spots like Duck Duck and Featherweight are just around the corner. 25 min. cab ride from La Guardia Easy publ
neighborhood_overview: Best neighborhood in the world (maybe biased)! Lots of cafes, bars, restaurants, and nightlife. Restaurants like Win Son and Roberta's are big highlights. Fun late night spots like Duck Duck and Featherweight are just around the corner.
transit: 25 min. cab ride from La Guardia Easy public transportation from JFK (A train to L train) Short walk to Montrose L train (2 minutes) which will have you downtown Manhattan (Union Square) in less than 20 minutes.  less than 15 minute walk to J/M/Z trains.  Street parking is fairly manageable. Uber/Lyft is fairly inexpensive to get into Manhattan or around Brooklyn.
access: There are washers/dryers (accepts quarters) in the building, which can be accessed with a code. Courtyard is shared, but please be respectful about noise.
interaction: Feel free to reach out at anytime with questions, I'm also happy to share neighborhood recommendations or ideas for exploring NYC.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I work as a creative in advertising. I've lived in New York for 12 years in neighborhoods all over Brooklyn and Manhattan. I settled into "East Williamsburg" in 2016 and love the quirky neighborhood gems and convenience to other parts of Brooklyn and into Manhattan (though I rarely need to go into the city on the weekends). 

I tend to go out of town quite a bit between work, family, and a cross-country boyfriend, so would love to share my happy place while I'm away.

reviews.comments: Sheila's place is very nice. It is small but cozy with all you may need for a comfortable stay. It is nicely located if you want to explore Brooklyn, and just a quick ride away from Manhattan. Sheila was always ready to answer all our questions and gave us some rather nice tips about local Brooklyn favorites.
Sheila’s place is a great stay for couples. Me and my boyfriend had a great mini getaway.
Sheila was great. Very responsive and helpful. Would definitely stay again!

Sheila was so quick to respond to any questions. The flexibility in check in time was great. The place is very close to the subway which gets you into Manhattan so quickly. Lots of coffee shops, restaurants and shops in walking distance to Williamsburg. 
Everything you need in a place to crash near all the fun stuff to do in Brooklyn and Manhattan!
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a fantastic stay in Sheila's lovely apartment! It's small, but everything you need for a short stay in New York. The location in Williamsburg is perfect (love this neighborhood), 2 minutes walk voor the Metro that brings you to Manhattan and a lot of hotspots for (late night) drinks, dining, coffee and lunch!
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I highly recommend Sheila’s place! Her place is comfortable and very clean. Sheila was an excellent host; she was very responsive and quick to answer questions while we were at her place. Her place allows easy access to the best of Brooklyn and, with the L nearby, all of Manhattan.

Sheila's accommodation is excellent, great location, perfect space for a couple. The communication was great and the self-check was super easy, we felt safe and comfortable during the 8 days we spent there. I would recommend Sheila's apartment to anyone looking for a comfortable trip that combines Manhattan and Brooklyn in perfect harmony.

name: Entire Sunny Brooklyn Apt for Art & Cat-Lovers!
summary: Entire sunny, spacious, & art-filled top floor apt with wood floors, eat-in kitchen, living room, bedroom, and a large art studio/library/office space. 15 min subway ride to downtown Manhattan/Wall Street. Within a 10 min walk to Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, & Botanic Garden. Area has many cafes, restaurants, bars, and grocery stores. The fee is reduced in exchange for pet-sitting 2 people-friendly and chill cats. Clean and responsible renters only - no smoking, outside guests, or parties.
description: Entire sunny, spacious, & art-filled top floor apt with wood floors, eat-in kitchen, living room, bedroom, and a large art studio/library/office space. 15 min subway ride to downtown Manhattan/Wall Street. Within a 10 min walk to Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, & Botanic Garden. Area has many cafes, restaurants, bars, and grocery stores. The fee is reduced in exchange for pet-sitting 2 people-friendly and chill cats. Clean and responsible renters only - no smoking, outside guests, or parties. I'm available by phone/email anytime. Caribbean neighborhood with lovely tree-lined streets and many parks, music venues, and galleries nearby. Apt is just off of lively Franklin Ave w/ local restaurants, cafes, shops. Near Franklin Ave subway (2,3,4,5,S) trains.
neighborhood_overview: Caribbean neighborhood with lovely tree-lined streets and many parks, music venues, and galleries nearby. Apt is just off of lively Franklin Ave w/ local restaurants, cafes, shops.
transit: Near Franklin Ave subway (2,3,4,5,S) trains.
interaction: I'm available by phone/email anytime.
house_rules: - Renting to tidy and responsible pet-lovers only. The fee is low in exchange for cat-sitting: fresh water and food 2 x/day and cleaning litter box daily. The cats love people and are very friendly! - No smoking, outside guests, or parties. - Not available as a location for film or photography shoots.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm an artist/designer/curator currently living in Brooklyn. Have lived and traveled to many parts of the world, enjoying meeting people who live there and preferring the best local hang out spots over the large touristy places (especially with food!). Walkable neighborhoods are my favorite. I'm very friendly and personable, but also an independent traveler.

reviews.comments: Lovely New York apartment with personality. Convenient neighborhood, great artwork, very comfortable bed, super clean. Purry snaggletooth cats, friendly responsive host. Bring ear plugs and a sleep mask if you're not used to radiator clanging or early morning sun. 4th floor, no elevator,

Beautiful, spacious apartment with two of Brooklyn's friendliest cats and lots of art.
Erin really set it up for these two artists to feel comfortable with our visit and exploring the city.
Highyly recommended!

Erin's place was ideally located with tons of excellent restaurants nearby so we didn't end up using the tiny kitchen for much beyond hating up leftovers. Her super friendly cats kept us feeling well-loved--it's definitely a good place for cat lovers. The artwork was beautiful and did wonders to transform an old-school Brooklyn apartment into a lovely gallery. Erin made us feel welcome and at home.
Great place and nice cats.

The apartment was very stylish, clean, and comfortable (including the bed!). It’s close to a subway station, which was convenient for us so we could visit Manhattan as well as explore different parts of Brooklyn. Erin’s cats were friendly and sweet. After we arrived, I had a question about the instructions and Erin responded very quickly. Highly recommend!

Erin’s apartment is lovely, extremely clean, and beautifully decorated! It was very conveniently located to the subway and her cats were so sweet. We visited on a very hot weekend, and it was a bit warm in the apartment, since there’s no AC unit (there is a good fan though!) — but it was in no way unpleasant. I’d definitely recommend staying here!!

Erin's place is a great value, and a great location. Easy to walk over to the Brooklyn museum or Prospect Park,  or catch the 2 train into Manhattan as the Franklin Ave stop is a 2 minute walk. Up and coming 'hood with some good coffee shops and restaurants.  Great for value shoppers. Would stay there again.
Had a fantastic stay at Erin’s place with her sweet cats. The neighbourhood is great with lots of fantastic restaurants. It was the perfect base for exploring the city.

Great place!! In a busy neighborhood just minutes away from the subway and really cute interior. Great AC for hot summer days. Her two cats were super friendly and I loved getting to spend a few days with them! Also Erin was super flexible and friendly, highly recommend this place!
Great apartment in a great location. Easy walk to the subway and the park. The 2 host kitties were adorable and so sweet! Would recommend for sure.

Very nice and clean apartment with two friendly and adorable cats in the heart of Brooklyn with lots of shops, caffees and restaurants around. Metro station Franklin Ave is just around the corner a 30mins to midtown Manhattan.

Great apt, classic Brooklyn, excellent location, nearby amenities on Franklin Ave, easy transportation, super communicative and generous host. If your visiting New York/Brooklyn , you won’t do much better than this.
Definitely got the NYC experience with staying at Erin’s place. Kimba and Poe were amazing and the area was safe! Loved the local restaurants.
Erin was a fantastic host with a lovely apartment and two adorable cats. She was easy to communicate with and very hospitable. Would recommend staying here.

Erin is a wonderful host and her apartment is very spacious with beautiful art and two friendly older kitties. The apartment is located very close to many great places, though visitors should be cautious walking on that side of Eastern Parkway at night. The building itself is older and has moderately thin walls but neighbors seemed friendly and it was nothing at all out of the ordinary for Brooklyn. Overall a very stylish place to stay and Erin is a great communicator and very accommodating! The price point is very reasonable too.

name: Comfortable Room
summary: Are space features full kitchen, bathroom, music rehearsal space, and bedroom for one person. It is located a few minutes walking to the L train in Brooklyn, NY

host.host_about:
My team and I at The Apartment Service are proud to have been helping people with short and long stay apartment rentals across Sydney since 1989. 

Property professionals say location is everything and we believe that a convenient location is essential, especially in the rental market. We can offer you some of the best locations accross all the major areas of Sydney, and all of our  apartments are carefully selected for their proximity to cafes, key business and retail districts, public transport, and tourist hotspots.

Furnished apartments are a cost-effective alternative to five star hotels and have the added advantage of feeling like you are staying in your own home with separate lounges, kitchens and laundries, and modern appliances.

We've found Airbnb to be a perfect fit for our apartments and we're proud to have achieved a high volume of 5 star reviews consistently since joining. 

Please don't hesitate to view our 150+ properties listed on Airbnb across all areas of Sydney, and do get in touch for quick and friendly assistance.

reviews.comments: Location was brilliant, parking easy, undercover and secure. The balcony is large. We really could have used an air-con during our stay and the place does not have one. It has 2 portable fans, but that was not enough to beat Sydney's summer heat. For everything else the place was OK.

name: APARTAMENTO INTEIRO PARA O RÉVEILLON!
summary: Excelente apartamento localizado próximo ao metrô, há 10 min da praia, do lado a um supermercado e academia.  Apartamento de família, que apenas alugamos para datas festivas como ano novo, feriados, e carnaval. Qualquer hóspede que vier será muito bem vindo e terá todo o auxílio que necessitar. O Apartamento conta com dois quartos, onde um deles possui ar condicionado, com uma boa sala que também possui ar, dois banheiros, uma cozinha, e uma área de serviço.  Dúvidas me chamem no chat.

name: Incredibly cozy room close to Manhatan
summary: *Make sure that you check pictures and description. It is small private room for 1 person with single bed.  Great to get rest after long day exploring NYC but it doesn't have  a lot extra space* This is a small, but very cozy room located in Bedford–Stuyvesant, Brooklyn. It takes only 25 min to get to Manhattan. You will be sharing this appartment with me and other Airbnb guests. The building has been just renovated, but managed to keep its old charm.
space: There is a shared, well-stocked kitchen (where you can always grab some tea, coffee or snacks) and a nice living room with huge windows. You are getting one Twin-sized beds, a walk-in closet.There are also a washing machines and a dryer available.   As for the toiletries, you are getting everything you need - towels; toothbrushes and toothpaste; body wash, shampoo and conditioner.
description: *Make sure that you check pictures and description. It is small private room for 1 person with single bed.  Great to get rest after long day exploring NYC but it doesn't have  a lot extra space* This is a small, but very cozy room located in Bedford–Stuyvesant, Brooklyn. It takes only 25 min to get to Manhattan. You will be sharing this appartment with me and other Airbnb guests. The building has been just renovated, but managed to keep its old charm. There is a shared, well-stocked kitchen (where you can always grab some tea, coffee or snacks) and a nice living room with huge windows. You are getting one Twin-sized beds, a walk-in closet.There are also a washing machines and a dryer available.   As for the toiletries, you are getting everything you need - towels; toothbrushes and toothpaste; body wash, shampoo and conditioner. Living room, Kitchen I usually give my guests space. But if you have any questions, problems or just want to ask couple tips about places to eat, drink etc I al
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very green, featuring the famous-New-York-style residential buildings.  All the convenience are close to the place (grocery stores, pharmacy, bank, gym etc.) It is a quite place, but is only 20 minutes walking away from a very hip area of Bushwick, where one can find plenty of bars, restaurants and galleries.
transit: Myrtle-Broadway Av (M & J trains). Only 25 min to Manhattan! To get to LaGuardia: 25min on a cab  1h 20min by public transit.  To JFK:  30min on a cab  1h 20min by public transit.
access: Living room, Kitchen
interaction: I usually give my guests space. But if you have any questions, problems or just want to ask couple tips about places to eat, drink etc I always would love to help you!
house_rules: - Please take off shoes when you enter the apartment (There is a crate with slippers - help yourself)  - Ask me before use laundry machine  - Don't open windows with AC - Don't forget to turn off the lights and AC when you go out - Make sure you close all doors when you leave - Stay green and recycle. Here in New York, we try to keep the planet clean by separating our trash (there is a separate bin for paper, cardboard,  plastic and glass, and one for everything else) - Don’t throw anything on the street or in the trash bins outside by yourself. If you do that there are separate bins for trash, plastic(metal, glass) and cardboard.  - Do not flush paper towels / baby wipes / personal hygiene objects down the toilet (only toilet paper) - Don’t use towels to clean you face with make up on it please (I will charge you 20$ if you will) - We are all about hanging out, but please don’t  be loud from 11pm to 11 am  - If needed, I can hold your luggage after you check out - Let me know if somet

host.host_about:
Hey! 
My name is Alena.
I moved to New York 3 years ago. I love that city and hope that you will enjoy it too!
I'm pastry Chef and spend a lot of time at work. You can be in touch with me on the phone all time.
Also I have roommate who will help you with any problems.

I would be happy to host you in my apartment!

reviews.comments: The host was awesome. Very attentive and great communication! She provided toiletry and amenities. Washed and renewed sheets after each guest. Close to the M and J train to get into Manhattan. I appreciate how the place was heated especially during the cold season. Highly recommend this place!!!
great stay, thanks for asnwering text immdieatly, good time besides the hard time with opening the door
Great place for budget travelers. The shower was really nice! Only problem was having a little bit of cigarette smoke come from the air vent from time to time (when the heat came on).

Alena's home was extremely relaxing. My best experience yet. The place was very clean. She was very welcoming and the fact that I had my own bathroom really made the stay that much more relaxing. Thank you so much.
Alena is an extremely helpful, responsive, and thoughtful host. Throughout my stay she was so quick to help with any issues that may have popped up with other renters. The space is as it’s described.
I would recommend this place for anyone spending couple of days in NYC, Alena was amazing and helpful. The apartment was so clean
Place was good, really easy to get to the public transportation, and host was really friendly.
10/10 all round. A swift replier with a clean, stylish home. Could not reccomend enough!
Alena’s place in Brooklyn is very cozy and offers all of the essentials during your stay! The area is safe and close to the G train.

Apartamento muy acogedor, relativamente cerca del metro que conecta con manhattan, Alena is excellent host! she always attended, i hope i could come back to nyc soon and definitely i'll looking to stay with alena!

I contacted Alena last minute, and when I say last minute I mean 2 hours before I needed to check in. I was in town for work and my job needed me to stay another night. She graciously accepted my request and check in was a breeze. It’s about a 10 minute walk to the train station and a short ride to the city. Place was very clean and comfortable. I had a great nights sleep!
Alena was waiting my arrival till late night,that was very good.But for my early check out she dont get payment back.That was not nice
Great spot, great place and great people.  I will definitely return!
Nice place especially if your looking to go to NY and not break the bank.
Alena is nice and the room is quite comfortable.

Thank you Alena for hosting me! I enjoyed the peaceful and relaxing mode of the house and the privacy of my little room. The neighboorhood is also quiet, needed public transport or uber to coffee shops or other places (Brooklyn museum). The sheets and the bathroom were very clean- all I needed for my first days in NY. Thank you for letting me leave my baggage in the living room for some extra hours till I could pick them up to my friend's house. I appreciate that a lot!

Good space to tour the city. The house is in a quiet but safe neighbour and you have a bus close to the riverside of Brooklyn (east Manhattan) where to you can transfer to the train (metro) to get there. There is a subway station too and a bus to JFK just one block. Yet I used Uber hehe
Perfect place, just what I was looking for. Will stay again

Rigtig fint og hyggeligt sted. Særlig velegnet til unge og hvis man er mere end én. Det ligger lidt lang ude i Brooklyn, så den 10 minutters gåtur hjem fra metroen føltes ikke så tryg hvis man går alene om aftenen, så brugte uber - hvilket til gengæld var ret billigt :) om dagen var det intet problem. 

Lejligheden er stor, ren og pæn, og det er hyggeligt med de andre besøgende, man møder indimellem nær man er hjemme. Alt man skal bruge er nemt at komme til og værten er hurtig og nem at få fat på hvis man har spørgsmål. :)
A great house in an area that is up-and coming with a true Brooklyn feel. Room is basic, ideal for small budget and short stay, if you just need a bed. Alena is a lovely, thoughtful host :)

Séjour parfait pour 2 nuits à New-York. Idéalement situé entre JFK et Manhattan. Alena est hyper réactive en terme de communication et laisse une place importante à l’intimité de ses hôtes. A noter : l'appartement est super propre.  J'apprécie ! Merci Aléna !
Alena's place was great! It's exactly as described and she was super helpful throughout the stay. Check in was super easy and would definitely stay here again if I am in the area.

Es tal como se muestra en las fotos, tienen que tener en cuenta que la ubicación no es la mejor o por lo menos si son solos ya que la estación de subte que te lleva a Manhattan queda a unas 8 largas cuadras y en mi caso no me parecía muy segura. El servicio de wifi en la sala funciona de 10 pero en la habitación no. En cuanto a los anfitriones solo conoci a Anthony que fue muy cordial y Alena la traté solo por msj que también fue muy amable. Si vas en grupo es distinto, pero solo se complica la sensación de seguridad en mi casa.
Very nice clean and comfortable stay. I appreciated Alena as a host.
Alena is great. Her place was easy to find. She explained everything and answered all the questions I had in a speedy manner. The price was amazing. I would highly recommend.
Very clean,  very cool decor, lots of lovely little touches to the place that really make it feel special! Highly recommend!
Pretty cool apt and nice neighborhood.

I was here for about a month, which I am very gracious for. The place wasn’t as clean as one would expect. There is a no shoe rule inside; however, I was constantly stepping on things with my bare feet. With a month stay, I only had one towel and the sheets weren’t changed. Other than that it was a great stay. It is an easy walk to the subway, and easy ride into manhattan.
Alena's space was clean and worked out well for my stay.

Absolute peace. Alena's space does exactly what you want it to. I hardly saw/heard anyone, never had to wait for any amenities/utilities and was welcome to use all that was present. She's in the HEART of Bed-Stuy and the city is always 15 minutes away.

I had a wonderfully chill stay.
Awesome place not far from Manhattan, and a bus stop nearby
Great place and great communication. All you need for a comfortable budget stay in Brooklyn.

My room was just as the image. I felt really at peace after a long day in NYC, and I wish I could have stayed there for my entire trip. It might not be ideal for people taking subway back late or wanting to eat healthy nearby, but for people like me who want to come back to a chill spot with a clean bathroom and home after NYC tourist times, it’s wonderful! Alena is a gem of a host!
The place is a nice and easy way to stay in Brooklyn. Tamá is a great Filipino restaurant just around the corner from there too!
Very Clean and spacious. My room was a bit small, but all I could expect for a single bed room. Alena was very responsive with all my questions and I appreciated a safe, thoughtful, and clean space.
Good place for the price.  Clean and homey. Good street parking.
Alena’s place was amazing. I had such a great time being there. Very cozy and comfortable. I will definitely stay there again next time I’m in Brooklyn.

The place was nice and easy. The room was small but comfortable. The only problem was that there is no ac and you’re on the top floor. The weather wasn’t too bad so the window open at night with a fan made it comfortable? But there’s a fair amount of street noise at times. This place will be perfect as the weather continues to get cooler and you don’t need an open window!
Solid room for an amazing price. If you need a room just to sleep in then this is a really great option
Great location and good value for price. Host was very clear communicating during check in.

Alena’s place was cozy just like described. Perfect spot if you’re just staying in Brooklyn for a few days. We only interacted once but she was accommodating, responsive & gave me a few suggestions for cool things to do in the area. Great host, thanks Alena.

Nice room in Brooklyn, located in a big apartment where many guests come and go. Not the cleanest option in town, not the best neighborhood to hang out (not much to do and not a lot of food options besides fast foods and pizzas), but still a good option considering the price. Fancier areas such as Bushwick are close-by and the transportation to Manhattan is super fast and easy (15-20min via the express train).
Alena’s is comfortable and in a pretty convenient location. She’s easy to communicate with and is down to help troubleshoot problems as they arise!

Nice place with updates in an old Brooklyn apartment. Bed was fine for 1 person but anymore would be pushing it. Updated bathroom was a nice touch and access to kitchen was nice. Living room was welcoming and warm
Reliable, cozy, and inexpensive.

Alena’s place was great. I was only in town for two nights and this was perfect. It was clean, easy to check in, and close to the subway. Room was comfortable and everything was great. I would definitely recommend to a friend.

It's also an inviting home with lots of natural light; everyone who stayed here has loved it. Most guest love that it's quiet, clean, convenient, and best of all family friendly. Because we are family oriented, we cannot allow guest to throw parties or smoke in the home. We like our guest to enjoy their time however, partying or smoking guests will be asked to leave without refund.  I normally have a 2-night minimum, but if a guest only needs to stay 1 night, private message me so I can make accommodations. Feel free message me with any questions.

neighborhood_overview: This location has a Walk Score of 89 out of 100 which makes it a very walkable and desirable area. Most errands can be accomplished on foot and the building is only a two-minute walk from the 2 train 7 Avenue Express or the 5 train Lexington Avenue Express. In addition, this location is in the Williamsbridge neighborhood in New York which is one of our most walkable neighborhoods with a neighborhood Walk Score of 87. Close to everything from restaurants, parks, gyms and much more.
notes: If you love to bowling, the bowling lanes are only a short 10-minute walk away from the home at 1215 East Gun Hill Road Bronx NY 10469. Take a free tour of the Bronx ZOO on Wednesdays. The zoo is approximately 10 minutes from the home. If you need a car to get around, there is a car rental agency 15 mins away or you may use the car service described below.  Lastly, If you need airport transportation to and from the home we can arrange a pick up for a small fee. Also, we are able to arrange a reliable Chauffer in a Luxury vehicle to show you around the city if you like to experience New York City up and personal.
transit: The 2 or 5 trains and plenty of buses for easy access to public transportation.  About 30 min from JFK, 17 min from Laguardia airport, and roughly 35 min to Manhattan. A personal driver is available to show you around and get you to any destination desired. Go out, enjoy the city nightlife and drink all you like without worry; your personal driver will make sure you get back safely. Message us for more details on this service.
access: Everything!!! If you send me a message request I would be happy to help in anyway I can.
interaction: We will give you as much privacy as you need so you may come and go as you will. We only ask that you respect other guest or residents by entering or exiting the home quietly.  The host will usually only be available via text, what app, Airbnb messenger, phone or email. Local guests are required to show valid, non-expired state ID upon arrival, otherwise will not be granted entry.
house_rules: We take our house rules seriously and they will be enforced so please consider them carefully before booking.  - Guests must present ID.  - NO SMOKING of any kind.  - NO Parties or Events  - NO unannounced guest allowed - Quiet Time 9PM - 9AM - No Third party booking   Violators will be asked to leave immediately without a refund and a $250 cleaning fee will be billed for guest who violate our no smoking rule.

host.host_about: Andy is a real estate entrepreneur with ambitious goals. He is also one of the nicest persons you will ever meet. To no surprise, Andy is also easy going with a kind personality. In addition to being a responsible guy, he is super clean and organized.

Andy was an amazing host, he answered all our questions and made it very easy for us to check in and check out. The place is wonderful and really close to the metro station, comfortable beds, a clean environment and a beautiful kitchen with everything we need. 
ONE OF THE BEST AIRBNB EXPERIENCE EVER!!!
Great place! Super clean! Has everything you need and the host was really responsive! Will def stay again if in the area!

First I want to thank Mr. Andy to go out of his way to help me check in at 1pm thank you very much for that.

Mr. Andy have to be upfront with his description about the place, first the place is a basement where the hot water foundation went trough, make the room hotter then the rest of the place,  you have no control over the heat or AC. He set the temperature 78 first night, when I tell him about it he told me to open the door.then ignored me if that would change tomorrow, I have to message him trough Airbnb to get a respond from him next day I had no sleep that night, he tell me  he will set it to 65 for the rest of my stay, but  only let it for two days change it to 76, I only had two days of sleep. 

The  stairs is very slippery I fall in front of him mess up my pants, had a cut in my elbow he didn't even asked me if I was okay. Then tell me he didn't hear or saw anything after he made eyes contact with me. He ignored some of my message I had to send the same massage trough Airbnb to get a reply from him.
I think the host need to be honest about they place just like they have they rules for the house. I definitely have a bad taste in my mouth staying at his place. Clean house is not everything when its come to hosting a place.

It is a 5 minute walk to a subway (above ground at this point), and 10 minutes to the Metro North Train stop, which takes you to Grand Central Station and destinations north.  Andy met me, and was very helpful and kind.  I highly recommend his apartment.

name: Lovely Apartment in the heart of Barcelona.
summary: Nice apartment near Spain square, near the center and metro station (Line 3). Situated in a lovely, typical square "Poble Sec" with a lot of small authentic restaurants and all the services. You can go walking everywhere or you can take the Metro Line 3 next to the apartment and only 4 metro stops to the center or 20min walking. A comfortable and perfect place to discover the city by yourself!
description: Nice apartment near Spain square, near the center and metro station (Line 3). Situated in a lovely, typical square "Poble Sec" with a lot of small authentic restaurants and all the services. You can go walking everywhere or you can take the Metro Line 3 next to the apartment and only 4 metro stops to the center or 20min walking. A comfortable and perfect place to discover the city by yourself! The entire apartment will be at your disposal. Asf me for anything, I love Barcelona and I like to share it with my guests Poble Sec is a neighborhood that has a peculiar character, different from the rest of Barcelona. The Blai streets and the Plaza del Sortidor are the main arteries, where you can enjoy bars and spectacular restaurants. It is also next to Paral-lel avenue, Montjuïc and Spain Square three areas with lots of life and where you will find palaces, monuments and museums that you must visit. Metro Line 3 "plaça d´Espanya" station. I can come and pick you up personally at the airport

name: Spacious Apartment in Historic Harlem!
summary: Spacious apartment in historic Harlem, right next to the Apollo Theatre. Suitable for all travelers. Right in front of the train station with express trains to midtown and downtown. There is wifi and TV with a roku. The apartment has a warm and cosy feeling and features high ceilings, big windows and wood floors. The bathroom and kitchen are also spacious and get lots of sunlight.  The kitchen comes with all amenities. The apartment has everything you need to make this your home away from home!
space: This apartment is in the heart of historic Harlem, right next to the Apollo Theatre. The street is lined with shopping centers and places to eat. We are also minutes from Columbia University and Morningside Park.  Suitable for all travelers. There's a subway station in less than ten minutes, so you can easily get to downtown and avoid traffic. Julia answered very quickly all our messages and was very accomodating with our arrival's hour.

name: Bright Beach side 1 Bedroom Apartment
summary: Located on the best street in Bondi Beach with some of the best restaurants in the country right on your doorstep and just moments away from the most famous beach in the world! Our apartment is light, airy and the perfect coastal 1 Bedroom flat with outdoor space and modern amenities
space: You’ll love staying so close to the beach but right in the heart of Bondi! With a Queen sized bed and a double sofa bed you have a choice of spaces and can have a little more privacy if you’re sharing! This is a great coastal get away with a private garden with laundry/dryer facilities included. A large choice of restaurants/bars and some of the best choices in all of Sydney directly on your doorstep!
