Always available to answer any questions you might have (please bear in mind Australian time differen
neighborhood_overview: Bondi Beach is not just great for fun in the sun, there are also a huge array of restaurants, bars and cafes. Being located on Hall street means you’re right in the heart of the action with your choice of the best brunch spots or bars on your doorstep!
transit: Bondi Beach is well connected to many bus stops or is a 20min walk/10min bus to Bondi Junction which has train connections all around the city.
access: Guests are welcome to access all areas in the apartment including the garden with laundry/dryer facilities. Please bear in mind this is our home so there will be belongings (neatly condensed) into some areas.
interaction: Always available to answer any questions you might have (please bear in mind Australian time differences) but I will always get back to you as quickly as possible! As it is a 1 Bedroom it will always only be available to rent the entire space

name: Tranquil beach home with pool & ocean glimpses
summary: This private, sunny family home on Sydney's Northern Beaches offers beautiful glimpses of the sea down the coastline, in amongst lush bushland. With a light-filled open living, dining and kitchen area leading onto the large upstairs deck, this pet-friendly, family holiday home presents amazing opportunities to enjoy the tranquility. There's no better place to escape the madness of life! Just minutes from various, equally glorious beaches, and a selection of delectable cafes and restaurants.
space: Relax on the upstairs deck, overlooking the lush green landscape that Bilgola is renowned for, while catching glimpses of the beautiful blue ocean.  Enjoy a family BBQ on the shaded downstairs patio, or spend a chilled evening around the open fire pit. Take in the peace and quiet while relaxing in the sun-soaked formal lounge, or choose between watching family movies on the oversized, comfy couch and playing board games in the spacious rumpus room. Very private setting, surrounded by lovely gardens. The near-flat lawn is perfect for the kids to play on. Go for a  dip in the glistening salt-water pool or sunbathe on the lounges.
description: This private, sunny family home on Sydney's Northern Beaches offers beautiful glimpses of the sea down the coastline, in amongst lush bushland. With a light-filled open living, dining and kitchen area leading onto the large upstairs deck, this pet-friendly, family holiday home presents amazing opportunities to enjoy the tranquility. There's no better place to escape the madness of life! Just minutes from various, equally glorious beaches, and a selection of delectable cafes and restaurants. Relax on the upstairs deck, overlooking the lush green landscape that Bilgola is renowned for, while catching glimpses of the beautiful blue ocean.  Enjoy a family BBQ on the shaded downstairs patio, or spend a chilled evening around the open fire pit. Take in the peace and quiet while relaxing in the sun-soaked formal lounge, or choose between watching family movies on the oversized, comfy couch and playing board games in the spacious rumpus room. Very private setting, surrounded by lovely gardens.
neighborhood_overview: Bilgola Plateau is a small delightful community which sits on top of a hill between Newport & Avalon, with some spectacular views of water and bushland. It is never crowded, has a couple of lovely coffee shops & delis and is only five minutes to just about everywhere.
notes: We respect our neighbours and trust that our guests will do the same. Well-trained, well behaved pets are welcome.
transit: You may be tempted to just stay in when you are here but then you'd miss out on exploring all the beautiful local beaches with their golden sand and crystal clear warm water - Newport, Clareville & Bilgola are only 5 minutes drive away, and Palm Beach and Monavale not even 10 minutes.  For local shopping & dining, Avalon & Newport are on your doorstep. We'll even supply a local parking permit so that you don't have to worry about how long to spend enjoying yourself while you're out and about!
access: Make yourselves at home! We want our home to be your home-away-from-home while you are here. You have access to the pool, garden and entire house with the exception of our locked storage sheds. Upstairs has three spacious bedrooms with the fourth bedroom situated downstairs.   The upstairs deck and downstairs fire pit area seat 8 comfortably,  while the BBQ area downstairs has a table that seats 10. Superb kitchen with all mod cons and two separate lounge areas, both with TVs.  Bread, milk and other breakfast provisions await you upon your arrival. We provide fresh flowers, candles, and essential toiletries. There are both bath and beach towels available for your use. Our TV has Foxtel (with all sports channels)  and Wifi is available. Fans are provided in all rooms.
interaction: Glorious beaches, plus the delights of Avalon, Newport & Clareville within 5 minutes drive. The perfect holiday destination that will feel like you are hours away from Sydney when you're not!

host.host_location: Bilgola Plateau, New South Wales, Australia

reviews.comments: Duncan’s place offered the perfect family break for us. It’s very accessible from Sydney but gives the feeling of being far away from it all. The location is great being just a short drive from several beaches, shops, cafes etc. The house is incredibly well equipped with everything you can think of and the host went out of their way to provide helpful information and little touches which made us feel very at home. It’s a very sociable home with several eating and entertaining spots in the house: an upper balcony & bbq overlooking the treetops and ocean as well as a lower deck, dining table and bbq area downstairs. The garden is private and the pool area lovely for lounging around under a shady tree. We would have no hesitation recommending Duncan’s place.
Duncan was an amazing host. Great communication with very easy check in. The place was immaculate and had everything we needed and more. Such a beautiful place would definitely recommend.

name: Century XIX Designer Flat with balcony
summary: Located in the heart of the city centre, on the second floor of a XIX century building, this fully rehabilitated apartment maintains its original features, making the delights of any traveler that wants to discover this historical World Heritage City.
space: This apartment was specially designed and decorated combining the original ancient look with premium design and equipment so you can enjoy your stay in the most comfortable way!  It is ideal for 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children as it has a double bed and a sofa bed. Its beautiful balcony facing the sunrise is perfect for the morning breakfast or for some drinks while enjoying the beautiful view of Oporto city.  The bathroom is private and with all the amenities so you don't need to worry about it. After getting a relaxing shower go to 'Bolhão' market and with those fresh ingredients prepare a tasty meal in the fully equipped kitchen, yummy! With that gourmet dinner and a great Douro red wine at your table, the cozy ambience will make you feel at home. In winter time, the air conditioning will keep you warm inside! Also, there is a baby cot avaliable so you can bring the whole family with you!
description: Located in the heart of the city centre, on the second floor of a XIX century building, this fully rehabilitated apartment maintains its original features, making the delights of any traveler that wants to discover this historical World Heritage City. This apartment was specially designed and decorated combining the original ancient look with premium design and equipment so you can enjoy your stay in the most comfortable way!  It is ideal for 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children as it has a double bed and a sofa bed. Its beautiful balcony facing the sunrise is perfect for the morning breakfast or for some drinks while enjoying the beautiful view of Oporto city.  The bathroom is private and with all the amenities so you don't need to worry about it. After getting a relaxing shower go to 'Bolhão' market and with those fresh ingredients prepare a tasty meal in the fully equipped kitchen, yummy! With that gourmet dinner and a great Douro red wine at your table, the cozy ambience will make y
neighborhood_overview: Small local market stores located at typical and cozy squares ,provide you all the types of local products. Nearby, the Art District is where you will find the studios and galleries of the artistic trend and where you can also enjoy very nice exhibitions of international artists.  The flat is also close to a very old city theater – Teatro Carlos Alerto -  where you can watch some music, dance and performance plays. Opposite to the theater you have one of the most trendy 'corners' for an after dinner drink - 'Aduela' pub. This neighborhood is located in the UNESCO's World Heritage area. Remember you are staying in a cosmopolitan centre where people do their daily lives and routines, so you will merge in the Oporto’s lifestyle. The citizens are very friendly and they like to help. Get involved :)
notes: • If you wish to do a late check in, until 23h, it is possible but implies a payment of a 25€ fee in cash on the moment of the check-in (arrival), if the late check-in is after 23h the fee is 40€;  • If you wish to do a late check-out, until 18h, (depending on availability) it is possible but implies a payment of a 25€ fee in cash on the moment of the check-in (arrival);  •During your stay, it is possible to demand an extra cleaning service for 50€. It includes: - Clean towels and sheets - House cleaning - New shower gel, shampoo and soap.  • If you wish to have a welcome basket waiting for you when you arrive, it has a cost of 20€ and includes: -Bread -Tea -Coffee -Water -Jam -Butter -Biscuits -Fruit On top of that you can order a bottle of red Douro wine for 10€.  Note: Both of these two services must be paid in cash during the check-in.
transit: How to get here!  By METRO: The nearest metro station is called 'Trindade'. Once you get there it takes a 6 minute walk to get to the apartment. From airport take line E (purple) straight to Trindade (30 minutes). By TRAIN: The nearest train station is called São Bento. Once you get there it takes a 10 minute walk straight to the apartment.  TIP: You can always catch a TAXI to get you anywhere within a low fair price.
interaction: When you arrive we will provide maps, some suggestions for restaurants, bars and nice spots to visit as well as the nearest services such as supermarkets, health facilities or any specific need (please feel free to ask us).
house_rules: • Its NOT ALLOWED to smoke inside the apartment, you have the balcony to do so!; • After your Check-out our team will verify the apartment to ensure everything is ok. If so, the deposit will be fully refund; • NO PETS or other animals are allowed inside the apartment; • Respect you neighbour SLEEPING TIME between 22h00 and 08h00; • No one besides the guests are allowed to sleep in the apartment; • Loosing the apartment key implies a 50€ fee;

host.host_about:
We are a team called MajorDomus that offers propriety management, as well as maintenance services and we operate in Porto and in Tavira. 

As people that are used to travel, we understand the need to have good guidance when booking the place to stay because it is, in fact, the first contact you have with the city even before your arrival.  It’s your rule to treat the guest the way we wanted to be treated.
We hope you enjoy this beautiful city, the beautiful people and our awesome food.
See you soon!

reviews.comments:
Hemos estado pasando unos días en la casa de Henrique&Isabel y sin duda es una experiencia que recomendaría a cualquiera que quiera visitar Oporto. La vivienda es amplia y muy bien situada, con todos los servicios que puedas necesitar a muy poca distancia (supermercado, panadería, parking...) está en una zona cercana al centro pero que goza de tranquilidad.
Y destacar sobre todo la amabilidad de Henrique y su disponibilidad. Todas las sugerencias que nos realizó nos fueron muy útiles para descubrir Oporto.
Sin duda repetiríamos!!
Obrigado Henrique

Exceptional space, large and with all the amenities, minutes from the center in a neighborhood whose restaurants and bars are cheaper and more interesting, we really enjoyed our time here! Henrique (who was super friendly and made check-in and -out a breeze) was waiting for us when we arrived and gave us an overview of the place and Porto and some nice food recommendations. Highly recommended.
Immeuble magnifique dans un quartier en pleine évolution. Henrique est le sourire du Portugal !!!
Thank you very much to Henrique for his warm welcome. The place is really great and so comfy. We spent a lovely week-end there, thanks again xox

Henrique & Isabel han sido anfitriones inmejorables, atentos, profesionales y amables. La casa es estupenda aún mejor que en las fotos. Céntrica y a la vez muy silenciosa. Mi instancia en Oporto ha sido maravillosa también gracias a ellos y a la casa. 
Espero de volver en un futuro muy próximo. La recomiendo de verdad

The flat is stylish and very comfortable and equipped with the things you need for a successful holiday. It is very centrally situated in a lively and interesting street
Henrique is charming and has good restaurant recommendations and was available if we needed him. Highly recommended.
This place was clean, stylish, and well located. Our host, Henrique, was kind, knowledgeable and attentive. I would highly recommend this airbnb. It was an absolute pleasure to stay here.

I cannot recommend this apartment enough. Central, beautifully-decorated and very comfortable, the apartment itself feels like a home away from home. As for Henrique, he could not have done more to make us feel at home - the local tips were especially helpful!

Thanks so much to Henrique and Isabel for our stay and great hospitality! We absolutely loved the apartment - it is a gorgeous place; comfortable bed, spacious living area and clean bathroom. It’s situated on a street which is relatively quiet but close walking distance to all local amenities including a supermarket, chic bars and restaurants, quirky shops. It was just far enough from the town centre to feel private and peaceful whilst being a stones throw away from all of the excitement of Porto. I would thoroughly recommend staying here to anyone visiting.

Everything was as described. We liked the apartment, spent a great time there and Henrique was an absolut great host. He gave us excellent local advices where to eat and to visit, very gentle and was every time reachable...a great host!!!
The apartment, location and Henrique...absolutely recommended!

This lovely apartment exceeded our expectations. It is spacious, comfortable and was spotlessly clean. We enjoyed spending time on the lovely balcony/terrace. Henrique gave us fantastic recommendations of things to do in Porto. Thank you and we hope to stay again!
Henrique was such a great host and went above and beyond to accommodate us. The place is beautiful and in a fantastic location! Would love to stay here again.

We loved the apartment and the location. Privacy and tranquillity in the apartment, lots of great bars and cafes nearby, and the city a 10 minute walk away. Henrique is fantastic and was helpful throughout our stay.

L'appartement est très agréable, gorgé de soleil et décoré avec goût, si bien qu'on aimerait rester y vivre !
Idéalement placé sur les hauteurs de Porto, tout est accessible à pied, le quartier regorge de petites boutiques vintage ou design, et se trouve tout près de petites terrasses vivantes et chaleureuses. 
Henrique nous a accueilli avec le sourire et a pris le temps de nous donner plein de très bons conseils de visites adaptées à nos envies. Il mériterait de devenir un Superhost !

We had a great experience staying at Henrique's place. The host greeted us and provided useful tips for sightseeing. The apartment is very spacious, clean and has everything you need for a quick or longer stay.  Having A/C was much appreciated as it can get warm from the sun  ... I highly recommend this place for your stay in Porto.

Super accueil, appartement très agréable ou l 'on se sent bien dès qu' on y entre !
Quartier calme et facile pour partir chaque matin visiter Porto.

Beautiful apartment! The air conditioning was helpful as the sun warms up the place during the day. Henrique was more than helpful and offered great tips and gave us our bearings by patiently explaining the city. Kitchen is well equipped for your stay. We loved Porto! The hop on hop off bus tour was great. We chose the little yellow bus - and for €25 had a 2 day pass which included bus for 2 days, 6 bridges river cruise and a surprisingly great port tour! Good value. Do try the frenchasina! Enjoy Porto and your stay with Henrique!

Perfect location. Most things in Porto seems close but this apartment is secluded and at the same time a stone away from everything. The apartment is spacious and the AC does the job during 34 degrees+. When we come back, we want to stay here again.
Lovely apartment, good location and great terrace. The bedroom is internal which I didn’t realise
Thanks for everything Henrique, we had great time and the appartement was great.

Très chouette appartement, très calme, lumineux, spacieux et très bien équipé. 
Le balcon est un atout important.
Quartier très vivant et pas touristique ce qui fait du bien! (Il n'est pas loin à pied de toutes les choses à voir) Henrique accueille de façon très disponible.
Bref à recommander chaudement.

absolutely wonderful. Henrique is super helpful and accessible for check in and info about the flat and Porto. The flat is gorgeous, stylish and spacious and is even better than in the photos. Perfect for two,  and four could easily stay as there us a nice sofa bed in the living room. location was central yet tranquil. everything we needed for a great week in Porto. thank you so much Henrique, we will be back soon!

L'appartement est tout simplement charmant. Situé dans le quartier des artistes, l'appartement a complètement été rénové. Très joli! Le quartier est tranquille. Henrique a été très généreux de ses recommandations.

Beautiful apartment, great location.  Henrique gave us maps and wonderful tips about the local attraction.  We enjoyed our stay very much and would do it again if we are ever in Porto again.  Watching sunset on the balcony was relaxing!
Nice one-bedroom apartment in well refurbished apartment block.  The location is interesting and convenient.  The sofa bed is too small for 2 people.

The place is just as pictured and was very clean. The bed was comfortable and there was very little outside noise. Great patio to sit on to have breakfast or a glass of wine later in the day. The location is perfect. We walked to just about everything. Henrique provided recomendations and explainations to anything we asked about.
Hôte hyper sympa, appartement magnifique, très propre, insonorisé, avec air climatisé, lave linge et joli balcon tranquille, bon emplacement, excellent en tout.
We had a great stay at Henrique's place! He provided really good tips and was very hospitable. The location of this apartment is perfect and it has a really nice balcony!
The apartment was very comfortable and beautifully decorated. Everything we needed including washing machine for a longer stay. We were very happy with our stay in Porto.
Simply sublime! Perfect location, a beautiful home and outstanding hospitality. Will definitely be coming here again!

The apartment is spacious and modern. It is close to the metro and about a 15 minute walk to the river. The area initially appeared to be a bit grungy but it also had a lot of local colour and interesting shops. Some great local bakeries and port shops are near by.

A beautiful space in the heart of Porto. bright and airy, with some lovely period touches - and an incredibly warm and informative welcome from our host, Henrique. The perfect spot for a weekend break!

This apartment is in a great location, quiet but an easy walk to lots of Porto’s attractions. The space is light, the amenities are spot on and the sunrise from the balcony is spectacular. Thanks Henrique for greeting us at the apartment and sharing so much information about Porto.

name: Remodeled penthouse in Gracia *Bcn*
summary: Apartment completely renovated in the best area of Gracia. With two double bedrooms and a small terrace is the best place to explore Barcelona, enjoying the tranquility of an attic and the luxury of being 5 minutes from the metro stop.
space: This spacious penthouse is located on the top floor of a building with elevator located in the district of Gracia, one of the most emblematic of Barcelona. The apartment has been completely renovated in December 2017. It has two bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other with a truckle bed (single bed that can be converted into two beds). It also has a sofa-bed in the dining room, ideal if you come with children if you are 6 people. The bathroom with shower has been renovated maintaining details of the Barcelona modernist style. The kitchen is open to the dining room, and is equipped with all the necessary utensils to prepare a delicious meal. In the dining room we find a table with capacity for up to 6 people and a spacious sofa that easily converts into a comfortable double bed. From the dining room we can go directly to a terrace with an nice table to enjoy the Mediterranean climate of Barcelona and the wonderful views over Tibidabo. Tourism license number: HUTB-008122

neighborhood_overview: The district of Gracia is one of the most emblematic and authentic of Barcelona, since it has managed to maintain the essence of the city, preserving its shops, museums and traditional restaurants. One of the main advantages is that it is not located in the tourist epicenter, so you can visit the city and the genuine culture of Barcelona, but in just 20 minutes by public transport you will reach Plaça Catalunya.

host.host_about: Our only objective is to ensure that your stay is even better than you imagined. We are Oscar from Barcelona and Maria from Girona, we married in 2013 and we have 2 wonderful children. Also, together we started Flateli, a little group of properties we love to manage to host our guests and make them feel like home. Ask anything you need and we will make our best to get it for you!

reviews.comments: Antonio is a great, detailed and responsible host. Antonio's place is clean and comfortable. The house is on the 4th floor, its a good exercise for us to walk up and down everyday. The area here (Sheung Wan) is not crowded which we loved it so much. There are many nice restaurants around as well as tourist attractions. It takes 10-15mins walk to MTR station (Sheung Wan Station) which is convenient too! ;) We will definitely stay here again for our next Hong Kong trip!
처음 에어앤비 사용하는 것이라 부담감이 많았다. 주인이 매우 친절하다. 생각보다 너무 좋았네요. 나중에 홍콩에 다시 가면 또 이 집을 이용하고 싶네요. 아주 아주 깨끗한집입니다. 두 사람 지내기에는 넘 좋았어요. 제겐 베스트였네요^^
It’s a lovely and cozy place and the location is very convenient. Antonio is a very nice guy, let us check out late in last day.we enjoyed for staying in his apartment.

Nice little place in a trendiest HK area, a few steps to Man Mo temple, Soho and all Central area. Apartment is 4 stores up the stairs what is a good warm up every day. Pretty coffe shops, bakeries  and restaurants around. Really recommend this place to stay

name: 1921 - AB Paral·lel Apartment A - Contemporary Penthouse with a Private Terrace
summary: This apartment for up to 6 guests is situated on Paral.lel in the neighbourhood of Poble Sec, within easy reach of the city centre, the beach and Montjuïc. Paral.lel is lined with restaurants, cafés and bars and sits away from the main tourist strip, whilst still offering a central location. The whole apartment has been recently renovated, boasting exposed brickwork, neutral décor and modern furnishings. The open-plan kitchen, dining and living area is complemented by a huge floor to ceiling glass door spanning the width of the room that floods the space with light and leads out to the large roof terrace. The terrace is over 33 square metres in size and is equipped with outdoor furniture including sun loungers and a large dining table with chairs so you can sit out in the sun, soak up the rays and enjoy meals al fresco with family and friends. The terrace even features an outdoor shower, ideal for after sunbathing or when you come back from the beach. The kitchen is fully equipped with
space: Todo el apartamento ha sido recientemente renovado, con ladrillo, decoración neutra y mobiliario moderno. La cocina de planta abierta, el comedor y la sala de estar se complementan con una gran puerta de vidrio del piso al techo que abarca el ancho de la habitación, proporciona al espacio mucha luz y conduce a la gran terraza. La terraza tiene más de 33 metros cuadrados y está equipada con muebles de exterior, como tumbonas y una gran mesa de comedor con sillas para que pueda sentarse a tomar el sol y disfrutar de comidas al aire libre con la familia y amigos, también cuenta con una ducha al aire libre, ideal para tomar el sol o al regresar de la playa. La cocina está totalmente equipada con horno, hervidor de agua, tostadora, exprimidor, cafetera, una gran nevera-congelador, ollas y sartenes. Prepara tus comidas favoritas y disfrútalas en la mesa de comedor redonda antes de relajarte en el sofá para ver la televisión. El sofá también funciona como un sofá cama, ofreciendo espacio adic

house_rules: The check-in will be made at our reception: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 558.  Barcelona’s tourist tax is €2,48 per person and night, for a maximum of 7 nights. It is not included in the price. Anyone under the age of 17 is exempt.  Only adults over 25 years old and/or families are accepted.  Basic cleaning service every 4 days. Includes: Sweeping of all floor surfaces, cleaning the toilet, shower and sink, and removing the rubbish. Does not include: A change of sheets or towels. If you need a more thorough clean you can hire our cleaning service by contacting our Customer Service.

host.host_about:
Hi everyone!

We are Eva & Jacques and we work in the travel and tourism industry. Our company is AB Apartment Barcelona. What we aim to do is offer each of our guests the best Barcelona experience, from start to finish. So as soon as you begin to book your stay right up until the moment you leave Barcelona, my team and I will be available to help you with any questions you might have, or even just to offer you some friendly advice. 

We have one office open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, meaning you can contact us anytime you want, day or night. We speak many languages between us, and we’re all tourism professionals. Plus, we know all the best places to go in Barcelona, from sights and attractions to bars and restaurants (including where the locals go) so we can help you make your time in the city the most memorable with our insider tips ;)

By renting your apartment in Barcelona through me, you’ll be in safe hands.

We looking forward to meeting you soon!

name: Bright & spacious 1BR apartment with ocean views!
summary: Our family-friendly, airy & spacious 1-BR apartment in Bondi (60 m2 + 12 m2 of balcony with ocean views) is great for travellers who'd love the proximity of beach & ocean, yet prefer the comfort of a quiet, local street. We are a stone's throw from Bondi, Bronte and Tamarama beaches (all 10 min walk away) and Bondi Jnc Station and Westfield (15 min walk or 5 min bus trip). Kids' amenities (cot, high chair) are available upon request. Parking is in our driveway.

reviews.comments: Our stay at Alex‘s apartment was great. The house is in a great location and the rooms were clean and well equipped. We didn‘t meet the hosts but they left us a notice with helpful information. We really enjoyed our stay and recommend this apartments to others! Thank you!!

Aleksandra was a wonderful host. She went above and beyond to accomodate our family and make us feel at home. Her place was just as described-perfect location, clean and spacious. I would highly recommend her place to anyone wanting to stay in the Bondi/Bronte area. We hope to stay again in the future.

name: "Hôtel" room Frontenac metro, private & furnished
summary: Nous sommes plusieurs locataires d'un bel appartement. Il est spacieux avec de grandes pièces éclairée & des meubles éclectiques. Nous sommes trois locataires mais il y a souvent plus de monde, avec les animaux aussi! Belle ambiance décontractée, on est plutôt des oiseaux de nuit. Au plaisir! We are a few roommates in a nice apartment. It's spacious with good light and eclectic style. We are usually 3 but sometimes more with the animals and friends. Good vibe, relax and friendly. See you :)
space: Cuisine spacieuse et agréable.  Salle à manger correcte, mais peu utilisée. Salle de bain confortable et accessible. Chambre de l'hôte, vous verrez Chambre Airbnb, comme une chambre d'hôtel! Près de l'entrée, chaleureuse et juste assez grande!!  Grande terrasse privé accessible (fermée l'hiver) Deux balcons fumeurs, nous sommes non fumeur en général
description: Nous sommes plusieurs locataires d'un bel appartement. Il est spacieux avec de grandes pièces éclairée & des meubles éclectiques. Nous sommes trois locataires mais il y a souvent plus de monde, avec les animaux aussi! Belle ambiance décontractée, on est plutôt des oiseaux de nuit. Au plaisir! We are a few roommates in a nice apartment. It's spacious with good light and eclectic style. We are usually 3 but sometimes more with the animals and friends. Good vibe, relax and friendly. See you :) Cuisine spacieuse et agréable.  Salle à manger correcte, mais peu utilisée. Salle de bain confortable et accessible. Chambre de l'hôte, vous verrez Chambre Airbnb, comme une chambre d'hôtel! Près de l'entrée, chaleureuse et juste assez grande!!  Grande terrasse privé accessible (fermée l'hiver) Deux balcons fumeurs, nous sommes non fumeur en général Vous avez accès à tout.  Brassée de lavage : OK max 2 par semaine Cuisine : OK vaisselle en ordre et apportez votre nourriture, nous ne fournissons pas.
neighborhood_overview: Le quartier Centre-Sud n'est pas très excitant. Par contre, la promenade Ontario se trouve a 15 minutes de marche et le métro Frontenac à 2 minutes. Vous avez donc beaucoup d'options de bons restaurants, de bars et d'activités dans le coin.
notes: Nous avons un chat (Boris), très calme et propre. Parfois la colocataire a son chien (Bailey) qui reste de l'autre côté de l'appartement
transit: Voiture : Rues Hogan ou Bercy Métro : Station Frontenac Bus : 125 Ontario Est/Ouest Plusieurs stations de Bixi
access: Vous avez accès à tout.  Brassée de lavage : OK max 2 par semaine Cuisine : OK vaisselle en ordre et apportez votre nourriture, nous ne fournissons pas. Douches : OK pas trop longues ni trop chaudes svp Séchoir, peignoir, pantoufles, serviettes et débarbouillettes fournis.
interaction: J'aime bien parler avec qui est chez moi, mais il faut garder en tête l'intimité. Nous sommes chez nous après-tout :) Par contre, nous allons surement apprendre à se connaitre! Gardez simplement en tête que l'esprit de cette annonce est plutôt celui d'une chambre d'hôtel privée et confortable.
house_rules: Tout est à votre disposition, gardez ça propre et on va bien s'entendre!  Everything is in the room. Keep it clean and we'll be in good terms!

host.host_about: Je suis étudiante en enseignement et j'ai une vie assez occupée, remplie de projets. Ma colocataire, Vanessa, est passionnée d'hôtellerie et de luxe. Notre projet : Une chambre d'hôtel chez nous. On vous offre un nid douillet pour la nuit ou la semaine, intime et fourni de tout ce dont vous pourriez avoir besoin. Au plaisir de vous rencontrer!

reviews.comments: I was not expecting so many thoughtful little touches!  She really went the extra mile.  The coffee maker in the room was particularly heavenly.

Location idéale, bonne communication,  très propre, et très confortable. Charlene est très gentille. Je recommande cet location .
.
Charlene’s place is really cozy. Also, She is so thoughtful and nice. I fully recommand this place :)

Excellent value, Friendly host, nice room and close to Metro for easy movement.  The use of the kitchen during my stay was a nice bonus. Downsides were breakfast is listed in the description but was not provided. Also was offered an early check-in which wasn't possible after my booking was made.  However, I would still recommend the room.
Very nice room in Charléne's home. Metro station and city bike rentals around the corner. Would love to stay there again!

In many ways, Charlene was a great host. She was very accommodating when it came to check-in and check-out hours. Also, her apartment is nice, has all the necessary basic features and would be clean for anyone who is not a clean-freak.

For us it wasn't a problem, we are very deep sleepers, but beware that the house has rather thin walls and you will easily hear noise from the rest of the house during the night.
Simple but cozy. Charlene was lovely.   Comfy bed and coffee was a nice touch.
Chambre confortable proche du centre ville et du métro.
Cozy bedroom with balcony, comfortable bed. Charlene was very welcoming.
Amazing place and great location!
Nice stay for young people in a big apartment. Charlene is a very friendly host! Thank you, xoxo
Super séjour ! De belles rencontres ! Lit super confortable et très bien passé !
Charlene was very approachable and sweet! The place was cute and stylish to stay in as a younger person:)
Charlène est très sympathique . Le Airbnb est très bien situé à quelques minutes du métro  , la chambre est très bien. Je recommande a 100%

Very nice place. Super clean and cozy :-)
I recommend it

Super belle place, très propre et agréable.
Je recommande fortement.
Charlene’s place is great for travelers, we only stayed one night but we rested well and she was really nice and welcoming !

The location is good. Parking was not free. apartment was lovely and French style. The indoor cat was really adorable and the most friendly cat I have ever seen! Charlene was cute,friendly and helpful! Would definitely recommend this place!

Charlene was a great host. She gave us all the privacy we needed and provided all the essentials needed for a comfortable stay. Can’t ask or expect anything else for the price. Charlene was even kind enough to recommend a great local live music bar for us to enjoy during our New Years celebration. The room is located at the front of the apartment, and it’s a good size. The bed provided is a futon, so be careful not to put too much weight all on one side - we learned this the funny way. We both fell off the bed while sitting on one side of it.

Charlene was a very gracious host. She was immediately friendly in her greeting and made me feel welcome. I also found that her place is a great representation of what its like for locals to live in Montreal. Thank you ! Would recommend.
Hôte très sympathique, parfait pour bien commencer son séjour au Québec !

I loved it. I needed a room in Montreal for a few days mainly for sleep and this place was beyond my expectations. Charlene and Simon are friendly and respectful. There were plenty of amenities I didn’t used but appreciated.
très bon accueil de Charlene. l'appartement est spacieux et la chambre est très bien emménagée. je n'ai manqué de rien. Très bien situé.  Merci pour les bons conseils.

Perfect room just 2 minutes walk from Subway station.
Apartment was clean , and Charlene was very helpful. 
Confortable bed, clean bathroom and equipped kitchen.
A lovely little apartment in a great location to get the subway into central montreal! Great value for money :)
ÓTima estadia! Uma localização perto do metro, e o quarto muito bem cuidado e com ótimos detalhes.

Es una linda habitación donde pudimos descansar agusto ya que nadie hacía ruido. La casa está muy cerca de una estación del metro lo cual facilita tu movilidad, además de tener una plaza como a una cuadra donde hay restaurantes económicos. En la descripción dice que hay un gato, pero realmente no es molesto, ya que nunca entró a nuestra habitación, lo vimos muy poco.
Great location. Considerate host. Cool common area.
Good one
It was close to the metro station and very convenient. Charlene was a nice host!

name: Affordable traveler's studio in the heart of HK
summary: BEST LOCATION: Causeway Bay: affordable accommodation. It’s a furnished and newly renovated small studio at the centre of Causeway Bay (5min to Times Square, Victoria Park, SOGO department store, MTR stations). There is a double bed, separate shower/bathroom and an airconditioner. Suitable for travelers, students, young professionals and couple. Self-checkin and checkout available for your convenience. Just arrive with your suitcases!
description: BEST LOCATION: Causeway Bay: affordable accommodation. It’s a furnished and newly renovated small studio at the centre of Causeway Bay (5min to Times Square, Victoria Park, SOGO department store, MTR stations). There is a double bed, separate shower/bathroom and an airconditioner. Suitable for travelers, students, young professionals and couple. Self-checkin and checkout available for your convenience. Just arrive with your suitcases! MTR is 5min away.
transit: MTR is 5min away.

host.host_about:
Hi,

I am a full time research student. I have been an airbnb host for a more than 7 years now and I always enjoyed hosting people from all over the world. I am a quiet, respectful person and spend most of my time in the library during term times. I have traveled to many places in Europe and Asia, and have had the opportunity to stay in quite a few of them as a Airbnb guest myself.
The location of my flat is great and you surely won't be disappointed.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Great location, easy to find, restaurants around, close to MRT.
accomodation a bit small for two but it's ok for one. no windows that's a fact but it's ok for few days.
Lysa is so helpful, Idefinitely recommend her studio.
Great place..lovely host...

Lysa’s place was exactly what I needed. A few blocks from the MTR in Causeway Bay. The listing may be small but it was all I needed for a quick layover. 
Lysa was great at providing check in details and also provided local tips. 
Definitely would stay there again!

Fantastic location for a great price .. just beware that there’s no window to the street, so if you need natural light, this isn’t the place for you ..
Great place to crash for a couple of nights in HK tough!

This apartment is at an awesome location and perfect for a solo traveller. Everything is accessible - convenience store, MRT isn't so far and the buses and trams are just steps away. Apartment was bigger than I expected as per HK standards but bathroom was small - no surprises there. For me the best part was the location as it near to all main areas of HK. I will definitely stay here if I ever visit HK again!

The place was clean when I arrived and the listed amenities were all there. Would have liked a trash bin and vacuum cleaner to clean while I was leaving but I had to make do with what I had. Lysa is a great host and her check in steps were detailed and easy to follow. Maybe slightly faster responses would have been nice but I faced no problems so it's all good. :)

Highly recommend this place and the location!

Nice place in a great location.  Easy to get around from there and easy to check in. Place was small (it is Hong Kong and Causeway Bay after all) but has everything you need including a hot plate and cooking utensils and a fridge and plenty of places to store your things to keep the room tidy. Plus, Lysa was super nice!  Only problems really were in the bathroom where the toilet had to be manually filled with water to flush (this wasn't that big of a deal and, per a chat with the neighbor, apparently affects not just this apartment but the adjacent ones as well from time to time) and we had to sit sideways on the toilet in order to fit in the bathroom since it's so close up against the wall. Didn't affect our stay in a negative way really though as it fully served our needs for a few days. Thanks Lysa!

The room size is bigger than the standard of HK. Easy check in and check out. There’s a lot of food stalls nearby. Elevator is quite old school but okay. Bathroom toilet has some issues, but I was told that it’s already resolved. Communication with Lysa is very convenient, she responds to queries really fast.

name: Waterfront Apartment Maroubra Beach
summary: Maroubra is only 30min from Sydney CBD. An Ecological Reserve which makes this city beach unique. No car needed, buses run till late and we're only 30sec. walking from the bus stop.  Close to all coffee shops and restaurants (The Bakery, North End Cafe,The Pool, Feedbag Burger, etc) this unit is situated right at the north end of the beach. Make the beach your backyard :) and don't forget to do the walk Maroubra to Malabar. Great place for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
space: Situated on the north end of Maroubra, facing east which will make the sun light your alarm every morning in Summer. Only 1 min walking to the beach, this unit is perfect for a summer holidays. A simple, clean and comfortable space with all kitchen appliances to make your life easier or just a 3 min walk to most restaurants. Enjoy your breakfast, lunch or dinner with a 5 star view.

host.host_about:
Hi, I'm Will!
Brazilian born but living in Maroubra, Australia for the past 10 years.
I'm easy going person that sees life as an unique chance, making the most of it not caring much for material things but caring more about having a good healthy life surrounded by friends and discovering new places.
Love sports, I'm surfer, soccer lover (standard for a Brazilian, even been 10 yrs away haven't lost it),  snowboarder, skater...

reviews.comments: It's my first time to rent house on Airbnb . Fortunately , I choose Willyan's house . Willyan is very friendly people . It's very tidy and clean . If you like surfing , you can't miss this house , just walk 1 min than you can arrive beach , everynight you can hear sea sound from beach , it's very comfortable .

name: Liiiving in Porto | Downtown Charm Apartment
summary: Fabulous duplex studio in the heart of Porto! The space has a suite with a double bed upstairs and a fully equipped living room and kitchen on the lower floor. This cozy space is the ideal place to enjoy an unforgettable stay in the beautiful city of Porto. Book it now! Because Liiiving is easy :)
space: Fabuloso estúdio duplex no coração da Cidade do Porto! O espaço dispõe de uma suite com cama de casal no andar superior e de uma sala de estar e cozinha completamente equipadas no piso inferior. Este espaço acolhedor é o local ideal para usufruir de uma estadia inesquecível na belíssima cidade do (Website hidden by Airbnb) todas as comodidades a um passo de distância. Reserve já! Porque Liiiving is easy!

This cozy space is the ideal place to enjoy an unforgettable stay in the beautiful city of Porto. Book it now! Because Liiiving is easy :) The guests have full access to the apartment. We leave our guests at ease, but we’re available whenever they need us. It's in the heart of the Invicta City! Less than 5 minutes away you will be on Avenida dos Aliados and close to the main attractions of the city, such as Clérigos Tower, Lions Square and also the iconic Bolhão Market! Access to transport will not be lacking as it is only a few minutes away from two major Trindade and Aliados metro stations. Perfect for those who want to enjoy the culture and tradition of the city, being within walking distance of all the entertainment! Less than 5 minutes away you will be on Avenida dos Aliados and close to the main attractions of the city, such as Clérigos Tower, Lions Square and also the iconic Bolhão Market! Access to transport will not be lacking as it is only a few minutes away from two major Trindade and Aliados metro stations. Perfect for those who want to enjoy the culture and tradition of the city, being within walking distance of all the entertainment!
notes: In order to make Porto more attractive, the municipal tourist tax came into effect. The rate of € 2.00 included in the price of stay, is for guests over the age of 13. It is charged per person and per night for a maximum of 7 nights. We have a transfer service that will leave you at the apartment! You only need to ask it (consult us for price) You can also enjoy a delicious breakfast, which can be delivered every morning in your apartment, upon request (consult us for price)
transit: You can request our transfer service whenever you need it (consult us for price) There is a vast public transportation network at your disposal.
access: The guests have full access to the apartment.
interaction: We leave our guests at ease, but we’re available whenever they need us.
house_rules: Treat the apartment and its items well and with care as it was your own :) Smoking is just allowed outside. Please respect the neighbors: No loud noise allowed before 10h00 am or after 10h00 pm. Please Respect the check in and check out times: •	Check in: from 15h00-24h00. Please provide a check in time at least 24h hours before you arrival. If you need a baggage drop (from 12h00) please let us know in advance. A member of Liiiving Team will have the pleasure to meet and welcome you at the apartment at the arranged time. •	Check-out: until 11h00. (If there’s availability, we would love to provide you a late check-out). Please do take care of the decoration items, furniture, towels/linen and other apartment's equipment. Any doubts handling the apartment's appliances and equipment please feel free to contact us. Please leave all electric appliances turned off, make sure water taps are not running and close all doors and windows before check-out. We ask guests to please leave the dishes a

host.host_about:
Olá! We are Liiiving's Short Stay team!

We are looking forward to welcome you in our properties :)
We were born and we have lived in Porto. We will be happy to help you out to know and enjoy every city where we are installed !
We love to meet new people, enjoy literature, cinema, to travel, meeting other cultures, other ways of being and living life !
We are delighted to give a personal welcome to our guests and to receive them the best way we can :)
Hope to see you soon !

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: Lovely little duplex, very clean, comfortable bed and nice bathroom...Thank you to our host Thomas who was great. He was quick to reply and help us with anything we needed! Good value for money and would definitely come back!
Sítio muito acolhedor e confortável!

Apartamento renovado, equipa profissional atenta a todas as questões. Tudo funcionava perfeitamente e está numa localização priveligiada no que toca a saídas nocturnas e proximidade dos transportes e locais turísticos.

É de ter em atenção que o duplex tem a sala à face da rua o que será importante de ter em conta no que diz respeito à privacidade, e que a rua está em obras, pelo que tive sempre barulho pela manhã, embora seja algo alheio à equipa, a qual é excelente.

Quanto à atenção, nada me faltou e foram sempre de rápida resposta. Recomendo reservar este alojamento.
This apartment is in a great location! Lovely and clean and very spacious. Close to some lovely bars, but also on a quiet street.

We really enjoyed our stay. The apartment was very clean and tidy. Location was within a 15-20 minute walk from the sights we wanted to see. There is a supermarket about 3 minutes away. The check in process was smooth and  Humberto was very helpful.

Très bon séjour 
Appartement magnifique et très propre , merci de nous avoir accueilli des 10 h . À bientôt
friendly staff with local recommendations who want to make sure you enjoy your time. overall pleased with the experience, a few additional amenities would have improved the experience even more.

name: Quarto de casal próximo ao aeroporto Galeão
summary: O quarto é arejado e espaçoso, o banheiro fica ao lado do quarto e é privado. Os hóspedes tem livre acesso a cozinha e a piscina. Localização super próxima ao aeroporto internacional ,mercado, bancos,shopping. A Casa fica em um condomínio fechado por isso se torna um local bem seguro para se hospedar .
space: A casa possui  3 andares,   fica em um condominio fechado com portaria e câmeras de segurança  24horas. O quarto é arejado e bem confortável com bastante espaço para malas e afins.O Banheiro fica ao lado do quarto e é privativo também .   Disponho de uma cama King size,  3 colchões de solteiro que podem ser colocados no chão para mais pessoas dormirem. O quarto tem ar condicionado split inverter , ventilador ,mesa de estudos com cadeira, guarda-roupa embutido ,Wi-Fi   e televisão a cabo.

neighborhood_overview: O bairro é bem centralizado, perto de mercados, bancos, shopping e restaurantes.A residência  Fica a 3,8 km ( máximo 10 minutos )do aeroporto internacional Galeão! A casa fica num condomínio fechado, por isso é um local seguro.
notes: Tenho dois cachorros de pequeno porte. Eles ficam soltos  nas áreas em comum da casa .

interaction: Estou em casa na maior parte do tempo .

reviews.comments: Muy agradecido de Heidy por su rápida respuesta. De emergencia necesitaba un alojamiento para una noche cerca del aeropuerto y su habitación fue perfecta para nosotros.

Nós (eu e a minha namorada) alugamos o quarto da Heidy por 1 noite, devido a uma conexão longa no Aeroporto do Galeão, e adoramos muito á hospitalidade da Heidy, é uma pessoa muito simpática e acaba deixando os hóspedes bem á vontade com isso. A casa é bem localizada e fica pertinho do aeroporto Galeão, então quem está buscando uma estadia confortável para passar a noite ou vários dias, o quarto da Heidy é muito bom. O quarto é amplo e o banheiro também, tudo muito limpo e organizado! Vale muito a pena ficar no quarto que a Heidy disponibiliza! Obrigado por tudo! Até uma próxima! Abraços!!

Estadia ótima, novamente muito bem recebido. A localização é ótima, próxima a transportes, aeroporto, refeições e com facilidade de estacionamento. Acomodação limpa e muito boa. Parabéns por sua receptividade.
Podem apostar que o lugar é muito bom e a anfitriã é super gente boa.
Adorei ficar na casa da Heidy, muito simpática e hospitaleira. O quarto é muito confortável e espaçoso. Lugar mais que recomendado.

We booked our one night stay with Heidi only hours before arrival as a last minute decision. Heidi responded straight away and the room was ready on arrival with a big king bed. The house is very close to the international airport and rental car locations which was all we needed.
The room had A/C and a good fan.
Heidi’s daughter can speak great English which helped. They have 2 lovely small dogs. We didn’t use the rooftop pool but it looked inviting. Large kitchen facility downstairs and close to supermarket and restaurants. Recommend!
Muy buena recepción por parte de Heidy y muy cómoda la ubicación para llegar al Aeropuerto Galeao.

Gostei do quarto, é amplo, arejado e claro. Bem localizado. Banheiro ao lado do quarto. Cozinha equipada e disponível para uso. 
Era o que estava precisando. Dei a sugestão para cortina black-out para quem acorda mais tarde.
Tudo OK.

Já é a segunda vez que eu me hospedo na casa da Heidy. Casa muito bem localizada, perto de tudo. O quarto é confortável e a Heidy é uma excelente (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, eu volto a me hospedar.

Me hospedei muito brevemente em uma noite, e a Heidi foi muito atenciosa e gentil.
Meu quarto era excelente, cama e travesseiro ótimos.
Os demais ambientes também estavam muito adequados e organizados para o uso. 
Local muito tranquilo e seguro.
Book this place! She is an amazing host!
Lugar incrível! Limpo, organizado e com todo o conforto para um boa noite de sono.
Realmente a Heidy está de parabéns como anfitriã  , tudo perfeito, sempre com muita atenção e respostas! Limpeza de parabéns! Voltarei!
Heidy was so hospitable and accommodating. She went out of her way for us and I cannot thank her enough. Her space was wonderful as well!
Ótima localização. Ótima acomodação. Anfitriã super gentil.
Ambiente espaçoso, bem fiel às fotos e anfitriã bastante atenciosa!
A Heidy é uma fofa, super simpatica, me ajudou bastante na minha hospedagem. Agradeço por tudo.

name: Luxury 3 Bedroom Apartment in Prime location
summary: A prime offering of lifestyle and convenience. This modern 3 level apartment offers light filled living in the heart of Surry Hills. Close to central station, cafes and restaurants in all aspects of Surry Hills. This property offers a spacious light filled open plan living/dining area, TV included, outdoor balconies with bbq facilities, ducted air conditioning throughout, kitchen and laundry facilities, three double bedrooms and bathrooms and internal lift.
space: Luxurious living in this spacious three storey, three bedroom, two and a half bathroom, open plan living apartment. Conveniently located in the heart of Surry Hills and extraordinarily close to central stations, cafes and restaurants  Highlights: - Internal lift - Modern interiors, in-out flow - Open living ares and timber floors - Contemporary kitchen with integrated appliances - Ducted Air-conditioning  - Full laundry facilities - Thee double sized bedrooms with Master King, Balcony and ensuite - Sunny and tranquil balcony with bbq facilities. The open plan living/dining and kitchen area flows out to an outdoor balcony complete with BBQ.  Fully functional kitchen with ceramic cooktop, dishwasher and coffee maker for your morning coffee. Complete with six person dining setting and flat-screen TV.

neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is an evolving area known for its stylish cultural and cafe scene. Including coffee joints, fashion boutiques and global eateries. Trendy pubs, wine bars and galleries dot the area around Surry Hills Library, a community hub with a contemporary, sustainable design. Held once a month, Surry Hills Markets lure shoppers for snacks and vintage goods.
transit: The property is a 5 minute walk to Central Station.
access: The entire apartment is accessible.
interaction: Feel free to contact me if you need any information relating to the apartment.

name: Private room in stylish loft in Surry Hills
summary: Great opportunity to stay at the most vibrant area of Sydney. Private double bedroom, fully furnished room with built in wardrobe in a stylish boutique warehouse conversion building. name: Manly Haven- Best Location with carpark
summary: Beautiful apartment in Manly, incredible location and views. Car park available, across the street from the famous Manly beach, 5 min walk to cafes and restaurants, 10 min walk to Manly markets and ferry.  Full of light and fully equipped for your perfect vacation.
space: The house is right on the beach strip, full of light and is perfectly designed to enjoy the Manly vibes.  there is a fully equipped kitchen, big living room with an apple TV and a wooden bar, looking out to the great view of the Manly beach. one of the bedrooms is an en-suite with their own shower and toilet.  there is a patio and small garden with an outdoor BBQ. there's a parking space under the building just for the house guests.

name: Chambre privée - Plateau Mont-Royal
summary: Je loue ma chambre pendant 10 jours car je pars en vacances. Vous partagerez le logement avec mes 3 adorables colocataires.  À votre disposition :  - Chambre avec lit double - Salon (avec rétroprojecteur) - Cuisine (toute équipée)  - 2 Salles de bain à partager (serviettes et produits non fournit).  À 10 mn à pied du métro Laurier et bus.  À 15 mn à pied de l'avenue Mont-Royal (restau, bar, café, shops, etc.) L'heure d'entrée/sortie des lieux peut varier selon les jours, on peut s'arranger :)
